name: Spot Apartments Sao Bento 61
summary: Spot Apartments Sao Bento 61 Bedroom, is a duplex apartment that sleeps up to 6 guests.
space: The Spot Apartments Sao Bento are fully set to you Comfort. The building is located in the city center and is equipped with an elevator. Metro and bus stops are at a 1 minute from the apartment. The apartments is 130 m2, and offers two bedrooms, a living and dining room, an equipped kitchen and two bathrooms. There's a room with a double bed and one with twin beds. There’s also a sofa/bed for two in the living room, allowing six people to sleep comfortably. The apartment also has cable tv and free wifi internet. There's also parking place available, under consultation, fot 7,5€ per day. Your apartment will be the perfect starting point to discover the city on foot, as the main Square and city’s attractions are located just five minutes away, as well as hits vibrant night live. In the neighborhood there are also several restaurants, with a large variety of food. host.host_about: I've lived in Porto all my life, and I Love it. Come and discover this amazing city.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Jose's apartment is in a great location, within Porto. It is in the heart of the historical city centre; walking distance to churches, cathedrals, cafes, and quaint little shops. The apartment is lightly furnished in sophisticated fashion.

El apartamento está limpio, tiene buenas vistas, y es completamente funcional, lo recomiendo. 

La atención ha sido buena en todo momento.

We made a same day booking for a 2 night stay in Porto. The response was quick which was great. 

The location of the apartment is great, making it easy to walk everywhere, with plenty of shops, cafes and restaurants. It is also very close to the Sao Bento metro station. 

The apartment itself is minimalistic and spacious, and can comfortably sleep 6 people. \
Regarding amenities, there is no washing machine and you will need to bring your own tea and coffee etc. ( bedding, towels, toilet paper, kitchen utensils are provided for)

We had a situation with the building maintenance, which is out of the control of the apartment owner, however feel, that it could have been better managed and communicated.

Upon checking in, we were notified that the building was having a problem with a water leak, and maintenance would need to come and fix the pipes the next morning for a few hours. The owner assured us, this will be quick and of the least disturbance. For the inconvenience of not being able to use the kitchen sink and the disturbance caused, complementary parking was offered. We were totally fine with this. 

When we used the main entrance that evening, the lobby ceiling was dripping with water, through the ceiling light sockets, and all over the floor. We notified the owners immediately. With no response that evening.

The next morning maintenance took longer then anticipated and felt like a full on construction site due to the drilling. The owners apologised and assured us not to worry., and that further compensations would be made. We left before they had finished. Upon returning, the kitchen was dusty and dirty, we texted the owner and they gave us the option to check out and they would refund the 2nd night or stay with further compensation to be discussed.  Due to the lack of time, we decided to stay.

With the check out, we would just leave with the keys in the apartment. However, we did not have any form of communication from the owners, so decided to call (international calls that we had to pay) to see what further compensations could be made. After a few calls and a bit of back and forth, the owners agreed to compensate 25% of the accommodation. They were immediate in the action which we appreciate.

Magnifique 
Location parfaite
Great location, super nice apartment, friendly hosts
Great location. Warm and clean on a chilly winter stay.  Loved the refurbished listing.  Great shops and cafe close by and so close to amasing restaurants. I will be back!
O andar esta no centro da cidade. Jose estava a hora acordada. Ao chegar o andar estava perfeitamente limpo. A estadia transcorreu conforavelmente.

Todos estaba muy bien. La locación, las habitaciones, los baños, la cocina...etc
Quiero quedarme si viajo Oporto otro día :)

L'appartement est réellement fidèle aux photos, propre, clair et vraiment sublime.
Il est idéalement placé, proche des principaux lieux de visites (pont luis, se do porto, gare de Sao Bento, avenue des aliados..)
J'ai vraiment hâte de revenir à Porto et louer cet appartement car nous en avons très peu profité des belles installations.

This penthouse was perfect for me and my three friends. Very spacious, clean and beautiful views of the tower.  We especially liked how central it was to everything in Porto. It's a fabulous place in many ways. The host was super accommodating and extremely helpful.

Jose was great! The Apartment was extremely neat and comfortable. We all slept well and it is located right in the heart of everything. We were able to walk to almost all of the sights. Also, I really appreciated the help with parking and with food recommendations.

The apartment was centrally located with great views, spacious interior, and comfortable furnishings. We stayed in July, so the second floor was quite warm, although open windows made for a great breeze. Joana was very warm and welcoming and gave us great advice about beautiful Porto. We can't wait to come back to Porto and would happily stay here again!

A beautiful, clean and very spacious apartment on top 2 floors of apartment building. Nice views in two directions and great location, everything within walking distance. Private parking available in the building for 7.50 per day. Excellent mobile wifi equipment. Very warm and informative welcome by Joana. She was very helpful during our stay. 
It was very hot in porto, and also in the bedrooms. We had a bit of a struggle to cool the rooms as there were no fans and opening the windows brought streetnoise inside.   
We would certainly recommend this apartment to visitors of porto!

The apartment is extraordinally well located in the heart of Porto, and easy to access. This duplex, with a terrasse, is absolutely perfect for two couples or more, and perfectly located for nice dinners in old Porto and for walks on the river side!
Pleasant clean modern apartment, conveniently located. Efficient host.
A very beautiful and comfortable apartment in the best area of Porto, walking distance from all touristic places.
superb place with excellent location. easy walking distance to restaurants, shops, sites and the bridge to Gaia. highly recommended

El apartamento de Jose es realmente espacioso y limpio. Esta ubicado muy cerca de todas las zonas turisticas y bares y restaurantes. El edificio donde esta el apartamento dispone de un parking privado comunicado con el ascensor del edificio. Una estancia genial!!
Nice apartment with everything we needed. Great location for visits and nights!
Amazing apartment, like a 4 stras hotel!
Amplio, limpio, super céntrico.

Isabel est très serviable et l'accueil est très chaleureux. L'appartement est très propre et bien situé au centre du vieux quartier ce qui le rend un petit peu difficile d'accès. Néanmoins une fois installé, tout est à portée de main.
Great location,lovely accomodation,spotless.I will definately stay there again.Isabel was very kind and helpful and provided us with as much information as we needed it.
Very clean and we love the central location!

It's a perfect place to start or end in Porto.
Close to everything you're looking for...
Very clean and everything you imagine to have good stay.
I really recommend the place

L'appartement est bien situé en plein centre de Porto au pied de la fameuse gare ce qui facilite les visites à pieds. Superbe accueil avec des explications sur les visites sur plan . Merci pour nous avoir gardé nos baguages à la sortie pour facilité les visites le dernier jour sans ces derniers . Seul bémol des travaux en face de l'appartement qui le rende très bruyant avec un gros chantier qui risque de durer plusieurs mois.

Great!!!!!!!
Amazing location.
Amazing style.
Amazing communication.
This apartment is in a perfect location and the communication with the host was superb. I've stayed at this apartment twice over the past 4 years. I highly recommend it.
Very nice, beautiful, spacious and clean.

Great location by a beautiful metro station. Short walk to the water front or up into the city. 

The apartment is very comfortable with lots of windows for fresh air if you need. Noise isn’t an issue but there is construction across the street which may wake you up early. 

Overall a great place that I recommend to everyone!

L'appartement est grand et idéalement situé 
Point fort : une salle de bain par chambre et des grands espaces 
Des petites attentions aussi
Par contre nous devions attendre l'hôte avant de partir pour accéder à notre voiture avant d'aller prendre l'avion et il était en retard et ne répondait pas : mauvaise organisation
Wonderful space in an amazing city. You will be pleased! Location cannot get better!!

Très beau logement  !  l'appartement est idéalement situé, les hôtes sont réactifs,  accueillants et sauront répondre à toutes vos questions. Convient à des groupes d'amis ou des familles nombreuses. Bon séjour à Porto !

name: Size, Splendor & High Ceilings
summary: This apt has an extension making it over 1050sf! Master bedroom: queen bed, comfortable mattress & plush covers, huge closets, large desk with chair and a sofa. Big windows, garden view. Full bath. 2nd bedroom: queen size bed, plush covers, dressers, 3 bedroom twin bed.
space: This apt has an extension making it over 1050sf! Master bedroom: queen bed, comfortable mattress & plush covers, huge closets, large desk with chair and a sofa. Big windows, garden view. Full bath. 2nd bedroom: queen size bed, plush covers, dressers, closets. 3rd Bedroom: twin bed & large desk & chair. Note: the 2nd and 3rd bedrooms are railroad style. You need to walk though the small bedroom to get to the large one. Living room with full kitchen, family dining table, sleeper/sofa & TV. Few steps up from street.

At closer inspection you’ll find small cafes, bars, shops and resta
neighborhood_overview: Clinton Hill first seems quiet and residential, but don’t be fooled! At closer inspection you’ll find small cafes, bars, shops and restaurants at every corner. Soon you will make friends with the owners. People are super friendly here and will make you feel at home right away. In addition to the corner store across the street, find a string of larger food stores on nearby Fulton Street, which is five short blocks (ca. five minute walk) away. Choices include Met Supermarket, Mr.Melon for fresh produce, Green Planet, our local health food store, and Brooklyn Victory Garden, a bright neighborhood cafe and purveyor of delicious "locavore" fare.
notes: Includes: all utilities air conditioning tableware & cookware iron & ironing board hairdryer flat screen TV with HD cable high speed internet via wifi
transit: We are between the Franklin Avenue and the Clinton/Washington Ave C-train stations and near the Classon Ave G-train station. Take the C train (connects to the express A train) and be in Manhattan in about 20 minutes. The G train will take you to Park Slope or Williamsburg in about the same time. Several buses come to our neighborhood as well. Street parking is free and very easy to find. Only on Sunday mornings, parking spots may be in moderate supply, because there is a church across the street and many people drive to services. Please observe opposite side of the street cleaning rules. This means that for about two hours twice a week, you can only park on one side of the street.
interaction: You can call me any time if you need anything. We are local and can help.
house_rules: no smoking quiet hours after 10pm

host.host_about: Cher(s) voyageur(s),  je suis content d'entrer dans l'univers d'Airbnb et ainsi vous laissez entrer dans le mien.Il me fera plaisir de vous faire découvrir ce beau quartier historique que j'habite depuis plusieurs années.Épicurien de nature, je pourrai vous conseiller les meilleurs tables en ville toutes cuisines confondues.Soucieux des petits détails cela fait de moi un hôte attentionné à vos besoins.Autant les petites familles, couples ou personnes seules sauront appréciés le paysage et l'ambiance qui s'y découle. Impatient de vous accueillir n'hésitez pas de me contacter .  À bientôt!

reviews.comments: L'hôte nous a bien reçu et était très gentil. En terme de localisation, difficile de trouver mieux. Je le recommande!
très bien, rien à dire. Appart clean, moderne et bien décoré. Calme. A 2mn à pied du vieux montreal.
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We enjoyed the condo very much. It was very clean and comfortable and the location was perfect. Parking on site was a bonus. Jonathan was an excellent host and the check-in and out was super easy. Highly recommend!
Great place to stay in the Old Montreal,very clean and close to everything Montreal has to offer.I will definitely come back.Thanks Jonathan

Great time in Montreal and the place was ideal for Old Port and beyond. We enjoyed easy walks to the restaurants in the Old Port neighborhood and everything in the place was fine, clean and what we expected. I would and probably will use this listing again.  Worked out great.  Our host even left us a nice bottle of champagne to welcome us.  Meeting Jonathan to get key went smoothly and with no hitch.  The underground parking was key for us, as we did not want to deal with parking or driving in the city.  A good find!

We had a very enjoyable stay at Jonathan's condo, conveniently located minutes from the historic Vieux Montreal and walking distance to Rue St Paul, local bistros and galleries, Scandinave spa, the Basilique, and many other sights. Parking was a great amenity, we could leave the car at the condo and not worry about looking for street parking. The condo is well equipped and very comfy, we will certainly visit again:)
The place is furnished very nicely and homey. Strongly suggested for travelers visiting Montreal!

We booked this apartment for our son and his friend for a mini getaway during the holidays.  They loved the place!  Plenty of room, very clean, great location.  We felt that it was a great value and would stay here again.

Jonathan's place was clean and located within walking distance of everything in the old port area. Jonathan was an attentive host and even provided us with champagne, bread, and fruits in the apartment. I would definitely stay here again!
Great place to stay in old Montréal
Great location if you would like to do things in the old Montreal area. very clean and nice place. awesome host
Great spot. Perfect location. The underground parking was a plus and Jonathan was an amazing host. Would definitely stay here again.

Jonathan was unbelievable host!!! He welcomes us personally, which doesn't happen often. He has champagne, fruit and an amazing French bread. His place was even better than the pictures. He was prompt in his response, very accommodating and well above and beyond to make my boyfriend and I feel at home. Would definitely come back! Thank you Jonathan.
Everything was great! If I'm going to be in Montreal again, I will definitely stay here.

Location parfaite! Nous sommes allés marcher pendant des heures dans les quartiers autour du vieux Montréal. 

Le condo est beau et propre, tout est là.. Vaisselle, serviettes, kit à fondue.. Jonathan a même pensé à nous laisser des essentiels dans la salle de bain (pâte à dent, gel de douche, shampooing, etc.) Vraiment, il nous a accueilli encore mieux que dans un hôtel. Nous avons adoré notre séjour! 

Si on retourne à Montréal, c'est certain que ce sera là.
Place is great, you get an assigned parking. It's very close to everything. We happened to be there during Igloofest, it was 2 blocks away. Had a great time. Johnatan was very welcoming and helpful.

Jonathan was a great host and greeted us with a warm welcome. His indoor garage provided peace of mind, specifically with the location as it is difficult to find parking. It is very close to major attractions. 

I highly recommend this home as it is affordable and accessible.
Super sejour chez Jonathan! Tout était exactement comme sur les photos. Super propre, toutes les commodités et encore plus! Tres bien situé, on reviendrait sans hesiter!

My girlfriend and I spent a night in Montreal at Jonathan's Airbnb and it was great! In my opinion, the apartment is in the best location for a visitor to be in. It's close to Old Montreal and there are beautiful views. The apartment was as described and an enjoyable space - everything you need is on site.

Jonathan was amazing!
My boyfriend and I stayed here for 2 nights and had an amazing time!
When we first got there he met us at the front of the residence and showed us how everything was going to work (what keys to use and where the apartment was as well as how parking would work). Parking was an amazing benefit of this place. The parking is underground in the same building and very secure (did not worry about the car what so ever). The location of the place is right by the port and a very close walk to all the nice attractions (depending on the attraction it was 5-20mins walk). Jonathan welcomed us with a bottle of champagne and a loaf of fresh French bread (which we ended up using to make one of our dinners, we made sandwiches). The condo is exactly like the pictures show (the wifi was easy to connect to, there is cable on the tv or we connected our tablet with a HDMI cable). The condo was very clean and well furnished. Also was provided with traveling amenities in the washroom and also the kitchen (coffee, milk, bread, spices, and kitchen is fully equipped with utensils and cups). Would 100% recommend this place!

Great location in Old Montreal!  Jonathan was awesome, creature comforts were all there.  We loved this place and would for sure rent here again.  The place was stocked with a few essential travel items in case you forgot.  And a welcome treat of fresh bread!  Can't beat that.  Highly recommend staying here.

Jonathan's place was exactly as pictured. He was so helpful with parking our car, getting us settled, and showing us how to get around the apartment. There was champagne and champagne flutes waiting for us upon arrival as well as a loaf of French bread. It was amazingly clean, but he offered to send over a cleaning service midway through our stay. Truly would recommend staying here, if you're visiting Montreal. The experience was better than I could have imagined. Thanks so much, Jonathan!
Logement bien situé, propre, spacieux et très bien équipé.

My husband and I would recommend Jonathan's condo. It is a great location and the indoor parking was wonderful. We did not use our car during our visit,we were able to walk or get to the metro easily. There is a grocery store a 10 min walk away and many great restaurants close by. Jonathan is a great host he was there to meet us and show us around. There was milk and eggs in fridge and a loaf of bread. He even dropped off coffee for the coffee maker. This is a great spot for a couple. We would definitely stay here again.
Nice spot in the old Port. Champagne and bread was a nice touch. Jonathan also thinks of all the amenities you may have forgotten. Quick efficient key change over + explanation. All round great host.
Very nice and modern.  All comforts and Jonathan very helpful.  It is on the ground floor but shades provide plenty of privacy and Windows shield the noise.

Je recommande cet appartement autant pour une courte visite à Montréal qu'une visite plus longue. C'est très propre et calme. Les photos sont fidèles à l'allure réelle de l'appartement. Il y a plusieurs restos à proximité.
Beau condo très bien situé on a bien aimé notre séjour le lit est très confortable
The condo was clean, comfortable and bright.
We had a great stay! Very clean and in a great location - walking distance to everything in Old Montreal. Jonathan was very prompt on responses, both at check-in and check-out.
Great place

The apartment is well equipped and accurately portrayed in the pictures. Underground parking is a plus. It's in a great location for exploring Old Montreal. I had a few minor communication issues with the host, such as having to call and wait around the morning of for checkout instructions, but generally had a very good stay.

Spent four nights at Jonathan's place in Old Montreal. The place was just as expected and the included parking was great. Jonathan even had a few essentials available that we had forgot - shampoo, conditioner etc. The location was great, we were able to walk everywhere we wanted to go, including the Bell Centre (half hour) and old Montreal. If we come back to Montreal again we would definitely want to stay here again. Thanks to Jonathan for making our first Airbnb experience a positive one!

We had a great stay beginning to end. Jonathan was easy to get in touch with and always responded promptly to any queries. Once arrived he gave us many helpful suggestions and recommendations on things to do and places to visit during our trip. The location was excellent and very central. Would highly recommend to anyone visiting Montreal:)

Jonathan is an awesome host, prompt on email reply and very thoughtful in wanting to make his guests feel welcome and provided for.  From the champagne and fresh bread, to headache remedies and bathroom toiletries, Jonathan made our stay just like home.  Perfect location to visit Old Port and underground parking is icing on the cake.
The place was great! Jonathan was an amazing host and extremely easy to communicate with! We will be staying here again on our next trip for sure!
Excellent experience!
L'appartement correspond exactement à la description. Très beau quartier. Communication facile et rapide avec l'hôte.

The time we spent in the apartment was welcoming and it was identical to the pictures showed in airbnb. The place is well connected and it is near to the subway and bus stations.

Jonathan is a great host, the atention he gave us was excellent. Also, the day we arrived he left a welcom/warming pack with champagne and a delicious bread.

I had soar throat and asked him for advice, he kindly explain were to go to get attention without spent too much money.

We totally recomend you to stay in Jonathan's place.

Which is a nice apartment nearest to several turistic places.

Thanks Jon. Greetings from Mexico.

Great place! Jonathan is a very great tenant; very good communication and clean place. 
Thank you
Amazing location! The place had everything we needed. We found it to be a great base for exploring the city. Thanks!!
Great location!

My girlfriend and I stayed at Jonathan's place for a few nights in May. We found it to be the perfect location for us. Being on the edge of Old Montréal, we were able to walk to many attractions. Having the underground parking was great as parking is very limited in the area. 

The apartment itself was very clean and many necessities were provided.

Jonathan's place was absolutely perfect! The unit was very clean and comfortable and was fully stocked with enough ammenities for our 5 day stay. The apartment is very close to Old Montreal and walking distance to downtown Montreal. Jonathan was an amazing host and was always reachable throughout our stay. We would definitly stay here again.
Great apartment and friendly, helpful host - can't do better than this.

This was a great location quiet and clean. Walking distance to shops restaurants! We enjoyed our stay at Jonathans place and the complimentary drinks and bread was a very nice touch as well! Jonathan was a great host and very accomodating as this was our first time using Airbnb. Highly recommend!
The apartment was safe, secure and quiet.  It's location was incredible and Jonathan was a very gracious host.  I would definitely book with him again.
O apartamento de Jonathan fica em uma localização espetacular! Próximo a tudo. Ele é uma pessoa muito atenciosa e sempre esteve disponível! Recomendo muito seu apartamento!

Great condo in a superb location. Can walk to many great restaurants and bars in old Montreal. 
Check in and check out was very easy and the condo itself is absolutely beautiful. 

Would definitely come back here again.
Bien situer près de tout et très bon service de la part du proprio je recommande un séjour

Jonathon's place was excellent. It was very roomy and clean. We had the use of all the facilities of his home. He advised us of things to see and do as tourists. We were right next to the old town of Montreal and so well within walking distance of many attractions.
The garage was extremely good as we had rented a car and needed somewhere to park.
Great location, only a 5 minute walk from downtown Old Port. Jonathan was a great host and our stay was great. We will look to stay here again the next time we visit Montreal.
Condo was very clean, close to all in old Montreal, few extras very nice (bread, coffee), great communication, quiet area, comfy bed, nice shower. Would definitely recommend.
Moi et une amie avons passé la nuit au condo de Jonathan! Super hôte, rapide à répondre, emplacement dure à battre, vraiment proche de tout. Vraiment bon pour le prix et le stationnement inclus!

Appartement comme sur les photos, très beau, moderne, très bien équipé et très bien situé sur le vieux port. À proximité du bus et des restaurants. Notre hôte a été disponible à tout moment et très sympathique. Nous avons passe un agréable séjour dans ce logement.

Our first time to Montreal. The location was great, walkable to old town and the metro in a quiet area near the waterfront. Apartment was large for a one bedroom and well appointed. Jonathon was a fantastic host who left us a bottle of bubbly and fresh bread to welcome us to Montreal. He was very flexible with the check-in and brought over a hairdryer when we realized we didn't have one. Would not hesitate to stay here again on our next visit to this lovely city.

We love to arrive to a host is there and friendly. He was! We love places that are spotless and well equipped. It was! We love rain shower heads and nice sheets. It had it! We love coffee makers and supplies coffee. There was! We love in-apartment washer & dryer. You guessed it! We love spacious and modern places. It is that! And perhaps in a city like Montréal with limited parking, we LLLLL (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) EEEE free secure parking on premises. Again, had it!

Did I mention that there is a Bixi bike station seconds from the front door? Well there is. You can download the app and sign up for an account in minutes on your smartphone. We got two 3 day passes for $14 CAD!

This lovely apartment is close to everything in old Montreal, and very accessible to the metro and bus lines.  We enjoyed the comfy bed, hot shower, underground parking, large TV, and the nice treat that greeted our arrival. Jonathan always communicated promptly, and met us upon arrival.  We enjoyed our visit thoroughly.
Great place to stay in Montreal. Joe was very accommodating and helpful. Location was great! Would stay here again!
Die Wohnung ist perfekt gelegen. Die Altstadt (Rue Saint Paul) ist bequem zu Fuss erreichbar. Hilfreich war auch die Garage wo wir unser Mietauto parkieren konnten.
Perfect location! The place is clean and Joe is a great host. Highly recommended  for a stay in Old Montreal.

We really enjoyed the condo!  It was really clean and comfortable and a great view to the water!  We loved the bread and champagne that Jonathan left for us. Unfortunately the wifi and television weren't working the whole 3 days we were there but Jonathan tried really hard to get it sorted out. I think he was actually going to change Internet provider as it had been an ongoing issue on and off.  We highly recommend this condo for anyone wanting to stay in Montreal's Old Port!!

Le condo était vraiment super, propre et bien situé. Il est à 5 min à pied à de la place Jacques Cartier à pied et proche d'une station de location de vélo. Nous avons passé un agréable séjour.
Le lit était très confortable et tout le nécessaire était présent.
Nous avons trouvé l'accueil de notre hôte impeccable et chaleureux.

Great location, directly on the river.  Short walking distance to all of the sites...great location for the fireworks, as well.  The condo itself was nice -
 leather sectional sofa, good sized kitchen, bedroom, bathroom.  Would recommend to anybody visiting.

My boyfriend and I visited Montreal for the first time. Jonathan was helpful before and during our stay. Communicating with him was very easy. Location was a couple blocks from Old Montreal, which we loved.
Great Location and Great Host!

Very clean and cozy!
Thanks to him we could spend nice time in Montreal.
If I go Montreal again, surely I'll choose Joe's condo.

Accueil très agréable et Joe s'est montré très arrangeant.
Apparemment très confortable et propre

Une de mes meilleures expériences airbnb! Jonathan est un "super" hôte, très disponible et sympathique et que dire de son appartement, ultra équipé, confortable et bien situé, combo parfait pour passer un bon séjour!

excellent place. excellent kindly host. everything is perfect.
If i go Montreal again, surely I'll choose Joe's condo.

The place is in a great location, very close to old Montreal but without the crowds and noise. No surprises, very clean and very nice condo. Joe was excellent in communicating with us. Would definitely stay here again.
Très bel appartement à 10 min de la place Jacques Cartier. Rien a dire si ce n est que vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés.
Amazing place!
Great condo! Conveniently located in the Old Port; on the ground floor, which is super convenient; safe; clean, and I felt as though I was at home.  Would definitely stay here again.

Joe was very quick to respond, very accomadating. The shower was warm and water pressure was good, unlike many of the hotels we stayed at. The parking space was a plus, perfect with the small car we had. Location is convenient being just down the street from bonsecours market. Thank you Joe!
Great location, parking which is essential if your driving.

Great apartment which looks exactly like the photos!
Location couldn't be better, an easy walk to the old town and port area and about 10-15 min walk (uphill!) to berri metro to access the Olympic stadium, space for life attractions and botanic garden.
Communication with joe was always quick and he was also quick and helpful to reply when we sent a query while we were there.
The car parking in a secure park directly under the building, and you get a key fob so you can come and go as you please.
joe asks you to contact him a hour before you arrive so he can meet you outside which we struggled with a little, we allowed half an hour extra but got stuck in a traffic jam from 6km outside the city!!...we made it only 2 mins late!
We were a bit disappointed after reading other reviews that there was no champagne or bread on our arrival....maybe he's stopped providing it (although there were over 20 empty bottles under the sink!
This was our first time using AB+B and it went great. The apt was great, excellent location, clean, it had everything you need and more. Joe was very nice and friendly.
Location TOP .... appartement  TOP et très complet... hôte TOP à recommander

Jonathan was a pleasure to deal with. He is very courteous and was very generous with his time responding to my linguistically challenged parking signage questions. He made himself available whenever needed, either in person or via phone. 

Jonathan's place was FANTASTIC, clean, comfortable and it is very conveniently located close to Old Montreal, which is where I wanted to stay. A few blocks up St. Hubert and you will have access to an IGA and SAQ to stock up on essentials. If you get to the IGA then the Berry UQAM metro station is right there.

GREAT PLACE! I will definitely recommend and repeat myself :-).
Appartement très bien situé, rien à dire ! Un sejour, même d'une nuit, vraiment parfait ! Merci

The location is fabulous, very clean and exactly like the pics 
Joe was very friendly and gave us some great restaurants suggestions.
I was a little disappointed not to find my fav champagne waiting for me like  others did but it was a perfect secure place  and clean to hang your hat 
Would stay again

Really nice condo, not far away from the old Montreal and the old Harbour.
We stayed here for 3 days and used the bixi bikes. Next bixi station is very close!
The Check-in and Check-out were uncomplicated! 
Joe was very flexible with our check-in and he was really caring and often asked if everything was alright! We recommend staying in his apartment!

Legitimate! The host was very good in keeping contact even after we arrived to make sure everything was going good. The unit looks exactly like the pictures. Unit is very close to all outdoor entertainment.

Jonathan a été au petits soins avec nous, disponible il a pris des  nouvelles de nous tous les jours. L'appartement est très bien situé, proche de la vieille ville, mais très au calme. Parfait pour quelques jours à Montréal. Je recommande vivement

The apartment was an amazing deal. It was sleek, stylish, comfortable, and was a short walk to the old part of the city where there were wonderful shops, historic sights, and restaurants. Joe greeted us with a bottle of champagne and loaf of bread, and showed us how easy it was to park and access the building.  He was attentive and courteous, and we would definitely stay here again.

This apartment is in a very good location close to Old Montreal.  It is a large, one bedroom with lots of space to spread out, very quiet, offers free parking (huge in Montreal), a washer, dryer (although there was a mattress taking up most of the laundry room), dedicated internet, so the wi-fi is reliable and a very economical price.  There was only hand soap and three little hotel bottles with lotion, shampoo and conditioner in the bath, so bring tissues, bar soap or shower gel.  Coffee was provided, but bring your own tea, creamer for coffee, etc. A great place to stay in Montreal.
Great location . Easy vehicle parking. Nice clean well appointed condo.
Recomendo muito essa opção de hospedagem. Apartamento bem localizado, bem decorado, limpo e com todas as comodidades. Joe, o anfitrião, é muito gentil e solícito. Nossa estadia foi muito boa.
Great apartment, super location!

The places is much larger than it looks, in a great location in Old Montreal. It’s a quick walk to many sites. Close to good restaurants.

We have already shared this gem with friends and family and we ourselves will be staying here again in a few months. It will be our getaway spot!
C’est clair , c’est beau , la cuisine est très bien équipée , le lit est super confortable (matelas XXX ) , salle de bains comme sur les photos
Perfect location and communication.  Much appreciated.  Cool space.

Joe could not have been easier to coordinate with -- really responsive and flexible with check-in and check out which was much appreciated since we were only there for a night. The place is exactly as described and location was the perfect jumping off point to different neighborhoods in Montreal. Would definitely stay here again!

Joe's place is a spacious, modern apartment in Old Montreal. It is a great location for taking in the sights of Old Montreal and the riverside parks nearby. If you are a runner, this place is great for a run.  The apartment is fitted out with everything you will need. There is covered parking which we didn't need but this is a major plus for travellers who arrive by car. Jonathan was prompt with communication and showed us the apartment at check-in. A great place to stay.

Le logement est exactement conforme à la description. Il ne manque rien pour un séjour court où long (pour nous ce fut 7 jours). Très propre, spacieux et confortable. L’accueil de Joe est excellent, il a passé le temps nécessaire pour nous présenter les environs. Il est à l'écoute si l'on a le moindre problème et c'est très facile de communiquer avec lui par courriel.  Le "vieux Montréal" est à quelques minutes de marche et on y trouve une multitude de restaurants tout à fait corrects et à tous les prix. En revanche, pour les commerces de nourriture,  il faut marcher un peu, mais mis à part ça, nous recommandons sans hésiter.
Lovely place, nice location.  Check in and out were smooth and pleasant!

Joe has a great space in Old Town Montreal which is really beautiful. The space is large, modern and has all the necessary amenities. The shower was not the cleanest it could be but we still really liked Joe's place.
Joe's apartment is perfect, near of the old port, cassino... very confortable e clean ... everything was great. Thank you Joe!!!
Couldn’t ask for a better host

La ubicación es inmejorable, puedes llegar caminando a muchos lugares desde ahí, el edificio es muy tranquilo y los vecinos son muy respetuosos. El apartamento tiene todo lo necesario para cocinar, limpieza, aseo personal, etc y la decoración es genial! Incluso Joe nos recomendó algunos lugares para visitar e ir de compras, él es muy amable y responde inmediatamente. En general mi experiencia fue excelente! :D
Un très bel appartement, remarquablement bien situé et bien aménagé. Un accueil sympathique et qui a su s'adapter à nos horaires. Un très bon séjour.
Great space in Old Montreal! Easy check in/out and excellent value.

Joe waited several hours for us as we were delayed in coming from the airport
His apartment is larger than we expected and although the internet was not working he made every effort to get the provider to do something about it for us. It is a great location on the edge of the old town and the river. Wonderful to watch the Christmas fireworks in old town just outside the apartment
Great location, and welcome from our host. The private parking is a plus, especially this time of the year !

Joe est un hote à l’écoute et aux petits soins. Il est très réactif. Son Condo est très bien situé et fonctionnel. Situé près du vieux Montreal, vous pouvez tout faire à pied. Excellent Condo ! On recommande !
Joe was an amazing host. The place was superb, well kept and ideally located. Will def be back.
Super special place, right on the port! It was the perfect distance from Igloofest. Host was very welcoming, the place was very clean and homey. Would definitely come again and recommend!  :)

Ideal location for Igloofest! We were extremely comfortable - I haven't slept that well in ages! Joe was a wonderful host, the place clean and modern, and it was fantastic to be in a location that allowed us to walk everywhere we wanted to go. Would definitely love to stay again.

Fantastic place close to all the great areas in the city. Very walkable. It is a beautiful modern place. He did a great job of making sure we had everything we needed and worked with our crazy schedule. We really appreciate it!

Host was awesome! Place was great too, could use a little love in some areas (bathroom toilet paper holder and shower doors) and it was freezing cold until we had to turn up the heat. Would of been nice to walk into alrdy heated cozy place. But other than that it was an awesome stay, very nice place, secure building, great location, etc. !!! I would definitely recommend to others.

- Apartment: Very clean and very cozy apartment. Great location for Igloofest.
- Host: Had the pleasure to meet Joe and his son. Very friendly and polite. Very responsive and fast in replying to msgs. Super accommodating. Joe even offered to bring us his own blankets.

Wuold definitely recommend staying here!
Joe and his place are both fantastic. He's a top notch host.
We loved the location and Joe was very prompt and helpful.
Joe's place was beautiful for our brief stay in Montreal. The bed was super comfortable, the bathroom, living room & kitchen were lovely & spacious. We plan to come again for the summer.
Joe’s place is great and in an even better location. Walking distance to Old Montreal and the Ferris wheel. The apartment was very big and clean. Great value. Would definitely stay here again.
Joe’s place was exactly as pictured right in the heart of old Montreal. Check in was a smooth process and Joe was very accommodating.
Great location for walking and public transportation. With indoor parking as an added plus. Immediate access to Old Port, yet in a quiet location.
Clean, great location, speedy response- would stay again! Oh- and parking!!

This place was very clean and well-maintained with beautiful natural light.  Located right near the water, nearly everything we wanted to see was within a 15-minute walking distance. The parking garage was extremely convenient and easy to use. Joe was very helpful.
Great space and location. Joe was very nice and helpful. We had a wonderful stay!

We loved our stay at Joe’s Airbnb. It was spacious and bright, the bed was comfy and the apartment was really clean. It was in a great location on the river. We really enjoyed walking around the area and exploring the city. Joe was a great host and we would not hesitate to stay at his Airbnb again in the future when we return to Montreal!

Ce fût ce séjour court et très agréable.  Joe a une très bonne écoute de nos besoins. 

Je le recommande fortement ce logement.

Joe’s place was amazing, it’s very clean and nice plus the garage It very helpful. The bathroom was very clean and they have a nice shower and bath.  We had a very good experience stayed there. Definitely go back to stay here again.

Very convenient location, very safe and clean. Easy check in and out. We enjoyed how close we were to the old port where there was lots to do, and also close to the metro to get around the city. The condo was large and very cozy! We enjoyed having a safe place to keep our car during our stay and a comfortable place to come home to after a busy day! Would definitely stay here again next time we visit Montréal!
Ease of check in and out, prompt responses,  thoughtful check-ins by Joe made this trip stress free.  The home is very nice and location is fabulous! Great place to stay in Montreal.

Joe's place is great. He's doing some remodeling so expect things to be even better. The location is an upscale neighborhood in northern Old Montreal, a stone's throw from the water. If you get a chance, book Jo's place!

Joe's place has excellent access to Old Montreal or you can walk a bit longer (or take a short taxi) to Place d'Arts. There's a great kitchen set up but we didn't have to use it with all the wonderful access to cafes and restaurants. It is how it looks with a very comfortable bed and spacious bathroom.
It’s a really wonderful place for short stay & Joe is a  nice host. Great view to the waterfront especially.
Joe’s place is clean, easy to access, and well maintained. It includes easy-to-access parking. Joe is incredibly accommodating. Thanks Joe!

Great location, just a short walk to old Montréal! Included parking which was a huge plus! The apartment was spacious and had everything we needed. Joe was very responsive and easy to get in contact with.

Great location at the edge of the old town, right by the water! The apartment was clean and large with a comfy bed. Joe met us at the apartment to give us keys and show us around. He let us check in early which was amazing as we had caught a rather early flight. He’s finishing up a renovation of the bathroom, but overall it was great and Joe made sure to check in with us during our stay to see if we needed anything.

Joe's condo is very conveniently located in Old Montreal, steps away from a Bixi station and many attractions near the waterfront. Very comfortable bed and stylish interior. The parking spot was a huge plus, and Joe was friendly and prompt with his communication when we had problems. Very nice place.

name: Mon petit coin à moi ..
summary: Location à court terme au mois / 2 mois disponibles   Paisible 2 et demi , bien situé et surtout près de tout .Entrée privée et parcs tout près .(sous-sol )
description: Location à court terme au mois / 2 mois disponibles   Paisible 2 et demi , bien situé et surtout près de tout .Entrée privée et parcs tout près .(sous-sol ) Près des parcs Beaubien et Molson . Cinéma Beaubien et plusieurs bons resto et pâtisserie . Rue très tranquille ! 2 minutes du métro D'Iberville .Pour se rendre au centre ville 15 minutes . Buanderie à 2 coins de Rue
neighborhood_overview: Près des parcs Beaubien et Molson . Cinéma Beaubien et plusieurs bons resto et pâtisserie . Rue très tranquille !
notes: Buanderie à 2 coins de Rue
transit: 2 minutes du métro D'Iberville .Pour se rendre au centre ville 15 minutes .
house_rules: Non Fumeur

name: Habitación acogedora y soleada!!
summary: Nuestro acogedor piso amplio con terraza y vistas bonitas desde el piso, la habitación es d exterior y muy soleada. Estamos a 20min andando,d la playa y centro comercial. Somos personas amables y ordenadas. Tenemos cerca la línea d metro que va por la costa.
description: Nuestro acogedor piso amplio con terraza y vistas bonitas desde el piso, la habitación es d exterior y muy soleada. Estamos a 20min andando,d la playa y centro comercial. Somos personas amables y ordenadas. Tenemos cerca la línea d metro que va por la costa.

host.host_location: gran via de les corts catalanes .bcn

reviews.comments: Jesús was a very welcoming, friendly, and pleasant host. He and his brother were helpful and informative about finding our way around Barcelona and easily getting to places we wanted to visit. The apartment is in a residential area and super close to metro, which was very convenient. Thank you for your kindness Jesús!
Jesus was a super friendly and helpful host. Flexible enough to be at home at the time we arrived, with positive vibes all over. Recommended!

Super super , Jésus était un hôte agréable , super gentil et accessible.Il nous a bcp aidé ,moi et mon fils pour  facilité notre déplacement sur Barcelone .
Trop belle Barcelone ... avec beaucoup des choses a visiter . Je suis enamorada de cette ville .
à refaire rapidement...

Bueno la verdad es que mi experiencia en esta casa, ha sido excelente el anfitrión se porto fenomenal muy agradable y amable desde el momento que llegamos, siempre dispuesto a aclarar mis dudas. La casa limpia y la habitación como la imaginaba, la salida muy flexible. En definitiva una excelente elección. Gracias Jesús por tu atención y amabilidad.
Jesus was very friendly and welcoming and the communication was spot on. I definitely recommend the host and his accommodation. It's a 5 out of 5 stay!

Dreadful experience at Jesus's flat! The first one since we repeatedly use Airbnb's services since 2013 (as host AND guests)
Where to start?

1 st night, awaken at 5am by his brother listening to music on his tablet at full blast. We had to discuss with him to make him realise it was slightly too loud...

2nd night, the TV in the living room was very loud and we asked Jesus to at least reduce the sound so our room doesn't feel like a home cinema. All of this was around 2am.

3rd night, exact same thing with the TV.
Jesus barely accepted to slightly reduce the sound but said it was the maximum he could do and that it wasn't his problem if we couldn't sleep as we had to adapt to his lifestyle. When we mentioned that we are paying for a service which is non existent he just couldn't care less and ignored this argument. 
After this incident, he accused us of lacking of respect in front of his guests by continuously shouting at him. What???!

By the way, you have to know that the room is located between his brother's and the living room that Jesus uses as his bedroom in the meantime. Not to mention that the walls are almost made of paper and also that we were wearing earplugs throughout the stay.

We had so much better experiences where we used CouchSurfing, unbelievebale.
We were supposed to stay 5 nights but after unsuccessfully trying to find a solution we decided to leave because we just couldn't sleep at all.
Hopefully this review will prevent anyobdy else from booking with him!

Tout était nickel chez Jesus. Les colocs sont très sympas, et même si je suis arrivé trop tard, il a trouvé un moyen de me rendre les clés de l'appartement. J'ai pu trouver du parking dans la rue, et l'appart est accessible avec le transport public, même tard la nuit. Trop bien passé!

Jesus's place on the 11th floor is basic but fine if you are looking for a place to sleep and shower. Jesus is a social guy who likes to talk and help when possible.   All-over I had a good time staying in the room.

Jesus was extremely nice and available with us.
The room's price was really cheap.

Très bon séjour dans l'appartement de Jésus et ses colocataires. L'ambiance était conviviale et malgré l'obstacle de la langue, Jésus a su nous accueillir convivialement. Il nous donné de bons conseils pour avoir un aperçu du mode de vie des barcelonnais et sur les attrapes touristes à éviter (certains féniculaires à éviter au profit d'une promenade à pied plus sympathique ...).
Jésus è stato molto cordiale e ospitale, la casa è spaziosa e comodo per i mezzi pubblici

Que dire sur  Jésus, juste que c est une personne remarquable, avec un grand coeur , je me suis rendue chez lui avec mon enfant et je peux dire que l accueil qu' il m a réservé dès le départ était très chaleureux , on a quitté l appartement les larmes aux yeux tellement on a était bien avec Jesus , Eric et ses amis .une belle et grande amitié est née entre nous et je tiens à le remercier du fond du coeur pour ces grands moments.
Concernant le logement , vous aurez une belle chambre lumineuse et très propre, vous aurez aussi le choix d utiliser l une des salles de bain mise à votre disposition , vous aurez aussi le droit de profiter de l ensemble de l appartement et surtout vous aurez la chance d avoir Jesus comme hôte qui saura vous mettre à l aise et vous aide
r en cas de besoin.
 Le quartier est sympathique à côté de
 Deux stations de métro BESÔS ET SANT MARTI ,VOUS trouverez
 Également des cafés, des bars,des  supermarchés Et des restaurants  bons et pas chers juste en bas de l immeuble .allez y sans réfléchir, je recommande fortement .
La experiencia ha sido muy buena. La casa muy limpia y la convivencia genial. Repetire seguro cuando vuelva por Barcelona. 100% recomendable

Jesus place was great. He was a perfect host and helped us when we had questions. Also he was very welcoming and friendly.  The place was clean and we had everything we needed. 
Since there is no fan or ac it's getting really hot even during the night in the summer time. 
Highly recommended!
E una persona molto gentile e brava.Ti fa sentire come a casa ...ottima scelta!

Jesús, Gracias!!! 
We are happy that we met you! ❤️
Friendly person, excellent room
Awesome place to stay! If you want to enjoy Barcelona choose this place – Jesús is super-friendly and really helped us :)

Amazing host, very friendly. Would recommend to anyone staying in Barcelona. The apartment is clean and close to a station that's easy to get to. How ever we still walked everywhere as the location is great. Would love to go back some day.
Great host, everything as described.

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour chez Jésus, l'appartement est très bien situé entre deux lignes de métro besos et la pau ou sant marti. Appartement très propre et bonne communication avec Jésus. Je recommande
Great location, very kind and helpful host.
Danke Jesus! wir kommen wieder!

Jesús is a very nice and welcoming person. The room was really clean and the view from the 11th floor (that you can reach using a tiny elevator) extends on a large and beautiful avenue. Don't hesitate to go there! Barcelona is such an amazing city :D

Great stay!
The room is clean and spacious, it has a big window and a fan so its not too warm. It is located near metro and bus station.  
Jesús was very nice and provided us with helpful tips!
I absolutely recommend this place!
Muy limpio el apartamento, cerca al transporte público.

Ragazzo molto disponibile e tranquillo, ci ha fatto sentire come a casa nostra.  La casa è molto pulita, si può cucinare in cucina la quale ha tutto necessario (posate, piatti, pentole, microonde, forno,  ecc) e mangiare in sala o sul terrazzo che dà una bellissima vista sul torre Agbar.  La zona è collegata con i mezzi pubblici, ci sono tanti negozi di alimentari, bar, panetterie ecc. La spiaggia si trova circa 20 min a piedi. Lo consigliamo vivamente   e lo terremo in considerazione per il nostro prossimo viaggio a Barcellona.

Jesus was a super nice host and his apartment extraordinarily clean. Although we had a difficult time in Barcelona - our bags being stolen - he made us fell better and at home. 
The only problem we had was the old fan breaking down one night so it was just unbelievanle hot. Apart from that everything was perfect and I highly recommend staying with Jesus! :)
Totally recommend staying here, very comfortable and clean room.  Jesus always tried to help with any problems.
Todo perfecto, fácil y sin problemas
It was great. Thanks!
Thanks so much for everything Jesus, always smiling and ready to help. Also very very clean!!! Muchas Gracias for your hospitality!!!

Place is very clean and you can use kitchen, living room and balcony(and of course bedroom and bathroom) Metro and bus station is very close so you can be very fast wherever you want to be. :) Jesus is very nice guy. He will tell you exactly how to come from airport to his place. Placr is very clean. I recomande it 100%.
Jesus is a nice guy. was nice to stay in his home!!

Чистая комната с отличным интерьером. Хорошее постельное белье, полотенца. До метро примерно 7мин пешком. Рядом находятся магазины. Очень тихий, спокойный район. Хозяин очень гостеприимный, вежливый. 10 из 10. Однозначно советую!
Nous avons passer un agréable séjour chez Jésus qui est accueillant et serviable. Appartement calme et super propre.

Jesus lives in the area where locals live, so you need to use public transport. But 2 metro lines are close and bus is just under the window. 
Jesus is nice and welcoming, you can use also kitchen and balcony.
You will have separate room but Jesus and his family is living there too and the walls are a bit thin. Also windows are facing to the main road with heavy traffic.
However nothing serious that affected our stay there :)
Thanks!
La habitación es tal cual se muestra y se describe. Jesus muy atento, una buena estadia

Die Unterkunft war sehr sauber, das Zentrum ist mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln gut zu erreichen, es gab keine Probleme beim check-in. Jesus ist ein toller Gastgeber, immer sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend, er hat uns tolle sightseeing Tipps gegeben und ist sogar bereit gewesen uns spannende Plätze in der Stadt zu zeigen! 
Würde das nächste Mal mit Sicherheit wieder kommen :-)

name: Stunning Panoramic Ocean Views!
summary: When the Ocean Becomes Your Front Lawn..2 bedroom 3 bath Beauty with 180 degree ocean views.
space: Treat your senses to the majestic ocean views, the musical sound of a variety of exotic birds, the sweet scent of plumeria that fills the air around you and feel the sense of complete relaxation as the warm tropical breezes carress you and transport you to paradise found. Spread out in this spacious ocean front villa with three separate walk out Lanais. Two large and completely private master suites and three baths. This lovely villa is situated on one of the most beautiful stretches of coastline in Maui and immediately in front of a magnificent natural blow hole! Perfect for families with young children who love room to run and play and for adults who appreciate the opportunity to stretch out, relax and unwind. Just a minute walk to Oneloa Bay. Swim, snorkel and play in the surf and sand. Come see OUR WHALES that splash and play with their young in this MAJESTIC BAY each season. Come see OUR TURTLES at the rocks just BELOW YOUR VILLA , (a favorite feeding place). Come experience the w
description: When the Ocean Becomes Your Front Lawn..2 bedroom 3 bath Beauty with 180 degree ocean views. Treat your senses to the majestic ocean views, the musical sound of a variety of exotic birds, the sweet scent of plumeria that fills the air around you and feel the sense of complete relaxation as the warm tropical breezes carress you and transport you to paradise found. Spread out in this spacious ocean front villa with three separate walk out Lanais. Two large and completely private master suites and three baths. This lovely villa is situated on one of the most beautiful stretches of coastline in Maui and immediately in front of a magnificent natural blow hole! Perfect for families with young children who love room to run and play and for adults who appreciate the opportunity to stretch out, relax and unwind. Just a minute walk to Oneloa Bay. Swim, snorkel and play in the surf and sand. Come see OUR WHALES that splash and play with their young in this MAJESTIC BAY each season. Come see OUR T
neighborhood_overview: Why Kapalua Bay Villas:  Kapalua Resort is surrounded by 22,000 acres of natural wonder. Situated between two wild life preserves, Kapalua is home to a variety of tropical birds, exotic plants, fish, and giant sea turtles. During the months of January through April, Kapalua Bay and surrounding waters are playgrounds for an abundance of whales and their young. The Unique Benefits at this Villa:  Walking distance to world class beaches, championship golf courses, tennis, dozens of restaurants, and shopping, Kapalua resort offers something for everyone. For the wild life enthusiasts, there are miles of scenic walking trails. For the adventure enthusiasts, zip line through the lush tropical landscape. If rest and relaxation is the goal, rejuvenate mind and body at the exclusive Kapalua Spa or simply stretch out in the comfort of your private lanai and let the tranquil sights and sounds of your island paradise melt your every care away.
notes: Property Type:  Villa - 2046 sq. ft. Bedrooms: 2 Bedrooms, Sleeps 5, Beds for 5-6 King size beds (1), Twin or Single Beds (1), Baby Cribs (1), Sleep Sofa or Futons (1)
transit: Most Guest rent a car. However If you'd like to skip the walk to your favorite restaurant, beach, resort activity, or adventure, we'll chauffeur you. You'll have a FREE DOOR TO DOOR RESORT SHUTTLE at your service.
access: Included also are the following amenities:  Resort Pools | Tennis Courts  Password protected Wifi  Beach Chairs | Beach Towels  Mid stay towel and linen service when you stay 10 days or more FREE local shuttle  Convenient parking behind your villa **pamper yourself at the luxurious Kapalua Spa Montage (daily fee).  Our guests enjoy the BEST GOLF DISCOUNTS AVAILABLE for the Bay and Plantation courses
interaction: Included also are the following amenities:  Resort Pools | Tennis Courts  Password protected Wifi  Beach Chairs | Beach Towels Mid stay towel and linen service when you stay 10 days or more  FREE local shuttle  Convenient parking behind your villa

host.host_about:
We are Aloha Vacation Villas, a family owned business that grew organically through our great love for Kapalua and West Maui.  We had made the area our vacation destination of choice for most of our lives until one day, we decided to put down our roots and call this magical paradise,... home.

We proudly oversee 50+ privately owned homes in West Maui, Hawaii.  Following our dreams years ago and becoming a part of the island was the best decision we ever made. 

Welcome to paradise (Website hidden by Airbnb)

reviews.comments: The location is one of the most beautiful places I have ever been. We watched humpback whales from the deck chairs. The proximity to beaches means that you can use the unit as your base camp and return to it after swimming. The unit was clean. The kitchen is well stocked. The interior of the unit is getting a little old--no modern kitchen or bathrooms. However, still very nice.  We really enjoyed our stay.

This place is no joke. I dare you to find a more stunning view anywhere. If you have never been to Hawaii and want the full experience just rent this place. Large, private, 3 bathrooms, well appointed and, oh yea, the view. Pull up a lounge chair and enjoy arguably the best back porch in all of Hawaii. Not exaggerating.

name: Room in Kurtuluş close to subway
summary: Our house is in Kurtuluş 5 minutes walk to main subway line. You can to Taksim and Beşiktaş in 20 minutes by walk. It is a cozy and relaxed home filled with books and coffee. Only for women or couples. Room is good for one person or a couple.
space: We offer free breakfast and coffee and tea. Dinner can be prepared for extra fee. Gluten free or vegetarian meals can also be provided on demand.
description: Our house is in Kurtuluş 5 minutes walk to main subway line. You can to Taksim and Beşiktaş in 20 minutes by walk. It is a cozy and relaxed home filled with books and coffee. Only for women or couples. Room is good for one person or a couple. We offer free breakfast and coffee and tea. Dinner can be prepared for extra fee. Gluten free or vegetarian meals can also be provided on demand. You can share a fully equipped kitchen, living room and bathroom.  Guests will  be provided basic needs like towels, shower gel, shampoo, hair dryer etc. Anyone is welcome, regardless of nationality, but preference will be given to people from Korea - I really want to speak Korean :).  Please feel free to mail me with any questions.  Istanbul is a very beatiful city and we will be happy to share what we know about the city with you. Hope to have the chance to meet you!  Thank you! Kurtuluş is an old and safe neighbourhood where you can enjoy the local life but at the same time be very close to the touris
neighborhood_overview: Kurtuluş is an old and safe neighbourhood where you can enjoy the local life but at the same time be very close to the tourist attractions.
notes: Smoking is not allowed in the house.
transit: The house is very close to the main subway line and bus stations, it is only 5 minutes by walk.

Istanbul is a very beatiful city and we will be happy to share what we know about the city with you. Hope to have the chance to meet you!  Thank you!
house_rules: Smoking is not allowed in the house. Please use the shared rooms and your room in a clean way. You can use the kitchen, but please clean after you use it.

host.host_about: Hi! I am psychologist working on memory and my husband works at a bank. We are married for 8 years and we don't have children. We love to travel, have fun and meet new people. I can speak turkish, english, german, korean and a little bit of french and my husband can speak turkish and english.

reviews.comments: I felt like I made lifelong friends at Burcu's place. I moved out only a couple of hours ago. Yet, I already miss Burcu and Volkan. The place is filled with books, gourmet tea and coffee. But most important of all, Burcu and Volkan are fun and kind and reliable and smart and witty. I couldn't feel happier to stay there.

name: chambre,condo
summary: chambre a louer a meme notre condo
description: chambre a louer a meme notre condo

host.host_about:
Bonjour,
Laisse-nous nous décrire un peu afin de mieux nous connaitre
Nous sommes un coulpe(46-50 ans) qui adore voyager.  Nous aimons surtout louer des petits cottages , appartement ou B&B car nous aimons nous sentir comme à la maison.
Voici quelques endroits que nous avons visités : Costa Rica,Italie(2fois), France, Californie, Chicago, St-Martin, Floride et plusieurs fois dans le Sud (Cuba,Mexico,Republic Dominicaine).
Nous sommes des personnes très respectueuses des endroits que nous louons.
Espérant vous voir prochainement !!  Ann et Domenic

name: Prívate room with double bed
summary: Hi! My
space: In a quiet floor without much noise and quite light. It has a large spacious and cozy living room with dining area. The bathroom has a shower and the kitchen cooker, refrigerator, microwave and various utensils. The room where they lodge has a double bed of 1.50 m is convenient and comfortable. En un piso tranquilo sin mucho ruido y con bastante luminosidad.  Tiene un gran salón amplio y acogedor con comedor. El baño dispone de ducha y la cocina de vitro cerámica, frigorífico, lavadora, microondas y diversos utensilios. La habitación donde se alojan tiene una cama de matrimonio de 1,50 m es cómoda y confortable.
description: Hi! My
neighborhood_overview: Es una zona apartada de la zona turística, es un barrio muy acogedor y con mucha vida.  La forma de vida es distinta ya que hay mucha gente de otras culturas y hace que sea multicultural.
notes: Es una zona apartada de la zona turística, es un barrio muy acogedor y con mucha vida.  La forma de vida es distinta ya que hay mucha gente de otras culturas y hace que sea multicultural.

access: Access and enjoyment throughout except my room. Tienen acceso y disfrute a toda la casa menos mi habitación.

host.host_about:
Soy una persona muy activa y divertida.
Me encanta los deportes de aventura y la naturaleza, todo lo que sea con ir a la montaña.
Me encanta viajar y conocer otras culturas.
Adoro comer, es uno de los placeres de la vida, jajaja.

reviews.comments:
Ad accoglierci è stata un'amica. la casa è molto spaziosa, ha una sala molto grande dove si può mangiare, l appartamento è provvisto di lavatrice e connessione internet.
la nostra camera aveva il letto a soppalco e questo d' estate non è proprio positivo, c' era molto caldo.
l'appartamento è situato vicino alla fermata della metropolitana e linee bus. la padrona di casa è molto simpatica e disponibile.

Virginia fue muy simpática y amable con nosotros, ningún problema en el uso de habitaciones comunes, horas de llegada o salida, ni nada por el estilo, tal cual como si fuera nuestro propio piso, además estuvo a nuestra disposición en cuanto algunas dudas que teníamos de la ciudad. 
Piso muy acogedor y en un barrio tranquilo (4 días estuvo nuestro coche en la calle sin ningún altercado). 
¡Completamente recomendable para pasar unos días en la ciudad condal!

Sono stata con il mio ragazzo a casa di (Website hidden by Airbnb) casa è molto piccola, la stanza è un ex sgabuzzino. La finestra c'è ma è come se non ci fosse, dato che dà sulla cucina. C'erano le lenzuola sporche, forse non le ha lavate dagli ospiti precedenti. Lei non l'abbiamo praticamente mai vista. La colazione neanche. L'armadio era a metà occupato dalle sue cose. Sconsigliata profondamente.
Es una gran anfitriona! Una habitación cómoda... La pasamos genial!
Une hôte formidable, Ne rien changer  =)
Buenisima experiencia!! recomendado 100%. La casa esta perfecta, muy limpia y agradable. Virginia fue muy acogedora con nosotros y muy agradable. Repetiriamos sin duda!!

I was there with my boyfriend. The room was ok, but little small and I missed window (it was situated to the another room, not out). We were there alone almost all the time so we could use living room, kitchen. Virginia is nice person, she helped us with everything we needed. There is good traffic availabilty, metro, night bus. I recommed in general.

Thank you very much! We were happy to stay in your apartment! Everything was great! We are sad, that we had very early plane and hadn't ability to say you goodbye. We hope that will able to come back to Barcelona and maybe meet you again. =)

Virginia is a great, open minded host! Her apartment is close to the Metro and has several bus lines in 2min walking distance. Supermarkets are close by. The room is totally fine, when you want to discover Barcelona. The room has a super comfortable bed. The metal frame makes some sound- but it's not at all disturbing- according to us. The bathroom & kitchen facilities work perfectly fine. We can recommand Virginia as a host for your Barcelona trip.

Barrio agradable, calmo, con buena locomoción al centro de la ciudad.
La anfitriiona es muy amable y se pasa muy bien.

It was really nice staying at Virgina's place. She communicated via AirBnb in time. She is really sweet and although we were little late but she waited for us. Place was clean and everything was good. She is really nice. Although her English is not very good but even then she tried her best to explain everything to us.
Her place is not very far from center(via tram/metro). 
Neighborhood is safe as well. Although she was not home for most for the time during our stay but we were quite comfortable there. In the given price, her place is really best. I want to mention one thing about the bed, it is a bunker as shown in the image so it almost touches the roof but it was still comfortable after all day travel :D  Overall, We really enjoyed at her place.

name: Ocean View Across Street from Beach Clean & Quiet
summary: Newly renovated, Ocean View 2bd 2bth condo. 5 minute walk across the street from Sandy Beach, Kamaole 1 & Charley Young beach. Perfect for Swimming & Snorkeling.  Walk to restaurants, grocery & shops & more! 20 Minutes from the airport. Includes Baby Gear, Beach chairs, towels & umbrellas, Coolers & much more!
space: Clean, remodeled, 2 bdrm 2 bathroom non-smoking unit. Features the following; - Free Parking - Elevator - Wi-Fi - Across the street from Beach - Away from Street Noise - Pool & Large Hot tub - BBQ Area - Washer & dryer in condo - 60' Flat screen HDTV - Cable Tv - Netflix ready Smart Tv's in each bedroom - Tommy Bahama Beach chairs & Umbrella's - Coolers & ice packs - Queen size beds - Sofa Bed Queen size pull out Sofa bed - Crib, Stroller & Highchair - Nintendo Wii U + Many More Welcome to our home away from home in Paradise. Enjoy the peek-a-boo Ocean view from this recently remodeled unit while relaxing on the lanai. Situated right across the street from one of the most pristine beaches in Maui, Kamaole I & Charley young beach, one of the most beautiful beaches in the world, where you can swim, snorkel and admire the tropical fish, turtles and even whale watch during the winter months.        Enjoy all the comforts and amenities of this beautiful condo to make this your ultimate vaca
