reviews.comments: Stephan's apartment is beautifully renovated and beautifully appointed.  Modern bathrooms, a huge TV and very comfortable beds - the photos in the listing don't do it justice!  It's across the road from the beach and walking distance to many bars, shops and eateries.  Genuinely useful extras like beach towels, snorkelling gear and beach chairs are a nice touch that differentiates this place from other AirBnBs we stayed at whilst in Oahu.  Lastly, the check in process is fully automated which gave us the flexibility to check in anytime after 4pm without without the hassle of arranging a time to meet the host or a property manager on site.  In our case, this was very convenient as the return drive on Maui's famed Hana Highway took longer than we expected!
The host canceled this reservation 95 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
这里还是不错的,位置非常好,走路到海边只需要3分钟,超市､餐馆都有,房间也很舒适,厨房一应俱全,房东还提供了全部海边娱乐设备｡除了看不到海景,其他都比较满意

The listing was as described, along with a surprise of the boggie boards,noodles, snorkle gear, beach chairs.  Beautiful kitchen newly remodeled very nice appliances. Really liked the keyless entry.  This fit our family very well.  Short walk to Charlie Young beach, could walk to shopping and eating.

Check in was convenient, communication was excellent. Location was close to the beach and great food options, but a bit of a drive to get to Maui's other main attractions. Next time, I would consider staying in Lahaina if doing lots of sightseeing.

The unit was very clean and well presented (better than advertised), with ample space for 6 adults. Beach towels, chairs, snorkel equipment and boogie boards all provided. Full kitchen in immaculate condition. Would not hesitate to book this space again.

Rebecca's house was equipped with everything you need to have fun in Maui! Beach was really close and Beds were comfortable. Also I needed late checkout in the last minute but she understood the situation. I spent a wonderful time in Maui thanks to her :)
Nice and newly remodeled unit in Kihei.  My girl loved this place as a weekend getaway and asked when are we coming back. Beautiful kitchen and baths.

Rebecca was in touch with me immediately (within minutes) when waiting on our booking/payment. During our stay, I messaged her a couple of times and never heard back from. I messaged her regarding the dirty swimming gear, roaches, dirty pots/pan, and dirty kitchen utensils. While there wasn't anything she could've done for us immediately, she never even acknowledged that I messaged her. The roaches were in the kitchen (in the cabinets, on the stove top, countertop, floor, bathroom sink counter, curtain in the living room, living room floor). The only communication we've had since I booked her place was when I requested and received a refund for the cleaning fee, which is $135, because there were several roaches in the kitchen and in the living room. I actually asked her about the cleaning fee before booking with her because it is unusually high compared to several other listings in the area, but she stated that her cleaning fee is that price because she gets her place professionally cleaned. There were old candy pieces underneath the single sofa she has in her living room, which is probably a source of the roaches. I sent her photos and also took videos of the swimming gear, pots/pans, roaches, etc. Half of the swimming gear that's "provided" is broken and we ended up having to rent gear because the ones that were intact didn't fit us. We thought we'd be saving money by getting a place that provided these amenities. The cooler that she provides was sandy all over and had a dead roach inside of it. She charges you for every little thing (one example is using AC more than what's considered "usual" for her guests) - it's all in the welcome binder. You have to do a load of dishes in the dishwasher before leaving if you want to prevent additional charges, even though nothing was cleaned for us before we arrived. While the bed is very comfortable and bathroom looks nice in person, is not worth the lack of cleanliness and thought that you'll have to deal with roaches when you come back to the apartment every night (especially finding multiple in the kitchen everywhere). The residential community is in a good, central location. However, I would definitely not recommend this place to any of my friends or family!

Rebecca's place was very nice, clean and extremely close to the beach (you can't beat that). Check in was quick and easy.  Communication with Rebecca was great.  She responded to all my questions in a timely manor.  I highly recommend this location.

Rebecca & Stephan's place is so easy to book. Their home is beautiful and complete! From bathroom and kitchen amenities and supplies to coolers and other swimming equipments! You don't need to worry about everything! The Hosts responded quickly when we asked for extension. Over all, our stay is stress-free and amazing!
感谢房东给我们的毛伊岛之行提供如此温馨,周全,如回家一样的体验,全家都很开心,真诚感激!
Alles gut. Unkomplizierter Checkin&out, gute Lage, sehr gute Ausstattung, sehr ruhig. Passte alles für uns 4 Personen optimal.
A great place to stay when visiting Kihei! Very close to the beach!
Great condo! Clean and updated. Thank you Rebecca for being attentive when I had any questions or concerns. Definitely will look for this place when I visit Maui.

Super close to several great beaches, whether you are looking to lounge or to try out surfing on some beginner waves. Lots of great restaraunts and shops near by. We found Kihei to be the more "budget friendly" area of Maui, which was perfect for us. I felt like we really got to explore the area and not just be bound to one resort and its beach. The hosts have a perfect supply of beach chairs, boogie boards, a cooler, kitchen supplies, you name it! Definitely a great place stay.
Great place to stay at while vacationing in Maui! The location was great and made it easy to go to the places we wanted. Right across from the beach and near many stores!
The Condo his very well located close to beaches and good surf spots! We had an amazing time in their condo.
Exceeded my expectations. Clean, comfortable, quiet

Rebecca was incredible to work with! We had no trouble entering the place. We had a short walk to the beach! That was awesome! In addition, we had some terribly windy days while there, so it was nice to relax by the pool and use the hot tub that were right next to our condo building. 

There were a few screens with holes that she quickly had fixed while we were there. It was great having a washer and dryer available as well as the dishwasher. Everything worked great and we were very happy with the stay. 

The only issue we had while staying there was not knowing where to park when someone parked in our reserved spot. We ended up parking in guest and letting the security guard know so our rental wouldn't be towed.  Otherwise, we had no issues during our stay. Some of the snorkel gear was broken upon arrival, but my sister was able to put together two complete sets. That was plenty for us as we would take turns when people were tired. We got to swim with sea turtles two of the days we were there, once at the beach right across the street from our condo and once at a beach north of Lahaina. 

I highly recommend this property. We did see some public transportation buses running, but we didn't use them since we had a rental van. So I don't know if it is reliable or not. Mahalo, Rebecca and Veronika for a fabulous stay!

Directions were very clear and simple to follow.  The layout of the condo is simple and quite nicely decorated.  The kitchen was very well stocked with utensils, plates and spices.  The appliances are updated which provided an option to prepare meals!  Beaches are nearby and the condo has snorkelling and beach supplies which we found quite useful.  Our daughter loved the pool.  It was close to shops and restaurants.  S & Q Shave Ice was a favourite stop for us!  Very central location to access all the different parts of the island.  Within 30 minutes to the airport and Costco.  An excellent place to explore and enjoy all of  Maui!

The location is superb.  Right across from the beach, walking distance to restaurants and near everything else.  The unit was very clean and new since it was recently remodeled.  It did feel a bit small but enough for 4 adults.  We ate most of the time.  We were pleasantly surprised the amount of beach gear was available to us. Chairs, umbrella, snokling gear, coolers even a beach bag and toys.  She got back to us right away with every text.  She was even our guide on the island

The place was perfect for our family of 6 adults even with 2 adults sleeping on the couch and a blow-up mattress.  Being in Maui across the street from the beach was awesome.  The chairs, umbrellas, and snorkeling equipment were used daily.  We contributed a few items to your collection.  Thanks again!
The unit is just like the pictures, and  it's a great location to get just about anywhere you need.
Great condo, very close to the beach which is a great beach for kids, great pool on site with bbq's. Walking distance to restaurants and shops. All around a great location!

Aucun commentaire négatif. Nous n'avons manqué de rien, serviettes, parasols, body board, nouilles, glacière, etc., il y avait même des condiments dans le frigo (moutarde, relish, ketchup), très apprécié.
Clean and cozy. Really convenient part of Kihei. Close to the beaches and a shopping mall. Also, it had all the beach gear you need.

This apt was perfect for my family trip. The amenities are amazing and it's a top airbnb I've had so far. The host is not really super duper warm and welcoming (since I never saw her and we just communicate each other via airbnb message) but she does a great job when it comes to the apt. So I give her 5 stars. Thank you.
Very clean and modern appliances!
It was good

Loved the location, very convenient for traveling all over the island and walking distance to some of the best beaches and restaurants in the area. Clean comfortable condo. Would definitely stay again.

Excellent place to stay if you want to explore South Maui.
Great location near many restaurants, shopping and beaches.
Tremendous communication and amenities (beach equipment, etc.).
would come back
Nice and affordable
We needed a last minute place to stay and we are so glad we could stay here.  Even though it was last minute she was accommodating.  The space was perfect for us and very clean.

The condo was clean, updated, and perfect for the 7 of us. There were lots of extras like chairs, coolers and beach stuff that was awesome. Rebecca was quick to respond to questions and was very helpful. Easy walk to the beach!

The space was beautiful and furnished exquisitely. It was just like how the pictures depicted it! Rebecca was accommodating and helped solve any questions if we had any. She was quick and responsive, which is something I love about a host!

We loved staying in this Airbnb! It had everything we needed to go beach hopping and its location was perfect to explore the island. 
We did our grocery shopping at Foodland which is a short drive away, and we found membership cards in the credenza. Saved quite a bit using them. 
Loved getting up in the morning, taking my cup of coffee to the beach and sitting there before breakfast. The entrance to the beach is right across the street. 
The bedrooms are comfortable, the kitchen is well stocked, and the dining room was perfect for meals and board games. 
Overall, excellent place to stay in Kihei! Thank you Rebecca!

GREAT LOCATION !!!! Having the beach chairs and cooler available to us made things so much easier. The outside is a little deceiving but you will love the inside.  OMG !!! Rebecca was great. Always responded to me very quickly and was so accommodating to us. I would definitely stay here again.
Great place to stay. Beautiful ... Perfect location. ..

I can't put into words how wonderful this place is!  Great location, walkable to beaches, restaurants, and convenience stores.  The interior is beautifully furnished and includes beach amenities (so sweet!).  Rebecca was great in communicating everything needed to checkin and made sure we were well accommodated upon arrival.  Would definitely stay again and recommend to others!

Fantastic price and location!! South Kihei is a great spot, and the condo is walking distance to several eateries, bars, coffee places, food market, and of course the beach. We walked most of the time. The condo features 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. One bedroom has a bathroom included, and the other bedroom has a somewhat private hallway entrance where the other bathroom is also located. The condo is well stocked with snorkeling equipment, beach chairs/towels, beach umbrellas, baby furniture, first aid amenities, and washer/dryer. Also, Rebecca is very friendly and responsive. If we are fortunate enough to come back to this beautiful paradise, we will definitely see if this condo is available again.

Such a great find! Rebecca was very responsive and sent helpful tips. We comfortably had 5 people in the condo. We especially appreciated the amenities- beach towels, umbrellas, chairs and other items. The location is across the road from Kihei’s beaches and just a quick drive to beaches all along Wailea-Makena. We would happily stay here again!
Very nice place to stay, close to beach, shopping and great places to eat. The condo has great amenities everything you will need.  Highly recommend this stay.

This was my first time using airbnb and I'm pretty sure Rebecca has ruined me for other places. Her home was amazing and her hospitality was unmatched.  She was very understanding and patient while I tried to figure out how to use airbnb. Once we arrived she checked in with us to make sure we had everything we needed and was available to answer my questions throughout our stay.  
Rebecca obviously takes great pride in her home. It was stunning with lots of little detail added in.  Everything we needed was right there from laundry facilities to beach gear. I couldn't have asked for  better experience.
这是我第一次用airbnb订房,过程很顺利,房主在出发前一周将房屋的注意事项都发给了我,我们的房间位置很好,海滩就在对面,步行的距离就可以到达｡房间里设备一应俱全,有提供浮潜面罩,挖沙工具,冲浪板沙滩椅等,孩子们玩的很开心｡我们度过了愉快的三天,下次我会选择这家｡
Very nice well furnished condo in a great location

Really good location. Local/residential area. Fast and easy commute from the airport and relatively easy to get to Lahaina and Kaapanali. It’s a nice area to go for an early morning jog along South Kihei Road/along the beach. The shops and restaurants nearby meant my elderly parents can just stroll around and explore the area while we do our outdoor adventure activities. 

My boyfriend and I also rented bicycles from a shop just 200m away, and cycled to the Lava fields down south (18km away). 

The fan in one of the bedrooms was slightly faulty and Rebecca was prompt in her response to fix it. Kudos to that. My only qualm would be the second bedroom is slightly dark as the windows are closed since for privacy since it is facing the common corridor. 

Would recommend the place! <3
It was a beautiful place that had absolutely everything ! We would totally stay there again .

We had a great time there. The place was clean and nicely updated. The booking and check-in process was really easy. Rebecca was really great about get back to us with any troubleshooting issues we had. The location was perfect and right by several beaches. We would definitely stay here again.
Beach access across the street. Pool was nice. It was a nice place to stay for myself and family.
Great location and very clean condo. I appreciated the easy keypad entry and clear instructions. My stay was just a quick overnight so those were very important.

Rebecca’s space was in a great location, with beach access right across the roadway. The place had tons of useful beach items for the family. Full kitchen, washer and dryer made everything extremely easy for our stay. I would highly recommend this place and I will surely be back. Thanks Rebecca!
Rebecca’s place was great for our family of 5. It was so nice and clean and at a perfect location. We had a great time!
Super comfortable beds in relaxing space.  Great location and proximity to non-crowded beach!
This place is amazing. Perfect location to everything. Food and beautiful beaches are all within walking distance.
Unit was beautiful and clean, directly across the street from the beach to beautiful sunsets!

Rebecca was most accomodating and the place was better than advertised in my opinion. We had a scattered group including couples and singles, and everyone ended up getting satisfying sleep. In the awake times, we could accomodate all food and drink requirements for the group in comfort. The place fed us the rest, food, and amenities we needed to fuel the days of adventure and matrimony of the daytimes. Rebecca was off island but the local contact helped out in lieu as needed.

This place is excellent. Very nice space like the photos suggest and in the perfect location close to all the shops and across the road from the beach! We are so glad we stayed here!! Would highly recommend!

Condo was great. Within walking distance of great snorkeling places, restaurants and gift shops. 
House was very clean and comfortable. Would definitely stay there again.
Wonderful, classy and clean condo across the street from the beach. Loved it!

Exactly as pictured and described. Quick responses.  My friends and I stayed over 2 nights for a wedding. On the day, we checked out,  I left behind $170 by accident.  I was promptly notified by Rebecca within hours of checking out.  Thank you for the hospitality and the honesty.
Exceptional service and quick response.
Great location! We enjoyed the beach that was closest for morning and evening walks and all day fun in the sun
perfect location. Rebecca was very helpful with every concern we had. the space was amazing for our party of 7! I highly recommend this place and will likely use again for our next trip to Maui.

Loved the location of this apartment above all. It’s close to lots of restaurants and the beach across the street, Charley Young Beach, is my favorite for late afternoon swimming and watching the sunset. The beach gear was fantastic. Used the snorkeling gear, boogie boards, beach chairs and beacb umbrella to go snorkeling at Ulua beach one day and had the best time. It has a fully equipped kitchen, where we enjoyed cooking full meals for our family. Foodland was also just 4 minutes away drive. The only blip for us, and it’s not really anything that the owner can do, is that the beds run soft. So if you like harder mattresses, you might need to make some adjustments like putting a pillow under your lower back. Thank you for having us!!! Would definitely recommend.
Clean and fully equipped apartment with comfy beds, kitchen and beach gear. Responsive owner. Detailed instructions for check-in. Very happy with our stay.
Don't expect to actually view the ocean from this unit.  It was clean and well decorated, but small.  We liked having a key pad instead of keys to access the unit.

The place is great. It’s close to the beach. The pool is great. The only gripe I have is that from the initial advertised price of 296$ per night after service fee, cleaning fee and Hawaii tax it was closer to 381$ per night. The Hawaii state tax is mentioned in the deal but easy to oversee because it is not due until 2 weeks prior to arrival when it is too late to dispute.   It is 14.25% so it added about 44$ per night for us.

Rebecca’s place was great in general! The location was good and parking was near the entrance. However, we did see a cockroach in the bathroom (yikes) and we were only provided two very small sets of body wash, shampoo, and conditioner for 4 people for 3 nights stay. We used that up the first night so we had to go buy our own. The kitchen is also good but didnt have any hood so the place was filled with smoke after cooking a meal. Lastly, the place had sand here and there on the floor from the previous guests, which we didnt really mind but it also had sand in the washing machine and the dryer which wasnt pleasant. I did tell Rebecca about the sand and she promptly sent housekeeping to clean, but there wasnt much she could do since the sand was already part of the washing machine and the dryer.
Perfect launching pad near gorgeous beach. Rebecca has all the gear you need! Baby items (pack and play, high chair), beach items and more!
As advertised, clean, just enough room for a large (7) party, and a short walk to the beach. Rebecca was responsive, helpful and reasonable.

name: Single Rm@Inn Square, Jordan, TST#2
summary: ‘Inn Square’ provides a SINGLE BED and a private bathroom room. We provides a comfy and tidy place at an affordable rate for travelers. The room size is 80 sqf. Quiet and comfy sleeping condition is guaranteed.

description: ‘Inn Square’ provides a SINGLE BED and a private bathroom room. We provides a comfy and tidy place at an affordable rate for travelers. The room size is 80 sqf. Quiet and comfy sleeping condition is guaranteed. Double Rm@Inn Square #1    https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/6769671 Double Rm@Inn Square #3   https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/6619115 Double Rm@Inn Square #6   https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/6770407 Family Rm@Inn Square #5    https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/6723406 Family Rm@Inn Square, #7   https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/6770795 Family Rm@Inn Square #9    https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/6771089 Single Rm@Inn Square #2     https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/6771249  Single Rm@Inn Square #8     https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/6722851  *************************************************************************** PLEASE READ THROUGH THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE BEFORE MAKING ANY INQUIRY OR RESERVATION: Opened in May (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , INN SQUARE is a TRENDY and COZY HOSTEL in Hong Kong, designed for t
neighborhood_overview: The area is well known as Gourmet corner for Hong Kong locals. You can have a taste of a variety of local and exotic cuisines just downstairs of the guesthouse.
notes: All the rooms have private bathroom and ventilation system, and are equipped with full set of toiletries: shampoo, shower gel, soap, toothbrush and toothpaste. We also provide towels, slippers, hair dryer, kettle, complimentary bottle water and coffee and tea. Housekeeping is provided on the daily basis. Once per week cleaning will be done for every booking over a week.Free Wifi is provided with no speed limitation.  Regular check-in time starts from 3pm. Early check-in is flexible only if the previous guest checks out early and the room is cleaned up by then. In case the room is not ready yet by the time of your arrival, you could leave the luggage at the reception. We will arrange in first priority to have your room cleaned up. Regular check-out time is 11am, special request for late check-out will be considered according to the availability of the room of the day. Any unapproved late check-out after 2pm will be subject to a charge of a minimum of 50% of room rate of the day.
transit: 5 minutes of walk to Temple street & Jade Market;  10 minutes of walk to China Ferry Terminal to Macau;  15 minutes of walk to Harbour City;  20 minutes of walk to Star Ferry Pier, Avenue of Stars, Space Museum, Museum of Art, Museum of History & Science Museum;  10 minutes of walk to Elements & Kowloon Station for Airport Express & MTR Tung Chung Line;  22 minutes to Airport by the Express from Kowloon Station;  25 minutes to AsiaWorld Expo by the Express from Kowloon Station;  27 minutes to Ngong Ping 360 from Kowloon Station;  3 minutes of walk to MTR Austin Station;  30 minutes to Disneyland from Austin Station;  10 minutes of walk to MTR Jordan Station;  6 minutes to Admiralty Station from Jordan Station, where you can take shuttle bus #629 to OCEAN PARK;  5 minutes to Hong Kong Station from Kowloon Station, Exit J2 to Tram Terminus to the Peak; Exit D2 to SOHO & Lan Kwai Fong;  10 minutes to Wan Chai Station from Jordan Station, where you can walk to HKCEC;  20 minutes to Wan Cha
interaction: You are more than welcome to ask for assistance or travel tips in Hong Kong with our staff who speaks English, Mandarin and Cantonese.
house_rules: • Check-in time is 3PM. There is no additional charge after full payment on AIRBNB, except under following conditions:  1. $300HKD to be charged for smoking in the room;  2. $100HKD to be charged for losing the room key.

host.host_about: Opened in May 2015, INN SQUARE is a TRENDY and COZY HOSTEL in Hong Kong, designed for the modern day global travelers. Owned and operated by a friendly Canadian, we are located in the heart of the bustling streets of Kowloon West, seconds away from the Austin MTR station and within walking distance to the Elements shopping mall, where the Airport Express Kowloon station locates and of course many local fabulous eateries catered to the unique taste of our backpackers.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong, Kowloon, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Small room,clean and good for sleep.
好小好小好小,将近没有伸缩的空间都没,不过挺干净的

I love staying at Inn Square. My room is always clean and well stocked. The place is very secure and is close to the MTR station (Jordan, Kowloon, Austin). 
The flat has everything you need for the perfect stay. Very nice and clean apartment. Nothing bad to say about the place
Inn Square was very accommodating and helpful. Thanks you for your help all the time. I look forward to my next stay at Inn Square. 
This place is highly recommended.

A great place to stay for sure. The room is quite clean and comfortable. Also the location is close to everything with easy access to MTR/Airport Express. (BTW, highly recommend the dim sum place across the street)
The host sent clear instructions on how to get to the Inn many days in advance! I'll definitely stay again there on my next visit!
房间跟图片一样 很干净整洁 有家的感觉
非常乾淨舒適,住宅區也相當安靜,一樓有管理員,層層把關,非常安全｡很貼心提供轉接器｡地點非常好,去哪裡都方便｡值得推薦｡

Good, clean place. Didn't see any staff other than cleaners, but the help available via phone was very attentive. Felt relatively safe. Decent neighbourhood for food options and relatively central. There is a big construction site nearby, but it didn't really affect my stay. The room was small rooms, but that's standard for Hong Kong. I'd stay here again.

麻雀虽小五脏俱全｡交通还算便利,楼下很多餐厅,但隔音不好,夜晚很吵｡总体来讲性价比高｡it's a tiny room that is well equipped. It's located at a convenient place where many local restaurants open.  almost no sound proof . after all,good quality at great price.
Perfect location close by MTR Austin / Kowloon station. Convenient self check in/out. Newly renovated, clean and cozy.

予約時のﾒｯｾｰｼﾞがとても丁寧でした｡場所が分からず､中国人の友人が電話で問い合わせてくれたのですが､夜中だったにも関わらず対応ありがとうございました｡
お部屋も狭いですが清潔で､変換ﾌﾟﾗｸﾞがあったのがとても助かりました!あとﾄﾞﾗｲﾔｰも完備されていました｡
Newly renovated place and is super nice & clean.  But the problem is common.... too small. If I open my luggage, I can't open the door :( but overall is nice & comfortable!
It was great! Good location and a nice room. Great for a short stay in Hong Kong.
交通方便,外加一位善良慈祥细心体贴的房东太太｡你还有什么好犹豫呢?
Very nice location and clean room. I love it. Thank you very much!

I stayed in room 6 for one month and had no issue. The listing is accurate with the rooms being quite small but in an excellent location. The location is fantastic to experience local life, but also has access to all touristy area's via mtr. Jorden, Austin, and Kowloon stations are all within walking distance. Did not have much contact with the host, but was available when I called him. Overall a good experience.
The bed is too short for me. I'm 181cm. Overall was good.

Recommended for solo traveller , It's located near Jordan and Yau Ma tei. Not a bad place after all, clean. there's also a night market and u can find lots of food there :). will definitely come back again.

I booked two rooms and I stayed in the double room.  The single room according to my friend was great.  I loved the fact that it was extremely clean and new.  I was there when the weather was around 10 degrees Celsius, anf the water heater worked perfectly.  My friend locked herself out of the room  one time, and I called the host.  Not one tone of rudeness, very polite and promptly called the cleaning lady to come open the door.  The day when I arrived in hongkong it was about 7am in the morning, and it wasn't until 3pm before we could check in. As the place was quite small we didn't know where we should place out baggages. I called the host and he was as polite as ever even when receiving calls so early in the morning. Rooms are very clean and cozy.  Very new and very convenient.  I could even walk to TST in 20 25 minutes.  We are near a lot of good areas and transportation is extremely convenient.  The ferry to macau and the MTR are all within walking distance.  Great choice and I highly recommend this place.

This room is SMALL. However, if you are a traveler with a small budget who doesn't mind a cramped room, this is an incredibly good value for HK. I didn't do anything other than sleep and shower so it was overall a nice stay. The directions were also very clear.
The listing was accurate according to its description. The location was very ideal!
非常干净整洁,地理位置也很好,大概是香港同类HOSTEL中最好的一家~~无论到佐敦还是柯士甸地铁站都只要10分钟路程｡楼下的食肆是本地朋友的推荐呢!
臨行之前通知了更換地方,因為之前的樓層在整修,入住也很方便,離地鐵站非常近,地理位置很好,周圍也有許多有名的餐廳,房間雖然隔音不太好但舒適乾淨,下次還會再選擇｡
원래 1인실로 예약하였으나 홍콩 도착 전날에 1인실 방이 없어 패밀리룸으로 바뀌었다는 메세지를 받았습니다. 친절히 하나하나 설명해 주어 어려움 없이 숙소를 찾아갈 수 있었으며, 체크인 시간이 많이 늦을것을 대비하여 현관 비밀번호를 비롯하여 여러 정보를 미리 주었습니다. 얼굴은 한번도 보지 못했지만 세심한 배려를 느낄 수 있었습니다.

The room is pretty small, but it's got everything you need, bathroom, TV, cleaning service. It's two minutes walk from the MTR. Great location, surrounded with miscellaneous delicious food. And the security in the building are very kind and friendly. Definately would recommend it to my friends.

위치 가격 모두 만족합니다.
다만 방음이 되지않아 이어플러그 사용하였습니다.

The room is small but (Website hidden by Airbnb) has a good location,you can easily reach Jordan and Austin station.And the host is (Website hidden by Airbnb) a nice trip to HK.I'll commit it to my friends.
地理位置优越 虽然房间不大 但是功能齐全 性价比完胜 房东也很好

The place is easily accessible by public transport as it’s close to both Austin Station and Jordan Station. There are many restaurants, supermarkets and a few laundries around so everything is convenient. As I have been living in Hong Kong for many years before, I can say the room is really worth the price.
Small room in Jordan, close to amenities, clean, good value.

Very tiny room but definitely enough for one person! Location is nice, nearby temple street. Cleanliness was okay. Communication with hostel manager was very good! Would recommend it, worth the price!!

看图片可能会觉得睡不舒服,但是当你住进去,真的很舒适,也很干净!
足够你的正常使用!
i like it!
with the price that low and the room so clean,i think is worth it.
and when you live in,you feel like it is actually bigger than you thought!
And the bed small nice!

Despite of noise, my overall stay was ok. 3pm check in was not suitable for me however I went there at 2pm and the host didn’t object me. Nobody cleaned my room for 3 days and the trash got bigger. So, seeing big trash everyday was also not comfortable.
Very very Small size and no window, but good location and clean

Very conveniently located.
Room is a typical size for the price. No point searching elsewhere if this is your budget.
The building itself is very old and the area very worn but everything in the hostel is brand new, and clean.
Mould is typical due to humidity in Hong Kong but there wasn't much in the bathroom.
还可以,位置很好
very good location,so near the subway station. Its cost performance is very high.
My mom had a great stay.

name: Cozy room near by Boğaziçi Univ.
summary: The flat is very close to bus stops and metro that you can go to central places like Taksim, Beşiktaş, Kadıköy easily. The room has one(+one) bed, wardrobe, bookshelf and a desk. It is sunny and comfortable. We are welcoming queerfriendly people:)
description: The flat is very close to bus stops and metro that you can go to central places like Taksim, Beşiktaş, Kadıköy easily. The room has one(+one) bed, wardrobe, bookshelf and a desk. It is sunny and comfortable. We are welcoming queerfriendly people:)

reviews.comments:
Die Wohnung liegt in einem kleinen Viertel gerade gegenüber vom Haupteingang der Bogazici Universität, und 5 Minuten zu Fuss entfernt. Das Zimmer war sonnig, vom Balkon aus blickt man auf die Schnellstrasse zur Bosporusbrücke. Es leben mehrere Parteien in der Wohnung, ich habe aber nur zwei Leute gesehen, die beide sehr freundlich waren. 

Damla war selber nicht in Istanbul zu der Zeit, hat aber die Schlüsselübergabe gut organisiert. 

Insgesamt eine gute Erfahrung, würde ich wieder machen.

Damla and her roommate were friendly and helpful. The location was good, about a 15 minute walk to my friend's accommodations at Bogazici university. The room was clean and spacious, as was the bathroom. A very nice apartment and overall great experience.
Damla was a wonderful host! Very warm and friendly, as well as thoughtful when it comes to anticipating guest need. The bed was quite comfy and there was even a desk. Perfect for a traveling student!
Very pleasant, friendly, strongly recommend

I would recommend making very sure that Damla and her roommates are expecting you and ready for you. Also make sure that the room you are being offered is the room pictured in the listing, and that the kitchen is clean and available for use if you would like that option. Also the flat is a bit further down the street than it appears on the map; there is a fairly steep walk down to the apartment and back up to the University so be aware of that.

It was a bit hard to find it and the rest of the stay was really good.

FYI you can get to the host only using the metro line from the airport!

name: Sunny and charming centric flat!!
summary: Easygoing host; Artistic flat; Fibra WIFI
space: Hi everybody!!  My name is Chiara, I am from Italy, I work in an art gallery and taking a PHD in Medieval Art. I share the flat with my friend Marcelo, from Patagonia. He is an amazing hair dresser and a very creative artisan! We will love to have you as guests! Our nice app. is located near the Parc de la Ciutadella and the Arc de Triomf, 5 minutes walking from Born neighborhood and 10 from the beach! There has 3 rooms in total, one kitchen with an interior balcony, one bathroom with a shower/little tub and a big and colorful living room with a balcony from which you can see the Sagrada Familia and the Tibidabo Church! The flat is really colorful and full of small details! We provide Wifi, sheets and towels and you are free to use the kitchen. Our house is really well connected by bus, metro (red line) and train (Estacion del Norte). We have supermakets, resturants and coffee shops near by. As we both love to cook, we also offer the possibility to try our multiethnic dishes! (Extra se
description: Hi everybody!!  My name is Chiara, I am from Italy, I work in an art gallery and taking a PHD in Medieval Art. I share the flat with my friend Marcelo, from Patagonia. He is an amazing hair dresser and a very creative artisan! We will love to have you as guests! Our nice app. is located near the Parc de la Ciutadella and the Arc de Triomf, 5 minutes walking from Born neighborhood and 10 from the beach! There has 3 rooms in total, one kitchen with an interior balcony, one bathroom with a shower/little tub and a big and colorful living room with a balcony from which you can see the Sagrada Familia and the Tibidabo Church! The flat is really colorful and full of small details! We provide Wifi, sheets and towels and you are free to use the kitchen. Our house is really well connected by bus, metro (red line) and train (Estacion del Norte). We have supermakets, resturants and coffee shops near by. As we both love to cook, we also offer the possibility to try our multiethnic dishes! (Extra se
neighborhood_overview: The location is centric and perfect to reach the popular Born area, the ciutadela park, the sea and some cultural (e.g., Museo Picasso) and shopping areas.
transit: Bus stops and metro stops (Arc de Triump and Ciutadela Vila Olimpica) are literally 5 minutes walking from the flat. Also the rail stations (Estacio de el Nord y Estacio de Francia) are at 10 minutes distance. It is possible to reach the flat from the airport by public transport (rail with change at Barcelona Sants). The cost is approximately 10 Euros, and it offers other 9 trips included in this price to use the metro and explore the city. It is also possible to reach the flat by taxi (cost of approximately 30 Euros)
access: All the common areas and their room
interaction: Pre check in by the Airbnb platform is the most efficient source (messages will be directed to my mobile). During the experience I will be around and in any case we can exchange our mobile contacts
house_rules: After 12 pm at night we require no severe noise or parties to be respectful with the neighbours. Smoking is allowed on the balconies of the flat (we have 2). We are reciclying friendly!! We do not have any pets in the flat but we can host your small pet in case you need so

host.host_about:
Hello everybody!
My name is Marcelo and I'm from Patagonia, Argentina.
After a long stay in Andalucía, Spain, I decided to move to the multiethnic city of Barcelona, where I'm spending my third wonderful year. I'm an hand - made artisan. I like to create, read, listen to music, spend time with people and share my experiences with them. I also love animals, so pets will be welcome! I really love to cook and I'm always glad to offer my guests the possibility to try my dishes (as an extra service). 

Airbnb give us the chance to meet people from all around the world so that we can share our life experience in Barcelona and joy of living!!
I will be glad to make your stay enjoyable and memorable and I hope that you will fell like at home. Do not hesitate to contact me for any further query.

Hola a todos!
Mi nombre es Marcelo y soy de la Patagonia, Argentina.
Después de una larga estancia en Andalucía, España, decidí mudarme a la ciudad multiétnica de Barcelona, donde llevo viviendo ya tres fantásticos años. Soy peluquero y artesano, me gusta crear, leer, escuchar música, pasar tiempo con la gente y compartir mis experiencias con ellos. Adoro a los animales, así que todas vuestras mascotas serán más que bienvenidas! Me encanta cocinar y siempre estoy encantado de ofrecer a mis clientes la posibilidad de probar mis platos (como servicio extra).

Airbnb nos da la oportunidad de conocer a gente de todo el mundo para que podamos compartir nuestra experiencia de vida en Barcelona y la alegría de vivir!
Estaremos encantados de hacer su estancia agradable y memorable y deseamos que nuestros huéspedes se sientan como en casa. Os esperamos!

Ciao a tutti!
Mi chiamo Marcelo e vengo dalla Patagonia, Argentina.
Dopo un lungo soggiorno in Andalusia, Spagna, ho deciso di trasferirmi nella multietnica città di Barcellona, dove vivo giá da tre fantastici anni. Sono  artigiano e parrucchiere, mi piace creare, leggere, ascoltare musica, trascorrere del tempo con le persone e condividere le mie esperienze con loro. Amo gli animali, quindi tutti i vostri animali domestici sono i benvenuti! Adoro cucinare e sono sempre felice di offrire ai miei clienti la possibilità di provare i miei piatti (come servizio extra).

Airbnb ci dà l'opportunità di incontrare persone provenienti da tutto il mondo in modo da poter condividere la nostra esperienza di vita a Barcellona e la gioia di vivere!
Saremo lieti di rendere il vostro soggiorno piacevole e indimenticabile e speriamo che i nostri ospiti si sentano come a casa. Vi aspettiamo!

address.government_area: el Parc i la Llacuna del Poblenou

reviews.comments:
Being hosted in Chiara's flat completed my wonderful 2-days trip to Barcelona - planned just 1 day before it. Chiara replied my request few hours after I post it, so it helped me a lot, making me feel relaxed about the hosting. Chiara's flat is precisely charming as she described. It was a warm decoration, that will make you feel comfortable and relaxed. There I found interesting books of photography, and also Mafalda. Furthermore, it's pretty close to places you may love to visit. I'm glad I visited Chiara and Marcelo, because not only I found a good place for discovering Barcelona, but also I made new friends in that short time.
 
===== ===== ===== 
Hospedarme en el piso de Chiara completó mi maravilloso viaje de dos días a Barcelona - planeado apenas 1 día antes. Chiara respondió mi petición un par de horas después de enviarla, lo que me ayudó mucho a relajarme respecto al hospedaje. El piso es encantador, tal como lo describe Chiara. Tiene una decoración cálida, que harán que te sientas comfortable y relajado. Allí encontré interesantes libros de fotografía, y de Mafalda. Además, está muy cerca de lugares que querrás visitar. Estoy contento de haber visitado a Chiara y Marcelo, no sólo porque llegué a un buen sitio para descubrir Barcelona, sino porque hice nuevos amigos en un corto período de tiempo.

We stayes four nights at Chiara's. The flat is very nice, colourful and clean. 
Chiara and her flat mate Marcelo are very friendly and open minded persons. I would recommend to stay here to everybody. Thank you chiara, hope to see you some day.

thanks to Chiara we spent some good few days in Barcelona.
what a shame we did not have more time to be together 
I recommend this place

Chiara and Marcelo are among the best hosts I have ever met. Marcelo cooks very well and he is an open-minded and easygoing guy, Chiara has the typical Italian positive attitude and is ready to help for everything you might need. If you want to enjoy your spare time while keeping your private time when you need it this is the best option to consider. 

The apartment in a nice and quite zone is well equipped. Wifi works well and from the balcony there is an amazing view.

I definitely recommend it!

I really enjoyed staying at this apartment. It's very charm, cozy and well located. You can easily go to the center, to the beach, to Sagrada Familia or to the parties. Chiara and Marcelo are amazing hosts. I had the opportunity to try some nice meals and chatting with them. I highly recommend staying there. Hope to meet you guys someday.

Chiara and Marcelo we're amazing hosts! They were so friendly and warm sharing with us  tips on Barcelona. Everything went so smoothly, the house is kept in a beautiful condition and in a great location. Will definitely recommend to all my friends! (:

Julia and I had a wonderful stay with Chiara and Marcelo.  The bedroom was a little small but more important was the friendship we gained.  We slept well and also had a nice time just hanging out when we needed a rest from the busy city.  It was like we had known our hosts for a long time.  And the location was great. We would stay again with Chiara and Marcelo if we return to Barcelona.

The colorfull flat and flowered balcony makes you feel the air and the particular ambience of Barcelona. The flat invites you every morning to wake up with your coffee, sit in the balcony and enjoy the view and the sun of the city.
Moreover, the apprtment takes place in the middle between the beach and the center in a calm street. Perfect to take advantage of everything.
Finally Chiara and Marcelo ( and GianCarlo) are really really nice persons and will make you feel like home. We laughed a lot !

WE RECOMMEND !!! :-D

El piso colorado con su balcón florido  te hace sentir el aire y el ambiente particular de Barcelona. El piso te invita cada mañana a despertarte con tu café, sentarte fuera en el balconcillo, admirando la vista bonita y sentir el sol iluminando la ciudad. 
Ademas, el piso se encuentra a la mitad de la playa y del centro en una calle calma. Perfecto para aprovechar de todo.
Por fin, Chiara y Marcelo (y GianCarlo ;-) )son muy simpaticos, divertidos y te hacen sentir como a casa. 

RECOMENDAMOS !!!! :-D

My stay at Chiara's place was very nice. With the housemate Marcello I had a lovely dinner and I felt very welcome in the house. The location is nice because your are only few minutes walking away from the Born area and directly surrounded by parcs (Ciutadella park) and the Arc de Triomph. Eventhough the house is lively the room is very private and clean. Chiara's place is a perfect choice if you like to be close to the city centre.

Chiara and Marcelo are very friendly hosts and their flat is the most colorful we have ever seen.  It is located next to Ciutadella Parc and you can go easily to Born ang gothic area, Sagrada Familia, beach and most of the museums.
We have been with our two-year boy and Chiara and Marcelo were so welcoming that we and our babyboy felt at home :) 
Thank you both for your warmth at this rainy days, it was so nice time to us.
We recommend it!

Nous avons passé une semaine dans l'appartement de Chiara et de son colocataire Marcelo. Très bien situé, l'appartement permet d'être dans un quartier calme et de rejoindre le centre à pied. Nous n'avons jamais rencontré Chiara mais Marcelo était très accueillant et s'efforçait de se faire comprendre malgré le peu d'anglais qu'il maîtrise. Si vous cherchez une "auberge espagnole" c'est celle-ci qu'il vous faut, il y aura toujours du monde en transit. Petit bémol le lit est assez étroit et il faut se faire à une fenêtre en plexi sans volets.

Llegar a la casa de Chiara y Marcelo fué literalmente un respiro. La casa y la habitación son muy lindas, limpia, muy bien ubicadas con respecto a los lugares principales para recorrer. Puedes moverte desde allí a pié o con el metro que está a escasos metros. En cuanto a los anfitriones, son los mejores que he tenido en todo el viaje, siempre disupuestos a colaborar, divertidos, serviciales. Volvería una y otra y otra vez a Barcelona, en parte por gente como ellos. Gracias chicos!!!!!

We stayed for five days int the flat in june 2013.
We had greats moments at this flat. It was a really good experience.
The reception was warm, friendly, smily ! 
Sincerely, Chiara and Marcelo are the best host that we ever had.
We can share with them, talk, laught !
The flat is nice, very agredable and well located.
We highly recommanded the host and the flat, dont' hesitate if you're looking fot a flat in Barcelona.
We hope we will have the opportunity to get back !!
J&D

Chiara is great, totally relaxed! If you need a stressless host with a room which is located perfectly in the city center -with view on Sagrada Familia-, go for this flat!

Thanks Chiara & Marcello!

I was in Barcelona for a conference and needed a room for 4 nights. I chose Chiara and Mercelo's apartment because of the location and the posted reviews of them. They were as friendly as described in the previous reviews, and I enjoyed my stay there. Every morning, Mercelo made me a cup of coffee and bread, and also when I was there in the afternoons working, he offered me lunch he made (which was delicious!). There is a supermarket down in the corner where you can buy water, bread, etc. I would stay there when I am in Bercelona.

We had a wonderful eight days at Chiara. She and her friend Marcelo are very frendly and helpful people, it was a pleasure talking with them. The room was nice and clean, the flat has a great view to the city. It is located in a central location, we could reach the center on foot, catch the suburban trains to Costa Brava and travel with the buses from the near central bus station.
Thanks you guys for the great time!

We absolutely loved our stay with Chiara and Marcelo. They were both so kind and accommodating, Chiara even made us some lovely food on arrival. This was our last stop on a trip interrailing through Europe and it was the perfect place to finish our travels, it was so relaxing and easy going. The apartment was within walking distance to the beach and the main promenade and also about 15 minute walk from Sagrada Famillia. Very close to the metro and surrounded by lovely parks and restaurants. 

We highly recommend this accommodation and the very friendly hosts :)

Artful! Good location for all quests, whatever you wanna do in Bcn: travel, lying on the beach, walking round the city. Near Parc de la Ciudadela and Estacio de Franca. Close to the market with a large assortment of foods (20 meters).

Chiara was a wonderful host who went above and beyond to make me feel welcome and taken care of. The flat was nice, very well decorated and provided for. I would definitely recommend staying there to anyone. My only complaint is the mattress, which wasn't as nice as I would have preferred, but it's a minor issue with an otherwise excellent host.
Chiara was really friendly and welcoming. I stayed there for 1 week and had a great time. My room was fine and I could make use of the whole house. I would recommend this place to everyone.

We have spend 5 wonderful days in Barcelona while staying at Chiaras place where we were warmly welcomed and which is in the perfect location to visit Barcelona. Chiara is a very nice person, the view from the balcony is great and it's very close to everything that matters. I would recommend to everyone!
The decoration is pretty cool and interesting. Chiara was very nice and friendly host. The location is great, and overall I had a very nice and comfortable stay.

I had a fantastic time in Barcelona staying at Chiara's place. Although she was not there for most of my stay her (Hidden by Airbnb) were very accommodating and friendly. The flat is situated very conveniently located close to the Parc de la Ciutadella and only a short walk to Plaça de Catalunya and the gothic quarter of the city where you can find all sorts of bars and restaurants.  
 
The flat itself is clean, spacious and well furnished, perfect for a short stay or even a longer one. I'd recommend Chiara's place to anyone who wants to Barcelona and the Catalan lifestyle whilst living with some great people. Awesome!

Staying in Chiara and Marcelo's house has been amazing, we immediatly had a warm welcome and it's enjoyable to talk with them. The house is charming, clean and situated in a very nice and calm district.
We highly recommend this accomodation to everyone.

Hola!  Nice and clean  apartment,  good view and fresh air.  
Creative design. 
Marcelo and his friends are helpful and friendly.  We love Marcelo and  Giampaulo. 
Marcelo very nice person  even he speaks English a little.  
Giampaulo  ready to advice smth  or support any conversation.  Bright  and interesting Italian.  Come to this place.  
Location is great: sea,  city Centre, bus station  and metro,  supermarket all in best availability.  
We as family with kid loved this place and this company.  
Cheers guys!

I spent 1 night in Chiara's apartment and received a fantastic welcome from Marcelo and his fellow tenant. The apartment is well-located and Marcelo is a great conversation partner... And hairdresser!

It was a lovely experience. All the residents were so kind. Marcelo was helpful with everything. The location is perfect. Main attractions of the city are easily reacheable on foot and it is also convenient to do the airport trip by Renfe since there is a close station. Thanks for everything. Hope to come again and see you guys:)
Amazing stay with Marcelo, he is always available to help out on anything you need. The flat location is excelent, walking distance from the ramblas, the beach and many other sights.

Marcelo was a very welcoming, accommodating, easy going and discrete host. Even though he spoke little English he still found ways to helpfully communicate things we wanted to find out and as an experienced host anticipated many of our needs, having maps, flyers and tourist information on hand.

Through Marcelo we met many interesting people and this contributed greatly to the enjoyment of our stay. It was so much more than just a tourist destination.

The apartment is just a 10 walk from the old section of Barcelona and even closer to the metro rail network. From the Balcony you can admire the Gaudi Cathedral as it is being built.

We had a great stay, walked everywhere on foot, and would thoroughly recommend this to people who want to be close to the city centre.

Loved staying with Marcelo, who made us coffee every day and chatted to us and gave us great recommendations. Great atmosphere in the flat, which is nicely decorated. Also perfect location near the park and the sea.

We had a nice stay at Marcelo's home; it's nearby the metro station ,easy to find ; Marcelo is such a kind person,although he can speak few English,he help us a lot ,we feel at home stay ; we will be back to the city for sure ; tks a lot !

We stayed with Marcelo in Barcelona for 1 week and had a wonderful time. The room and apartment was always neat and clean and his coffees in the mornings were delicious. 
The location of the apartment is perfect if you want to stay in the city centre, but in a very quiet area. 
Although people have mentioned having difficulty with Marcelo's lack of English, we had no issue communicating with him. His recommendations on what to do and where to eat were always perfect.  
We would definitely stay here again next year!!
Thank you for your hospitality Marcelo!

We had a wonderful time with Marcelo who is exceedingly kind and helpful despite the slight language barriere. Apart from being in walking distance to both the Gothic Quarter and the beach, the apartment also has a lovely balcony where you can sip your morning espresso (courtesy of Marcelo) and enjoy the view of the city and even catch a glimpse of Sagrada Familia in the distance.

U Marcela spędziliśmy 4 noce. Marcelo jest bardzo przyjaznym człowiekiem. Chętnie udzielał pomocy i przydatnych porad. Łatwo nawiązuje kontakty. Pobyt w jego mieszkaniu był niekrępujący. Mieszkanie jest skromnie wyposażone, ale w zupełności wystarczająco. Usytuowane jest na 5 piętrze. Jest winda. Na balkonie można wypić kawę patrząc na Sagrada Familia i wzgórze Tibidabo. Lokalizacja jest świetna. Bardzo blisko jest na stare miasto i do metra. Na plażę można dojść w 15 minut.

We stayed at Marcellos place for 2 nights and everything worked out really well.The booking and communication with Marcello via airbnb was very easy and quick, he gave us an exact description of how to get there from the airport. His flat is clean and just around the corner of Arc de Triomfe which means you can easily explore everything by foot. Also it is just a 10min walk to the beach.
Marcello was such a nice host, he welcomed us when we arrived, spoiled us with very good coffee and even had some Barcelona guides that we could borrow. Our room was simple but charming and neat and we really appreciated the good wifi.
All in all it was a nice trip and we would definitely recommend this place and stay there if we came to Barcelona again.

Marcelo was a great host! Kind and very laid back and friendly. The listing was extremely convenient as it truly was quite central to everything, and I had a blast in Barcelona. It had everything you needed and Marcelo was very accommodating. I highly recommend the place if you're looking for a laidback, sensible way to spend your time in Barcelona.

Our time in Barcelona was amazing!! Marcelo is a very lovely man who happily welcomes you. He is always glad to help and has advices, maps and beers prepared for you ;)
Although he always tells you his english is so bad he knows enough english to show you arround. 
The rooms were tidy and clean. As was the bathroom. 
His appartment isn't located directly in the center but its still only a nice walking distance of 10 minutes to get to the main Plazas. not to forget the view out of the balcony from where you can see the Sagrada Familia.
All in all we loved our stay
Thank you Marcelo :)

Marcelo is a great host, kind and helpful, and his place is super clean and comfortable.    I arrived there with a cold and I was tired after two nights of poor sleeping in the Ramblas (which is noisy), and Marcelo offered me tea with lemon.  His place is quiet but central, an easy walk to the beach, the picasso museum, and to the ramblas.  He's  close to the Arc de Triomfo metro station.

Marcelo is an extremely friendly and cheerful guy, with excellent Spanish and Italian, nice rooms and a good coffee maker. He goes out of his way to be nice, the apartment is clean and pleasant, and the location is perfect for going into the centre of town or up to the Sagrada Familia.

Marcelo is an excellent host! The apartment also has a nice terrace to have a cafe outside. Highly recommended! ^_^

I would definitely return. 

Thanks Marcelo!  ^_^

Very sunny and clean appartment. Well located near to the gothic and the born areas. The Host is very nice and helpful with everything you need. I recommend it.
Good Value for money.

Macelo is one of the varmest persons we have met! His english is not the best, but it is charming and not a big problem. His flat is very sentral. It takes a little walking to go to the beach, but we did not mind it. Hans and Anita, Tromso, Norway.

E' stato veramente un piacere condividere l'appartamento insieme a Marcelo. Siamo stati molto bene e la sua ospitalità è stata eccellente.
Qualche volta ci ha fatto assaggiare anche i suoi piatti! =D A tutte le domande e problemi che gli abbiamo posto è stato sempre gentile e puntuale nelle sue risposte. La casa ha una vista fantastica e quando c'è un po di vento si sta benissimo! Sicuramente ritorneremo Marcelo! Fue un placer compartir tu piso y nuestras charlas! =D..Nos Ablamos! Se siete a Barcellona e volete condividere e vedere come vive la gente del posto sicuramente andate da Marcelo! Fabio

Marcelo is a great host. Every time I go to Barcelona I go there as the place is really convenient being close to Arc de Triump, the sea, the characteristic Born area and there are lots of facilities (supermarket, metro, etc.) really close by. As for the flat, there is an excellent wifi connection and being in the fifth floor the view of Barcelona from the balcony is astonishing!
The room was very nice, the flat is amazing. There where a few miscommunications at the beginning but the host was very responsive in sorting those out.

Marcelo is a great host with a great location. Very affordable considering the central location. Two blocks from the Arc de Triumf subway and a 15 min walk from the sea. Would highly recommend Marcelo's apt!

Marcelo is an excellent host! He allows you to drop off your things in the apartment even before check in time- to take a shower, eat.. untill your room gets ready. 
He is really easy going, truly no muss, no fuss kinda guy! 
He was gone most of our stay in Barca so we basicaly had apartment to ourselves, but while he was in, he was helpful giving us directons to cool beaches and things we could/should see. He was also available whilest he was gone for any kind of questions.
Apartmant location is great, you can easily access the beach as well as the city  centre by foot. If you like, there is metro station 5min wlaking distance from the apartment.
Marcelo's english is not best, but it charming. (Hidden by Airbnb) translate, a bit of spanish, a bit of english and voila :)
I would definitely come back at Marcelo's place when in Barca and I recommend it to everyone!
Marcelo is a chill and welcoming guy and his place feels authentically Spanish. The room adjacent to ours was also an AirBnB so this is a cool way to meet other travelers. Would recommend.

Marcelo is a great host!  We rent a room in Marcelo's flat for 7 nights, and he was always helpful, friendly, funny and talkative with us, when we met. He gave an umbrella, when we went to the beach, and last evening he made some special tapas for us.
The apartment isn't an five star hotel, but we have everything, what we need. I have to mention that the bathroom was clean every day. 
The location is so good, the beach and gothic quarter is also 10-15 minutes walk. On the balcony we can see Tibidabo and Sagrada Familia. In this area has many supermarkets, little shops, greengocer's, and coffee shops. 
The long and short of it, I recomend warm-heartedly Marcelo's flat. :)

Had a great stay, i was only there for one night and the host made sure I was settled and happy. The apartment was clean and tidy, perfect location as its close to the metro so can get into the heart of the city very easily. I will stay there again another time for sure.
Marcelo feels like family - friendly, communicative and personable.  Location is great and i’m coming back again for sure.

This flat has the most wonderful location, it has the sea, many sights and parks nearby. The room is bright, colorful. It is not far from the center of Barcelona, a lot of cafes, restaurants and shops. We had funny neighbors in the flat. The host was very nice and took care about our arriving. I advise to take it!

name: Lindo Loft praia Copacabana/ Leme!
summary: Quer se sentir dormindo nas nuvens? Teto espelhado?  Se você tem senso de aventura, gosta de ambiente aconchegante, romântico, luminoso, de praia, Wi-Fi, banda larga, esse é o imóvel perfeito para você! Venha conhecer você vai se apaixonar!
space: Um loft delicioso, charmosamente integrado , localizado no Leme, na tranquila e segura Gustavo Sampaio 630, a menos de 50 metros da praia.  Claro, arejado, pertinho de shopping, restaurantes, teatros, casas noturnas e do antigo Hotel Meridien, que tornou-se famoso pela cascata de fogos no Ano Novo. Em  frente ao Super mercado Zona Sul da Avenida Atlântica e próximo a famosa avenida larga e arborizada de Copacabana, a Princesa Isabel! Ideal para dois hóspedes, podendo acomodar até quatro pessoas. Sendo que terceiro e quarto hóspedes serão acomodados em sofá  no primeiro piso.  Convém atentar que é um loft, os ambientes são integrados, o que não propicia privacidade individual aos hóspedes. Descrição do Loft: Quarto com cama King size em mezanino com teto espelhado, armário embutido em pátina branca e ar condicionado. Primeiro piso , composto por hall com estante e sapateira, close com portas espelhadas, sala com sofá de oito lugares, Tv Lcd, bar com cadeiras altas, banheiro e cozinha. B
