neighborhood_overview: O Bairro     Leme é o nome dado à parte da Praia de Copacabana e também do bairro, que se localiza na parte leste da praia, ou seja em uma de suas extremidades. Se você olhar para o mar, o Leme estará à sua esquerda, no final da praia, depois da Av. Princesa Isabel. O Leme é o início da praia de Copacabana, e o bairro de Copa  é sem dúvida o bairro mais carioca do Rio de janeiro! Eu costumo dizer que moro onde a maioria das pessoas gostariam de passar férias! Copacabana, carinhosamente chamado de Copa pelos cariocas, é um bairro nobre situado na Zona Sul da cidade do Rio de Janeiro, no Brasil. É considerado por muitos um dos bairros mais famosos e prestigiados do Brasil e um dos mais conhecidos do mundo. Tem o apelido de Princesinha do Mar e Coração da Zona Sul. Faz divisa com os também bairros nobres da Lagoa, Ipanema, Botafogo e é contínuo ao Leme. Em termos populacionais, é o bairro mais populoso da Zona Sul da capital carioca, com mais de (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) habitantes
notes: Por favor, solicitar orçamento para o Carnaval, Semana Santa, feriados, datas festivas assim como natal e ano novo, bem como grandes eventos (tipo Copa do mundo, Olimpíadas, Rock In rio) .  Podem existir valores diferenciados em períodos de férias e em reservas com antecedência maior que 6 meses. Os valores publicados podem não ser aplicados a esses períodos. Em virtude dos problemas de fornecimento de energia que estamos enfrentando no Rio de janeiro, o governo está solicitando que o consumo de energia seja controlado, pede a colaboração de todos no sentido de evitar desperdício e estipula uma taxa adicional sobre os KWh excedentes  visando evitar apagões.   Assim sendo, colaborando com o governo e com toda a população de residentes do Rio de Janeiro, agradecemos a compreensão, a colaboração e solicitamos aos nossos hóspedes evitar o desperdício.
transit: Indo e vindo O bairro do Leme é uma extensão de Copacabana sendo a Avenida Princesa Isabel a linha que os delimita. Pode-se dizer que o Leme é o cantinho da praia de Copacabana mais residencial e tranquilo.  A Avenida Atlântica, orla da praia, tem início no Leme e termina no posto seis de Copacabana. Assim  o Leme e Copacabana são como irmãos siameses, e falar de um é o mesmo que falar do outro. Copacabana oferece três estações de metrô Cardeal Arcoverde, Siqueira Campos e Cantagalo, e mais de oitenta linhas de ônibus municipais e intermunicipais. Há uma linha de integração do Leme para a estação do metrô Cardeal Arcoverde. As principais vias do bairro são as a Avenida Atlântica, a avenida que margeia a Praia do Leme e de Copacabana e as avenidas Nossa Senhora de Copacabana , principal avenida, cruzando o bairro, sendo uma das mais movimentadas de toda a zona sul do Rio de Janeiro; A Avenida Princesa Isabel Que interliga os bairros de Copacabana, Leme e Botafogo; A Rua Rainha Elizabeth
access: O espaço é todo seu! Sinta-se em casa!
interaction: Adoro receber meus hóspedes e ajudá-los a desfrutar o máximo possível de sua estadia na cidade maravilhosa! Sou flexível, compreensiva e estou sempre disposta a buscar uma solução que atenda os meus hóspedes.   Se há alguma necessidade sua que não esteja contemplada nesse anúncio, por favor, entre em contato comigo antes de efetuar a reserva, que tentarei com empenho, dentro do possível e dependendo da natureza da solicitação, viabilizar. Estou sempre disponível seja por telefone, e-mail, torpedo para esclarecer dúvidas, auxiliar e atender as necessidades dos meus hóspedes,  para tornar a estadia o mais agradável possível. Em caso de emergência durante a estadia estarei acessível por telefone e quando necessário presente, pronta para prestar auxilio na busca de sanar e resolver problemas relativos ao imóvel, a locação, ou ajudá-los no que for preciso. O meu intuito é receber meus hóspedes com muito carinho, oferecendo um serviço de hospedagem diferenciado e especial, em conformidade co
house_rules: IMPORTANTE:  O número de hóspedes não deverá ultrapassar o que foi determinado no anúncio e na reserva do site AIRBNB. Hospedes extras NÃO serão aceitos porque o apartamento é preparado e equipado para o número de pessoas que constam na confirmação de reserva. Caso aconteça este tipo de problema a reserva poderá ser cancelada! Há valores de diária diferenciados para os períodos de férias escolares, eventos, festas de final de ano, nessas épocas recomendo que consulte antes de efetivar a reserva para evitar cancelamento. É expressamente proibido pelo condomínio, em qualquer hipótese, deixar chaves do apartamento na portaria do prédio, e também é vedado pelo anfitrião a entrega das chaves a terceiros que não constem do documento da reserva. Em qualquer das hipóteses, caso isso ocorra, será providenciado pelo anfitrião a troca do segredo da fechadura e a confecção de um par de chaves à expensa do hóspede, sob pena de multa e/ou encerramento da estada. Deve ser dispensado especial cuidado

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Otimista nata! Comunicativa, extrovertida, dinâmica! Objetiva e compreensiva. 

Adoro ler, descobrir novidades, estar em contato com pessoas e com a natureza. 

Gosto de receber e reunir pessoas. Amo viajar!!! 

Acho que é por isso que tenho tanto prazer hospedando, pois descobri há um tempo, que de uma certa forma, tão bom quanto viajar é ajudar alguém a planejar e a realizar seus sonhos de viagem!
Além do que, curto compartilhar descobertas! 

Como hóspede sou cuidadosa, organizada e procuro seguir as regras e horários dos anfitriões. 

Quando anfitriã.... ah ....quero que meus hóspedes sintam-se em casa,  confortáveis e seguros sabendo  que há alguém  zelando por eles.

Se por um lado primo por estar em conformidade com o contratado, por outro, atender e superar expectativas é meu foco!

Para mim tudo é uma questão de dedicação, perseverança e uma grande dose de boa vontade!

Meu lema: Impossível? Impossível e nem tentar!

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
Meu sobrinho, para quem reservei o imóvel, ficou encantado com o Loft e eufórico por dormir em um mezanino de teto espelhado. Achou D+, diferente, irado!  Não queria ir embora! Disse que é lá que quer morar!
A Mary é  super atenciosa, prestativa, muito querida, nos atendeu e superou nossas expectativas em todos os sentido.  Sobre o espaço, concordo com meu sobrinho, é incrível! Só tinha visto antes esse tipo de imóvel em capa de revista de decoração. Aliás fiquei sabendo que o imóvel foi destacado pelo excelente e diferenciado aproveitamento de espaço. No prédio é considerado o apartamento mais bonito.
Quanto a organização, limpeza e todo o resto, é  impecável!  A localização excelente! Local seguro, porteiros prestativos, um recanto silencioso, claro, bem servido de comércio, meios de transporte e muito, muito mesmo pertinho da praia. Há internet de alta velocidade (isso era prioridade para o meu sobrinho), TV a cabo e o apartamento super bem equipado, tudo novinho! Se estiver em dúvida, não pense duas vezes, esse é o local, perfeito, super-recomendo!
Muito obrigada por tudo.
Bjs, Vera

Fiquei no loft da Marilene com meu namorado durante uma semana e nossa estadia foi perfeita! A localização é ótima: rua super segura, uma quadra da praia (se atravessar pelo mercado Zona Sul, que é bem em frente, é como se fosse na mesma quadra), comércio de todo tipo em volta... O condomínio tem portaria 24h, elevador, a vizinhança é super simpática. O apartamento é um sonho! Quando chegamos estava tudo incrivelmente limpo, cheiroso e organizado. A iluminação é linda e aconchegante, o sofá é grande e super confortável, o chuveiro é a gás, uma delícia! A cozinha é toda equipada com tudo bem novinho (fogão, microondas e louças foram inaugurados por nós!). Tem até máquina de lavar. Na sala tem um closet que dá pra colocar todas as roupas organizadas, espelho gigante, muitos cabides... E a melhor parte: a cama fica num mezanino com espelho no teto! Incrível! Além de uma ótima decoradora de ambientes a Marilene é um amor de pessoa, simpática e prestativa demais, nos deu dicas valiosas de onde ir, onde comer, o que fazer... Fomos recebidos bem demais, nossa estadia no loft foi perfeita e somos muito gratos à Marilene!

A Marilene foi super atenciosa. 
O apartamento é confortavel, bem equipado e bem localizado, em um bairro tranquilo, bonito e muito próximo a praia. Toda a experiencia foi muito positiva.

Marilene foi muita simpática, atenciosa e preocupada com a minha estadia. Sempre estava pronta para ajudar. O apartamento é super bem localizado, bem arejado, claro, limpo, e está próximo a tudo (padarias, supermercados, restaurantes, farmácias) e sem falar que está a poucos metros da praia. Adorei o loft e com certeza recomendo.

Eu me chamo Vívian e por ser carioca, já conhecia o bairro e já havia me decepcionado com falsas promessas de outros anfitriões aqui mesmo no Airbnb.
Marilene é impecável e leal no que se propõe, e creio assim seja em todas as áreas e escolhas que fez e faz, em sua vida.
O apartamento é inenarravelmente amplo, embora pequenino em metros quadrados. O espaço é maravilhosamente aproveitado e tudo é limpo e funcional, e agradável como deveria ser um lar.
Ela se dispõe a ajudar ao recomendar  e sanar dúvidas, desde a restaurantes do mais alto gabarito, até um simples local pra tomar um café rápido, saboroso e barato.
Além de ficar radiante em poder executar o desejo de habitar por alguns dias este loft delicioso, e de conseguir surpreender meu marido, Xavier, que é um pouco avesso a espaços pequenos; fiquei ainda mais alegre em conhecer Marilene que se mostrou um ser de alma reluzente, dona de um papo envolvente e de uma energia leve e boa.
Agradeço mais uma vez o tratamento recebido por mim e meu marido.
Recomendamos o loft a qualquer um que queira contratar exatamente o que é mostrado em fotos e descrições.
E, claro, já planejamos nosso retorno!

Eu aproveitei meu tempo no loft da Marilene! Ela  me ajudou para localizar na cidade e qualquer outra coisa que eu precisei. A locação é ótimo: uma quadra da praia e a lado dum mercado na Copacabana.  A estrada foi muito tranquilo e seguro. Recomendo para duas pessoas ou menos.

I enjoyed my stay in Marilene's loft! She helped me find my way in the city and any other thing I needed. The location is great: a block from the beach and next to a grocery store. The neighborhood was very safe. I recommend the loft for two people or less.

Tudo perfeito desde nossa chegada com uma recepção muito agradável que fez nos sentirmos em casa. A anfitriã é simpática, prestativa e muito gentil. O loft excelente, ótima localização, perto de tudo inclusive da praia. Tudo de que precisamos tínhamos disponível no apartamento. Recomendo e voltaremos no próximo mês.
Everything fantastic- Marilene was great, nice value, awesome location.
O loft e uma graça! Pequeno, mas aconchegante e super bem equipado. A localização é muito boa, uma rua tranquila com tudo por perto

Apartment was cosy and well equipped and at good location. Market, pharmacy and other stores next to not to mention the beach where you could get so handy and quickly. Host Marilene was so nice and makes you feel almost like coming home and helps if needed. I enjoyed really staying there my two weeks vacation.

Muitos bj!
-Mika

Tudo foi 100%, o loft é bem equipado  conta com tudo para uma ótima estadia e a Marilene é uma ótima anfitriã, fazendo de tudo para tornar a sua viagem ainda melhor.
Pode confiar que estará, certamente, fazendo um bom negócio.

Foram dias maravilhosos que passamos, só temos a agradecer pela hospitalidade e gentilezas da anfitriã. O loft  tem uma excelente localização, é calmo, bem organizado, com todos acessórios que precisamos e além de tudo, muito limpo.  Recebemos dicas importantes para compras no  supermercado, o que nos ajudou muito!Dá vontade de voltar de novo, sempre! Foi simplesmente perfeito! Muito obrigada.

Minha estadia no loft da Mari foi perfeita! A localização é ótima, com tudo muito perto: mercado, padaria, restaurantes e o principal: Praia!!!

Logo que chegamos fomos muito bem recebidas. Mari já havia deixado tudo muito organizado e com um roteiro de tudo que há pela região e com dicas ótimas para os dias que iríamos passar lá.

O loft é exatamente como mostram as fotos e a localização é muito tranquila! Fomos de carro e deixamos o carro na rua mesmo, já que o prédio não possui garagem, um dos meninos que ficam cuidando dos carros na rua (Vítor) cuidou os 5 dias do carro e sempre que saíamos com o carro, ele já deixava uma vaga reservada próximo ao prédio. Gostei muito!!! 
Com certeza voltarei!!
Obrigada por tudo Mari!!!
Minha estadia foi ótima, tudo perfeito, supermercado, restaurantes e lojas por perto, praia linda e limpa, voltarei em breve.

Apartamento espetacular!
Já havia me hospedado nele e repeti a experiência. Que grande acerto foi esta escolha de, uma vez mais, passar meus dias neste "lar".
Aconchegante, limpo, e funcional. Aproveitamento excepcional do espaço e a sensação de que nada me faltava.
Agradeço e parabenizo à Marilene, que foi, como sempre, cuidadosa, prestimosa e gentil pra toda e qualquer ajuda ou informação.
Super ultra mega recomendo!
apartamento pequeño pero con exelente ubicacion y muy comodo. cerca de la playa y con accesibilidad a muchas cosas. pasamos muy bien nuestra estadia ahi

Primeira vez usando o Airbnb e posso dizer que comecei com chave de ouro.
Loft super confortavel e muito perto da praia.
Marilene foi muito atenciosa e muito (Website hidden by Airbnb) tenho que agradecer.
Muito obrigado.

Highly recommended !!
Hope to see you soon again Marilene.
Thanks a lot.

Fabricio.

Realicé una  una estadia en Rio por tres semanas  por motivos de trabajo. El departamento de Marilene se encuentra muy bien ubicado, en un sector tranquilo de Leme, con movilización directa para practicamente toda la ciudad. En el barrio se encuentran servicios básicos (supermercados, farmacias, cafe, restoranes, gimnasio, etc), asi como  la playa de Leme. Es notable el aprovechamiento del espacio interior del apartamento, ofreciendo un lugar confortable para una y máximo 2 personas. El apartamento cuenta con internet y elementos básicos para cocinar. También cuenta con lavadora y aire acondicionado.

Si bien el departamento es pequeño, el espacio esta increiblemente bien aprovechado. Completo con todo lo que se necesita y como se muestra en las fotos. Aire acondicionado y wifi.

Marilene fue una gran anfitriona y nos ayudo en todo lo que necesitamos. Disponible para cualquier pregunta a cualquier hora.

El departamento queda a dos cuadras de la playa, tiene un supermercado enfrente y está a otras dos cuadras de una avenida principal: super conveniente!

Lovely little quiet apartment in great location 5 minutes from the beach and 15 minutes from nearest metro station. The place is fully equipped with everything you need, including cable TV and fast wifi. Only things to mention are that it is definitely suitable for 2 people and not 4 due to the size, and take care of you are a bit less physically able as climbing the ladder to get to the bed may be challenging. But we had a lovely stay!
Excelente apto, anfitriã incrível, ótima localização, recomendamos!
Everything like describen.

Eu apenas aluguei o imóvel que seria utilizado por amigos, com a concordância da locadora. Desta forma, acabei não conhecendo pessoalmente nem o imóvel nem a locadora. Só posso avaliar a negociação antes das reserva,c que foi excelente.
À situação geográfica e perfeita. A comunicação com a Marilene muito fácil e o lugar pequeno mas bem confortável. Adoramos!

A nossa estádia no apartamento da Marilene foi excelente! Nós fomos muito bem recebidos pela, ela foi bem atenciosa e receptiva, nos dando dicas de lugares e restaurantes para ir na vizinhança, (o que particulamente fez a diferença). Muito obrigado por tudo! Eu definitivamente recomendo!

Minha estadia foi perfeita. A Marilene foi incrível, simpática, agradável e nos deixou super tranquilos. O local é muito bem servido de tudo: comércio, praia, transporte, etc. Os porteiros do prédio simpáticos e prestativos. Enfim, foi tudo perfeito! Adoramos.
Boa hospedagem, anfitriã muito gentil, ideal para jovens.
Excelente localização. Limpo. Marilene é muito atenciosa.

Nos alojamos en el departamento por cuatro días y nuestra estadía no pudo ser mejor. 
El apartamento es ideal para pasar unos días en pareja en Rio. Cerca de la playa, con buen acceso y seguridad. Además de contar con excelente supermercado enfrente al apartamento. 
Todo se encuentra en perfecto estado en el loft y condice con lo indicado en el anuncio. 
Sumado a esto la hospitalidad de Marilene supera las expectativas. Ella no de recibió de excelente manera a la hora  indicada y fue excelente dándonos recomendaciones de Leme y el resto de río. 
No queda más que agracerle su atención y esperar una próxima visita a Rio. Seguro repetiremos la experiencia
Very nice comfortable space in an amazing location, small but everything works great.
organizado e bem aproveitado

O loft é muito bem localizado, contando com farmácias, mercados e ótimos restaurantes a distâncias mínimas.
O tamanho é ideal para duas pessoas, super aconchegante e a cama no mezanino é um charme à parte!
Como se não bastasse tudo isso, a host Marilene é uma querida, deixando ótimas dicas de programas e se colocando a total disposição para qualquer necessidade.
Altamente recomendado para curtir o Rio de Janeiro nesse cantinho maravilhoso que é o Leme!

O loft é muito aconchegante e bem localizado!Fica perto de supermercado,farmácias, restaurantes e super perto da praia!A anfitrião Marilene foi muito atenciosa dando varias dicas bacanas e muito solicita!!Certamente voltaremos!

Es importante destacar del departamento lo cercano a la playa, hablamos de una cuadra y llegas a la avenida Atlántica. También la facilidad para tomar locomoción, ya sea taxi, ómnibus y metro que es bastante útil.
El departamento tiene lo esencial y cumple bastante bien con las necesidades, utilizamos lavadora, licuadora, horno y la verdad te sientes como en casa.
Lo recomiendo totalmente excepto para niños pequeños.

Marilene is very friendly and the communication was perfect. She took good care that I feel comfortable in her place. The place is located in a great area and everything is as described. Would love to stay there again :)

Passei 5 dias com meu filho e foi tudo muito bom. O loft é pequeno mas muito aconchegante. Ideal pra descansar depois de passar o dia curtindo a praia ou as maravilhas que o Rio oferece. Nos sentimos em casa. Só tenho a agradecer a Marilene pelas dicas que foram muito úteis e pela hospedagem estamos muito contentes. A localização é ótima!

Great location! just 3 min walk to copacabana beach. Very clean apartment and super-fast wi-fi. Close to supermarket and public transportaion as well. The host is extremely nice and giving good tips to travel in Rio. Very recommended place! Perfect for couples!

En verdad nuestra estadía no pudo haber sido mejor. Pasamos unos días maravillosos y la comodidad del departamento lo hizo aun mejor.Muy bien equipado y una ubicación inmejorable, a una cuadra de la playa y enfrente de un supermercado muy bien abastecido. La seguridad del edificio es de 24hs. Muy buena anfitriona, nos ha facilitado todo con el horario de llegada y con el check out. Super recomendable.

Marilene is an awsome host which you will find out simply by entering her beautiful flat. She has a very good taste, her flat is clean and everything from check in to check out went perfectly fine. Her english is very good and if you need anything she is always there to help you. The wifi is fast, the people at the reception friendly and the neighbors good people. The area is calm , beautiful and still very close to the beach. Anything you need is near by and anything you need to make your stay as comfortable as possible is in the flat. I loved my stay there and Marilene and her flat made it a very special experience for me. If you want to experience all of Brazils warm hospitality, this lady and her flat have it for sure !

O Loft é ótimo, muito bem decorado, clean, limpíssimo e bem equipado. 
A localização excelente, próximo à praia e supermercado.
Só tenho  a agradecer pela hospitalidade e gentilezas da anfitriã.

Amamos a estadia, apartamento muito bem localizado, confortável próximo à praia, comércio, restaurantes. 
Agradecemos à Marilene e Ana pela simpatia e cuidado que tiveram conosco.
Super indicamos e com certeza voltaremos.
Beijos
great location , near the beach
Excelente anfitriona...

name: Vibrant Sydney at your fingertips
summary: Large home with that includes a bedroom with TV , hanging and shelf space for clothing, comfortable double bed and air conditioning. Additional private sitting room includes sofa, kettle, bar fridge and toaster. Exclusive use of large bathroom with shower, bath, double sinks and toilet. LGBTQI friendly
space: Two large rooms. One serving as a bedroom and one serving as a lounge room. Exclusive use of large, modern bathroom. All linen provided.
description: Large home with that includes a bedroom with TV , hanging and shelf space for clothing, comfortable double bed and air conditioning. Additional private sitting room includes sofa, kettle, bar fridge and toaster. Exclusive use of large bathroom with shower, bath, double sinks and toilet. LGBTQI friendly Two large rooms. One serving as a bedroom and one serving as a lounge room. Exclusive use of large, modern bathroom. All linen provided. Large modern bathroom with bath and separate shower. Separate lounge area with bar fridge, toaster, kettle. No kitchen access. Basic crockery and cutlery supplied. We are happy to chat with our guests and answer any questions about the local area etc that they may have. Your space is quite separate from ours so you also have your privacy and personal space. Quiet and safe neighbourhood. 10 minute walk to Stanmore train station for a 10- 15 minute journey into the city (depending on where exactly in the city you want to go) and a 2 minute walk to bus sto
neighborhood_overview: Quiet and safe neighbourhood. 10 minute walk to Stanmore train station for a 10- 15 minute journey into the city (depending on where exactly in the city you want to go) and a 2 minute walk to bus stop on Parramatta Road which has very regular bus services to the city (15-20 minutes journey). Walking distance to Newtown and Enmore (20 minutes). Glebe( 30 minutes). Close to great bar and restaurant options. Very handy to cafes, pubs, fast food options( 2- 10 minutes walk).
notes: We have an energetic 16 month old and very friendly Jack Russell Terrier "Buddy" who can interact with you or not depending on your preference.
transit: Taxi is $30-$35 from airport to listing (Uber much less),  buses and trains to city within a 10 minute walk, free on street parking.
access: Large modern bathroom with bath and separate shower. Separate lounge area with bar fridge, toaster, kettle. No kitchen access. Basic crockery and cutlery supplied.
interaction: We are happy to chat with our guests and answer any questions about the local area etc that they may have. Your space is quite separate from ours so you also have your privacy and personal space.
house_rules: No smoking. No access to kitchen.

host.host_about: I live with my husband Steve and our Jack Russell Terrier Buddy who is 1year old. We have both traveled extensively and do a few o/s trips each year. Therefore we know that travelers have different needs , some want to be left to themselves others like a bit of guidance.  We love meeting people and love Sydney and sharing its pleasures.

reviews.comments: I can highly recommend Carole and Steve’s place  - what a lovely, light, spacious and spotlessly clean home! If you get a chance to rent the entire house, go for it. We stayed in the front two rooms of the house, in our own fairly separate area, and had sole use of a beautiful, spacious bathroom.  There are no kitchen facilities in this part of the house (as made clear in the ad) but there is a small fridge, kettle and toaster, as well as cutlery and crockery for guests to use. Meals are easy to find in any case as the house is close to some fantastic cafes, bars, pubs and restaurants – a real taste of Sydney’s cosmopolitan inner west. The house is in a peaceful, quiet, tree-lined street. Parking, if you need it, is easy to find nearby, or even out the front if you're lucky (check the parking signs to be sure though). Public transport – buses, trains –  in easy walking distance. Carole and Steve and Snoop dog were perfect AirBnB hosts, very friendly and considerate, without being intrusive. We were lucky to have found them! Absolutely recommended.

I had the privilege to stay at Carole and Steeve's house for a night. I was also disappointed cause I had to leave Sydney earlier than I expected.
this couple made me feel really confortable. I really enjoyed my stay in their house. And I've been touched by the fact they proposed me to  eat together, the first evening. They are really open minded and kind persons. The bed was confortable. The bathroom is really big. Even if they start on airbnb, they behave like they're on many years ago, because they are travelers. So they're curious and they know what you need. 
You'll feel at home. Rent it; that's an order :) (french joke)

Very clean. Great location . House and room looks even better than the photos. Spacious your own bathroom and your own private lounge. Definitely come back here again. Btw, the cafe nearby is superb! You have to try :)

Wir haben uns sehr wohl und willkommen gefühlt! Die Beschreibungen von der Unterkunft und dem Umfeld haben definitiv nicht zu viel versprochen. In 20 min. ist man bequem in der Innenstadt mit dem öffentlichen Nahverkehr, fußläufig gibt es mehrere Cafes und die Gastgeber sind sehr freundlich, aufgeschlossen und stets mit einem guten Tipp zur Stelle. Wir würden definitiv gerne wieder kommen, sollte es uns erneut nach Sydney verschlagen. Absolut empfehlenswert!

Carole's house is very clean and comfortable.
Better than the photo.
There are very conveniently located near the bus with the train.
Carole and Steve are very friendly.
Have the opportunity to Sydney,we will choose to live here.

Carole, Steve and Snoop Dog are a lovely and happy family ! 
There house is beautiful and so clean with a big new, modern bathroom all to ourself ! 
Perfect location right next to bus stops and funky cafe strips !
Defiantly worth the stay !
Thanks so much for having us !
xxx

Carole and her husband are welcoming and have a plethora of knowledge about Sydney that they are eager to share with their guests! The bedroom is comfy and that bathroom is luxurious. Highly recommended.

Carole and Steve were extremely welcoming and helpful.  We had a lovely stay and I would highly recommend this listing!
Everything you need in a convenient area.
A Great stay, very welcoming, super clean and comfy, easy access - a home away from home. We'll be back!

From the moment that I booked with Carole and Steve I was made to feel welcome.  They are a friendly and helpful couple that went out of their way to ensure that I felt comfortable in their home.  Nothing was too much trouble and the accommodation was excellent.  I was more than happy with the lovely bedroom, the well set up sitting room and the light and airy private bathroom.  I would not hesitate to recommend their establishment for a place to stay in Sydney.  Their house is well situated to bus and train transport and there is local shopping available just down the street.

Well designed house with two seperate rooms(one bed room and one living room) that you can stay in. Everything is clean and make you feel at home. Reasonable price and absolutely better than my imagination.   I highly recommend here as a place for short stay! Thank you Carole and Steve

I was delighted with my stay. Carol and Steve are kind and thoughtful hosts. Beautiful rooms and bathroom, very clean. Having the lounge area was great for those rest times and having somewhere to chill out. It was the perfect accomodation for my weekend. Well done Carol and Steve, you guys were fab.
Carole and Steve were very friendly and cooperative. The place is well maintained and centrally located. We had a splendid time!
Amazing place! Clean, spacious, all the necessary facilities are available, great hosts and very easy to get into the CBD quickly! Very much recommended

Carole and Steve are really nice and often offer suggestions on our plan or when we have some questions. Their house is clean enough and we got surprised when we arrived that it is much better than the photos and is located in a quite convenient place. It took only half an hour to get to the city by train or bus, and so does the airport.  They provide us a living room, a bedroom and also a private bathroom, which made us feel like a home. By the way, their little Buddy is also very cute and always showed friendly to us.
Great location. Great price. Great house. Great hosts. Definitely recommend & would definitely go back. Thanks Steve & Carole

Lovely and very well-kept home. Superb comfort and privacy. Good value and great access via local public transport. Would definitely recommend this place for anyone staying a few days in Sydney, who isn't focused on beaches. Easy 20 mins walk to Newtown and wide selection of eateries, bars and shopping. Can get a bus or train to Sydney centre, beaches or airport with ease. 
Buddy is irresistibly cute and very friendly.
Steve and Carole were very good hosts and very flexible for our needs. 
Highly rated and possibly the best Airbnb experience we had so far in Australia.

A very pleasant space that enabled me to come and go as i needed. It works well having the bedroom, private lounge and private bathroom in a row along the passage at the front of the house. Characterful and close to everything with friendly and helpful hosts.
我们在Carole的房子里住了十来天,房子很满意,交通方便,房间整齐,卫生间干净整齐,是一个安静的住宿区,房东夫妇待人热情,在悉尼停留的这段时间,为我们提供了很多帮助,帮我们叫出租车,解决上机换卡问题,等等｡因我们自身的原因最后一天退房时未能提前给Steven打招呼,而给他的生活造成了一些不便,感到抱歉｡总之,这是一个值得推荐的地方

We stayed at this wonderful home for 6 nights. We truly enjoyed staying at this quiet and lovely home of Carole and Steve. They are so helpful and caring. Indeed, the energetic 16 month old and very friendly Jack Russell Terrier "Buddy" who is very smart. Thank you so much, Carole and Steve. Surely we will come back to stay with you again.

This was a great airbnb: a homely, tidy and spacious multi-room space at the front of Carole's place. The bed was super comfortable and the bath in the private ensuite is divine! The location is very good, close to bus and train lines in to the city. Great hosts, prompt and easy to communicate with before and throughout the stay. I would happily stay here again.
The place was very beautiful, stylish, clean and very comfortable. Carole and her husband were very welcoming and hospitable people. We loved staying at their house.

I booked the place for my parents and they loved it. 
the hosts helped them alot and the place was clean amd comfy. 
a great place for refreshing for tourists who have walked all day.

Absolutely top-notch place to stay. Carole & her partner are unobtrusive, yet very friendly & warm, hosts. Their beautifully appointed, centrally located home is a sight for sore eyes after a long day/night out exploring. Their gorgeous place is a stone’s throw from amazing coffee shops, restaurants, watering holes, & public transport. I will definitely stay here again & highly recommend this to everyone.

This was our ideal accommodation; very comfy bed, wonderful bathroom with bath an shower and separate sitting room. Easy, ground floor private access. Best of all, Carol and Steve are the ideal hosts and made us feel very welcome. This was our perfect stay in an excellent location.
Great place to stay, nice quiet house close to everything. Nice, friendly, welcoming hosts.

The place was really well maintained. All necessary amenities were provided by Carole and Steve. The room and extra lounge was really helpful. The place that you have for yourself is private and you have plenty of space for yourself with the lounge room. Carole and Steve were always around for any requirement we had. Sweet place :)

Additionally note, The cute doggo 'buddy' was is super friendly and had his own boundary but was always happy to play with you :)

Definitely pick this place if an opportunity presented itself.
It's a great pleasure to return to friendly hosts Carole and Steve's well appointed home, offering their guests plenty of private space, and  walking distance to everywhere.
Very friendly hosts and plenty of space to ourselves. Walking distance to trains with easy access to the Waterfront and City.

I was meeting friends in Newtown so location for me was great. It's also only a short walk to the station from where you can go straight to circular quay. Bed was really comfortable and everywhere was very clean. 
Would stay again and definitely recommend.

Loved my stay. Lovely people, comfortable bed and separate living room with lovely outlook to street. Everything super clean and really quiet street. Of course, in this part of Sydney aircraft noise began around 7am.

This was a lovely place to stay! it was nice and private but the hosts were also very kind  and friendly and happy to help out. Very cute pup! The rooms were clean and comfortable. We were really happy with our stay!

Carole's home was lovely! Everything was as described, and she was very responsive by phone to answer questions. Her partner Steve was home during most of our stay and readily available to answer any questions as well while Carole was working. Their dog Buddy is the cutest. The location is near a really cool part of town called Newtown. Highly recommend checking it out!

Carole and her husband are extremely welcoming including their dog (Buddy). The house is nice and clean being a 10min walk from the nearest train station and 5min walk from the bus stop. Overall, great place to stay and we look forward to coming back!
Wonderful place!! Super peaceful and sweet and lovely neighborhood!!! Appreciated the extra help they gave me with transportation issues I was having. They were a blessing to me!!
Great place to stay - pretty neighbourhood, convenient  location, super clean. Would recommend!
Great place to stay.  Everything was perfect. Very friendly. Highly recommend staying there.

Steve and Carole are very friendly and hospitable. We enjoyed our stay at their place. They let us use the washing machine as we desperately needed it after a week on the road. The bathroom is super clean and spacious. Their place is very close to the bus stops. We also enjoyed a 15 mins walk to Newtown, a very funky neighbourhood with lots of cafes and bars. We would recommend staying at their place.

Carole is a very generous host. The accommodation is of a very high standard and so close to everything in the City. Great neighborhood with a lot of interesting things to do. All our needs were well catered for. Thank you so much. Definitely recommend Caroles place.
Carole's place was just lovely, really clean and very peaceful. It is also close to transport and the city which is an advantage. I would certainly recommend it.

If you are in Sydney, you should stay here!

Aside from the place being perfect (private bathroom, aircon in the  bedroom - not just in the living room, small fridge and small private living room), Carole and Steve are an absolute pleasure. They are super kind and very accommodating, and their little dog, Buddy, is adorable and friendly. If I am every in Sydney again, I just hope this place isn't already booked!

Stanmore great. Good parking. Station close. Great coffee at the Mule. 
Very comfortable and clean 
Aircon or a fan. Sitting room with tea and coffee great.
Easy place to stay, good transport. Very clean with Friendly people. Proximity to The flight path was a bit of an issue for me but might not be for others.
We had a great stay !  Close to transit and the room was very clean and lovely.  Would definitely come back
Carole’s place beautiful and convenient. Will come again. Thanks

Carole and Steve's house comes highly recommended! The perfect place to stay when in Sydney! The check in was smooth and Steve was very helpful and friendly! We were also allowed to leave our bags in the house while we explore Sydney on our last day and pick it up just before our evening flight. Location is great!! Located near Newtown which is a very nice and cool place to explore. It is also located very near to a bus and train that leads you straight to anywhere you would like to explore in Sydney. The house is also such a treat to return to after a long busy day out. You will have a nice big bed to sleep in and a big bathroom all to yourself. Additionally, there is also a lounge that we were allowed to use all to ourself to make coffee or tea. Overall, very thankful to Steve and Carole and will definetely be back here if ever in Sydney :)

name: [203] 5 min WALK to Times Square
summary: 5 min walk to Times Square! located in center of Hell's Kitchen neighborhood where you find all different restaurants from all over the world. Port Authority Bus stop is in few blocks where the shuttle arrives. Your own bathroom in the room. Kitchen is shared. 全室ﾌﾟﾗｲﾍﾞｰﾄのｼｬﾜｰﾙｰﾑとﾄｲﾚがございます｡All apartments have own shower room and toilet. Air conditioned with private switch panel.
space: 24時間ｴﾝﾄﾗﾝｽﾄﾞｱｾｷｭﾘﾃｨ､24時間ﾙｰﾑﾄﾞｱｾｷｭﾘﾃｨ-  24hr secured entrance to our building,  24hr secured lock each rooms Upon booking you accept:  * 'Non Smoking’ policy * 'No Pet' policy * No Party in room/building' policy  $250 charge for breaking these rules

Port Authority Bus stop is in few blocks where the shuttle arrives. Your own bathroom in the room. Kitchen is shared. 全室ﾌﾟﾗｲﾍﾞｰﾄのｼｬﾜｰﾙｰﾑとﾄｲﾚがございます｡All apartments have own shower room and toilet. Air conditioned with private switch panel. 24時間ｴﾝﾄﾗﾝｽﾄﾞｱｾｷｭﾘﾃｨ､24時間ﾙｰﾑﾄﾞｱｾｷｭﾘﾃｨ-  24hr secured entrance to our building,  24hr secured lock each rooms Upon booking you accept:  * 'Non Smoking’ policy * 'No Pet' policy * No Party in room/building' policy  $250 charge for breaking these rules If you are coming from JFK airport there are some shuttle bus services. neighborhood_overview: 建物路面店には､ﾆｭｰﾖｰｸの人気寿司店 SUSHI SEKI の3号店(URL HIDDEN) of the popular Japanese Restaurant, Sushi Seki has opened next door last summer. ﾀｲﾑｽﾞｽｸｴｱへは徒歩5分､ｾﾝﾄﾗﾙﾊﾟｰｸにも徒歩10分というﾏﾝﾊｯﾀﾝの中心に位置しています｡  すぐ隣の7th-8th Aveにはﾌﾞﾛｰﾄﾞｳｪｲﾐｭｰｼﾞｶﾙがあります｡また､あの大人気ﾊﾝﾊﾞｰｶﾞｰ｢SHAKE SHACK｣も歩いて直ぐのところにあります｡9th Aveは世界各国の料理を食べられるﾍﾙｽﾞｷｯﾁﾝがありとても人気のｴﾘｱです｡ 深夜営業しているﾚｽﾄﾗﾝやｽｰﾊﾟｰも近く､大変便利なところに位置しています｡5 min walk to Times Square! located in center of Hell's Kitchen neighborhood where you find all different restaurants from all over the world.
notes: there are some security camera in the building to keep the space safe and comfortable for the guests including on the 2nd floor where the guests are able to keep their luggages before check in and get check out.
transit: If you are coming from JFK airport there are some shuttle bus services. One of them are called "nycairporter". You can check online for schedule and price. The closest stop to our building is 'Port Authority' stop, which is few blocks from our building.  By subway, please take E train from JFK, and get off at 50th street or Port Authority station. Nearby subway stations:  - A, C, E (42nd Port Authority) - C, E (50th street) - N, Q, R (49th street) - N, Q, R (42nd street Times Square)  - 1 (50th street) All stations are about 5-8mins walking distance.
access: ｼｪｱｷｯﾁﾝもあります! Share kitchen is located on 2nd floor. Refrigerator, kitchen utensils and coffee maker are available.
house_rules: 綺麗に使ってくださいね! We kindly remind all our guests for our strict non smoking policy in the property. Please try your best to keep your room clean and make sure not to leave any garbage in the apt over night. There is a small trash bin in public kitchen also large garbage container on the entrance floor by the security door.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
5 min walk to Times Square!  and we are located in center of Hell's Kitchen neighborhood

Adjacent to the theater district, Hell's Kitchen has long been the home of actors and arts organizations. Pre- and post-theater crowds from nearby Broadway, tourists from Times Square and workers from office high-rises jam the international restaurants, bars and pubs along 8th and 9th avenues. Farther west, along the water, Hudson River Park has landscaped walkways.

Nearby subway stations are all in 5-8 mins walking distance. 

We hope to have you at our place!

reviews.comments: Hasu  is a very nice person. We met him at check in. It was smooth. Rooms are same as shown in photos. Attached toilets wid each room. Each floor has five rooms al together 10 room on 2 floor s. Kitchen is on 2nd floor. Property is very close to times square. Everything was just perfect.
Clean and tidy, the location of the accommodation is really convenience, it is super close to the time square.

Used airbnb for the first time by doing a last minute booking, and I am impressed. The place was walking distance to times square and other NYC attractions. Everything from check-in to check-out went smooth as explained in the guide. The best thing I liked was the cleanliness of the place. Would definitely stay here next time I visit NYC.

El lugar muy cálido y muy hospitalarios, nos estaban esperando y fueron muy amables,la habitación perfecta, amplia y tal cual la gráfica, estuvimos muy cómodos toda nuestra estadía, recomendable 100 por ciento
All of things were great !!

I didn't meet the host at check-in, but it was a very smooth process. The room is exactly as it appears in the pictures and the housekeeper (who doesn't speak english) was very accommodating when I asked for 2 more pillows. The windows overlook the street, which is lined with restaurants of worldly cuisine - Italian, Brazilian, Korean, Japanese, Chinese, Thai and more. Because of this, it can be a bit noisy at night, so if you're a light sleeper, best to wear earplugs. The location is perfect and it's walking distance (5-20 minutes) to touristy parts of NYC (central park, theatre district, times square, Carlo's Bake Shop - their cannolis are my weakness).  I would recommend this stay to anyone visiting NYC. It's cleaner and bigger than some NYC hotel rooms I've stayed in and it is a fraction of the cost.
I couldn't have ask more for anything better. The room is clean and located in the best spot ever. Yasu and Akiko took care of the problem and answered the texts promptly.

The communication was very thorough and accurate, which may our arrival easy.  The host is not on site. The space as a perfect location for anyone in town as a tourist, it is close to everything and actually quite quiet.  The bed was comfortable and pleasant. There are goo restaurants all around and most anything you could need is within walking distance. There is a shared kitchen area and through way right outside the bedroom door so there is noise from other guests coming and going in the evening but all the guests staying were very conscientious.

Apesar de não ter conhecido pessoalmente o anfitrião, pareceu-me muito simpático e amigável, as indicações que ele forneceu foram exatas. Sempre atencioso ao responder aos emails. A descrição do anúncio foi precisa, é tudo 5 estrelas. O quarto é fantástico como aparenta nas fotografias, equivalente a um 4/5 estrelas. O bairro apesar de estar a 5 minutos da time square é calmo para NYC. Recomendo.

Although not personally known the host, he seemed very nice and friendly, the information he provided was accurate. Always attentive to respond to emails. The ad description was accurate, is all 5 stars. The room is fantastic as it appears in the photographs, equivalent to a 4/5 stars. The neighborhood despite being 5 minutes from the times square is quiet for NYC. I recommend, seriously.
Nice place. Great location. No check in/out needed. Will definitely recommend this place for its privacy and conveniency.

La chambre est exactement comme décrite dans l'annonce, très propre, relativement spacieuse et très fonctionnelle. Le vrai plus est son son emplacement, idéalement situé à 5mn de Times Square, la chambre est l'endroit idéal pour passer 4 jours à NY. 
La chambre 203 donne directement sur la petite cuisine, espace situé sur le palier, ce qui par moment est gênant surtout quand certains hôtes décident de manger en rentrant de soirée à 4h du matin, mais de manière générale, les hôtes sont discrets et respectueux donc l'immeuble reste calme.
Le seul point négatif est le bruit ambiant de la rue. La chambre est au 1er étage et la rue est très bruyante, avec l'absence de double vitrage, nous sommes souvent réveillés en pleine nuit...mais je pense que c'est une généralité à Manhattan.
Nous n'avons pas vu notre hote, mais tout c'est bien passé, Yasu nous a envoyé tous les codes et nous avons eu aucun souci.
Je recommande cet endroit car l'emplacement est idéal et tout est propre et parfait.

The host promptly responded to all my requests. I like the digital locks for both main entrance and room, such convenient. But the helper fogot to change the towels for my third nite stay. The interior is fair. The price is a bit high but the location is gd, many places are walkable. Also it is quite near NYCairporter station, easy to get reach for the first time NY traveller.

1,very professional host.
2. perfect location
3. clean room with bathroom
The room was spacious, really clean and comfortable. We didn't have any problems at all and the neighbourhood was lovely and very well located
Location was very good, very central and 5-7 min walk to Times Square. Apartment was very clean and just as it is seen in the pictures. Very good stay.

La casa è in un zona centralissima e ben servita. Pur essendo a due passi da Times Square è abbastanza silenziosa. La stanza è piccolina ma pulita e molto confortevole. Il letto (una piazza e mezzo) è molto comodo. Ottimo il bagno, nuovissimo.
I proprietari, sebbene non li abbiamo visti di persona, sono molto disponibili.

El lugar donde se encuentra ubicado es excelente!! La habitación es tal cual las fotos. Es además limpia y confortable. Cambian las toallas y hay dispenser de shampoo y jabon. Tuvimos un inconveniente con la calefacción (no funcionaba) y fue solucionado rápidamente. Lo mismo con un secador de pelo. Lo informamos y nos dieron otro al día siguiente.  La comunicación fue por mail, no conocimos a los anfitriones, pero respondieron en el mismo día. 
Solo dos cosas a tener en cuenta: chequeen sus mails diariamente por si hay novedades del depto (cambio de claves de ingreso, por ejemplo), y que la cocina esta bien equipada pero no hay microondas. 
Lo recomiendo y volvería sin dudas!!

Host responds quickly to inquiries and request. Room is located centrally in Manhattan and have lots of restaurants around the area which makes it great. Room is spacious and bathroom is well designed as well. Checking in and out is easy as there is just a passcode that will be provided to you for entrance to the doors.

L'endroit est super bien situé par contre cest très bruyant. 
Très propre aussi bien qu'un hôtel.

As almost all the reviews have stated, the room is in a fantastic location walking distance to Times Square and right in Hell's Kitchen, near public transportation and many places to eat. The room itself is clean and comfortable and in addition to the bathroom, it also has a small closet with hangers for your clothes and a shoe rack. There is also a desk and a TV in the room as well. Right outside the room is the second floor kitchen which also has a fridge that has filtered water. The room faces Restaurant Row, which has a lot of activity so if you are a light sleeper I recommend bringing ear plugs.
A clean, cozy place in the heart of midtown and amazing for the value..cute street w many great restaurants! Fast communication from the hosts. All in all a perfect stay.
Clean, easy to access and very well located room, I would definitely recommend.

Very convenient! Nice location no need to worry about waiting for the host. It is like a hotel. I liked it. Clean and neat. However, the bedroom seems kinda smaller than the picture but overall it was a good experience.

Appartement sécurisé parties commune et individuelle, trés propre ainsi que la chambre avec sa salle de bain et toilette. Trés conforme à la description et photos de notre hôte. Cuisine  bien équipée 
Trés bien situé dans un quartier branché et animé avec ses multiples restaurants et bar loundge ....à 5 mn de Time Square.
Evidement chambre coté rue un peu bruyante ....nous sommes à 2 pas de Time Square dans le centre !!!!!
Nous avons apprécié notre séjour et fait connaissance avec d'autres résidents.....

I felt welcomed from the first moment I decided to make my booking especially it was a very short notice 3 hours from checking in time. and Yasu & Akiko offered to host me easily.  Location was perfect surrounded with all kinds of food courts and few minutes from Broadway.  Very easy access to the place with the organized instructions sent by email. Place is quiet and room is very tidy and clean.  Thank you for the nice 2 nights I spent at your place. I highly recommend the place for those who want enjoy nice location of times square.
Very smooth check in and check out. Room and bathroom were very clean and the location was outstanding !

Appartement très bien situé! 
Idéal pr visiter la ville!

Yasu & Akiko define why the concept of Air B&B is our future.  Convenient, Competitive, and Clean.
Thank you for being a great host and a wonderful communicator.  I hope your private business continues to flourish.  I will return soon.
Warmest regards,
 
Your Air B&B's Biggest Fan
I liked being there, it was nice and clean the room
Everything was just as advertised. Well done.

(Website hidden by Airbnb) not the word to describe the entire booking process, nor the say as well as checkout. The owners were very attentive and informative to our needs during our 2 night stay. This location is PERFECT to say the least. Public transportation is near in addition to various shops, restaurants, and TIMES SQUARE itself. Building is very secure and the "cleaning lady" is very very very nice and thorough with what she does. We had a late flight out but were able to leave our bags locked in the hallway-this factor made the end of the trip so worth it as I didn't want to haul luggage around all day. The noise(just a few horns and voices as people passed by)is easy to not hear and be able to enjoy a nice sleep. You do have to go to 3rd floor to iron, but I honestly felt like I was in my own home upstairs. Not lots of traffic in building either. Price was affordable and exceptionally lower than hotels in the area. We are looking forward to returning and will definitely be staying here again!!!!
this is an amazing place, this is in an excellent location, when come back to New York, I will pay for it again.
We had to wait a little to get in our room.  The TV was hanging off the wall and the The Masters was on.  Yikes.  No English, but found help and it was fixed.  Great location.
Was exactly as described. Great location. Would recommend and stay again!
This was my first Airbnb booking, and it was awesome! The room was fantastic and in a great location! Super clean and felt very safe. Thank you!!

My stay was wonderful. Everything described in the listing was accurate. The place is in great location , clean , spacious , welcoming and comfortable. The information I got prior to my stay was helpful and was part of the good feeling I had. I was most satisfied.
The flat was clean, well-furbished and a stone's throw away from Times Square - a big plus for anyone who loves Broadway! There were a couple of hiccups though, but it was still a good experience.

The location is super , very centerimg.
My problem was with the understanding that the kitchen is shared and was very poor one. Missing microwave and tosteroven .
After 2 night the A/C stop working and till we left was not working.
I must say that the hosted suggest to replacethe room but we disided not to becuse the packing agian will take time.

The room was very clean and located in a very convenient area. It took less than 10 minutes to get there from Port Authority. It was also a bit hotel-like in the sense that there were multiple numbered rooms on the floor with individual keypads in which you had to input the given key code. I really liked the sense of security and privacy I had when I was there. Would recommend!

La experiencia en el apartamento de Yasu y Akiko fue muy buena. La ubicación es excelente, en medio de las luces y el ruido de NY. No tuvimos oportunidad de conocer a los anfitriones ya que no tuvimos ningún inconveniente. También ayudo que nos tocaron vecinos geniales. Pasamos unos días maravillosos.

We had a fantastic stay at Yasu & Akiko's! It was the perfect location, less than 5 minutes from Times Square! The only concern was it was quite noisy but that's to be expected from staying anywhere in the city. The room was lovely as well and it was great that we could leave our luggage locked up in the kitchen after checking out on the last day. Would definitely stay again - thank you!!
Clean room. Close to everything! I enjoyed my stay :)

Our host sent us necessary information in advance. However, in other kinds of mail communications, he could be quicker. 

The location is really good since it's only a few minutes walk to Times Square. A lot of restaurants and bars on this street though which made it quite noisy during the night. There is no elevator so be prepared to carry your bags up and down on narrow stairs.
The room itself was surprisingly spacious and nice. Our aircon was broken during our stay and was not fixed. Kitchen space is nice. There are bike locks to lock your bags in the kitchen.

Didn't know there was a cleaner who came to change the towels sometimes. However, she didn't throw away garbage or cleaned up anything else.

Unit was extremely neat and clean. Not big but will comfortably fit 2 people. Bathroom was very modern and had all the essentials (towels, shampoo, hair dryer, etc). The kitchen is in a shared area, but it's very clean and there is a fridge that you can use to keep your food. There was a portable AC near the window that made summer nights a lot more bearable. We especially liked the key code system, it made checking in a lot easier as we didn't have to coordinate for a time to meet and pass the keys.

The place was super convenient and close to everything. There were tons of restaurants around. Subway station was 5-10 min away by foot and Times Square was only 2 blocks away. There was also a big grocery store close by that was open until 1am.

Due to its location in midtown Manhattan, there was some noise outside the apartment. I could hear drunk people and trucks honking in the middle of the night, so consider bringing earplugs if you are a light sleeper. That said, the noise is typical in midtown and it's the cost of being close to everything.
位置特别好!下面一条街都是吃饭的地方!牛角就在两个block以外!五大道都是走一走就能到!就是晚上有点儿吵…

Nous avions réservé la chambre 203.
Points positifs : 
Très bien situé ( 5 min de time square), rue animée avec des restaurants et boutiques à proximité.
Le système de code qui remplace les clés est vraiment très pratique.
La chambre et la salle de bain sont propres et agréable pour une semaine avec de la place pour ranger ses affaires. 
Le wifi gratuit fonctionne très bien.
Nous n'avons pas cuisiné durant nos vacances mais la cuisine ( partagée avec les autres chambres) est bien pratique ne serais ce que pour mettre des trucs au frigo. 
Les serviettes de toilette on même été changées en milieu de semaine.

Points négatifs : 
La climatisation intégrée de la chambre devait être en panne et a été remplacée par une clim mobile qui faisait un bruit d'enfer ( obligé de la couper la nuit même si en juin il fesait très chaud).
Notre chambre donne sur la rue avec beaucoup de bruit extérieur. 
Les rideaux n'isolent pas bien de la lumière du jour.
Le lit grinçait ce qui n'est pas très agréable dans la nuit.

Le rapport qualité / emplacement / prix reste quand même très intéressant, en cas de prochain voyage sur New York nous séjournerons à nouveau là bas.
Great location, clean room and owners are very friendly. Would stay here again in a heartbeat.
Absolutely ideal Airbnb. Just perfect
Excellent location and it's exactly as it's described.  5 minutes from Times Square, metro conveniently located and the neighbourhood is filled with bars and restaurants.

La verdad muy buena ubicación.  Son muy amables cuando tienes algún problema. Es un poco ruidosa pero es lógico estando en esa zona genial cerca de todo. Volvería siempre. Lo que si no tiene microondas y eso a veces afecta tu economía pero te la puedes arreglar. Gracias por una bella estadia!!!

Booked with this account when it was ran by a different group of people. Was told that there were access codes to the building and room that I would be given 5-7 days before I arrive. About two weeks before our stay I saw that Janice had taken over the page. Messages her 5 days before asking for access codes, got no reply. Kept doing it every day with no reply, and the day before very few hours, still with no reply. Landed in NYC and booked a hotel, but decided to give her the benefit of the doubt since our hotel was only a block away. Went to the building, knocked on the door- no answer. Stood there for 15 minutes and repeated but still same result. We left and went to our hotel.

Long story short, paid for an Airbnb we didn't get to stay in due to an unresponsive host. We got a refund, but I'm saying this just to warn all future people who may inquire about booking through Janice. Go somewhere else and save yourself some trouble.

Die Wohnung liegt super zentral und ist sehr sauber. Man bekam immer neue Handtücher und die Zimmergröße war für zwei völlig ausreichend! Die Vermieter waren sehr bemüht es einem angenehm zu gestalten!

Though we had no opportunity to see the owner, it was no problems as all the instructions given were very clear. The location was very attractive. It would be great if the water bottles were to be available for us as we were too tired to go out and buy them after a long flight. We dived into a bed by forgetting that we were actually very very thirsty. The room was clean and well organised. We felt that the owners are very considerate people. We were grateful to  such a clean and comfortable room. Thank you so much. お世話になりました｡ありがとうございました｡

Very good location 5 min from time square like they said. Tidy small apartment with shared kitchen. Street is very noisy though so bring the ear plugs for a good night sleep. Right smack bang in the middle of hells kitchen, great food options and bars at your door step. Thanks for the great stay!

La habitación es tal cual se ve en las fotos, la ubicación es excelente, solo a dos cuadras de times square, a 4 cuadras aprox de las estaciones de subte que te llevan a todos lados y muchos lugares alrededor para cenar. Sin dudas volvería, muy buen precio calidad!

Yasau and Akiko were amazing! They were both very responsive to my questions and requests of adding a night. The suite itself was very clean and convenient. Steps away from Times Square and a 10 min walk to Port Authority Station, it was great! The best value!
Everything was great. Clean and nearby great restaurants were on point.

The room was very clean and comfortable!!
And Great location!!
Thank u so much!!

質問したらすぐに返信があり､また､英語が苦手な私にとって､日本語で対応して頂けたのは､とてもありがたかったです｡
空港ｼｬﾄﾙﾊﾞｽの送迎場所の駅も近く､宿泊場所付近には飲食店や薬局､ﾊﾟﾝ屋さんやｺｲﾝﾗﾝﾄﾞﾘｰもあり､快適に過ごすことができました｡
ありがとうございました｡
Great location, close to everything. The room was a big disappointed- didn't look as good as the photos. the curtains/blinds were all broken & in poor condition considering the price you pay.

Ficamos muito satisfeitos com as acomodações, as quais estavam perfeitamente compatíveis com o anunciado; o apto. estava limpo e confortável; tivemos uma recepção amável da pessoa encarregada pela limpeza que nos deixou bem à vontade; a cozinha compartilhada estava organizada, com utensílios novos e espaço adequado para fazer pequenas refeições. Tivemos boa convivência com os demais usuários quanto ao espaço comum e que nos proporcionou bem estar e segurança. A localização é  ótima,  perto de estações de metrô e da Times Square, realmente a 5 minutos.

Todo fue genial. La limpieza, la ubicación, el poder tener wifi gratuito y con buena velocidad, la cocina, etc. Sólo destacaría algo negativo y es que la cama era algo incómoda, sería lo único que cambiaría de este apartamento. Sin duda si tuviera que volver a NY me alojaría de nuevo aquí. La zona es tranquila pero a la vez muy bien conectada.
Great location!

Fantastic and professional Airbnb. All communications were clear and informative. We received information on entry and directions a few days before arrival, giving us plenty of time to make travel arrangements. 

The location is amazing and there are so many great restaurants around. One of our favourites was immediately across the road!

It is very noisy at night so earplugs are a must for light sleepers. 

Overall we had a very pleasant stay and would definitely return!

Apartamento impecable y tal como  en la descripción, inmejorable ubicación e higiene.

100% recomendable , volveríamos a alojarnos con Yasu & Akiko.

Contact host about a broken handle upon arrival and cold room. The room temperature was corrected but handle remained broken. There was easy communication though. Great location and in winter not as loud as other reviews indicated. Would stay again.

Pros: great location and really safe environment. The wifi also worked perfectly. 

Cons: Hosts are lagged behind in responding to our messages. When we arrived, we immediately noticed the bed sheets were dirty and unchanged since we found several hairs (lighter than mine or my mom's) at the end of the bed, not on the pillow, but in side the blanket and AT THE END OF THE BED. This is unacceptable and made us really uncomfortable so we contacted the hosts immediately around 9pm. However, they didn't respond nor send anyone to change the sheets for us. Luckily, we ran into this cleaning lady the next morning and she was really nice and changed our bed sheets, pillow cases and even added another blanket for us. Till this point, the hosts still had not replied. 

There wasn't a hand wash or soap in the bathroom which we thought was really weird. Who's gonna pack a hand soap with them when they are doing airbnb (???). For the kitchen, just FYI, there wasn't a microwave.... a microwave! So for all the peeps who gonna have leftover food and need to put in the fridge (they sure do have that thank god), pizza, soup, rice, or any stir-fried dishes are not good choices. Unless you don't mind reheating everything on the stove. 

Lastly, the bathroom doorknob was broken. Whenever I tried to open the door from the inside, the knob would come off. I saw someone commenting about this but I'm not sure if it was the same room. It wasn't a big deal since none of us locked ourselves inside...but something to keep in mind, especially for people really value their travel experiences and living conditions. 

In general, it's a convenient place for people who just need a room to stay. I started to speculate there is a company or group of people running this business. They have cleaning ladies  (not just one), just like hotels. This whole building has several rooms inside and no oven or microwave in the kitchen. Therefore the hosts are probably just there as a public figure to put on their profile but they don't actually live here. I was looking for a more interactive and personal experience so I was a little bit disappointed.

La chambre de Yasu et Akiko est parfaite. 
Les lits sont régulièrement fait, les serviettes sont changées aussi régulièrement, mais surtout l'emplacement est juste parfait, on peut voir Times Square depuis l'appartement. 
Le prix est un peu élevé mais en vaut la peine, honnêtement si je reviens à New York je reviendrais ici si c'est toujours disponible.
A must when visiting time square. Very accommodating for the price. If I can I will use this airbnb in the future for sure.
yeri çok iyi heryere yakın ama sokak çok (Website hidden by Airbnb) yemek kokusundan çok rahatsız olduk.Yasu & Akiko her an iletişimdeler bu çok iyi.

Highly recommend to everyone! The lodging was great! The room was exactly as described and the location is great, right near Times Square. The bed was a little small for the couple but comfortable, apart from this detail everything else pleased us very much.
Es tal cual a las imágenes de la página. Ubicación excelente. Habitación grande. Baño privado dentro de la habitación que eso es buenisimo!  Cocina compartida pero muy equipada y limpia. Muy seguro
Un excelente lugar.!! Todo cerca y fácil moverse

Superbe endroit, bien équipé, propre, bien desservi par le métro. Le seul inconvénient à signaler est le bruit de la rue le soir et la nuit, il vaut mieux avoir un bon sommeil ça ne nous a pas dérangé.
Very close to time square and the subway. Lots of restraints on the area. Best deal for the price point.
Great place, great value, you cannot go wrong here.  Highly recommended.

We coudn't have chosen any airbnb better! Very clean and confortable. Despite it was near time square (great location), inside the room it was really silent. Clean towels every day. Highly recomended!
This place was perfect. Close to everything!
Excelente lugar. Muy limpio y ordenado. Cerca de absolutamente todo. Proporcionan toallas y las cambian. Muy recomendable
Great stay!, to close to metro system and night life, the place is easy to access and very comfortable.
Excelente ubicacion, lindo baño, muy buena disposicion de las anfitrionas para todo!
A very good apartment, very close to Time square. There is a nice women who keeping room clean, she can speak Chinese. it is a  good place for Chinese travelers.

Excelente ubicación. Tranquilidad dentro del edificio. Todo le funcionaba al baño. La cama es matrimonial, sin embargo la foto es engañosa aunque en el anuncio se especifica que es matrimonial. Todo estaba limpio. Todo ordenado. Puedes tomar agua de la llave sin problema. Puedes comprar despensa y guardarla en el refrigerador. Súper cerca de time square y muchos lugares de Manhattan. Se puede caminar a varios lugares. Lo recomiendo.
We really enjoyed our short stay at Yasu and Akiko's place. It was in a great location, close to everything, clean, secure, and an overall great experience.
Great location. Not real comfortable bed. Friendly host.
I cannot recommend this place enough. It was a great stay and the location was excellent. Nice clean and comfortable room.
地理位置很好,有单独的卫生间,这个价格在整个曼哈顿性价比很高
Hermosa habitación con baño privado. Ubicación excelente. Cerca de todo ,limpio, los huéspedes 10 puntos!! Super recomendable. Gracias por todo

I highly recommend Yasu & Akiko's Hells Kitchen apartment. We enjoyed the atmosphere of being so central to everything and we felt blessed to be in Times Square each day.
The apartment itself was perfect for our stay.
Great location, clean and convenient.  We would definitely go back!

It's ALL about location!  And this location is GREAT if you like restaurants and nightlife.  So, there's Times Square to the East sure, but even better in my opinion, is the Hell's Kitchen neighborhood a block West.  This neighborhood is friendly and welcoming with fantastic restaurants and small shops.  It is BUSY and a bit noisy at night so bring ear plugs - we turned the A/C fan on to drown out the noise and it worked just fine.  Great place, great location!!

Appartement très agréable, propre et bien situé. Les draps et serviettes fournis sont un plus très appréciable car cela fait plus de place dans les valises pour ramener des souvenirs. La rue est parfois bruyante mais c'est New-York. Si nous y retournons, il est fort probable que nous reprendrons le même logement ou un autre du même endroit.
As fotos e discrição refletem exatamente a acomodação.
Location was great, very close to Times Square. Able to drop off luggage prior to check in was nice. At times it was a little noisy but overall I️ would stay again.

It is a great room. Clean bedroom and bathroom. It provides extra blankets and towels,which is really nice. The bed is a little bit small,two people will be crowd. Yasu & Akiko are really nice,and they respond very quickly. This is a good place to live
Perfect location, less then a 5 min walk to Times Square. Great restaurants right just a stone throw from this building. Quiet and other then the hard pillows was GREAT!
Great room and terrific location. Close to everything. Check in details were very clear and easy to follow.

Brilliant location, room was perfect exactly how it is on the photos, cleaner was lovely and let us in our room early and we got fresh towels when we asked for them, couldnt fault it at all! Defo recommend!

You can stop searching, as this will be the best apartment for you to stay in NYC!
Location is awesome, communication very smooth and the convenience to enter without keys is priceless.
To have the cleaning lady coming to change towels is really lovely.
Strongly recommended!

Killer location.  Everything we needed to have a pleasant 48 hour trip to NYC.  Were there on both a Saturday and Sunday night.  Pretty noisy, even in the late (late) hours of the night/morning.  Bring ear plugs.  Otherwise, very happy.  Would book again without hesitation.

It was great in every thing u want
I really recommended that for any and every one
Thank you so much for such a good experience. We really enjoyed it!

It was definitely worth it to stay there.
I enjoyed it a lot. The location was good, and it was clean and was much better than I expected to.

Everything wonderful. 
Location, safety, hospitality. 
Great place to stay.
Convenience location. Very Clean room. Good experience!
Great place, clean, and close to everything!
Its a good apartment and im very happy for choose this apartment.
Great place and great cost-benefit!
Great place, clean. Double bed
I will see how things are handled first before leaving my input.

room is modern and clean. great location. 
will definitely stay again. Yasu & Akikos are outstanding hosts.

Everything is as described. Communication was super easy and fast. I would totally recommend it ! 

Thank you!

We really enjoyed our stay at Yasu and Akiko’s place. Perfect location, only about 2 blocks to Times Square!! The cleaning lady was so sweet and offered to check us in early, and carry our luggage upstairs for us. We would recommend this place to anyone and will be hopefully staying there again in the future!
Really clean, accesible and near Times Square. We only had one issue with the air conditioner and they gave us an answer and fix it in no time. We’ll definetly choose them again!
Ubicación perfecta. El departamento muy bueno e impecable.
Awesome location.

La posizione è davvero ottima, a due passi da Times Square e ben collegata alla metropolitana. Il quartiere è Hell’s Kitchen e la strada dove si trova è piena di locali e ristoranti. La struttura è pulitissima e le camere ed il bagno sono accoglienti. Le uniche piccole pecche sono: letto rumoroso (andrebbe cambiato assolutamente); camera abbastanza rumorosa, soprattutto di notte vista la presenza di molti locali (bisognerebbe insonorizzare meglio le finestre); la mancanza dell’ascensore. Per il resto è davvero perfetto per una vacanza, breve o lunga a NY.

- - -

The location is really great, a stone's throw from Times Square and well connected to the subway. The neighborhood is Hell's Kitchen and the street where it is located is full of clubs and restaurants. The structure is very clean and the rooms and the bathroom are welcoming. The only small flaws are: noisy bed (it should be changed absolutely); quite noisy room, especially at night due to the presence of many rooms (the windows should be better soundproofed); the lack of the elevator. For the rest it's really perfect for a short or long NY vacation.

Super emplacement pour être au centre de Manhattan
Le métro est accessible rapidement, bon rapport qualité/prix , seul petit bémol la rue est bruyante
Check-in was very smooth and the room had the basic amenities. However, going up the stairs to get to the room with big luggage is quite inconvenient. Everything else was fine.
Amazing place for the price. Couldn't ask for a better location for a weekend trip to NYC!
Good communication and clean apartment.

Apartamento muito bem localizado. 5 min da Times Square e perto de estações do metrô. 

O quarto é limpo e organizado, funcionando como um hotel. A limpeza é feita todos os dias e você ainda pode usar a pequena cozinha do prédio.

Super recomendo! Voltaria!
Alles tip top. Uneingeschränkte Weiterempfehlung!

We had a very enjoyable 1 night stay and would definitely stay here again for our next broadway show!  The place is kept meticulously fresh and squeaky clean by the diligent and always present housecleaning staff.
5 STARS all the way around!
Awesome location, we had a quick one night stay so not too much to say. Felt secure and a nice balance between hotel and personal touch.
Great location in good price. Easy check-in. even we reached in very late light. Thx.
Wonderful location and very nice room!

A few blocks from the Theater District, this location was unbeatable and we appreciated a clean, quiet resting place in the middle of such a bustling city. Yasu & Akiko were responsive and helpful. Would definitely stay again!

Yasu & Akiko's place is the perfect location for tourists to visit the top NYC spots within walking distance. Very clean and super accommodating. They were kind enough to let us check in early AND leave our bags in the common area after check-out. Couldn't have asked to stay in a better location with friendly hosts.
Great location
a walk up apartment a slight walk from the station. very clean and private room with secure passcode locks. shared kitchen sparse but okay.

L’appartamento è molto comodo, a circa 5 minuti a piedi da Times Square e da diverse linee della metropolitana. Molto comodo poter usare il frigorifero per poter far colazione prima di partire ogni mattina. Essendo in centro si gira tranquillamente anche di notte senza nessun pericolo.
Great location, nice place.
Everything was great
Consigliatissimo

Una gran opción por la excelente ubicación con la que cuentan. Nunca vi a Yasu&Akiko porque no tuve necesidad de hacerlo en persona, pero cuando tuve alguna duda siempre respondieron con rapidez. Las indicaciones que te dan para llegar son muy útiles, y el sistema para que puedas dejar tus maletas después del check out es de gran ayuda

A localização é excelente, a duas quadras da Times Square. O quarto é bem confortável, a cozinha atende em caso de qualquer necessidade. O acesso é todo por fechadura eletrônica, o que traz segurança e praticidade. Cama confortável, bom chuveiro. Apenas um ponto de atenção. Como está localizado numa região com muitos bares e restaurantes, pode haver barulho  durante a noite, que pode incomodar, dependendo do quarto onde estiver, pois alguns deles ficam de frente para a rua. Além disso, é muito comum sirenes de ambulâncias. O isolamento acústico de nosso quarto não era dos melhores. Resumindo, uma excelente opção para ficar em Manhattan. Quando voltar a NY, ficaria novamente.

My stay was good, but not worth the price. My only complaints were how cold the room was, even with the heater on 88 and the plain boring room. I wish they would have had some decorations and a better bed. Location was perfect.
The location is central to the theater district. The room was clean, newly renovated and modern. A small shared kitchen on the second floor was very nice as well.  I had a very enjoyable stay.
Great location in heart of NYC. Next to many food sources. Perfect

Yasu & Akiko provided a wonderfully concise stay in NYC. They were exceptionally quick with answering communication, and they provided plenty of information to help us both arrive and have a comfortable stay. The room was very clean, the amenities were quite up to par (the heater was especially appreciated), and we had no concerns during our stay. The location felt pretty safe and convenient with a lot of food options nearby. The most we could say is that the room could possibly feel a bit small, especially with the closet door open. We didn't have much luggage or purchases with us, and so it wasn't of major concern. Other than that, extremely helpful and very well-tailored stay.
The location is great! Each room has independent bathroom which is nice.
Loved the location would stay again 10/10

- 100% recomendable !!! 
- Muy buena ubicación.
- Amanda (servicio de limpieza) una genia, muy amable ! 
- La climatización excelente. 
- Lo que se ve en las fotos es realmente como es. 

Una estadía excelente !
Amazing place!

Great location, literally steps from great eateries and times square. The hosts are quick to respond and gave a lot of tips on local transportation. The check-in process was easy and quick. The rooms are decently equipped. Would def recommend staying here.
The accommodations are lovely and clean and the location is great. Especially if you like the theatre district and good restaurants.
Great stay. Best touch was they provided locks for luggage if you arrive early

Yasu & Akiko’s place is a perfect place to stay if you are looking for somewhere close to all the action. Times Square is a block and a half away. You are also in a main restaurant area so you have plenty of places to choose from to eat at. The room was the perfect temperature (space heater was on when we arrived). Everything was also very clean. It was nice having a private bathroom en-suite. Check in time was at 3pm, however, we did request an earlier check in time due to other obligations, and we were actually able to get in even earlier than that which was great. I normally stay in The Village, however, if I were to stay in this area again, I would definitely stay with Yasu and Akiko again.

L’alloggio è molto bello, cucina sempre pulita e disponibile, camera spaziosa e bagno con una grande doccia. La posizione è perfetta e il check in / out comodissimo. Siamo stati molto felici di questo appartamento. Lo consiglierei sicuramente per una bella vacanza a New York.
Thank you
Really good place. Amazing location. A little noisy at night but well you are in the middle of Manhattan.

Our room was in a perfect location!! We were within no more than 6 blocks from the broadway shows we came to see and subways that head uptown & downtown!  There are great restaurants on our street & such diverse choices in short walking distances! We got juice every morning from Juice Generation & there were 2 health food markets in easy carrying distance. 

If you want to stay near Times Square or the Theatre District, it’s a great place to stay!
An incredible location close to everything we wanted to see and close to the subway. Clean and the perfect fit for our weekend vacation.
