Please try your best to keep your room clean and make sure not to leave any garbage in the apt over night. There is a small trash bin in public kitchen also large garbage container on the entrance floor by the security door.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
5 min walk to Times Square!  and we are located in center of Hell's Kitchen neighborhood

Adjacent to the theater district, Hell's Kitchen has long been the home of actors and arts organizations. Pre- and post-theater crowds from nearby Broadway, tourists from Times Square and workers from office high-rises jam the international restaurants, bars and pubs along 8th and 9th avenues. Farther west, along the water, Hudson River Park has landscaped walkways.

Nearby subway stations are all in 5-8 mins walking distance. 

We hope to have you at our place!

reviews.comments:
El anuncio era totalmente fiel a la realidad, la ubicación es excelente, estas pegado al centro pero sin estar con todo el barullo del  centro, y en una calle con amplia y variada oferta gastronómica. 
La habitación y el baño recién reformados, como en las fotos.
Y el anfitrión disponible en todo momento ; )

We had a very enjoyable stay at this location. It is in a great location of Hell's Kitchen with all kinds of bars and restaurants nearby. The wifi worked well. The kitchen is communal with other tenants of the building. Yasu and Akiko were cordial hosts who made it easy to get settled into the room.

Upon arrival, our code to the room did not work. Luckily, the previous guest showed up and let us in with his password. He was also gracious enough to give us 3 metro cards that we were able to use during our stay, so thank you Bang! The location itself is well situated on Restaurant Row without feeling too touristy. The room was clean and all the furnishings were new. Overall, a nice place to stay to be close to most of the typical tourist attractions of Manhattan.

The place is not as great as it is publicized. In addition, when we reached, the place was not clean. Yasu and Akiko, after trying to reach them couple of times, responded after 45mins. They were patient in listening to my frustration and they apologized. They got the cleaning person to the place right away. They refunded 50% of my payment and I appreciated that. So overall, they are reasonable hosts.

Having said that, I will NOT stay there again. Put simply, I would NOT use airbnb again. I could have obtained a good double bed hotel room for similar price and there is nothing extra that I gained by using airbnb (or this place). 

An unwanted piece of advise: do not use airbnb, especially, in NYC.

Este fue en realidad un lugar maravilloso, muy cómodo, limpio y seguro, las habitaciones están muy bien equipadas, las camas excelentes   Y el baño con todo lo mínimo necesario pero lo mejor de todo fue la ubicación, caminábamos unos pocos minutos y ya estábamos en el time square.

The room is nice, clean and newly remodeled. The pictures are very accurate. Convenient neighborhood close to subways and theaters. Slightly noisy on weekends due to bar/restaurant downstairs but thats expected  in NYC. Good value.
Perfect for a quick trip. Place looked exactly like photos. Great location. Would definitely stay again. Owners very responsive.

This wonderful building in the heart of Hell's Kitchen was perfect for easy access around the city. It was clean and simply decorated, had everything we needed for our stay, including Internet access, toiletries, and access to a kitchen! It was incredibly simple to get in and felt secure and safe. A perfect place for us, we will return! Thanks for a great stay!

It was a very pleasant stay. The location is great, the room nice and clean. Yasu and Akiko were wonderful hosts - responsive, kind-hearted, and always have the guests' need in mind. My parents who had their first trip to New York had a great time. We'd be happy to stay here again if we visit NYC in the future. Thank you for having us!

This place is more like a hotel without a reception desk. We stayed here for a few days with another couple, total of 4 people and it was just great. The location is so convenient with great transportation, walking distance to many restaurants and sightseeing spots. It is extremely clean and fairly quiet for the location. The rooms are big and comfortable, my husband loved the bed. Just a note, this place does not have an elevator and has steep stairs to go to any floor, so carrying a suitcase up or down is challenging if you have a lot or heavy stuff. Still, I would recommend staying here and would return for sure! We never met Yasu or Akiko but we met the housecleaning lady who was so sweet and helpful. Thank you and we hope to come back very soon!
Great location. Not too noisy, just typical NYC noise. Room was clean and accommodating.
The apartment is in great location and so clean.. It is 5mins walks away from Times Square.. Highly recommend it..

This was a really great location if you are looking to be by Times Square - only a couple blocks away! Access into the building and room was by key code so no keys needed. Our room was on the 3rd floor which was fine. Room and bathroom were impeccably clean like a nice hotel, so it was a great deal for the price we got. 

Only issue was the ad said cable TV but there was no cable box or connection in the room, so the TV didn't work while we were there.  A couple people came by the first day to try to fix it but couldn't & said someone would come the next day but that didn't happen. I didn't mind but my fiancé really wanted to watch ESPN since football season just started. 

I think the room was really nice & bathroom was clean (super important to me!), 2 full size beds & futon were good size, so accommodated the 3 of us visiting, and there was even a futon so our friends who visited could relax. 

Very easy access to restaurants, convenient stores - as soon as you walked outside. I would definitely consider staying here again.

Yasu and Akiko were VERY accommodating and awesomely nice from the beginning.  I needed to change my travel days multiple times, and they were always there to answer my questions, inquiries, and concerns.  

When we checked into our room, it was very immaculate. There were clean towels ready for use, and they also provided body wash, shampoo and conditioner.

The whole apartment environment was clean.  The kitchen on the second floor was readily available for use, and it was always nice to see friendly guests passing by.

The only thing that struck us oddly (not in a bad way), was the fact that there was cleaning personnel on location. Therefore, the apartment felt more like a hotel than an apartment.  I guess the cleaning lady cleans your room everyday unless you inform her not to.  

A random and weird experience we had one day was when we got back to our room and there were people (workers) in our bathroom changing out the towel rack.  It would've been nice if they fixed the towel rack after we checked out, but what's done is done.

We would definitely stay at this apartment again!  The location was perfect, there are A LOT of eateries in the area (Hell's Kitchen), and it felt safe. Plus, the hosts were very helpful and genuine.
Excellent accommodation close to Times Square.  Very clean and easy to access.  Very impressed and will definitely look to stay here again when I am next in NYC.
El barrio es estupendo,no puede estar mejor (Website hidden by Airbnb) casa una monada y la habitacion aunque un poco pequeña para tres,esta muy bien.Todo super limpio y nuevo.

The appartment was excactly as described and it was very clean.
Good large room with two doublebeds and extra sofa and a very nice and functional bathroom. It was very near to Time Square and all the attractions. There is a little kitchen at the 2. floor. 
The only drawback was a rather noisy discoteque or bar nearby which was opened until late.
We never actually met the hosts, but we didn't miss anything and didn't try to contact them, so this was fine.
We would certainly recommend this accomodation to others and would chose it again if we should return to New York some day.

Appartement bien décrit et très facile d'accès.
La description du bien est à l'identique des photos.
Increíble ubicacion

The room is specious, clean and cozy; has some hotel vibe, and I really like it. I wish there were outputs close to our beds though. When we checked in there was some miscommunication and we waited outside of another room for an hour, it was quite unpleasant honestly. Host has been fairly responsive and offer a new room eventually, I really appreciate that.

La estadía con Yasu y Akiko fue excelente, la ubicación del hospedaje es muy céntrica y muy buena para conocer los principales lugares turísticos de NY, se podía caminar a muchos lugares desde este punto.  La habitación muy limpia y tal como lo describían en la página. 
Las instrucciones para el check in y la llegada al lugar fueron claras y explicativas y la respuesta de los anfitriones rápida ante dudas y cambios de fechas que tuvimos que hacer a última hora. 
Lo único incomodo fue que teníamos muchas maletas y nuestra habitación era en el tercer piso y la subida y bajada de las maletas tantas gradas y sin ascensor fue pesado.

Pros:
The room are good, clean and specious enough for 4 persons. The location is exactly as described very close to Times Square. The location also near to many restaurant.
The building is secure. Be prepare with all the code to enter the the building and the room. No one will help you.

Cons:
Difficult to get parking space especially on weekend. There are 2 or 3 public parking (1 and 3 block distance) it cost USD30 to 40 per 13h.

Best place. This place is one reason our entire NYC trip went very well. Everything is few blocks away. All the reviews written here are already detail enough. I don't want to repeat them again! We will stay anytime.

Thanks to hosts. The lady in the house did not speak english but she is sweet and warmth. Very helpful.

There is a bar in the same building, it was fantastic and cozy. Do visit the bar.

If you're looking for to interact with hosts, may be, this is not the place. Someone said this place looks like a hotel without front desk. That's true. Like many other said we also could not get a chance to meet the hosts. But its okay given you're here to enjoy NYC.
My best living experience in New York. The apartment is really clean and locates in a very good location. I definitely will choose this place to live when I come back to New York next time.
It's super convenient and clean ,around the place there are lots of restaurants and shops next time we come to Newyork will definitely choose to stay here again!

Las habitaciones super cómodas! Tal cual las muestran las fotos! excelente el barrio!  tranquilo, muy cerca a Times Square. Una cocina equipada para cocinar en el lugar pero algo chica para la cantidad de habitaciones ya que hay que compartirla.  Volvería al lugar en otro viaje a NYC!

El departamento es tal cual se describe en las fotografías. La ubicación del edificio es impagable, cerca de varios puntos de interés. Nuestro depto daba al interior, por lo que no sentíamos los ruidos de la calle. La comunicación con el anfitríon fue muy buena, siempre respondiendo a nuestras consultas a los pocos minutos. El check in es a las 15:00 y el check out a las 11:00. Por lo que si llegan antes o salen más tarde, el edificio dispone en los pisos 2 y 3 de cadenas de bicicleta con llave para que dejen las maletas seguras y puedan salir a pasear.
Las duchas tienen dispensadores de shampoo, jabón y acondicionador. En el baño también disponen de papel higiénico, el cual pueden pedir reponer cuando se termine.
Recomiendo absolutamente estos departamentos.
Muchas gracias al anfitrión.
The location is wonderful, the neighborhood is quiet and nice, and there are tons of restaurants nearby. Will definitely stay here next time visiting NY!
Loved our stay! Perfect location! Just  minutes to Times Square and trains. Room and restroom is nice and clean and looks just like pictures. If ever coming back to NYC I would stay here again.

We were greeted by a very helpful cleaning lady and made the checking in process a breeze. The place was as per the description and it was clean. We were also allowed to leave our luggage with locks provided. Yasu and Akiko was easily reachable during our stay. I highly recommend this place.
La estadía en el departamento fue excelente, muy buena habitación con las comodidades ofrecidas. el barrio es  perfecto!! a pasos de Times square!.  volveré sin duda.  gracias Yasu & Akiko
Well kept room in a fantastic location
It was a great stay, convenient, clean and felt like a home away from home.

The location is perfect. Literally a 2-3 min walk to Times Sq.  There are so many local  restaurants nearby to fill anyone's appetite.  Must suggest, on 9th around the corner is Amy's Bakery, a must. 

The room was perfect. 2 beds that were  comfortable and a very large bathroom. I really didn't use the kitchen on the second floor but many others who stayed there did. 

 I never met the host, but really didn't need to. The  directions he sends to you gives you all the information needed to get into your room and he makes it very easy to get a hold of him through messaging. 

I'd stay again!  
And housekeeping was helpful and very nice!

Great clean quiet.
Perfect for low key guests like us. Thx we will be back.
Amazing location. A few blocks from Times Square, and so many restaurants and bars right on the  same street. The room was perfect for the stay, loved the set up.

The apartment is situated in a great part of Manhattan, literally close to everything by foot from Times Square to the Empire State Building and Central Park. There are also a lot of good restaurants and bars nearby that you can choose from, but at the same time the apartment is nice and quiet. Everything was very tidy and clean and all our neighbours were very friendly. I would highly recommend staying here, its a great value for money.
ﾀｲﾑｽﾞｽｸｴｱから徒歩わずかに5分という抜群の立地が大変便利でした｡ﾍﾞｯﾄﾞのきしみ音が気になりました｡ﾆｭｰﾖｰｸ滞在中の荷物置き場と寝る場所と割り切れば安くて良い選択肢だったと思います｡

Hermoso alojamiento, super recomendable. La habitacion y edificio tal cual las fotos. Con facilidades como la cocina indicada y un espacio para planchar. Muy cómodo las cerraduras con código. Excelente ubicación, a dos cuadras del time. Dejamos las valijas temprano y volvimos a las horas para tomar la habitación y ningún problema. Volvería sin pensarlo. Esta en una cuadra llena de bares .. muy lindo!
Het welkom kan echt beter. We hebben tijdens ons verblijf niemand gezien. De kamer leek op de foto gezelliger. De ruimte was verder prima in orde, heerlijke bedden!

Unbeatable location, but if you are looking for a home feeling residential like most airbnb listing, this is not. It's more like a motel/inn type apartment complex with about 10 rooms. There isn't much common area, mostly are hall ways with a small kitchen area and a very small table.

The host didn't response very promptly when we have questions.

For the same high price, I think I can find a hotel with more amenity in that similar location.

This find on Airbnb was an absolute gift. Yasu & Akiko were quick with their initial and ongoing communication when I began searching for a long weekend residence in NYC. Directions were fabulous and everything went very smooth. The room we stayed in slept 4 easily and was quaint, clean and quiet. The location was superb with everything you need right out the door. The public spaces we shared were also clean and very user friendly. I cannot recommend this place more highly. It is nothing 'fancy' per say and yet so inviting and economical. The woman who cleaned every day was also so helpful and kind.
The room is very clean and quite, not to mention the location! There's lot of great restaurant around and very convenient.
I really liked the place! It looks just like in the pictures. The whole building is neat and clean. The location is great. I couldn't connect to the WiFi but other than that I enjoyed my stay.

I would stay here again.  The stay went smoothly. Check in was easy, the rooms were quite large and decorated basically, the bathrooms were very good too. The neighbors were very quite.  We stayed on a Friday night. There seemed to be a lot of fun night life in the area, though we didn't partake. We could very dimly hear the street from the room until the bars closed, but this was not unexpected from low rise accommodations, and didn't cause any issue.  Communication was quick and detailed. Thanks much!

My sister and I had a very comfortable stay at Yasu & Akiko's.  The place was very clean and felt like a homely hotel.  We were pleasantly surprised by the quality of the beds (especially the mattresses), the huge steam shower, the generous supply of fresh towels, and the well-sized closet with plenty of hangers and a drawer cart for keeping our things neat and tidy.  As it was chilly when we were in NYC, being able to adjust the temperature of our own room was also a huge plus.  Another perk was that the apartment was on a street just lined with restaurants (we tried Dim Sum Palace and it did not disappoint), and around the corner was a cute cafe called Amy's Bread.  Getting to and from the place was easy via the subway - Yasu & Akiko provided very detailed directions, not to mention very thorough instructions regarding check-in/out and house rules.  They were also great in responding quickly to questions.  It was a short but such a comfortable stay for us, we wouldn't hesitate to book this place again and highly recommend it.

Couldn't have asked for a better location.  Two blocks from Times Square, right in the heart of Hell's Kitchen.  Lots of food and cafes close by as well as laundromats and drug stores if you need anything.  A safe neighbourhood.  Couple things to note: steep, narrow stairs to get in and there is a bar downstairs that you will hear all night.  It isn't as loud as you think it will be but nonetheless the noise is noticeable.  Hosts communicated well and it was perfect for our family of four.
Clean. Well located. Great communication.

The towels, shampoo, rinse and body gel were enough to use. Really clean and located on a nice location. I barely used metro. In addition to this, the thai restaurant in front of the house, bangkok house was awesome. Plz try.

Wonderfull place, to spend new year in times square.
3 or 2 minuts walking, many restaurants around the room, the loccattion is wonderfull. 
i highly recommended for people who want to be near times square,
room clean, it works perfectly,

Comfortable for four people. Convenient location - close to Time Square and Broadway, Port Authority Bus Terminal, and so many restaurant choices as described. Steep stairs that could be challenging for people with knee problems. Though we did not need them, there  were bike locks provided inside!

This place was perfect! Almost don't even want to review, so we can keep it our little secret for future stays! It felt like we had our very own apartment in NYC. There is a bar/club right next to the building, so the music could be heard a little at night (but it's nothing a white noise app can't drown out). It really wasn't a problem since we were usually so tired from our long day. Will definitely stay here again! Thanks so much!! :)
Very nice and clean place. Beds were comfortable and the kitchen was convenient. Very close to transportation and resturaunts. Price was a little more than I would like to have paid.

Yasu and Akiko's place was ideal for people who come to explore the city. The place was a few blocks away from Times Square and great restaurants. Right by their apartments are a bunch of small restaurants so it was really easy to find something quick to eat. Wifi was perfect. I would consider this place perfect for a handful of friends who plan on just sleeping there and running around the city.

The place was located at a convenient location. We mostly used Lyft/Uber/cab to get around, but if you preferred, the subway is at a walkable distance. The place is a walk-up, and the stairs can be a bit steep. But overall, the place was clean and quiet, and there are many restaurants nearby.
位置很棒!酒店式公寓清洁打扫都很专业,推荐!
This place was better than I expected. The room was very clean and the location was great because there are SO MANY choices for food every direction you go. It was a very comfortable stay.
酒店式公寓｡设施齐全｡卫生间的水流比较小,可能是为了降低成本｡客人们住二､三层,大概一共有十多间屋子｡有保洁员,见不到房主｡(现在的保洁员会说汉语,不知道以后的会不会｡)46街周边繁华,早晚不愁吃｡周边吃饭一定要问清价钱(MP餐),这几天被坑了好几次｡(特别点名街道对面的shokudo,日语:餐厅,名字起的很亲民,但是料理真的一般｡我牛肉饭12刀吃了个洋葱饭｡心疼)

This apartment is excel.lent, great location and super clean. I highly recommend it to everyone who wants to stay in Manhattan.
Overall great!
Super great place to stay in Hell's Kitchen. Close to everything. Highly recommend.
Stay here ! Location is great, and room is of the quality of a very nice hotel. Highly recommend.

Amazing location in a pretty quiet street near Times Square which is awesome. We had a room on the rear side of the building so we had quiet nights. Communication is seamless & everything is aligned with what you can see on the pictures

Great location in the Hell's Kitchen, Times Square, and Broadway area! There is so many food and drink options and the neighborhood is really hopping! That being said the rooms were great, clean, and quite.
The place is nice and convenient to the time square
一切都很棒 只有一个小缺点就是水压太差｡
Great location and very helpful hosts! Definitely will go back there!
Muy grata experiencia. Buena relación precio/Calidad. Volveria en la proxima visitar a NYC sin dudas.

Great location! Despite the fact that it is close to Time Square, the place was very quite!
The most seamless process for check-in and the host was great communicating things in detail! 
I will totally book this place again when I visit New York again!!
Posizione centrale!stanze grandi e pulite..siamo stati bene
I liked the location a lot! Its in the middle of Manhattan Midtown, but still its silent inside. They clean everyday and communication and check in was easy and well going. Thanks!
Great location and communication was fantastic!

I was hesitant at first as this was my first time using airbnb but was extremely satisfied with my stay. The apartment was very clean and the location was perfect- plenty of restaurants and bars to visit!

公寓的地段还算不错,毗邻hell kitchen和theatre district｡这就意味着附近任意一家A级评价的餐厅都值得一试｡虽然晚上会有点吵,但是纽约就是这样,我们都没有认为这是什么大问题｡走到时代广场和port authority bus terminal也基本都是10分钟以内的距离｡往上城方向去哥伦布环也只需步行15分钟左右｡因此,公寓的地段还是很方便的｡另外,公寓空调很舒服,也没有噪声｡
不足的是公寓的卫生还是有待改进,毛巾显得有些不干净｡另外还需要注意,厨房和冰箱是公用的｡如果你住在三楼的话,搬行李会非常耗费体力...
除此之外,公寓性价比还是不错的,适合2-3天短期居住｡
Buena ubicación y limpio
Convenient and quiet! Located super close to Times Square and lots of restaurants nearby. Communication was awesome with perfect details on the check in process.

Nuestra estadía fue muy confortable y todo era acorde lo planteado por Yasu & Akiko. La habitación para tres personas era amplia y la ubicación muy buena. La calle donde se encuentra el departamento tiene muchas opciones de restaurantes a buenos precios y accesibilidad al subte. Cerca del Times Square y la 5 av.

Yasu & Akiko's place in is such a convenient location. It is right by times square and there are so many places to eat and get drinks nearby! The room is nice and comes with a personal bathroom, towels, sheets, shampoo, conditioner, soap etc. There is also a futon which is nice if you have 3 people who don't want to share beds. If you have big bags, know that there are no elevators, so you will have to carry them up the stairs. The community kitchen only really has a stove. There are pots and stuff to cook with but if you want to reheat food, theres no microwave and there is no oven. Yasu and Akiko are great hosts and respond to messages quickly. It is a pretty good spot for the price and location.
Awesome location, very clean & cozy!
You will need to know there are no elevators. You have to walk up flights of stairs with your luggage. Rooms are very plain.... not good lighting.

The room Yasu & Akiko provided was great and the location was superb. Walking distance from tons of nightlife, restaurants, Time Square, Grand Central, and other desirable NYC Amenities. The bathroom was private and luxurious, and the room was comfortable and quiet. I was hesitant at first because of the shared common space, but this room truly felt like your own private NYC escape, right in the heart of the action. Will definitely look to stay here again in the future.

ABSOLUTELY AMAZING! I loved the location, very close to everything it was like being in the heart of the city. Easy accommodations and quick to responses! I recommend this location as I have already told friends and family about this location if they are ever in NYC! Me personally would love to stay here again the next time I’m in NYC if the opportunity presented itself. 5stars for sure.
Good experience

Great and clean place where it was so convenient and sufficient to go places. You should be willing to climb 2 stairs because there is no elevator. Aside all, the bathroom was super clean and water pressure of the shower was on point.
Very good and cheap place to stay in NY. Bedrooms very clean. Super recommend.

The location of the Air BnB was great! Very close to Times Square, the subway and a lot of great restaurants. The place was very clean and comfortable to stay in. The only issue we had was with kitchen utensils. There was quite a limited supply of utensils to cook with which made it difficult to cook our own meals. Otherwise we really enjoyed our stay here in New York!

There is a lot of activtives to do around Akiko's place, once you go outside you see places to eat or bars. It's amazing, if you are new to New York and want to explore a bit staying at Akiko's place is the way to go.
Great location and great price!   Clean and spacious! Nice hardwood floors and high ceilings. We'll definitely stay again!

This place is amazing! There are countless restaurants around so that it's really convenient for us to find something to eat after 20+ hours flight. (The location is perfect!) Our room is big and clean, and also very quiet at night. Although we have to carry our luggage up to the third floor, which is hard without an elevator, I would definitely choose this place to stay again in the future.

We love staying at Yasu & Akiko's place! Great location, great price. Walking distance to Times Square and tons of amenities. The room is comfortable and quiet though the apartment is in the heart of the city, the bathroom is super clean. The host gives us very detailed, helpful information before our arrival, and quick in replying our messages. The only thing you may notice is that there's no elevators, so be prepared if you have huge suitcases. Definitely book again!
You cannot find a more centrally located place for this kind of price. Walk to everything. Very responsive. Close to a lot of fun restaurants and bars, so a little noisy at night.
Amazing place and great area to be in
Awesome place for stay.!!!
Very nice place! Very convenient!
총쏘하는뉸이 ㅉㄱ인데 ㅊㅅ하때 저나 초온내리 씨꾸럽ㄱㅔ해서 아침마다 쯔아즁으호 자매스 깨눈 쭈아즁이 이뜸
Convenient location, but a bit noisy at night, with pubs around.
Beds are a little small. But an amazing place to stay

Yasu and Akiko's place is located on a terrific, lively block in Hell's Kitchen. Times Square and the Theater District are an easy stroll away.  The check in system was smooth and it was nice to be able to drop our bags off in the hallway before we checked in too. The room itself was clean and quiet. We'd happily stay here again!
Thanks!

Great location, very clean and easy to find. Right on Restaurant row and close to Times Square and the Theater District. Price is very good compared to larger hotels. Quiet neighborhood. Excellant choice and I'm glad I chose this airbnb. I highly recommend this property.
Great hosts and great location!! 10/10 would stay again
Excelent location, clean, fast to respond. Will recommend 100%
This place is perfectly located, clean, and comfortable.  It's exactly what we were looking for.  Bonus, the A/C is fantastic!
Great location, 15 min time all for medison square. The checking in process was super easy. Place was very clean. I would recommend this place and stay here again!

Muy buena ubicación , cerca de todo , silencioso en las noches , el baño impecable . 

recomendado 

Slds desde Chile

The location cannot be better. Walking distances to almost everything we needed. The room and public space are both clean. There’s a shared kitchen that’s convenient although there’s no mocrowave. The WIFI is slow though.

Like this place very much. Clean and locate in a very good location. However, if you are easily bothered by an ambient sound, this might not be a place for you. There is a bar and restaurant around which might get loud throughout the night.
Very good location

I highly recommend Yasu & Akiko as host. Although, I did not personally meet them, they made it so convenient. Great tips, walking distance to just about everything in and around Time Sqaure. The "Taste of Time Square" was right in our front door, absolutely loved it!! A refreshen atmosphere!!

Excelente ubicación. La habitación es cómoda y espaciosa. Muy buena cama y ducha. Súper recomendado para descansar luego de un día largo de pasear y caminar. Todos los días una persona vacía los tachos de basura y cambia las toallas. Gran detalle.
Great location and close to everything

This is a great location. Just a few minutes walk from Times Square and all Broadway theatres . It is also on the same block as one one of my favorite NYC theatre eateries—the famous “Joe Allen” restaurant. In addition this room had a private bath and a convenient shared kitchen downstairs. This is a find! I’ll be back.
Great place to stay, easy check-in and convenient location.
comfortable place, essential furniture, comfortable beds and not always perfect cleaning. great location and neighborhood full of fun clubs and restaurants

Wat een fantastisch verblijf! We kwamen rond 10:00 aan, ze waren toen net bezig met onze kamer schoonmaken. We mochten meteen onze bagage in de kamer zetten! De kamer was schoon, de bedden lagen fijn en de locatie is top. Op de dag van vertrek konden we onze bagage boven laten staan aan een fietsslot wat ook een goede oplossing was. Als ik terug ga naar NYC zou ik hier weer boeken!

Lo bueno: ubicación excelente, lugar limpio y ambiente agradable. 
Lo malo: Control inexistente del comportamiento de los huéspedes, tuvimos problemas con ruidos molestos. Pasamos un día entero sin agua caliente, nos bañamos con agua muy fría, lo solucionaron al día siguiente.
La cocina y la vajilla es tan limitada que casi no existe, no hay horno microonda (inexplicable), ni horno eléctrico, un vaso y dos tasas para 20 personas.
Luces del techo de la habitación quemadas y enchufe del TV sin energía (no pudimos usar el TV), se reclamó su reparación y no hubo respuesta.

great location and very clean rooms. located along restaurant row, close to Broadway and Times Square. Yasu and Akiko sent very clear instructions and the room was as advertised. highly recommended for those visiting NYC.

Ottima soluzione funzionale ad una vacanza a NYC, anche se non completamente indipendente (cucina in condivisione). Posizione eccellente a 5m REALI da Time Square e quindi da qualsiasi mezzo di trasporto. Sarebbe perfetta con la presenza di un vero e proprio armadio nell'appartamento.
This place was so convenient for my best friends and I. We felt safe and it wasn’t a far walk to anything, we would definitely stay here again!

Location is so good.
But the owner didn’t deal with a couple of problems.
Recommended. Super close to anything you will need.

The positive: The apartment is spacious with two beds and extremely clean.  The modern bathroom is beautiful. The whole house air condition is a plus.  The location is perfect to enjoy the Theatre District, Time Square, and sights of the city.  The street, where the property is located, is lined with different restaurants and bars, perfect to enjoy a variety of foods and entertainment.  The kitchen is very nice, with a clean large refrigerator,  especially great for leftovers.  Make sure that you bring your own coffee and mugs to enjoy the use of the coffee pot.
The not so positive: The entire unit needs more lighting,  both in the bedroom and the bathroom.  The beds are hard and lumpy,. There was hot water in the shower Thursday night, after letting it run for 5 minutes,  however, on Friday morning, the water never got hot and remained cold after 10 minutes of running.

Amazing accommodation walking distance to Times Square!!  Lovely inside Yasu and Akiko have provided everything you could want . Beautiful and spotlessly clean rooms . Excellent communication with hosts . After a long day of sightseeing this is the perfect place to retreat to . A real gem !
the description and the price are adequate, well located, our room was quiet. We never saw the owners, it is a sort of self serve.
this us the best airbnb I have stayed at in NYC .  location is great.  rooms are clean and you get a private bathroom.
Good location with close access to cafes and bars
Excelent host and amazing location
Yasu and Akiko's place 5 min away from Times sq. It was as we had expected.
Very clean. host were receptive and friendly. it's in a really good spot, and I really like that you can drop off your luggage before the check in time.
Truly so close to time square. Great location and access to restaurants. Would definitely stay here again just because of location and cleanliness.
Fantastic value!
Very close to Times Square, clean rooms, and ability to keep luggage on site before/after check in/out!

Great little apartment and very close to all the action.  We loved the neighborhood and all the restaurants/stores right around the corner.  There are several bars close by and while sleeping you can hear the music though out the night.  Not terribly, but it woke both my husband and I up each night.

Our accommodations were great!  Literally 2 blocks from Times Square and right on Restaurant Row, and the 50th St. Subway station was so convenient.  Couldn't ask for a better location.  The unit was so clean, and it was nice to have the common area kitchen and things like a hair dryer, iron, and more.  So easy to come & go with the keycodes on both the building and the room - no keys to keep up with.  The ability to lock up our luggage to enjoy our day after check-out was awesome - secured inside the building but outside the unit.  Worth every penny of our stay and we will definitely be back.

Yasu and Akiko provided us with a great Airbnb experience. It was set up very similar to a hotel (shared kitchen with multiple different rooms in the building). Our room had our own bathroom, beds, and a closet in the hall that provided linens, towels, etc.. it had security cameras throughout the premises is and key codes to get in the building and our personal rooms. It is a very quiet area, it was so close to Times Square, and it provided us with a great first experience in New York. If you are looking for a laid back experience, this is a great place to sleep. Thanks for giving us a a great experience!
The place was in a great location and was an awesome value!

While it is not very large, three adults and one child stayed comfortably here.  The location is fantastic!!  There is a subway station nearby but Times Square, Rockefeller Center, Chelsea Market, and plenty of restaurants and activities are all within walking distance.  The host was on-site and very accommodating.  Enough linens and basic toiletries were provided for us all and the unit was very clean.  This rental was much more than we expected and we highly recommend it!
Gemütlich. Sauber. Alles wie in der Beschreibung beschrieben. Top
Highly recommend this place! Great location and like staying at a hotel
Very clean and great location
I expected much better and clean than what we received.very noisy throughout the night.    I think there is disco around the area not clean too many steps

Place is clean, quiet, comfortable!

Fantastic location, everything is within walking distance!

Has a classic NYC walk-up iron gate and stone stairs. Check-in is super simple and they even provide an area to drop your bags (with locks) if you arrive before the 3pm check-in.

A few minutes walk from restaurants, bars, pharmacies, Times Square, clothing stores. There are some great live music bars literally next door (and I couldn't hear them from my room!) and the street is well-lit in the evening. 24hr parking is available a few blocks away. For your own reference, the parking company charged me $48 USD for one 24 hour period in January of 2019, but the prices could change at their discretion, obviously.

I really enjoyed my stay, and I would definitely recommend this place!!

Yasu & Akiko’s place is just like its description. I’m amazed by how clean it is. I saw my bedsheet being changed before moving in and the floor was super clean that I feel comfortable to walk around to room barefoot. Even though I didn’t get to see the host, both check-in and check out process were easy. This location is perfect for a two-night stay.
房子位置很好,是公寓改建的宾馆｡有毛巾跟独立卫生间,很棒｡

Really nice flat and very well located... 5 minuts from time sqare and nice little restaurant in the street! We had a great time and the room was clean, nice and warm 
I recommend this place
Definitely recommend this place!
great location, safe to walk even at 3am
The experience was amazing! They were very kind and check in was easy. Location is fantastic.

name: Generous 75 sqm full of Art
summary: in perfect location to explore both the modern and ancient Istanbul! Great connection to Metro, Tram, major pedestrian street (3 min walk) but still very calm and tucked away, protected from the 'Istanbul chaos' on the streets.
space: Hi, my name is Jonas, an architect living in Istanbul for a bit more than three years now and I would like to offer you my house, so you can discover this interesting city on your own. The apartment is a nicely renovated and furnished with a very warm atmosphere through its historic structure, all the wood and bricks and not least the small individually designed details.  There is a master bedroom with a king size bed and a small balcony, a marble bathroom with large rain shower and a small kitchen, but the heart is its large, cozy living room, that can be joined in the day time and be separated with sliding doors and the sofa turns into a very comfortable double bed. The dining room offers comfy seating a  a large table that can easily hold up to 8 people. But I think the pictures speak for themselves.
description: in perfect location to explore both the modern and ancient Istanbul! Great connection to Metro, Tram, major pedestrian street (3 min walk) but still very calm and tucked away, protected from the 'Istanbul chaos' on the streets. Hi, my name is Jonas, an architect living in Istanbul for a bit more than three years now and I would like to offer you my house, so you can discover this interesting city on your own. The apartment is a nicely renovated and furnished with a very warm atmosphere through its historic structure, all the wood and bricks and not least the small individually designed details.  There is a master bedroom with a king size bed and a small balcony, a marble bathroom with large rain shower and a small kitchen, but the heart is its large, cozy living room, that can be joined in the day time and be separated with sliding doors and the sofa turns into a very comfortable double bed. The dining room offers comfy seating a  a large table that can easily hold up to 8 people. But
neighborhood_overview: The flat is located in Beyoglu - the cultural, musical and artistic center of the city. You can enjoy nice food in restaurants with a breathtaking view, overlooking the Bosporus, go out to the various bars or just stroll up the vibrant Istiklal Caddesi.
notes: If there is anything that you would like to know about, please ask!
transit: It takes you 5 minutes to the Sishane Metro Station and the Tophane Tram Stop. From there you can get straight to the historic peninsula and sense the ottoman and byzantine Istanbul, with Hagia Sofia, the Blue Mosque, the Cisterns and the Grand Bazar, of course – to name just a few. The ferry station is in a 10 minute walking distance, so your trip to the Asian side of Istanbul is just a hop away. Galata is just in front of the door step, with all its small galleries and designer shops and Karaköy is just a stone's throw away from the apartment, inviting with all it's hip cafes, bars restaurants. Or enjoy the modern Istanbul in the Asmalimascit/Tünel district with all its bars, pubs, clubs, restaurants, with crowded streets and music everywhere (also less than 5 minutes walking)  But, don't worry - the apartment’s street is really quiet and peaceful.
access: The house is fully equipped: TV, WiFi, laundry machine, tumble dryer, dish washer, stove and oven, kettle, toast machine and a nice big fridge. There is Central heating, warm water 24/7 and Air Conditioning and ceiling fans help in the hot Istanbul summer to keep the place cool and comfortable.  Of course I will provide you the linen and towels. And if you have any special requests, just let me know.
interaction: Furthermore, I can also organize an airport pick up service for you, that brings you straight to the apartment, if you wish so. If you're interested I can arrange yoga classes, massages or hamam visits for you. Just let me know!
house_rules: Common sense.  I believe that all my guests treat my place as it was their own.  That worked so far for me!

host.host_about:
I'm a German architect, living in Istanbul for over seven years now.

I want to share my apartment with you, as a great opportunity for you to see the city from a different perspective, other than staying in a hotel. 
Apart from sharing my home (which will be totally yours for your stay) I am happy to share my favorite places - where to eat or to drink cay, where you get the nicest views or you can go dancing -  and many other secrets, that Istanbul has to offer ...

reviews.comments: This has been my best airbnb experience so far in Istanbul! Jonas is a super and marvellous host! He helped me move from my previous apartment and also helped me with my luggage! The apartment is superb! Lovelier than the pics!! There is gorgeous artwork in the apartment and is beautifully decorated. The apartment is fully equipped with things that you need! The area is great! It is in a quiet street yet 5 minutes walking distance to Istiklal street the most happening place! I would highly recommend the apartment! I had no problems at all! It is really lovely!!

Super stylish, amazingly helpful...
The flat is as good if not better than the pictures, very luxurious, thoughtfully set up with top notch appliances, amazing bathroom, books etc. Jonas (who designed the place) was unbelievably  friendly and helpful, he organised airport transfers, gave us maps for local bars and restaurants and even helped with a bizarre shopping request - sorry Jonas!!
The area is the best in Istanbul for both tourist sites, and cool places to go out, soho house, junk shops, museum of innocence are all five minute walks. We loved it, and will be back!

Jonas war ein toller und sympathischer  Gastgeber und hat all unsere Wünsche und Fragen sofort erfüllt. Wir sind zu dritt angereist und haben uns bei Jonas sehr wohl gefühlt.  Das Apartment hat genau unseren Vorstellungen entsprochen, es ist perfekt ausgestattet, war sehr sauber und hat wirklich alles was man braucht. Es liegt in einer ruhigen Seitenstraße in perfekter Zentrumslage, die Einkaufsstrasse, die zum Taksimplatz führt, ist in einer Minute zu erreichen, ebenso tolle Restaurants und Bars in der Nähe. Eine große Hilfe waren auch die Maps und Tipps von Jonas. Wir kommen gerne wieder!

The stay at Jonas' flat was absolutely incredible. We felt hat home. Jonas is very kind and forward thinking. If there were 6 stars, I would rate this location with it. Top selling points are the interior design, the hosting and the location! Would always come back, if it is not booked out.

Der Aufenthalt in Jonas' Wohnung war großartig! Er denkt mit als Host und hat alles großartig geregelt! Kommunikation war einwandfrei. Die Wohnung ist sehr schön eingerichtet und wir haben uns zuhause gefühlt. Wenn es 6 Sterne gäbe, würde ich sie auf jeden Fall geben!

Jonas was an excellent host and personally did all to make our stay in Istambul comfortable. The location of the apartment is excellent and allows for a easy lifestyle to enjoy Istambul with style !  Just be aware that apartment is in on the 4th floor and no elevator as for most apartments in the old city so if you have heavy bags be prepared to carry them up, even though Jonas personally helped us so it's not a big deal.

Host: Jonas was highly communicative and responsive from my very first correspondence. We very much appreciated the warm welcome although our flight was delayed. 

Accommodation: It was definitely one of the most unique apartments I have ever stayed at. You will truly feel like living an architect's pad. We could see every design detail that Jonas put into place, from the power outlets to the wall arts. The apartment was spacious, clean, safe, private and well equipped. Both bed and sofa bed were very comfortable. Oh, the bathroom is truly equipped with five star hotel facilities as written in the description. We also loved the marble staircase. 

Location: Unbeatable! We were walking distance from some of the most restaurants in Istanbul such as 360 Bar, Yeni Lokanta, Cecconi's, Leb-I-Derya, and Mikla etc. The apartment is steps away from the most popular pedestrian street in Istanbul, in the heart of the hip Beyoglu neighborhood where you will find Istanbul Modern museum (loved it there), Galata Tower, and a very well known Hamam called Kilic Ali Pasa Hamani, all of which are walkable from the apartment. To visit the historical Istanbul for Blue Mosque, Topkapi Palace, and world famous Hagia Sophia, the tram is just down the hill from the apartment. But we walked everywhere! 

Thank you Jonas. We really enjoyed Istanbul part of it thanks to having a comfortable and cozy place to rest.

My experience with my temporary home in Istanbul is reminiscent of one fortuitous occasion on which I was accidentally allotted a first class seat on an international flight.  The accommodations were luxurious; the ambience a careful balance between stimulating and restful, the service superior in both attentiveness and cordiality; I had no trouble acclimating.  I like nice things.

I arrived on a Friday evening and after he gave directions in Turkish to my taxi driver over the phone, Jonas, the gracious host-turned-bellhop, pulled my generously portioned luggage out of my taxi, hauled it up the stairs for me, and showed me into a beautifully refinished apartment. . . with a plethora of snacks.  Regrettably, I ate all of them, and for that I do not thank him, but there was a degree of thoughtfulness in this welcoming which may or may not be demonstrated by one's own family upon homecoming so I believe it merits recognition.

The digs: significantly more spacious than expected (or needed, but I'm not one to complain about such things), brick covered walls, hardwood floors, brand new appliances, full length gold framed mirror in the ample bedroom evoking a Victorian-era level of refinement . . .  in summary, Jonas should be charging more.  But I will stop here.

I lied.  One more note.  The bathroom.  I grew up with three brothers who pounded on the door if I had the audacity to take more than 23 seconds in our small bathroom which they never cleaned.  So now, as previously mentioned, I like nice things, including a nice bathroom; I like to have coffee when doing my makeup in the mirror in the morning and red wine in front of said mirror when getting ready to go out at night, and this is the bathroom for such things.  It is a marble/glass/stainless steel oasis equipped with a well lit vanity mirror, removable shower head, and high powered hairdryer (#basic but these things do matter; hostel hair dryers do not cut it and even some nice hotel hair dryers will keep you drying for days.)

Now that we've covered the critical points and know my hair looked good for my entire trip, I should say a few words about Istanbul.  Hearing the call to prayer throughout the day and seeing the mosques dotting the skyline makes it quite the surreal city.  Though as exotic as it was, I actually felt quite at home rather quickly.  Everyone was respectful and friendly towards me, I was able to walk everywhere I wanted to go, and consequently I found it easy to slip into life here.  Jonas gallantly offered to escort me to and from the apartment at night should I ever feel uncomfortable, but I never needed to take him up on the offer.  I have traveled all over Europe and this was the safest I have ever felt in any neighborhood I've stayed in.

In case it was not clear, I will be back.
The apartment is lovely.  Absolutely no problems during the stay.  Both Jonas as a host and his apartment are recommended.

Jonas has a beautiful apartment which is located just off the busy and vibrant Istiklal street. It is a short walking distance to tramlines and major tourist destinations. Jonas left us some useful maps and restaurant suggestions. Istanbul is a wonderful city and Jonas is an excellent host! Highly recommended.

Really nice flat and host. Jonas flat is nearby vibrant streets of Istanbul but located in a quiet small street. Everything you need is available in this very well design and furnished apartment, I would definitely come back. Thanks Jonas.

The place is an excellent spot, in central Istanbul on the European side, and closer to all key historic locations and transport hubs. It was clean, pleasantly decorated, and accurately described in the photographs. Jonas is an excellent host, and was available immediately whenever we needed him. I will highly recommend this place for both, short- and long-term stays.

Sehr angenehmer und hilfsbereiter Gastgeber. Die Wohnung ist in einem sehr stillvollen ambiente eingerichtet und in einem gepflegten Zustand. Ob zu Fuss oder mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln sind alle möglichkeiten zum Bummeln und abschalten gegeben. Die Nachbarn in der Strasse sind sehr hilfsbereit und entgegen kommend. Die Einkaufsmeile Istiklal ist in 5-7 Minuten zu Fuss auch mit Kindern sehr gut erreichbar. 5 Sterne an Jonas, er hat uns 4Tage vor Reisebeginn die Wohnung in einem sehr sauberen Zustand übergeben. Wir persönlich, würden jeden die Wohnung und aufjedenfall den Gastgeber empfehlen. Einfach nur Traumhaft die Wohnung und die Gegebenheiten.

My stay here was amazing. The location of the apartment couldn't be any better - within walking distance to a lot of the attractions. The apartment was well decorated and we loved spending our afternoons just relaxing at "home".

Jonas was very nice and helpful. He was always available and quick to respond.

Jonas was very nice for he kindly agreed to host us even though our timing was far from the best. 

Answers fast, open and flexible. 

The place was as it is on pictures. 
Mind that Istanbul’s Most popular street is right around the corner and the location is loaded with dwellers.

Jonas was firstly very accomodating as we needed a place to stay in Istanbul last minute. The flat itself is beautiful, and fantastic location. Lovely neighbourhood to experience the small hilly streets of Istanbul and also close to many other interesting neighbourhoods. Would recommend and stay here again.

The apartment is spacy and located in a convenient spot—close to a variety of public transportation such as the tram, metro and ferry. We stayed here for a month and were overall satisfied with our stay. We had to get a few things for the kitchen (like a pot to make pasta, a sieve, etc.) since we wanted to cook at least a few days a week. This wasn’t really a problem. The main issue was that the fan in the TV room wasn’t working when we arrived and the last 10 days of our stay it got pretty hot in Istanbul. I asked about fans/air conditioner before we booked the place specifically, because my husband has low tolerance for heat, so we were disappointed to find out that the fan was not working (all other fans and the air conditioner in the bedroom worked well). We were watching the World Cup, so we spent quite a bit of time in that room. Jonas was already aware of the problem when I brought it up with him and told us that there was an issue with its engine and that he bought the fans from France and couldn’t find a matching model in Turkey to replace the broken one. He offered to send one from France, but of course the chances of the fan making it to Turkey before we left was very low. We were expecting a more immediate solution—such as an inexpensive portable fan from a local store perhaps? Luckily, I have family living in Istanbul, so we borrowed a portable fan from my sister; otherwise we wouldn’t be able to use that room very much. Jonas was prompt in his replies when we had questions and he let us stay an extra night without charging us.
Great place.  Very nicely finished. Everything worked well.  Cozy and stylish. Great to come home to after walking Around. Great area to walk. Cafes and art.  Never used a car. Recommend it.

Jonas has a beautiful apartment. It is situated at the best spot if you want to discover Istanbul. The metro is very close by so you can go anywhere you want. ( 1 hour from the airport with the metro) Just a 20 min walk takes you to the old city. 
Apartment is decorated very stylish, and you feel at home immediately.  There are little shops close by if you want to buy groceries but lots of restaurants and bars around if you want to go out to a different place every night.
Jonas, although he was not in Turkey, responded quickly to my messages.
Do bring ear plugs if you are a light sleeper, cause there is some noice from the street in the morning.

A wonderful place to stay in Istanbul. Perfect location, in the lively  and very well comunicated neighborhood of Beyoglu.  Super well located to catch tram and metro to the touristic musts but at the same time authentic. Other neigborhoods like Taksim and Cukurcuma /Cihangir are close enough and walking is just as easy. The flat is as stylish as you can see in the pictures and it´s in perfect condition. I would recommend it without any doubt.
