Esperemos que gostem!
Sejam bem-vindos!

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
We've been the first guests to stay in this lovely apartment in Porto and I only have good things to say about it! Everything was new, there was everything necessary and it had been decorated in very good taste. Cristina was kind enough to accept our reservation one day before, she was very nice during the check in, even though she only spoke Portuguese and we did speak Spanish we could understand each other perfectly. It is located nearby the city center, Aliados was a 10 min walk away, going back wasn't so easy though, let's say that Porto is not a very flat city haha

A big plus was the bakery downstairs, we're big fans of the pastel de nata and the ones they had were amazing!

We had a wonderful family trip to Porto. The city is very live, with beautiful sights, wonderful restaurants, and many things to do. We enjoyed staying at Cristina's apartment because its very cozy, full of warmth, and with all the spaces we needed. It has a full equipped kitchen where we could have breakfast every morning, and besides there is a bakery downstairs on the same street and grocery stores. There is also a metro station nearby, but you can get to places of interest in a 10 minute walk.  Cristina was very kind and helpful, a very good hostess. I highly recommend staying at her apartment.

We had a wonderful stay!! Cristina and her husband were great hosts! The apartment is clean, comfortable and newly furnished. The building is a 3rd floor apartment with no elevator. Everything is as described. We were able to walk everywhere! Just beware Porto's hills on your way back home!;-) Close to bakery, grocery store, restaurants..... Restaurant with 5 euro menu just down the road with great food!
There are some toys for kids and Cristina also let us use a great stroller for our baby. Free wifi too!

We got in much later than  expected but Cristina and her son were waiting for us with a smile on their faces and helped us with our luggage! 

Would go back again! Thank you so much!
Loved Porto!

Ola
Nous terminons notre séjour par 3 jours à Lisbonne. 
Merci de votre accueil

Hola a todos, nuestra experiencia ha sido buena en general.  El lugar está bien situado y sin problemas de estacionamiento, el apartamento bien también acogedor...aunque si tengo que ponerle un pero sería a los colchones que estaban algo incómodos. Con respecto a los (Website hidden by Airbnb) han portado de maravilla, cualquier incidencia  la han resuelto  rápidamente.  Eso habla mucho de las personas.

My friends and I had a great time in Porto. We enjoyed and had so much fun there. We want to say many thanks to Cristina for hosting us in her nice and cozy apartment. The flat was in a really good location, very close to the main streets, so we could go on foot sometimes. Cristina was kind and helpful with us, always answering our questions about the city. We highly recommend her flat to other people who want to discover Porto.

Un lugar muuuuy bonito y cuidadosamente decorado. Casa cómoda y Cristina y Luis son súper agradables. Nos han ayudado mucho.
Una muy buena opción en Oporto. Recomiendo.
Gracias por todo.

Cristina is a very nice and a very energic woman! The appartment is like in the description, cosy, comfortable, stilish and clean. It was at twenty minutes walking from the city center. We had a really good experience in Porto!

Considerably quiet apartment at a manageable walk from the city center, the apartment may look small at first but our company of six managed to fit in just nice. Our host was very lovely and she had probably the largest collection of framed motivational posters I have seen :) And the espresso maker they have was the best model I have ever seen, got our morning fix in 3 minutes :)
Cristina is a wonderful host! her apartments are great! comfortable, beautiful and there is everything you need) Thank you  again. dear Cristina!

S ubytováním jsme byli velmi spokojeni a překvapeni jeho vybaveností.  Velkou výhodou je poloha blízko centra, takže je vše dostupné pěšky. Pár kroků od bytu je výborná pekárna a naproti charismatická kavárna.
Majitelka je velmi vstřícná a sympatická. Můžeme doporučit všem kteří si chtějí užít Porto ve dne i v noci.
A Cristina e marido foram simpácticos, uma boa comunicação antes e durante a estadia e o apartamento bem localizado e bom para famílias.

Schöne größe wohnung in unmittelbarer nähe der altstadt. Die wohnung ist sehr schon und cristina hat uns nett empfangen 
Die wohnung ist sehr zum empfehlen!!

Nos alojamos 4 días en el Lulapartament. El piso coincide perfectamente con el anuncio, es muy bonito y acogedor. Tiene todo lo indispensable para la estancia. El primer día llegamos tarde pero Cristina y su familia nos esperaron igualmente y nos explicaron el piso y los transportes cercanos. Además estuvieron atentos durante toda la estancia. El piso se encuentra bien situado dado que se puede ir andando a mucho lugares cercanos. Está bien comunicado con los transportes públicos y se puede llegar fácilmente desde el aeropuerto. Nos hemos encontrado muy bien y si volvemos a Oporto repetiríamos.

Le logement correspondait aux photos vues sur le site Airbnb.
L'appartement était propre, agréable.
L'accueil du propriétaire a été sympathique malgré l'heure tardive d'arrivée.

Pasamos 2 noches en un viaje familiar para conocer Oporto y la elección del apartamento de Cristina fue muy acertada,está perfectamente ubicado para ir al centro andando o en transporte. Pero lo mas importante ha sido el trato recibido por los anfitriones ,realmente te hacen sentir como si estuvieras en tu casa, gente maravillosa,muy atentos y agradables ,apartamento muy limpito y sin faltar detalle de nada, con una decoración muy moderna y hogareña, repetiríamos sin dudarlo. Muchas gracias por todo Cristina !!!!!

Llegar hasta el apartamento fue un poco complicado, aunque Cristina siempre estuvo pendiente de todo. La casa estaba bien situada y comunicada. El problema es que es un tercero sinascensor. Los anfitriones estuvieron en todo momento pendientes de nuestras peticiones

Cristina havde stillet kiks, mælk og (Hidden by Airbnb) frem til børnene, da vi kom sent om aftenen. I det hele taget var den meget børnevenlig, med klapvogn, børneseng og legetøj (til børn under 4 år)Lejligheden var ren og indbydende. Den er meget skandinavisk indrettet, der er masser af naturligt lys, god plads, to altaner og flere døre der kan åbnes ud til vejen. Og så er der dyner!!! På den største altan er der eftermiddags/aftensol, hvilket var fantastisk da vi var der i oktober.
Vores vært - Cristina - var fantastisk. selv om vi aldrig nåede at møde hende, hjalp hun os utallige gange. Vi behøvede bare at ringe eller skrive til hende, så havde vi svar næsten med det samme. Der er masser af små hyggelige og lokale butikker og restauranter - bade på vejen og i området. Der ligger et godt privathospital nede af vejen, som er godt og effektivt. Busforbindelsen til centrum er god og let at bruge. Det tager omkring 15 min at gå ind til centrum. (lejligheden ligger i periferien af centrum). Alt i alt kan bade værtskab og lejligheden anbefales!!

This apartment was lovely as explained in the article and shown in the pictures. Everything you needed for a stay in porto was there :) it is really good located - also for party people, who like to walk to the city center, it is a safe location, stores of daily life are right around the corner and a cosy breakfast place right above. Cristina is a lovely person, super friendly, helpful and everything went smoothly. Porto for a short weekend trip in this apartment: really recommendable. we loved it <3
Impeccable. The apartment is decorated with taste and human warmth and is spotless. It is extremely well furnished and welcoming. We all loved it. Thank you, Cristina!
Agréable séjour ! Accueil très sympathique ! Appartement fonctionnel beaucoup de choses à disposition .

El apartamento es muy acogedor, es cómodo y está bien arreglado. No queda en el centro, pero sí es bastante cerca, 10-12 minutos a pir. Cristina fue muy amable. Sin dudas recomendaría a esta anfitriona. Muchas gracias!

Cristina é uma excelente pessoas e sempre se mostrou muito solícita para nos ajudar durante todo o período pré reserva e durante a estadia.
O apartamento é excelente, as camas são ótimas e uma boa localização.
Quando retornar a Porto, com certeza ficarei novamente nesse apartamento.

I didn't meet Christina personally as her husband Luis welcomed us. He was really nice and showed us the appartment. We arrived early and they were so kind that we could check in.
Before arriving and during our stay Christina kept in contact and was very helpful with any questions we had. And she helped us with getting an early morning transport to the airport.
The appartment was great. It was just as on the pictures. We were with the 6 of us and we all enjoyed our stay at the appartment. 
I can really recommend staying at Lulapartment

My friends and I all really enjoyed our stay at Cristina's place. It was quick and easy to communicate with her and her husband, who was very welcoming. Cristina's apartment is a great location in Porto, with easy transport links to all the sights. I would recommend anyone to stay here, no matter if you are alone or in a group!
A Cristina mostrou-se disponível e a casa estava muito bem situada para ver o Porto e o que tem para oferecer.

Una casa muy acogedora, todo limpio y en muy buen estado. La recomiendo a todo el que busque un apartamento en Oporto para grupo numeroso como el nuestro ya que tiene 3 habitaciones amplias y un buen sofá cama. La ubicación es buena, un  sitio tranquilo, el centro de la ciudad está a unos 15/20 min andando.

O apartamento de Cristina é ótimo! Muito confortável e bem equipado. Nós éramos um grupo de 5 amigos e ficamos muito satisfeitos com tudo! A comunicação com ela também foi ótima. Assim que chegamos houve um probleminha com o chuveiro, mandei uma mensagem via Airbnb para ela e ela logo me ligou para solucionar o problema. Nos ajudou com números de taxi, que precisaríamos no dia que fossemos sair do apartamento para o aeroporto. Recomendo o apartamento de Cristina com toda a certeza e voltaria a ficar hospedado lá numa próxima visita a Porto. Muito obrigado, Cristina, por sua hospitalidade.

The house is wonderful and Cristina and his husband help us a lot. 
Answer all my questions and help us call the taxi. The apartment is perfect for friends~
房东好热情人又好 去的时候还在打扫卫生 房子也不错

We had a great time at Cristina's apartment with my family. It is very cozy and nice. Cristina provided us with everything that is needed for kids, even the toys! Apartment is well located, about 15 min from the very city centre. Good value for money.I worried about how warm it would be to stay in winter, but Cristina provided us with 3 heaters as well, so regardless the big windows with a nice view it was warm and comfortable as well.

L'apartament de na Cristina és molt comfortable, pràctic, net y ben decorat.
La ubicació és bastant céntrica, es pot baixar perfectament caminant al Centre però per tornar, per evitar la pujada, val la pena agafar el metro.
Els llits i el mobiliari en general son còmodes y l'apartament està molt ben provist de menage de cuina.
Cristina ha estat en tot molt amable, i el darrer dia ens ha deixat estar fins tard a l'apartament. Sort perque plovia molt per anar a pasejar. Gracies Cristina, una estada molt bona a Oporto.
Us recomanem esmorçar a la confiteria del costat és perfecta i dos restaurants a la vora per sopar, Paraíso i Chamiço (el pop i el bacallà son inoblidables).

Éramos três estudantes e ficamos no apartamento por 3 semanas. Fomos muito bem recebidas pela Cristina e o marido. Foram muito atenciosos em todos os momentos, se deixando à disposição para tudo. Tivemos alguns pequenos problemas estruturais no imóvel no início, que foram resolvidos de imediato. Além disso, nos deram suporte e dicas referentes à transporte e toda a estrutura no entorno. Fomos realmente muito bem recebidas. 
O apartamento é confortável e tem muita estrutura. A localização é boa e pudemos ir para muitos lugares à pé. O metrô é perto mas para pegar ônibus é um pouco mais complicado. Nada grave para quem está de férias, porque o metrô leva para todos os lugares, não há necesssidade de ônibus. No nosso caso isso foi um pouco chato porque nossa faculdade era um pouco longe e as aulas eram cedo, então usamos muito taxi e uber (há um ponto de taxi perto do apartamento). 
Não tivemos nenhuma surpresa desagradável, anfitiões muito recomendados!

the owners are very friendly and helpful. It was very kind of Cristina to offer us Porto's special taste when we checked in. there were also some city maps and guides waiting for us. the flat is cosy and clean.

Arrived in Porto and went straight to the apartment. Cristina came and met us even though check in was later. In the apartment were lovely traditional pastries welcoming us. Great apartment. Lots of room and bedding. Thoroughly recommend. Thank you for  letting us stay in you place.

Estivemos moi ben en Lulapartment,  limpo, acolledor, e a dez minutos andando do centro da cidade.O barrio, moi agradable, con moito encanto. Ter o metro tan cerca tamén foi unha avantaxe, principalmente nos días de chuvia. Ficamos moi contentos da nosa estadía, e se voltamos, repetiremos!

Cristina was a fabulous host! She greeted us at the apartment and showed us around. She even left us a plate of traditional Portuguese nata tarts. The apartment is well located with a nice bakery nearby, walkable to downtown but with a taxi stand down the hill for when you choose not to walk. After several days of constant rain, the roof to the building leaked and water came into the apartment - Cristina responded to our e-mail within minutes by coming to the apartment to make sure we were ok and to do everything she could to fix the situation. We found the apartment to be comfortable and cozy!

Appartement bien pratique pour une famille de 6, lumineux et agréable.
Accueil sympathique malgré notre arrivée très tardive: le mari de Cristina était là avec une autre personne qui parlait français. 
Nous avons passé un très bon séjour sous le soleil de porto

The appartment is very cozy, the rooms were clean, about 10 minutes walk to the historical center. We took metro from Porto airport to Faria Guimarães, not far from the appartment by walk. Cristina was very friendly well come us and promptly gave us all the information we need. We love this appartment.

L'appartement de Cristina est comme sur les photos. Il est bien agencé et décoré avec goût :-) Elle nous a accueillis avec toute sa bonne humeur et sa gentillesse . Nous avons passé un séjour super à porto et avons quasiment tout fait à pied, étant donné que l'appartement est  bien situé  (à côté de l'église Lapa, 10-15 minutes de l'extra centre) . Le métro est tout proche également . Merci Cristina, à une autre fois pourquoi pas :-)
Good and quick communication with Cristina. Beautiful apartment with lots of detail. We had some remark but we were the first guest so that’s normal and I'm sure she will fix it.
Gostámos muito, casa muito central, simpática, bem equipada e bem decorada.

Recepção 5 estrelas por parte dos anfitriões, sempre disponíveis para retirar qq dúvida e sem serem indelicados ou intrusivos.
Mais uma nota 5 estrelas para a localização da casa.
Qt à casa em si, não era uma pent house, mas é muito prática e agradável com espaço q.b., em linha com o preço praticado.
Resumindo e concluindo, qd voltar ao Porto, irei verificar sempre a disponibilidade do Lulapartment.

Le Mari de Christina nous a accueilli avec gentillesse(il nous attendait sous une  pluie battante).
ils nous répondaient rapidement et de bons conseils à nos questions par messages.
L' appartement est égal aux photos et bien centré. La boulangerie aux pieds de l immeuble vaut vraiment le détour.
Nous gardons l' adresse en tête!
Nous regrettons seulement de ne pas avoir vu Christina.
Sim, foi tudo maravilhoso!!! Localização muito boa, perto de tudo.
The apartment was great, it was big enough for 5 of us and it had everything we needed. It was 15 minutes walking to the town center.
Super séjour à Porto grace à cet appartement bien situé et très agréable ! Cristina a été à nos petits soins pendant tout notre séjour !!!

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour chez Cristina avec nos 4 enfants. Son accueil a été très chaleureux.
L'appartement est situé sur les hauteurs de la ville, proche du métro et des bus. Nous avons bien profité de la boulangerie toute proche : orange pressées et natas tous les matins!
L'appartement est très lumineux et décoré avec soin. Toutefois en période fraîche ou humide, il y fait assez froid. Luis, le mari de Cristina nous a gentiment dépanné d'un radiateur bain d'huile. Cristina est très attentive à ses hôtes. Nous garderons un joli souvenir de ce séjour.

Bonito y cómodo apartamento, aunque en las fotos parece algo más grande. Situado en un barrio tranquilo a 15 minutos andando del centro. En general la experiencia ha sido muy satisfactoria y la comunicación con Cristina muy fácil y rápida.

Nous sommes venus avec nos 4 enfants de 14 ans à.....16 mois !
Accueil formidable, Cristina est à l'écoute et aux petits soins, merci encore !
Appartement grand et superbe, dans quartier calme et métro à proximité  ! Christina est quelqu'un de très sympathique qui a su nous rendre service !

Accueil chaleureux de Cristina. L'appartement est fidèle aux photos. Il se trouve à proximité du centre ville (15 min à pieds) et permet de découvrir Porto sans difficulté. Commerces à proximité avec notamment une excellente boulangerie en bas du logement.
Petit bémol cependant, la nuit les bruits de la rue sont très présents...
Very nice flat, has all you need ,located in walking distance to city center,  it was a little bit cold in the flat, so several heaters would be highly appreciated.

Cristina is a lovely host very kind and flexible. Her apartment is very great, it's a very nice place to stay with friends in Porto ! 
Thank you for everything, we enjoyed our stay :)
Merci Christina pour votre accueil. Tout était parfait !

Great spacious apartment within walking distance to the centre and the tube stations (from Lapa station that was like 10minutes walking you can get to the seaside or the airport as well as designers outlet if anybody is up for shopping :)) 
Cristina was very nice and welcoming and apart from a few little things I can't think of any bad points.

Cristina was at the house waiting for us at the arranged time, gave all the necessary indications on how to reach the apartment (very near to historical center 5/7eur taxi ride away) and was very friendly welcoming us! The apartment isn't very big (namely the living room) and there is only one bathroom but it is anyway perfectly adequate for a few days, it has two small balconies with lots of sun and was very nicely decorated, very clean and tidy. Completely furnished including kitchenware, practical furniture and comfortable beds. I would definitely stay again with Cristina!
Cristina is a very friendly and nice host, the place is very clean and has enough space for 8 people, location is great.
We were a group of 8 and our stay was very satisfying. We had a great time together.

Cristina's house is really nice. We had a really good moment!

thank you for everything Cristina!

David.

We enjoyed our stay at Lulapartment. Cristina is very helpful and communicates well. The apartment is just as fresh and clean as the photos. The kitchen is well stocked with equipment to cook and there is a grocery store near by. It's in a busy part of town, so bring ear plugs if you are a light sleeper. It's definitely a feel good apartment!

Un relationnel remarquable, un appartement bien localisé, très propre et spacieux, conforme en tous points à la description. Que demander de plus !

Great apartment located near the subway, very clean and spacious, exactly as described ! Cristina is a great host, communicating with her was easy and fast.

Cristina et Luis ont été très réactifs pour répondre. Nous avons très bien été accueillis par Cristina directement à l'appartement. Ils se sont montrés très disponibles quand nous les avons sollicités pendant notre séjour.
L'appartement était très propre. Il est bien équipé et les photos le représentent bien. 
Cristina avait déposé des jouets pour notre enfant dans l'appartement. 
Comme déjà lu dans les commentaires précédents, pour dormir nous conseillons les bouchons d'oreilles pour ceux qui sont sensibles au bruit de la rue.
Pour ceux que cela préoccupe, il y a des antennes relais sur le toit de l'immeuble.

Nous remercions chaleureusement Cristina et Luis pour leur accueil et leur gentillesse. Leur appartement était très agréable.

Sebastien

The very best part about this listing is Cristina and her family. She was easy to communicate with and was very responsive, both before our visit and while we were staying with her. The apartment is smaller than it looks in the pictures. We were 5 adults and a small child, and even though there were enough beds, there really wasn't enough space. The apartment is located on a main street so there was a lot of traffic noise at night which was difficult because we couldn't sleep with the windows open and we were there during a heat wave. There is no air conditioning but Cristina purchased fans for us that helped. It is a long walk to the historic district and river but coming back up is a steep hill so it is possible to walk into town (it is far) but will likely need a taxi back up. Same for a grocery store. There is a lovely bakery very close for breakfast and coffee. The apartment was very clean and had everything that we needed. There is free street parking close by.

Merci Christina pour ce sejour. Appartement propre, soigné, conforme aux photos et très bien situé. Accueil chaleureux de Christina, qui a toujiurs été très réactive pour répondre à mes messages avant le sejour. Je recommande sans hésiter. A bientôt

Nous avons été bien accueillis par Luis, le mari de Cristina. L'appartement  est très joli, bien équipé en cuisine et très propre. L'intérêt c'est qu'il est situé à 15 min à pied de très bons restaurants, et à 10 min à pied d'un arrêt de bus (le 502) qui permet de rejoindre la plage par l'avenue Da Boavista. Cependant, il n' y a pas de climatisation et il fait très vite très chaud dans l'appartement. Et lorsqu'on veut aérer l'appartement le soir, il y a beaucoup de bruit dans la rue, très tard dans la nuit.

Joli appartement au 3e et dernier etage sans ascenseur.  bien agencé avec toutes les commodités. Le seul bémol est le bruit de la rue, très passante, et la situation de l appartement un peu excentré. Mais nous y avons passé un bon séjour.

Appartement  spacieux pour 4.
Tous les équipements sont présents pour le confort.

Situé sur les hauteurs de porto vous ne mettrez pas longtemps pour rejoindre le centre.Le soir un petit coup de metro a 5/7min pour revenir.

Tres bon accueil de nos hotes qui nous ont vite mis a l'aise.Nos hotes nous avez mis a disposition une poussette un lit pour notre petit.Merci beaucoup.

Nous recommandons sans conteste ce logement.

Great apartment with good transport facilities to the center. We traveled to Porto with a group of 6 and the apartment was big enough for all of us. Christina is very welcoming and the house is clean and had beautiful views over the city. Only minus can be the noisy road next to the house but we took ear plugs so it was no problem at all. Recommended!
It was a very nice appartment. When we have a problem, Cristina helped us directly. The appartment is not far from the centre.
샤워실(화장실)이 하나이고 세탁기를 따로 쓸수 없었던 점은 아쉽지만 부득이하게 체크인이 늦어지고 새벽에 연락드려야 했는덷도 호스트가 매우친절하고 방은 넓고 깨끗했습니다.
Cristina est adorable. L'appartement est propre et assez proche du centre ville qui reste à pied accessible.
Anfitriã muito simpática e disponível.  Espaço calmo e acolhedor. Boa localização.

Cristina was a great host - she was very helpful before and during out stay! Her appartment is very central in Porto - only around 15min walking distance from the center.
The flat is quite spacious, well equipped with everything you might need and very clean. 
I can recommend to stay with her when going to Porto!

Logement très sympa, fonctionnel, très bien situé, que nous recommandons. (boulangerie mortelle en bas de l'immeuble) !

Cristina était présente pour faciliter notre arrivée depuis l'aéroport.

Bref, n'hésitez pas !
Persönliche Begrüßung, Schlüsselübergabe, alles (!) super! Toller und immer (!) schneller und sehr sehr netter Kontakt.

Appartamento confortevole e ben servito dai mezzi pubblici , molto pulito e con parecchi giochi per bambini . Proprio sotto casa un bar pasticceria ottimo ed economico.  Consiglio questo alloggio per la vicinanza al centro , ma in un quartiere tranquillo.

Recomendable 100%!! Fuimos un grupo de 7 personas y estamos todos encantados. La anfritiona siempre dispuesta a ayudarnos y el apartamento precioso, acogedor y a 10 o 15 minutos andando del centro, puedes ir andando a todo sin problema.
La relación calidad-precio es genial y todo muy limpio y muy preparado con toallas y demás.
Muy buen sitio para pasar unos días increibles!!!

Cristina est très gentille et serviable, tout est conçu pour arriver avec un bébé.
Appartement au 3° étage , 3 chambres et propre.
Linge de lit et toilettes , tout y est.
La rue est bien desservie par les petits commerces et non loin du métro.
je recommande cet appartement
Beschreibung und Unterkunft stimmen zu 100% überein. Christina ist eine sehr zuvorkommende und überaus freundliche Gastgeberin. Sehr zu empfehlen!!

Ho soggiornato 4 notti in questo accogliente appartamento situato appena fuori dal centro di Porto.  La descrizione dell'alloggio sul sito era impeccabile, appurata al momento dell'arrivo  in casa. Nel complesso consiglio vivamente di soggiornare qui, unica  pecca la posizione, ovvero 15-20 minuti dal centro ma visto il prezzo super economico dei taxi, non ne ho risentito piu di tanto.

Todo genial. nos estuvieron esperando a la llegada. muy simpáticos. nos explicaron todo lo que le preguntamos, muy atentos.
El apartamento muy limpio y espacioso. Tiene debajo una cafetería para desayunar perfecta. El apartamento está situado en una zona residencia tranquila, y el metro a 5 min. Andando en 15 min estás en el centro de la ciudad.
Todo perfecto. Host muy amable y casa comoda y limpia. Muy recomendable!
Ideal proche du centre et d'une tres bonne boulangerie!

Hemos pasado una estancia fantastica.
El apartamento es igual a las fotos y perfectamente amueblado.
La anfitriona es muy agradable.
Merci pour votre accueil charmant .. Votre disponibilité ... Et votre très grande gentillesse !
Un grand merci à Cristina pour son accueil chaleureux et sa disponibilité si besoin; son appartement est bien situé, grand et lumineux, et nous avons passé un excellent séjour à Porto!
Bon accueil, bonnes explications. L'utilisation du bus num 600 est Trés pratique.

Het appartement was super!
De ligging is centraal, een schoon appartement en Cristina en haar man zijn erg vriendelijk en behulpzaam.
Zeker aan te raden voor een verblijf in het mooie Porto!
Excellent host! Very welcoming and helpful! The apartment was clean and nice.

Cristina's apartment was very nice. It was tidy and clean and comfortable. Everything we, a group of six friends, needed was there. The location is also very nice. A little bakery next door and a supermarket at a walking distance of within ten minutes. Also very close to several big metro lines. Cristina and her husband were very very welcoming and we laughed a lot during our contact. Thanks Cristina!
Muy bonito y cómodo

El apartamemto esta muy bien, pero hemos tenido muchos problemas con el agua caliente porque se acababa muy rapido. La calefaccion y la wifi van muy bien, cosa que es de agradecer. La cama de matrimonio es muy incomoda porque esta muy dura. Aun asi es muy recomendable porque por el precio que se paga esta muy bien el apartamento.

Cristina en todo momento ha sido muy amable, nos dejó irnos del apartamento incluso más tarde. Apartamento bien ubicado, cerca del metro, y a 20 minutos andando del centro. Apartamento con muchos detalles y bien decorado, aunque por la noche se escucha bastante el ruido de la carretera y la cama de matrimonio es algo incómoda. A pesar de esto es muy recomendable, está todo muy limpio y con muy buen gusto.
O apartamento é muito bom, confortável, a localização é ótima, porto de comércio e com transporte na porta. Acomodou bem 7 pessoas. Indico com certeza.
A nice appartment in Porto. Well-equiped. Not far from the city center.

Très bon accueil de Luis et de Cristina téléphoniquement. L'appartement était très propre et très bien équipé.  Un bouquet de fleurs nous attendait !
Bon emplacement avec une très bonne boulangerie à côté. 
Je recommande donc ces hôtes et leur appartement.
Appartement  où  l on se sent  bien des les 1er instants. Christina et luis sont  disponibles  au  possible.  Appartement  bien équipé.  Adresse  à  conserver
Great accommodation! Good location. Recommended!

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour en famille (3 adultes et 3 enfants entre 2 ans et 7 ans).
Le logement est parfaitement équipé pour les plus petits. Et nous avons apprécié la présence de radiateurs dans les chambres car le temps était pluvieux et on ressent vite l'humidité dans les maisons qui n'ont pas l'habitude d'être chauffées !
L'appartement est très propre, la salle de bain mériterait un petit rafraîchissement mais sa grande taille compense ce petit bémol.
Nous recommandons.
Lovely place, it was a bit long for my mum when walking into town but fine for me and my bro
Usefull and clean place to visit Porto

Our stay at Christina's appartment was perfect. It is located very convenient, price is great and Christina is super friendly. She helped us with arranging a taxi very early for the return flight, gave great directions and tips and the arrival and when we left was very flexibel. The appartment it selve is very nice and big enough for us. 20 min walk to the waterside wich we did almost every day. I can really recommend it!
Localização muito boa, da para fazer tudo andando e desta forma conhecendo melhor Porto

2eme fois que l on séjourne chez cristina qui est énergique et chaleureuse !
Appartement super fonctionnel et a 5min d un métro  . Famille avec 3 enfants.
La boulangerie au bas de l immeuble ajoute un charme gustatif! 
Merci cristina et on espère a bientôt !

My family and I had a wonderful stay at Christina's apartment. The place is clean and nice and the location is good. Christina and her husband were really helpful both before and during our stay which made the experience even better. Overall our stay at lulapartment made our time in Porto really great and we would love to come back. Can highly recommend it!

Cristina and Luis are very nice host and the offer a very good service, e.g. they called us a taxi for our return to the airport. The flat is comfortable, clean and nearby the old historic city, everything was fine

L'appartement est suffisamment proche du centre ville pour aller visiter le centre historique à pied. L'appartement est très propre est bien aménagé. De plus, Cristina et Luis sont très accueillants et sympathiques et nous ont donné des informations utiles pour notre séjour, notamment qu'il y a une très bonne pâtisserie dans la rue.
The apartment is very clean and modern and within walking distance of the centre. All in all we were very satisfied. Our host, Christina is very friendly. Thank you.

Bastante simpáticos tanto a Cristina como marido.  Sempre disponíveis. Tivemos no apartamento tudo o que precisamos.  Bem situado.  Como não pude levar carrinho de passeio para o meu filho  a Cristina disponibilizou um que nos facilitou muito.  Recomendo  o Lulapartment.
Very good location. Nice place. Everything is great.

Parfaitement situé pour découvrir porto à pied et en famille. À proximité super Market, transport en commun, petit marché et super boulangerie. Hôtes attentif et très sympa, l appartement est nickel, propreté et une mise  à disposition de serviette de bain et d une poussette est super. Le seul bémol les chambres étant situé côté  rue ne sont pas calme avant 23h car bar ouvert tard le soir et passage de voiture. Mais c est le centre ville ;).

L'appartement de Christina est idéalement placé pour visiter Porto à pied. Petit bémol sur le bruit des voitures que l'on entend depuis les chambres. La pâtisserie cafétéria située en bas de l'appartement est une tuerie ! ☺
Super logement, propre, fonctionnel et tout à disposition. Un grand merci à Cristina pour sa gentillesse !

Très bel appartement bien aménagé et bien situé!
On a aimé le chant du coq, au matin. Surprenant en pleine ville!

Nous avons été très contents de notre location chez Christina avec qui nous avons eu dès le moment de la location une excellente communication, de même qu'un bon accueil à l'arrivée.  L'appartement est  spacieux et en tout cas d'un très bon rapport qualité-prix
Il est situé très près du centre historique, pratique pour les ballades tout en nous permettant aussi la découverte d'un quartier plus populaire.
A recommander surtout pour un budget très raisonnable
Na een klein probleem met de sleutels heeft Cristina ons met haar wagen naar het centrum gebracht.  Leuk!!!

Serviço de excelência, desde o momento da reserva até ao check out. 
Apartamento com ótimas condições, e boa localização. Recomendo.
Obrigada cristina

Cristina, thank you very much for the accommodation in Porto. Luis was charming and helpful; we spent wonderful time in this amazing city and its surroundings. The flat was comfortable, clean and well located.

Cristina, foi muito simpática desde do primeiro momento da reserva e rápida em responder as questões. Na hora de entregar as chaves foi com sua familía e todos foram bem amáveis em ajudar e dar dicas da cidade. O apartamento é confortável e bem decorado.
A única observação, é que ele fica no terceiro andar e não tem elevador. Mas isso para o nosso grupo não foi um problema.
Super recomendo =)

The apartment was great. We had everything we needed and the apartment was in a good location. Cristina was very friendly and responded immediately. The only thing we were missing was air conditioning. It was very hot during the nights
Appartement très agréable et très bel accueil.

L'appartement est situé à une vingtaine de minutes à pieds du bord du fleuve. L'accès est facile en bus. Il manque un peu d'équipements en cuisine, mais dans l'ensemble, c'est fonctionnel et très propre. Nous recommandons cet appartement.
Awesome
Appartement Tres bien situé

Wir waren zu fünft mit kind unterwegs, daher waren 3 zimmer mit extra kinderzimmer total fein! 
Cristina und ihr mann waren total nett... haben uns mit den koffern geholfen und gute tipps für restaurants gegeben. die wohnung war liebevoll eingerichtet. Die lage ist sehr zentral, was einerseits super ist jedoch nachts wegen den eher undichten fenstern etwas laut war... 
wir haben alle den aufenthalt in porto genossen und danken cristina für alles

Dorothea
Great apartment matching the description and pictures perfectly. Cristian and Luis were very helpful and very fast answering any our questions. I would definitely stay again in this apartment.
Leuke tijd gehad in Porto!

We zochten een plek centraal in Porto zodat alles op loopafstand te bezoeken was, en dat is met deze plek prima gelukt. Ruimte genoeg voor 6 personen en een goede wifi. Vlakbij een supermarkt, niet groot maar voldoende voor een lekkere maaltijd. Ook de bakker was in de straat. Alleen de laatste dag konden we de huurauto niet makkelijk parkeren. Lastig, ook al is dat een risico in de stad. We konden een berichtje sturen een uur voor aankomst en Christina heeft ons opgewacht en alles uitgelegd.
Nice appartment, just a ten minutes walk from the city centre. Cristina is a nice host.
Apartement is wat kleiner en minder luxe dan advertentie doet vermoeden. Ongeveer een half uurtje lopen naar centrum.

I am falling in love with this flat. Our family felt here like at home. Very good location, 2 balcony, well equiped kitchen and bathroom. Nice , sunny, clean  atmosphere. Cristina was also so nice with good english:-)
Her place was clean, beautifully decorated, close to the main square, and her communication before was excellent. It was easy to find and super safe and welcoming.

Nous avons beaucoup apprécié ce logement car avec des enfants c'était très pratique avec les chambres loin des espaces communs.  La dame a été très gentille, le logement est très propre et très bien situé.

Tres content de nos sejours en famille dans l'appartement de Cristina, de plus a prit la peine de mettre une poussette a notre disposition 
Seul point négatif le secteur ,l'appartement est proche des commerces, metros etc mais tres bruillant la nuit, beaucoup de circulations et peu d'isolement dans l'appartement, egalement nous arrivions sous 41 degres avec deux enfants en bas age nous aurions apprécié  une petite bouteille d'eau dans le frigo a notre arrivée.  Neanmoins nous recommandons le logement et le sourire de Cristina qui est au top ainsi que son mari pour sa gentillesse.
Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Cristina. L'appartement est joliment décoré et propre.
Comfortable stay and Cristina is very warm and welcoming!
Tot molt correcte. Ens ha encantat l'apartament. Bastant aprop de tots els punts d'interès de la ciutat, s'hi pot arribar a peu.
Hôte géniale aux petits soins et appartement propre et fonctionnel et surtout à 10 minutes à pied du centre. Super séjour merci Cristina ;-)

Cristina & Luis' apartment is close to the centre of Porto. 10 minute welk to the University neighborhoud. Beautiful place to stay, very clean and tidy. We loved every second of our stay. You can always count on Cristina for everything. She made sure there were taxi's waiting to get us back to the AirPort. Thanks for everything!!!! Can't wait to be back.

We are a gropu of 6 and we have enjoyed very much the stay in Porto. The house is very confortable and nice. It is 20 minutes away from the center of the city by walking no need to take the bus or metro. There is a supermarket (Pingo) 7 minutes and 30 seconds from the apartment. The kitchen has everything necessary for cooking. Everything is very clean and the beds are large enough for tall people.
The apartment is well situated, 6 minutes by foot from Faria Guimarães subway station. Communication was excellent and Cristina gave us all the information we needed. Highly recommended!

Lulapartment to idealne mieszkanie dla grupy 4-6osob. 3 oddzielne sypialnie oraz salon pozwalaja na swobodne mieszkanie. Mieszkanie swieze i przestronne polozone w spokojnej dzielnicy, ktora od scislego centrum dzieli tylko 15minut spacerem schodzac z gory. Do najblizszej stacji metra jest tylko 5minut dzieki czemu mieszkanie jest fantastycznie skomunikowane z cala reszta miasta. Pod mieszkaniem znajduje sie fenomenalna piekarnia.
Appartement très propre, fonctionnel et bien situé à Porto
Good accommodation in Porto, spacious apartment.

muito bem localizado, central, limpo e bem (Website hidden by Airbnb) todas as comodidades (wifi, tv cabo, toalhas de banho) e conforto. Rua movimentada, com algum barulho de noite e com parquímetros. Comércio local e transportes muito próximos.

Неплохие апартаменты,но: 1.Третий этаж (по российским меркам-четвёртый) без лифта по узкой крутой лестнице. 2. Нет посудомоечной и стиральной машин. 3. Один санузел. 4.ОЧЕНЬ шумно!!!спать практически невозможно,слышимость такая,будто ты на улице!и на втором этаже сейчас ремонт квартиры,тоже шумят!
Muy bien todo!

We hebben een fantastische tijd gehad in het appartement en in Porto!!
Cristina is erg vriendelijk en behulpzaam!
Omdat ons vliegtuig al 's morgens vroeg in Porto landde, waren we ver voor de inchecktijd al bij het appartement. Cristina heeft onze bagage bewaard, zodat wij alvast konden gaan genieten van Porto.
We hebben met 8 personen in het appartement geslapen. Dat ging prima. Het enige is dan, dat je de slaapbank in de eetkamer moet gebruiken. Omdat wij geen zin hadden om die elke morgen in te klappen (wat trouwens wel erg makkellijk gaat...), heb je dan wat minder ruimte om te ontbijten.
Volgens ons een absolute aanrader!!!
Het appartement ligt ook redelijk dichtbij alle bezienswaardigheden.
Wij hadden een metrokaart voor 3 dagen aangeschaft, maar achteraf hadden we beter een paar losse kaartjes kunnen kopen voor die paar keer dat we de metro hebben gebruikt. Met een minuut of 10-15 ben je in het centrum.

Cristina's place is spacious and wonderfully located for those doing a quick trip in Porto who want to fit in a lot of stuff within walking distance. Cristina replied extremely quickly with any question we had and was very accommodating with our check-in time. The apartment we stayed at was on the the third floor, so it's not for the faint of heart if you're not a fan of taking the stairs! :)
Emplacement super, idéal pour famille avec enfants, décoré avec beauciup de gout merci nous avons passé un très bon séjour

L'appartement est bien situé dans Porto. Cristina est une hôte parfaite, très serviable et à l'écoute. Le logement est propre et très agréable. Nous étions 5 et nous avons passé un très bon weekend. 
Le seul bémol est que la rue est bruyante à cause de la circulation mais comme les rues de Porto montent et descendent sans cesse, aucun soucis pour s'endormir après une bonne journée  de découverte  de la ville et passer une bonne nuit dans une bonne literie.
Si nous devions revenir à Porto, nous choisirions l'appartement de Cristina

Es war eine richtig schöne Woche bei Cristina in Porto! Drei Schlafzimmer, gute Betten und viele Handtücher! Alles super und sauber. Ein netter Empfang trotz der späten Ankunftszeit! Bushaltestelle vor der Tür, Metro ist in wenigen Gehminuten zu erreichen! Gutes Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis!
Appartement idéalement bien situé permettant la visite de PORTO à pieds. Appartement lumineux, propre et bien décoré.

Mooie plek om Porto te bezoeken. Het appartement ligt iets hoger dan de binnenstad maar is beloopbaar. Makkelijker is het om met de metro te gaan. Prachtige stad. Schoon appartement, alles aanwezig. De communicatie met Cristina gaat ook heel goed. Wij hebben genoten.

Cristina and her husband are very friendly and proactive. They were very responsive to messages and questions. The appartment is cozy and clean. It is close to metro and about 20 min walk to center. We had a lovely time.

Très bel appartement grand,
lumineux à proximité du centre mais dans un environnement calme. Quartier à découvrir. 
Hôte en or! Disponible et dévouée!
Great place, great host, nice view
O apartamento é igualzinho as fotos, bem charmoso e bem conservado. É realmente bem próximo a tudo, porém durante a noite as ruas vizinhas ficam desertas...

Cristina is really friendly, always responding quickly to any questions I had. The flat is really cosy and is spacious as well. The location is perfect 10-15 min walk to the city center and really close to the public transport as well. I would definitely recommend the flat. The only negative point was that it was a bit cold in the leaving room. But the bedrooms have a heater so it is not a problem during the night !
Casa perfecta para una família.

The place is very nice and comfortable. Loved small touches: different cool pictures-sayings. Cristina and her husband were so kind to greet us warmly at night even after delay we had and came 1.5 hour later. They were very kind to provide us with breakfast. And all the communication was quick and up to point. When I'm again in Porto, I would be happy to stay again at Christina's place

Wonderful light space. Clean with great cooking facilities. Close to amazing surfing beach.  Easy access to Lisbon except at rush hour over bridge which we were advised about by hosts.
All round good experience.
Excelente hospitalidade, muito obrigada pela atenção e cuidado.
Das Apartment von Cristina ist super gelegen für einen Städtetrip. Liebevoll eingerichtet und Cristina ist jederzeit erreichbar für allfällige Fragen. Wir hatten ein super Silvester-Wochenende!

Os anfritriões foram super atenciosos e prestativos em resolver com agilidade nossos pedidos.
A moradia estava bem limpa e é muito confortável. O local fica próximo do centro, pôde-se fazer muitas coisas a pé.

Hacía muchísimo frío en la casa y los radiadores de las habitaciones no calentaban el salón ni la cocina, el frío era horrible. Además la puerta de una de las habitaciones se atascaba y era muy dificil de abrir. Por lo demás todo perfecto.

Hermoso departamento con muy buena ubicación.
Cristina y su esposo nos recibieron muy bien y nos hicieron sentir como en casa.
Definitivamente volveríamos.
malheureusement nous n'avons pas pu aller à Porto. Néanmoins, les contacts ont toujours été cordiaux et bienveillants avev Cristina. Nous espérons y aller dès que possible!

Anfitriões muito atenciosos. lugar muito agradável e próximo ao centro histórico...muito bom! Voltaremos outras vezes.
Obrigada Cristina e Luis

Verblijven in Cristina haar appartement is een aanrader!! Gezellig, netjes, klein maar volledig voorzien van de nodige zaken. Ook dichtbij een metrostation en op wandelafstand van de plaatselijke supermarkt en de historische binnenstad. Zeer gastvrije ontvangst. Echt niets op aan te merken! Tof verblijfje!! Wij waren met 6 en dat was perfect te doen, 8 zou wat krap zijn denk ik. Voor de rest enkel lovende woorden!!

Pessoas muito simpáticas e facilitam imenso para estarmos confortáveis. Foram muito flexíveis com nosso horário de entrada e saída. Deram-nos dicas. A casa é encantadora e possui uma boa localização. Apenas um de nós não conseguiu usar o wifi. A única coisa desconfortável é que nenhuma das portas, nem a da casa de banho possui chave. Mas em geral, foi uma experiência óptima e definitivamente para se repetir!

Todo genial, los anfitriones explicaron sitios para visitar y el transporte publico de la ciudad. El piso bastante limpio y acogedor. La única pega que pongo es que el piso se hace bastante pequeño para 8 personas ya que dos duermen en un sillón cama donde hay que desayunar, comer y cenar todos los días. Además del salón un baño para 8 personas se hace pequeño sobre todo si el piso está lleno de chicas como en nuestro caso. Ojo con las maletas! Es un tercero sin ascensor.

Apartamento aconchegante, limpo e bem localizado.
Ótimo para grupos de 4 pessoas.
Cristina e Luis são muito cuidadosos e nos receberam muito (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltaria a me hospedar com eles.
Our stay was lovely, and Cristina and her husband were very helpful and responsive to us.  I highly recommend this place to stay in Porto!

L'appartement de Cristina est idéal pour découvrir Porto. On accède au centre en 15min à pied ou en métro grâce à l'arrêt Faria Guimaraes. Le logement dispose de tout le confort pour y vivre à 6 sans problème. Cristina et luis sont des propriétaires attentionnés, réactifs et disponibles. Un seul bémol peut être, le chauffage, il peut faire très froid par moment, sinon tout est parfait.
It was perfect! :)
Tolle Lage, schöne Wohnung und eine sehr nette, immer erreichbare Gastgeberin

Tout était très bien. Cristina et Luis sont super gentils et très réactifs. Bons conseils pour le petit déjeuner à « 3 portes »  déco friendly. Propre. Draps et serviettes impeccables. Allez y sans hésitation !
Loved this place
Super séjour, Cristina est très réactive aux questions. Emplacement top, qualité prix imbattable!

Cristina’s place was lovely and comfy. We had a nice time at her place, there was room for everyone, it was well located and nice walking distance to everything. I loved that it wasn’t completely in the center, but in a more local area where you couldn’t see so many tourists. The shops and restaurants in the neighborhood were very good. The place was practical, it had a everything you need and nicely decorated. I definitely recommend it.
Cristina is a great host!
Logement fonctionnel! Facile a y vivre pour 8! Boulangerie au top a 10 metres
Excelente
Casa muy completa y bien ubicada.

Christina and her husband were great. We arrived very late in evening and we were warmly welcomed into the apartment and got very nice tips and recommendations. The apartment is cosy and it has everything you need for a couple of days. I’d like to recommend this place and would definitely stay there again!

O apartamento da Cristina é super aconchegante, muito bem montado tanto nos quartos quanto na cozinha e banheiro. Os três quartos acomodaram muito bem Pai, Mãe, Avô, Avó, filho de 6 anos e filha de 4 meses, inclusive com berço e cadeirinha de bebê para refeição. Bem próximo do apto, na mesma rua existem padaria/confeitaria, bar/restaurante, pequeno mercado para frutas.  Gostamos muito da localização, transporte público é bem proximo e nos atendeu muito bem, especialmente tendo em vista que viajamos com duas crianças. E a comunicação com Cristina é muito fácil, todas as dúvidas e solicitações antes da nossa chegada foram respondidas sempre no mesmo dia, às vezes em questão de minutos. Pretendemos visitar a cidade novamente, e se acontecer pretendemos nos hospedar de novo neste apto.

Lage: zehn Minuten bis zur Altstadt.  An einer viel befahrenen Straße, was aber nicht gestört hat. 

Gastfreundschaft: 
super liebe hosts gaben gutenTipps und Wegbeschreibungen 
Absprachen waren super und es wurde auf kurzfristige Änderungen eingegangen

Wohnung: wie in der Beschreibung angegeben mit super süßen Details
Küche ist komplett ausgestattet ( Auflaufformen, Toaster, Mikrowelle, Backofen, ...) 
Lediglich bei kalten Temperaturen sollte noch eine zusätzliche Jacke mitgenommen werden, aber sonst wirklich alles sehr schön und besonders sehr sauber!
Kousek od metra které vede hned do centra
Muito bom o espaço.

War alles top. Uns hat Maria in Empfang genommen und die Wohnung kurz gezeigt. Sie war sehr freundlich. Wir waren mit dem Auto da und neben dem Haus ist ein Parkplatz wo man, wenn man bisschen Zeit mitbringt auch einen Parkplatz findet. 

Alles in allem war es ein Top Aufenthalt. Wir werden wiederkommen :)
gostaria de agradecer aos anfitriões, pela atenção pela limpeza, tudo muito bom e próximo de tudo, a ajuda do luiz em ajuda a subir as malas pela escada foi tdo de bom.
Logement correspondant au descriptif. Emplacement correct. La petite boulangerie dans la rue est un vrai bonheur

El lugar muy cómodo, limpio, bonito y excelente ubicado; a 10-15 minutos andando al centro. El servicio estuvo perfecto Cristina fue muy atenta en todo momento y no tuvimos ningún inconveniente definitivamente volvería.

We absolutely loved our stay! Luis  was great and waited for us during our check in that was late due to a delay from our fight. The apartment was just as described and good for 6 people. It was very clean and relatively close to the center. The hosts were really nice as well and made our stay so smooth.

Christina a été d’un accueil et d’une gentillesse sans nom.
L’apparte Est spacieux, propre et décoré avec goût, je le recommande grandement.

Christina en haar man staan al vanaf het moment van boeken klaar om je te helpen voorbereiden op je reis. Snelle antwoorden en handige tips. Het appartement is ruim en schoon en zeer compleet. Ook voor onze dochter van 2,5: er was zelfs speelgoed! Vanuit het appartement ben je in 15 minuutjes in het centrum of binnen 10 minuutjes bij de metro. Je kunt alle kanten op. Bakker en supermarkt op loopafstand. Minpuntje kan de drukke weg zijn waar het appartement aan ligt. Daar zou je last van kunnen hebben qua geluid. En met kleine kinderen kun je niet makkelijk een schuifdeur open zetten ivm valgevaar door spijlen van de Franse balkons. Maar al met al hebben wij genoten van een prettig verblijf in een mooie stad.

O apartamento é bem equipado com boa roupa de cama, toalha e itens de cozinha. A localização é razoavelmente perto das principais atrações turísticas, sempre saíamos a pé mas na volta às vezes estávamos cansados para subir as ladeiras e o Uber acabava saindo em conta. 
No prédio tem que subir três andares de escada. Para nós não foi problema. 
Cristina sempre nos atendeu prontamente em qualquer questão e foi agradável. 
Estávamos com um grupo grande de 6 pessoas e o único problema que tivemos foi que a água quente só dava conta de até três pessoas no banho. Como ainda estava frio isso foi uma questão.

A casa é tal e qual como nas fotos, muito confortável e equipada. Está bem localizada e tanto a pé como de transportes é fácil chegar a qualquer lado. Tanto a Cristina como o marido são pessoas super simpáticas e disponíveis. Foi uma experiência agradável, recomendo sem qualquer dúvida!

Cristina is a Super Host, very Kind and Hospitable! Best Place to stay in Porto, also very good located, very clean and comfortable. 
Me and my family have been very happy to stay in this elegant apartment. Thank you so much for the Sangria as a welcome gift, so much appreciated.
Thank you for all.
Claudia
Acomodacao perfeita e anfitrioes tambem. Foi tudo otimo
Wonderful hosts and Porto is a lovely town!
El alojamiento está bien situado, cerca de zonas turísticas y en un barrio tranquilo.
Really nice stay at Porto on that flat. Thank you Cristina.
Wir hatten einen schönen Aufenthalt in dem süßen Appartement. Es war alles vorhanden, was wir brauchten.

Christina og Luis er utroligt nemme at kommunikere med og svarer med det samme. Vi ankom meget sent og blev alligevel budt velkommen med kiks og mælk. Lejligheden indeholder alt hvad man behøver og ligger centralt. Jeg kan på det varmeste anbefale deres bolig.
Fine apartment to the price. A little away from the center - many km of walking when you want to see the city by foot (but you can take the metro not far away). Very friendly host.

Great apartment! Well located. Very friendly and helpful host - our flight to Porto was badly delayed and we arrived very late, but this was not a problem. The apartment was clean and well equipped and perfect for five people for a four day city visit.
O local é agradável e tem ótima localização, tanto para quem goste de caminhar ou para quem preferir transportes públicos. Os anfitriões são simpáticos, prestáveis e rápidos a responder.
We stayed with 6 persons, it was nice, a lot of space, it was a 30 minute walk to the city.

Appartement agréable. L'accueil est très chaleureux, Christina est adorable et nous a donné plein de bon conseils.
seul bémol le stationnement. Il faut compter 15 euros par jour dans un parking surveillé. Il faut éviter de laisser son véhicule dans la rue.

appartement spacieux avec séjour, cuisine, 3 chambres.
super propre.
situation correcte il suffit de marcher 15 mn pour être dans le centre touristique.
Très bon accueil

Echt een geweldig appartement. Ook met 2 volwassenen en 4 grote kinderen. Als je zelf graag kookt, zoals wij, dan is de keuken echt top. Alles aanwezig. Tip: de koekenpannen liggen in de la onder de oven :-) Vonden wij helaas pas de laatste dag. Als je wilt kun je lopen naar het centrum van Porto (30 minuten max), maar met de sneltram ben je er in 10 minuten.  In alle opzichten waar voor je geld.
Schöne Wohnung . Gut mit öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln erreichbar. Taxi sehr günstig, ca 5 Euro für eine Stadtfahrt.

the apartment was really cute and the host available for any need. the bathroom was really good. 
we had a nice stay. not too far from the center.

Apartamento muito bom, comunicação rápida e fácil com a Cristina. Ela e seu marido estavam nos esperando para o checkin. É preciso considerar que o apartamento fica no 3º andar, o que pode ser ruim para idosos com malas grandes. A estação de metrô mais perto Faria Guimarães, fica a uns 10 minutos a pé, sendo necessário subir algumas pequenas ladeiras até o apartamento. Todos os quartos possuem ventiladores, boas roupas de cama e um banheiro bem limpo. Toda a casa é muito organizada. Ficaria hospedado lá outra vez.

Appartement bien situé, conforme aux photos, idéal à plusieurs. 
Accueil très sympathique par Maria. 
Réactivité de Cristina à nos demandes.

Excelente estadia! Cristina nos recepcionou com muita alegria e carinho como fôssemos da família! O apartamento está localizado em local privilegiado e próximo aos principais pontos turísticos  da cidade! O apartamento é  maravilhoso, amplo e completo além de muito aconchegante. Obrigada Cristina
Es ist eine schöne gemütliche Wohnung mit guter Anbindung an die Metro. Die Gastgeberin hat hilfreiche Tipps gegeben und ist sehr freundlich.
Buen piso en buena ubicacion, anfitriona inmejorable
La verdad es que es una gran anfitriona,  muy agradable y muy atenta en todo momento.

Bona (Website hidden by Airbnb) i fàcil comunicació. 
Recomanable.
Bon rapport qualité-prix pour cet appartement. Bien situé, à 20 minutes à pied du centre historique. Cristina est très réactive aux questions. Petit bémol : une rue bruyante.
Très bon accueil, très bon suivi. L'appartement est bien conforme même si nous avons eu un peu froid, mais il y a de bonnes couvertures! Commodités et boulangerie juste à côté!
Aconselho a todos, super central, a Cristina e o marido são TOP ... a casa está equipada para que tudo corra muito bem...

We loved the stay, the appartment was very lovely and cozy. We loved our bed, it was so soft  The only minus was that the hot water wasn't enough for 5 people and the floor was cold, but it's November after all and these are small things. Thanks to Cristina for being so friendly and nice :) Definitely reccomend this place :)

Cristina fue un encanto, muy atenta y simpática en todo momento, no tenemos ninguna queja de ella. Sobre el apartemento, había muchísima humedad, solo tienen calefacción dos habitaciones, la habitación de la litera sobre todo es la peor, los colchones eran insoportables, añadiendo que era la habitación que más humedad tenía y sin calefacción, los cojines horribles. Añadir que eramos 6 personas y solo una de ellas podía ducharse con agua caliente debido a que se acababa muy rápido. La zona no estaba del todo mal, pero en los alrederores no encuentras nada aunque esta a 15 minutos caminando del centro y no esta mal.

Cristina jest bardzo gościnna. Ma bardzo dobry kontakt i udziela dużo wskazówek. Mieszkanie czyste, przestronne. świetna lokalizacja. Blisko centrum, stacji metra oraz nocnego autobusu. Bardzo dobre połączenie z lotniskiem. A samo Porto jest wyjątkowe. Spędziliśmy naprawdę kilka cudownych dni.
Casa ordinata e pulita, ottimo posto di appoggio, vicinissimo al centro della città
110% recomendable, excelente atención, todo exactamente como en las fotos

Cristina e Luis foram super prestativos, sempre respondendo nossas questões. O apartamento fica no 3º andar, mesmo com 4 crianças pequenas não foi difícil! Quartos com aquecimento, o que nos ajudou muito no Outono de Porto que é frio!
Cristina ha sido atenta en todo momento y el apartamento estaba muy bien y de acuerdo con todo lo descrito. Perfecto para alojarse unos días.
Place was really nice and tasteful, we enjoyed our stay completely. The host was very responsive and we had everything we needed. Would recomend this place :)

Você não tem como se decepcionar com essa casa e com a hospitalidade de Cristina. De todos os lugares que já fiquei até hoje, foi onde fui melhor recebida e onde pude perceber o maior cuidado. 
O apartamento é exatamente como nas fotos, estava muito limpo, bem cuidado e se tínhamos qualquer dúvida, Cristina nos respondia rapidamente. Estava na cidade para reunir a minha família para passar o Natal, e Cristina sabendo disso deixou uns toques natalinos pela casa, foi incrível!
Voltaria, e indico com a maior segurança.

O apartamento da Cristina é bem localizado e acomoda com conforto uma família (ou grupo) de 5-7 pessoas. Ela é super solícita, respondendo todas nossas dúvidas com prontidão. Nosso grupo envolvia um bebê de 1 ano, e Cristina disponibilizou uma estrutura para acolhê-lo, incluindo cadeira de alimentação e carrinho para passeio. Tanto a hospitalidade quanto a estrutura do apartamento nos propiciou excelentes férias no Porto. Recomendo.
Really nice flat for a group, Cristina is a  nice host really helpful, and everything is super clean! i definitely recommend the flat, we had a great stay in Porto !
Apartamento cómodo y apto para una estancia larga
Hemos estado muy bien en su apartamentso. Ideal para grupos. muy bien ubicado, facil de llegar al centro y bien comunicado.

The apartment is small, but cosy and you can find everything you need. Also, it is not far away from the city center. Cristina is very friendly, helpful and reachable at any time. And there is an amazing bakery near the apartment so you can make your morning as sweet as you like.

name: 1 BR available in lovely LES unit
summary: 2 blocks from F line 2nd Avenue subway station.  You can walk to Soho, East Village, and China Town.  Walk up 2nd floor, 1 bed room of 2 bedrooms will be available for rent.  The room has 2 windows, sunny, furnished with a full sized bed and a TV.
space: More than half of the entire unit`s interior is made of exposed red brick and hard-wood floors. The space has a modern-rustic feel. The living room has brand new couch; it is a cream colored love seat with matching pillows. The kitchen is fully equipped with everything needed to cook a delicious meal. Ok, maybe not everything... Adequately spacious and is on the second floor of the building with daily access to a rooftop.
description: 2 blocks from F line 2nd Avenue subway station.  You can walk to Soho, East Village, and China Town.  Walk up 2nd floor, 1 bed room of 2 bedrooms will be available for rent.  The room has 2 windows, sunny, furnished with a full sized bed and a TV. More than half of the entire unit`s interior is made of exposed red brick and hard-wood floors. The space has a modern-rustic feel. The living room has brand new couch; it is a cream colored love seat with matching pillows. The kitchen is fully equipped with everything needed to cook a delicious meal. Ok, maybe not everything... Adequately spacious and is on the second floor of the building with daily access to a rooftop. The unit is in the center of the Lower East Side. It is close to everything within the SOHO/East Village area; practically walking distance to lots of places. It is a 5 minute walk to the Delancey street train station (F/M/J trains). You will be staying with my roommate who will be in his own room. He is quite friendly and c
neighborhood_overview: The Lower East Side is very lively and full of vibrant energy. The neighborhood is synonymous for local galleries, trendy dive bars and has some of New York’s best cafes, restaurants, bars, live music and clubs outside your door step. This particular unit is located on a block at the center of it all. It is 2 buildings away from Lady Gaga`s old apartment before she was famous.
notes: Everything in the apartment is brand new.
transit: The F/M/J trains are 3 blocks away and the , which means that your only minutes away from Midtown or Brooklyn. You are also 15 - 20 minute walks away from Soho, China Town, Little Italy and the East Village.
access: The unit is in the center of the Lower East Side. It is close to everything within the SOHO/East Village area; practically walking distance to lots of places. It is a 5 minute walk to the Delancey street train station (F/M/J trains).
interaction: You will be staying with my roommate who will be in his own room. He is quite friendly and can help answer any of your questions about anything.
house_rules: No parties or get togethers being hosted. No smoking in the unit Must make effort to maintain cleanliness of the space Pets allowed

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I am a Software developer. I enjoy playing my guitar and riding my motorcycle.

reviews.comments: Ben was really nice and accommodating. The room was clean and is exactly as it is shown in the picture. Would definitely recommend!
Ben is friendly and down to earth. He will do all he can to make sure your stay is comfortable.
Ben was an excellent host while we were staying at his place!! He was friendly and easygoing and we are super happy with the days we were staying there.
Very interesting neighbourhood, villagey feel, lots of local cafes. Ben and his flatmate were relaxed and welcoming.
Ben was friendly and welcoming, and the location was perfect. A great place!

Ben was a quiet but lovely host, offering us a chance to drop off our bags and accommodating our schedule. The room was just as described, small but comfortable. The bed was comfortable (although a little chilly!) and Ben laid out towels for us to use. The location is great. We were able to easily walk to St Marks and other spots in the LES within 10-15 minutes. I found the area to be very nice and the room to be clean- but my mother (who is used to overpaying for a room at the Hilton) found the area a bit dark and the room/bathroom not quite as clean as she would have hoped. This feedback is of course relative- as someone who has stayed at Airbnbs and hostels around the world, I found the space very comfortable and reasonably priced for NYC. I would definitely recommend staying with Ben for anyone who is comfortable staying in a lived-in apartment and walking a block or two through less busy streets.

name: M o n k OK 4 cosy rooms
summary: With Windows, comfortable, quiet
description: With Windows, comfortable, quiet

address.street: 香港, 九龍, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: I would not every stay here again and I would warn others from staying there. This is a Hostel at not hostel prices. They advertise as a kind of hotel once you arrive but you do not get the benefits of a hotel during your stay such as a clean room every day. However one day our room was just left open and not locked as we left it. Also, THIS LOCATION IS NOT IN KOWLOON. This is in Mongkok.

The room we stayed in was very small. It had enough space for three people to sleep in but not much else. The location is great and very close to the ladies market, restaurants and subway. Hard to find a better location in Monk Kok. Take note that this is overpriced on Air bnb for a hostel stay.

name: @CausewayBayMTR/TimeSq.★Near HKCEC
summary: This 2 bedroom apartment is just located at 300 meter from Causeway Bay MTR Station. Within the same 300 meter is Times Square. Only 180 meter is A11 airport bus stop , tram stop and Supermarket .
space: This 2 bedroom apartment is just located at 300 meter from Causeway Bay MTR Station. Within the same 300 meter is Times Square. Only 180 meter is A11 airport bus stop , tram stop and Supermarket . With an advantageous location,It is centrally located at Causeway Bay inside in Wan Chai district, a quiet and secure environment where premier shopping, dining, and entertainment complexes cluster. The apartment is connected with all types of convenient transportation (MTR , Bus ,Tram ,Taxi , Ferry , Minibus & Shenzhen Shuttle Bus) .From my door...Central and Tsim Sha Tsui are only 10-15 minutes away. In close proximity to Causeway Bay MTR Station,Landmark Shopping Malls -- ( Times Square, Hysan Place, Sogo etc.) ,Jardine's Crescent ,Wan Chai Pier (Star ferry), Hong Kong Convention & Exhibition Centre( HKCEC) ,Golden Bauhinia Square and Victoria Park . It is ideal for traveling couples , merchants, exhibitors and even families. ****************************************************    ♥ CONVEN

Only 180 meter is A11 airport bus stop , tram stop and Supermarket . This 2 bedroom apartment is just located at 300 meter from Causeway Bay MTR Station. Within the same 300 meter is Times Square. Only 180 meter is A11 airport bus stop , tram stop and Supermarket . With an advantageous location,It is centrally located at Causeway Bay inside in Wan Chai district, a quiet and secure environment where premier shopping, dining, and entertainment complexes cluster. The apartment is connected with all types of convenient transportation (MTR , Bus ,Tram ,Taxi , Ferry , Minibus & Shenzhen Shuttle Bus) .From my door...Central and Tsim Sha Tsui are only (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) minutes away. In close proximity to Causeway Bay MTR Station,Landmark Shopping Malls -- ( Times Square, Hysan Place, Sogo etc.) ,Jardine's Crescent ,Wan Chai Pier (Star ferry), Hong Kong C
neighborhood_overview: Great location - Only 300 meters to Causeway Bay MTR station and Times Square.Only 180 meter is A11 airport bus stop , tram stop and Supermarket . With access to all amenities(shopping,restaurants, convenience stores, wet markets and supermarkets etc.) all at your doorstep. Walking distance to Wan Chai.   ## Nice and friendly neighbor.  ### Excellent convenience and location with stylish decor provide a decent stay!
access: Guests will have full access to the whole apartment , including all amenities like cable tv,  wi-fi ,washing machine,DVD Player & DVDS,  kitchen ,hair dry etc. And will be given key cards as well as the buildings access code.
interaction: Please contact me through airbnb, (Hidden by Airbnb) , SMS or local call if you have any queries.
house_rules: 1. Please keep this apartment clean and tidy. 2. Keep the door and windows locked before you leave the apartment. 3. Please turn off the water heater after finish to prevent to be over-heated.  4. For safety and energy saving,please switch off all electronic appliances when leaving or not in using . 5. Please do not put bath towel on the floor as floor carpet.  6. Safe keep the key card , or a replacement cost of HK$100 / USD $15. 7. Extra cleaning can be arranged upon request at USD$50 per visit. 8. No illegal / immoral use in the apartment. 9. No smoking in apartment. 10. No noise before 7am or after 11pm. 11. Party is not allowed. - The quoted cleaning fee is a flat rate of general cleaning for guest check-out. In case of any excessive spoil, the host reserves the rights to make the final decision in case of any disputes for an extra fee incurred. Thank you very much for your cooperation and understandings! If any of the above is breached, security deposit in full may be claimed. It

host.host_about:
Hi everyone.
I like to travel just like you! I would be happy to host you in my flat in Hong Kong.I want all my guests to have a great time,to be happy here and to feel what is like to breathe,eat,live,love and touch the real Hong Kong.
I want my guests to go home and tell all their friends about my place,and I want them to come back.Oh! And to give me great evaluations.
Feel free to contact me if you have any questions,I look forward to having you in my home,and having you feel welcome.
Hope to see you soon...
Carmen

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
The apartment is very nice, well equipped. The host came to pick us up too and show the apartment.

Just i found the beds little small for 2 people, thats why its not 5 stars.

Rest all was Good :).

Hong Kong sized 2BR apartment in busy area between Wanchai and Causeway Bay. Good location for easy access to nearby restaurants and Causeway Bay shopping. The apartment is a good deal if you need room for up to 5 people. The rooms are small but there is a double bed in each. There isn't any windows in the main room but it is well equipped and quite roomy for the apartment size. Carmen met us on arrival and even arranged for car service from HKG. The apartment includes a washer, which is nice if you need to quickly wash a small load. It also has 3 air conditioners so you can keep cool in the afternoon. We probably would not stay again since the area is too busy for us.

The apartment was in a brillian location a 3 minute walk to time square and the causeway bay mrt.
The apartment was modern & fresh and had all our needs covered. It was also very quite which surprised us given the location.
We are a family of 5 so we probably needed a little more space. 
The tv and dvd were great however there are no english channels, something we did miss.
Our host Carmen was lovely and extremely helpful and always avaialble to answer any questions we had. 
I would definately recommend it for a small family

Carmen's apartment is very well located and very convenient as it is located near all kind of stores, restaurant, shopping mall. Moreover the apartment is very near to MTR station, bus station, trams and shopping district. Getting food, clothes and etc is not a problem at all. Everything is so near plus convenient to get and find from local delicacy to fast food, from boutique to shopping mall likes Times Squares, Sogo, Lee Gardens and etc.

On top of the location are good, her apartment is great. It is very cozy, clean and comfortable. It is fully and well equipped with all the necessity you will need. You can even cook and wash your clothes. It is very nicely renovated. Although there are 6 of us but it is alright as the place is not too small and we can bond even more. Choosing and staying at Carmen's apartment indeed is a right choice for us as the experience gain is awesome. This is not the first time for me staying and visiting Hong Kong but the first time that I felt like a Hong Kong resident staying in Hong Kong. The feeling is very different from staying in hotel.

Beside the great location and cozy apartment, our host Carmen is awesome. She is lovely, sweet, kind, extremely helpful and extremely friendly. She goes all out to make us comfortable like getting the apartment ready before we even arrived like turn the light on and turn on the air condition, prepared all kind of beverages for us in the fridge plus she even prepared coffee and tea in-case we want to make hot drinks instead. She even waited for us at the arrival to welcome us.

The overall is great and awesome. I will definitely stay in Carmen's apartment again for our next visit to Hong Kong.

Carmen's apartment was everything we expected from the desciption on Airbnb. The apartment was neat, tidy and clean. The location was excellent, just a short walk to the Causeway Bay MTR Station. There was plenty of shopping and eateries within a five minute walk. The Star Ferry was also within walking distance to head accross the harbour. 
Would also reccommend using the driver Carmen reccommended - he met us in the arrivals hall and took us straight to the apartment. We had a few difficulties explaining the addres to some taxi drivers.

This was the first time using Airbnb and I did not know what to expect. I was pleasantly surprised. For this particular unit, whilst the building itself is not exactly pretty, the flat itself was in an extremely convenient location on HK Island and was well kept inside. We used it as a base for 4 nights (3 days) and it was perfect for us as a family of 2 adults and 2 children (14 & 11). We were out most of the day and only used it to collapse at the end of it. It was good to come back to a place where you can get yourself a snack/drink without paying the world for it like you do in hotels. There were no English speaking channels on the TV but the DVD player seems like a good idea even though we did not use it. There are two windows in the apartment (one in each of the bedrooms) that look straight into a fairly ordinary set of units/lane way and hence not noted in the pictures on the website.

Over all a really nice, clean and comfortable enough unit to base yourself in for a few days in HKG if you do not want to pay the expensive rates of a hotel. Carmen was a wonderful contact, very generous with her information. easy to communicate with and organised a transfer to the airport on our behalf. Her unit was well equipped.

We would definitely use this unit again for our travels in HKG.

Carmen and Eric (Carmen's husband) are fantastic hosts.  Before our arrival, Carmen emailed me a lot of helpful tips.  On the day of our arrival, they personally welcomed us, showed us the apartment, and explained everything in detail.  As Carmen mentioned, there are plenty of restaurants, 7-11, circle K, etc in the neighborhood.   She also helped us to arrange transportation.  On a scale of 1 to 10 (10 being the highest), I will rank the apartment and the hosts 11 out of 10.  
I am highly recommend anyone who wants to visit HK to consider Carmen's apartment due to the following reasons:
 - close to all major MTR, bus, and tram stations
 - plenty of restaurants in the neighborhhold
 - a giant supermarkets where you can get everyting ranging from toothpaste to midnight snacks.
 - couple of mins walk to all major stores, Sogo, Times Square, etc.

5 stars for everything. bed was very comfortable, with beddings smelling new and fresh. amenities were well stocked up including extra toilet paper and even complimentary drinks in the fridge for us to consume. kitchen was very well equipped as well with all kinds of items available. She even has a list of suggested iteinary for us.

It was a nice experience for us as a new visitor of Hong Kong and at the same time new airbnb user.  At first I was so hesitant to use it & to pay the place which I dont know if it's for real or not.  But, things went well when we saw the place & met Carmen. 

The house has all stuffs that you need.  The fridge has even a welcome drinks for free - in hotel, you'll pay for it.  Travel tips / brochures of HKG places & even house instructions were posted for visitors infos.

I started introducing the airbnb to all my friends here in Dubai & even back home.  It's really unforgettable experience to us.  Thank you Airbnb & especially to Carmen.

My husband and I stay there with my auntie.  The location is great, just a short walk to Time Sq and Sogo, with many great restaurants, i.e. across the street is a famous bakery called Tony Wang!  The apartment itself is tidy and well kept.  Issues with the water heater were quickly resolved within hours.  All in all a great experience and we would visit again.

My father and I stayed in Camen's lovely apartment in early Feb and had a most enjoyable experience. The apartment was clean and tidy and beds very comfortable. The location is fantastic with only a couple of minutes walk to the MTR and a large array of shops and restaurants. It was terrific having a fully equipped kitchen so we could make some of our meals at home. And despite being on a relatively busy road, it was beautifully quiet. Carmen's hints and tips for visiting Hong Kong and recommended restaurants and sights was also a great help.  She also provided us with complimentary refreshments on arrival which was lovely. This was my first experience with Air BnB and I would highly recommend both this service and Carmen's apartment. Thank you Carmen!

We stayed in Carmen's flat for 10 days and found the location and services excellent. There were 4 of us, and it made it very convenient to be able to all be together in the same flt, rather than 2 hotel rooms. We used the flat as a base, and also traveled to Macau and Shenzhen, without having to lug all our luggage around. Carmen is very helpful, and stays in touch regularly to see if we needed anything. Nice touches: instant coffee. tea bags and bottled water waiting when we arrived.
A great stay, many thanks. Excellent communication from Carmen and we both really enjoyed our stay.
