It was a pleasure to stay at Carmen's apartment smack in the center of Wan Chai district. Carmen was very helpful throughout our stay and i would gladly stay at her apartment again!

Our host: Firstly, Carmen, our host was really helpful from the time we booked her apartment leading up to the day we arrived. She actively contacted us, giving us lots of info regarding traveling around HK, great food locations and even met us at the MTR station to lead us to the apartment. 
The Apartment: Although the apartment was small, most importantly, it was very clean! and it had EVERYTHING we needed to feel comfortable in it and the 4 of us felt really really comfortable living here for the past 4 days. The beds (including the sofa bed in the living hall) were firm and comfortable. Clean towels, basic toiletries were all provided and all you need is your own tooth brush and tooth paste! Air con was functioning well and there was TV and DVD player as well. Although there was a complete kitchen facility, we didn't have a chance to cook anything coz there are so much good food out there! 
Location: Excellent, excellent location! Just a few minutes walk from Causeway Bay Exit C. Also, there are lots of cafes down stairs, you will never go hungry! 7-Eleven, Time Square, Sogo,All other Major Dept Stores are just near by. Love it! 

Thanks once again Carmen for making our stay so pleasant and comfortable. This shall not be the last time we come to HK and stay in your apartment!

Carmen Lui is an amazing host.  She made contact prior to us arriving providing us with detailed instructions and maps on how to get to the apartment, and ideas as to what to do whilst in HK.  The apartment was exactly as described, and she even put an extra bed in for our daughter as we were a family of 5.  The apartment was within walking distance of the subway, and there was a 7-11 a few doors down for basic groceries so we could cook breakfasts and dinner.  She went the extra yard by having sightseeing brochures and maps there for our perusal which was very helpful.  She met our cab, who had difficultly getting to her apartment at peak hour, and she helped us with our luggage to the apartment and showed us around inside when we arrived.  The apartment was well laid out, and she provided all the necessities so we could just start living as a family straight away.  Our boys were very happy with the internet connection, and cable tv, which gave a bit of variety for down time in between sightseeing. We loved our time in HK, and would definitely recommend Carmen as a host, and hope to come back again soon!

We were very happy with Carmen, who gave us lots of helpful information before our arrival, she was an excellent host! Although the apartment is small, like all apartments in Hong Kong is was in a great location right in the middle of Wanchai!

Carmen's apartment is in a great location on Lockhart Rd, situated at the Causeway Bay end just a few mins walk from Timesquare. 
The property was very clean and comfortable, although no natural light in the living room the bedrooms had windows and there was tea, coffee, water, soft drinks and  snacks upon arrival. 
The apartment was small, but normal by HK standards. 
Could comfortably accommodate 3 adults. 
Carmen was very sweet, helpful and quick to respond on every occasion. A great host. 
Thanks!
Great location and a lovely apartment! Carmen was a great host and made our stay even more enjoyable!

Thanks Carmen and Derek for letting us stay in the nice apartment.  A value for money  for its convenient location  and the laundry machine makes our stay comfortable,
Carmen 's attention to details  such as providing us with welcoming drinks in the fridge, towels , hair dryer ,slippers, landline telephone  and  shampoo/ bath gel and even laundry detergent and dish washer detergent makes her place 5 star service and stand out from other airbnb hosts ( I have rented other airbnb place  before ) .
It is a pleasure to stay in Carmen's place. Thanks !

We were a family of 7, with 4 adults, and 3 children (all under 6). Had a great time staying at Carmen's place. The apartment is as the photos portrayed. Yes, the windows are only at the bedroom, and the view was to another building with an alley below. But if you are like us who went out all day and went back only at night to sleep, it didn't really matter. Carmen was very helpful and a wonderful host. From her tips that she sent via mail to arranging our pickup for airport transfers, greeting us when we arrived at her apt., to accommodating requests for a rice cooker, everything was handled beautifully. The beds and sofa bed were comfy and we had good rests. It was really helpful that the elevator is at the ground floor without having to go up a few steps up (some apt we saw from the outside was like that). Place was very convenient and close to the Causeway Bay MTR. Note: if you have problems going up/down steps, take the only elevator at Sogo exit. Once again, would recommend this place and Carmen as the host to my acquaintances. Thank you once again Carmen!

Carmen is a great host. The apartment is clean and conveniently located between Causeway Bay and Wan Chai MTR station. Plenty of nice local food around. I will definitely recommend group travelers to stay in this apartment.

We were a family of 5 with a 4 year old kid. The apartment was clean and comfortable. Carmen was a great host who provided us with what we needed in the apartment including welcome drinks and snacks, toiletries, laundry detergent, dish washing liquid etc. Location was great with close proximity to shops, 7-11, food stalls and public transport. Will stay here again when I am in HK next.

Carmen is an absolutely lovely host who went out of her way to make us feel welcome and comfortable. Very patient in answering our wealth of questions too. While the flat is a tad small (real estate comes at a premium in HK anyway), its location midway between Causeway Bay and Wan Chai more than compensates - convenient to move about... MTR, bus, tram, ferry... take your pick. Shops, restaurants and even a market are just downstairs. We enjoyed our stay very much and already planning a return trip! Thank you Carmen for being wonderful :)

位置好 步行五分钟到铜锣湾地铁和sogo 时代广场 楼下有超市 药店 sasa和卓越 后面有菜市场和海鲜市场 十分方便
房间很舒适 干净 安全 
Carmen很好 善良 而且还给我们送来了小电饭煲 很感动  

Very good location. 5 minutes walk to MTR and shopping mall. 7-11 is just downstairs and very close to cosmetic stores and local market. 

The room is clean, comfortable and more importantly , very safe. 

Carmen is really a friendly host.  I really appreciate her care during my stay.

We had a very enjoyable holiday in Hong Kong over the Rugby 7's weekend. The apartment although smaller than in most other countries was typical in size given our long term experience of Hong Kong apartments. It was however clean and comfortable and very well located with just a 10 min walk to either Wan Chai night life or the Star Ferry terminal to Kowloon etc. Carmen's attention to detail is also worthy of mention whereby she helped us to find our way around the apartment amenities and the local area. More than happy to recommend this apartment for a short term stay in HK.

Senang banget bisa menginap di apartment yang nyaman ini,,
dan pelayanan dari tuan rumah yang sangat bersahabat dan bisa menawarkan banyak bantuan..
Saya harap bisa kembali lagi ke tempat ini ^^

Dewi

Great location and cosy apartment. Apartment is clean and well maintain. Carmen is very helpful and checks back with us to see if we are doing well. Her respond is almost immediately. Love her apartment and will highly recommend her apartment to anyone looking for a cosy n great place to stay. I had a great experience staying like a local.

I stayed carmen's flat from 20 June to 22 June with my family in law (4 persons).
Carmen is a really kind host. She explained everything what I need.
Welcome drinks and snacks made our family so happy.
All transportations (tram, MTR, and bus) and supermarket is so close to the flat.
Her flat was perfect for my family.
When I will visit hong kong again, surely I will try to stay carmen's flat.

I stayed Carmen's flat at 27~29 jun with my family(4 adult & 1 baby). She is very kind and lovely host. She gave us transportation, tour spot, eat, market locatiton tips. Of course, her house was very clean and orderly. We loved her flat.

Carmen & Eric were good hosts. They were able to arrange airport transfers, & met us to hand over keys & instructions. The flat is small but well kept & equipped. It's easy to get around HK, with excellent public transport connections. All our communications were friendly, & very promptly answered. We had a great stay!
The flat is too small, can't even see the sky, not very comfortable.
Carmen的房子非常干净,一家人住着特别温馨｡地段也非常好,去铜锣湾地铁站和时代广场都最多只需要十分钟｡房子里生活必备物品很齐全｡除了衣物自己不需要带任何东西｡很细心提供了转换插头｡一家人在里面度过了美好的4个晚上｡如果有机会一定会再来入住｡

I rented Carmen's flat for family when they came to visit me. We have had a great week in Carmen's Flat. 
The location in Causeway Bay is very convenient and makes commuting to any parts of HK super easy! I love the Star Ferry and the terminal is just a short walk away.
In terms of the flat itself, it is exactly as described on the pictures, in a building on Lockhart road.
Carmen was really helpful and offered advice on HK and was checking that everything was OK.
To be honest, next time they come back, we will take it again!

Carmen was a wonderful host and did everything to make us feel comfortable and welcome. She provided a lot of useful information about the area and checked in every few days. The aparment is in a really convenient area. Some  may say the space is small but I live in Hong Kong and it is really comfy and spacious, especially for this area. The rooms both have big beds and there is a double bed sleeper couch in the lounge. It is exactly like the pictures. The kitchen is fully equipped and the drinks in the fridge for us were a nice touch. I will definitely book here again.
很庆幸可以住到这么好的公寓,地理位置绝佳,房东carmen和她老公eric人都超nice,对我们照顾有加,有问必答!

Carmen was very helpful before our trip with advice on a variety of matters. The flat immaculately clean, very quiet and easy to access.  It was a perfect base for me and my two colleagues on our business trip. It is centrally located - so we didn't need to take the MTR that much. Lockhart Road is bustling and colourful! We would stay here again.
Thank you Carmen!

We stayed 2 nights at Carmen's place. The apartment is very functional and extremely well located - right at the center of Causeway Bay action, and with plenty of great restaurant options. Carmen is a wonderful host, very responsive and extremely helpful and knowledgeable.
Highly recommended!

The location of the place is very convenient - it is right in the heart of CWB, just a short walk from the CWB MTR station, but far enough from all the traffic and activities to still be a quiet place. You will be glad to be able to come home easily anytime you want from all the hot/cold weather and shopping.

The host is friendly and provided us with all the necessary information in advance of our trip, with clearly layout documentation and touring suggestions so that we never feel lost in the action. She is also very responsive to our questions and even offer to arrange transportation for us if needed.

The apartment is clean and tidy, and the size is spacious by Hong Kong standard. it is well equipped with amenities and even instant coffees and tea. All equipment are very modern (especially impressed with the electronic door locks!) so do not let the age of the building fools you.

There are windows but don't expect any view since it is just second floor (we didn't go there for the view so we don't pay much attention to it). it has good air conditioning so ventilation is not a problem either.

We won't hesitate to book this place again next time if the occasion is right.

In one word wonderful. The apartment is in the middle of HK, with two metro stations nearby. Plenty of restaurants in the neighbourhood and shops close by. Carmen did much more than necessary to help us around, provide us with information and support us during our stay. The apartment was as advertized, clean and convenient. We stayed with a family of 4 and had more than enough space for us.
I would absolutely encourage you to use this apartment as a base for your stay in HK and will return myself next time I'm in HK.
Fantastic place w good location. Carmen took great care of us. Ensuring that all things were well. Would definitely stay there again on my next visit to HK.

Carmen's apartment was as described in her listing. It is in a convenient location, close to restaurants and transit. We did however find it very small for three people, and had difficulty since we had little room for our suitcases.

Carmen was an excellent host- she provided very detailed information on anything from how to get from the airport to the apartment to where to eat etc. the apartment was small (probably normal size for HK) but well laid-out, clean and comfortable for a multiple-day stay.

I did an urgent booking with Carmen's flat. She didn't be there to pick us up when I first arrived but every process and details that she provided to me the day before were promptly and thorough. 
That was our impressive.

The room was very nice and clean, fit for 4-5 persons even the space seems to be smaller than the photos but it doesn't matter. Everything you need i.e. cable TV, refrigerator, utensils, water heater or electric cooking plate etc. 
All with manual notes that easy to understand. 

However, Don't be so surprise with the entrance door of the flat and the neighborhood vibe on the same floor. It's Hong Kong style, as long as the room is clean I think it's good enough and much better than some hostels (of course!)

I recommend Carmen's place if you'd like to stay in a good location, very close to Time Square, Restaurants and all I can say is "Super Convenience"

Lovely place. 
Great host.
Thanks a lot Carmen!
设备齐全,能想到的都有,空调很凉,位置也很好,坐地铁很方便,周围吃的很多,晚上出来逛和吃的好选择
房子的地理位置非常好~离地铁很近~出门十分方便~全家出游是非常好的选择~房东非常的细心~基本都考虑到了~各种东西都有说明~

Carmen非常熱情,及時給到我相關的旅遊資訊,還幫忙提供了一個電飯煲｡

房間的佈置非常溫馨,我母親和兒子都非常喜歡,BB特別喜歡那三個小兵｡房子雖然不算大,但是住得很舒服｡

房間設置齊全,只需要自己帶上牙刷牙膏和毛巾｡離銅鑼灣地鐵C出口大約300米,只需要出來左轉一直走就可以了,出入非常方便｡銅鑼灣地鐵A出口的時代廣場有CitySuper,買東西自己煮都很不錯｡

下次來香港,絕對會優先考慮住在這裡｡
房东热情友好,解答问题细心,还特意准备了糖果等小零食｡公寓很温馨,设备一应俱全｡出行方便,离地铁口近,几分钟就走到时代广场｡总之,棒棒棒!白天玩累了一到公寓就倒在客厅沙发上瘫软下来舒缓腿脚,倒出冷藏的牛奶一饮而尽｡下次去香港还会考虑这家!
The host canceled this reservation 15 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
房东很热心 设施也很齐全 到了之后发现冰箱里还有水喝 超贴心｡公寓不大但是很温馨 而且地段超级好 走两步就是铜锣湾闹区 购物饮食非常方便  在香港能感受到家的感觉很棒
离地铁和叮叮车都不远,交通便利,附近都是喜欢的食肆

It was a meaningful trip for us and the stay at Carmen's place adds on to that. 

We had 3 adults and a baby and the space was just right. Typical Hong Kong size so don't expect it to be super spacious. We didn't get to meet the host, Carmen as she was away during our stay. We were provided with self-check-in instructions which were quite easy. She also messaged us to check if we were ok and told us to contact her if we had any issues.

As it was the first time my one year old baby travelled, we were quite anxious if he were to like the flight or the stay. Turns out its not that bad! Had requested Carmen to provide a pail so that we can bathe the little one but Carmen was so nice she provided a big baby bath which we were really grateful for.

Shower was good, as heater is provided with relatively good pump you would have no issues such as cold trickling water. Washing machine is functional, washing powder is provided too so no worries if you want to do some washing. Cooking utensils were also adequate, we brought a small pot and were able to cook baby's meals using everything provided including the induction cooker and the utensils.

It is on the second floor but you cant hear much noise from the streets.

Theres a great tv in the living area with channels and DVDs provided. Basically its a comfy place with all you need available.

Thanks Carmen we will definitely consider your apartment again when we visit Hong Kong again.

This is my first time using Airbnb and I feel lucky that I chose Carmen's  apartment and had a wonderful stay in Hong Kong.

From prior reviews, I know Carmen's apartment is kids friendly and I requested a baby bath tub to bathe my 6 month-old son. My elder daughter is fascinated by the three wood dolls. 

The apart is in perfect location, super convenient for shopping and dining. 

We only had a little problem with the water heater. It seems hot water would not be sufficient for a shower in cold days. So have to speed up a little bit. 

During the stay, Carmen is very responsive to my inquiries and questions. 

Overall, the pros outweighs the con and I'll definitely consider this place for my next trip to HK.

Great location, convenient access to MTR and short distance to Central. The apartment is very quiet, suitable for resting after a day of work or walk. Carmen was super nice, accommodate most of my needs. Highly recommend, will come back again.

This was my first trip to Hong Kong with my parents, and staying at Carmen's was the best decision we made! Her cute little apartment had everything we could need during our 4 day stay - so much attention to detail and caring for her guests. From a rice cooker and water kettle to a set of umbrellas, it all saved us plenty of time, effort and money! We could make ourselves breakfast and even a light dinner on a couple nights, thanks to all her kitchen supplies.

We didn't get to meet Carmen but all her instructions were super accurate and we didn't lose our way at any point. The door lock system was so convenient. We used bus A11 to get to her place from the airport. I suggest it to anyone who's thinking of taking public transport. It couldn't be easier. For all the sightseeing, we used the Causeway Bay MTR station as our starting and end point. Again, very easy and short walk from Carmen's place. We bought an octopus card as per her suggestion, which made things much faster and easier as well. 

If we ever go back to Hong Kong, we'll definitely consider this place again. It had a solution for all our needs. Please don't be intimidated by the small size of the apartment. It is very efficient and well organized and the sleep quality is great!

Carmen is very responsive and throughout our trip, I was able to ask her questions and she would answer within a few mins. 

Thank you so much for the wonderful stay in Hong Kong! It made our trip even more memorable.

Carmen was extremely helpful and warm with our stay even though we did not get to see her. However, her instructions was exceptionally clear regarding to the directions from the Airport to the apartment itself. We took the bus route from the Airport which was very convenient for us. The apartment was perfect for the four of us. The vicinity of the apartment was great as there were many eateries and restaurants just within the radius of the apartment. I'm really thankful for Carmen for such great hospitality, accommodating my friends and I, making this trip an unforgettable one.
我和老公带着妈妈还有儿子到香港玩了这几天,儿子的饭解决了,我们去崇光百货超市买的菜,很方便很舒适!儿子喜欢屋子里的士兵爷爷,楼下很多吃的,桥底辣蟹,避风塘辣蟹,鱼蛋粉､海皇粥!吃不完啊!门卫的大爷也很友善,出进门都会都会打招呼,很和蔼的!总之非常好的体验!我的随身Wi-Fi忘记在carmen家里,carmen也热心解决,而且,房卡拿回国内了､carmen说寄回来就好!carmen你太好了!!!

Carmen was great to work with!  She provided detailed information with visuals for transportation to the apartment along with instructions on use of the apartment and also dining and visiting ideas in the area.  The apartment was clean and functional, equipped with what we needed for our stay.  The bedrooms have limited space, but comfortable beds and it worked well for my daughter and I to have separate sleeping rooms.  The apartment is situated in the middle of the building, so be prepared for little natural light.  The washing machine in the kitchen area was very convenient for us, as we were in the middle of a longer trip and needed to do laundry.  Carmen had all instructions posted in the apartment and was available for any questions.  She responded in a very timely manner to answer questions or resolve any issues.
Lovely location, really convenient. The owner is so friendly as well. Highly recommend
公寓位置绝佳,装饰温馨舒适,房东细心周到,我们都喜欢她｡公寓距离铜锣湾地铁站约500米,去香港迪斯尼和中环都很近,如果孩子太小,需要安排宽松的行程,这里很合适｡房间内有做简餐的厨具､调料,好看的碟子和碗,可以去旁边居民区的菜市场买菜做饭,尤其适合带孩子不方便在外面吃的家庭｡
不好意思评价晚了些,房东人很好超级nice｡房间的地理位置很好,出门吃饭逛街交通很便利,房间的布置也非常的好很温馨住的很舒服,处处都有房东写的小便签超级窝心｡下次去还会确定!非常满意的一次体验!超级棒

Carmen was very easy to communicate with. She was a great host as she told us everything we needed to know. Her place is very well located. Everything is very convenient. The place was clean and everything was provided. I would rent this place again.

Carmen gave lots of travel tips and enough instructions for the flat before the trip. Although there was a toilet issue on the first day, the problem was solved on the next day. Overall, the location of the flat is great and it's worth staying.
The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
到香港参加贸发局的展会,住在铜锣湾这个位置,出门左转走大概1公里就到达展会目的地,地铁､公交都特别方便｡虽然早在进房间之前房东已经把明确的房间使用细节､周边交通､餐饮等等与生活起居相关的细节都告诉我了,进入房间后仍是更加温暖到以为回到了自己家里｡一场非常美妙的入住体验,以后来港,将会继续选择这里,超爱｡
交通方便 离地铁和机场大巴都很近 周围吃的和购物都很多 房间虽小五脏俱全 房东为你准备了一切 洗衣机 冰箱 一次性水杯 甚至连大米都有 房东有求必应 随时都回答你的任何疑问｡附近的居民也都是本地人 感觉很安全
The place is very comfy and clean! Everything you need are already inside the flat. Thanks for accommodating us. Til next time! Also, apologize for the damage that has been dealt.
性价比非常高｡到港凌晨了,房东还在帮忙联系司机,非常感谢｡Carmen还提前发了详细的攻略过来,我由于工作原因没能及时回复,她发了几遍跟我确认,有心了｡
Location is great, in tge middle of cuaseway bay madness. Apartment was very quiet still. Didn't meet Caren but the communication was very smooth. Could see myself staying there again.

房子的地理位置很方便,地鐵銅鑼灣c出口步行步行幾百米就到了｡我們來香港是要去會展中心3天的,步行過去會展中心要20分鐘多,1.4公里｡房子裡面設施齊全,我忘記帶插座轉換器了,幸虧屋子裡有一個,然後我們3個人輪流用,就不用買新的轉換器了｡洗澡熱水第二天同住的朋友說熱水不夠用,但後來很快就解決了,就是用的時候不要開到最大適中的水量就好了｡有點不太好的是,房子不怎麼通風,一進去或者每天進去都會感覺氣味好大,在屋子裡,鼻子感覺不舒服｡除了這個其他方面都是很滿意,感覺也挺安全的,我們三個女生住的,最後一晚我兩提前走了,朋友一個人住也沒事｡

The apt location is super great! Nearby many restaurants that open from morning till midnite, very near to wet market, supermarket, malls is within 5 mins walking distance. The apt is clean, Carmen is easy to reach, and very thoughtful, she even provide the bath tub for my baby. Im staying 6 nights and have a pleasant experiences. Thank you Carmen...

房子的位置非常好,确实挺安静,周边购物和餐饮都很方便｡房间不大,但三张床的尺寸还可以,足够用了｡房东热心周到,沟通回复非常快｡平安夜我一岁多的儿子把自己反锁在卧室里,幸亏房东及时接电话告诉了我备用钥匙的位置,几分钟内就都解决了｡也提醒带小童的朋友注意卧室的门锁｡

唯一的不足大概是房间的通风性能略差,但打开空调能缓解不少｡总之还是很适合家庭出游的｡

El espacio es un poco reducido pero bien para los standares de espacio en Hong Kong. Limpio, bonito y la dueña es una anfitriona increible. La ubicación es muy buena, cerca de restaurantes, tiendas y estación de metro a 5 min caminando.

Carmen is really accommodating when it comes to my questions. I asked my aunt what she liked about Carmen's place and the top 3: Location, Clean bathroom and cozy bedroom! What she doesn't like: Nothing.
非常可爱的房子和房东,美中不足的一点,周围邻居烧香会有点呛
第一次选择airbnb,最大收获可以说遇到了好房东吧｡Carmen非常周到细致,屋内所需生活用品一应俱全,很适合家庭入住,Check-in和Check-out都很方便简单,需要注意的是居住者需要自己准备好拖鞋,洗澡水需要提前加热｡公寓是民居,很安全,私密性很好｡位置位于铜锣湾地铁口附近,步行仅仅5分钟的路程｡紧邻sogo和希慎广场,购物十分方便｡

It was totally a great experience for me and my family staying at Carmen's homestay for 5 days in Wanchai. This place is quite ideal for five of us, although it looked a bit small in reality but it's enough, comfortable. A great location for walking to Mtr station, or take Tram. Carmen was not in HK during my staying period, but it doesnt bother. Carmen almost answer my question/providing her help immediately whenever i ask. For example, on the second day i told Carmen the detergent was depleted ,she asked her friend put the detergent in front of the door without interrupting me(it was 11pm that time). Only one thing need to be improve, the water heater, it's not stable. It could only provide very limited hot water even if i already pre-heat 25mins before using. Not ideal for staying during winter if this trouble exists. Other than this, I could say this homestay have everything you might need. Worth recommend.
地理位置挺好的,房间虽小但很干净整洁,对于香港这个寸土寸金的地方,房间小是正常的,附近到处都是吃的,坐地铁也很方便

hank you Carmen, we enjoyed our stay at your place. It is a great location for shopping, eating and MTR. The information you provided was detailed and very helpful during our stay. Would stay here again if were plan on vacationing in Hong Kong again. You are a wondeful host!

Carmen is a very awesome host who really takes good care of her guests - preparing all the necessary information (eg. travel tips from airport, tourist attractions, taxi-card etc) even before we asked for it! her house is clean, well-furnished. just a lil disappointed that we cannot watch some of the local channels on TV due to poor signal. But other than that, it's really clean and comfortable.
The host was very responsive and provides great instructions, travel tips and information. The apartment was clean and is well located. Carmen was a great host to deal with.
位置太方便了,房子很温馨居家很舒适,非常好
非常温馨的小屋,有家的感觉,适合三到四人同行居住~非常棒的体验,地理位置极为优越,房子非常干净整洁,房东很热情很负责

Carman is the best airbnb host I have ever had! Check in was very simple and she provided travel documents and tips that made our stay in Hong Kong go seamlessly. I would absolutely recommend This place to anyone staying in Hong Kong!

Carmen is an extremely helpful guest. We had a lot of questions during our stay, but she always answered us promptly. She was also especially accommodating when we wanted a late checkout, when we wanted a private airport shuttle, and when we lost her key card. 

The area where Carmen's apartment is located is also extremely convenient. There are lots of cool restaurants and bars and convenience stores everywhere. It's also only a couple blocks away from a metro station.

Finally, the apartment itself was incredibly clean, came with many amenities (and snacks!), and was very easy to find. Overall, an amazing stay. Thank you so much!
公寓位置很好找､房东热情､里面也很干净…
房东提供了很多的帮助,包括提醒我们很多次台风预警级别及变动,对我们的行程安排给出中肯的建议｡同时她也很耐心地解答我们的问题

感谢房东Carmen,沟通有效,快速回复,给予很多有效建议｡
同行三个成人,一个孩子,房间面积比酒店大一些,住着很舒适,厨具很齐全,离鹅颈市场不远,可以买菜买米,简单做饭｡楼下有一家茶餐厅,味道一般,不如自己做｡
离时代广场很近,时代广场下边就是铜锣湾地铁站,香港的地铁太发达了,到哪都很方便｡这几天去迪士尼,西贡,维多利亚湾,东涌免税店都是地铁出行,很方便｡
除了面积稍小,其他方面都非常好｡尤其是房东非常热情｡

Carmen is a great host. She gives very detailed information about the flat, transportation, and traveling tips. She is always there for us and offers timely reminders. The flat itself is clean and nice, with very convenient transportation and all sorts of facilities.
房东很nice,房间物品齐全,基本就是拎包入住,适合家庭出游,靠近铜锣湾,出行方便,不错
Carmen's place is very convenient. She is very communicable and responsible.
房东很不错,房子很干净,位置方便,下楼就能买早餐,适合家庭居住,很感谢房东!希望下次去香港还能去你家!
It was my second time staying at Carmen's place and I think I'll be staying here again whenever I'm in HK. The location is very convenient.  It's a good place to stay in Hong Kong.

Carmen is a considerate landlord providing us many useful information and reply quickly for my inquiries. Our checkin and checkout are simple and smooth. The apartment locates near causeway bay and you can easily find the food, shopping stores and public transportation nearby. The  place is friendly for family with kids. They have children bathtub(very useful for my 1 year old baby) and children pillow(not used by my baby but thoughtful for children). You can do simple cook as it has mostly the cooking tools you need. The only things I’m not used to is I have to hang my wet clothes in the living room under the aircon to dry. But I assume in the HK downtown area most places are the same. 
Overall experience is very good. Recommend family group with children to stay.
The host canceled this reservation 82 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
房子地理位置非常便利,地铁巴士叮叮车,都超级方便｡房子里面细节很到位,做饭工具和床上毯子等等,房东沟通都很及时,再次感谢
应该没有什么

I appreciate how convenient the location is to shops , restaurants and public transportation. Carmen was very helpful. She answered all our questions in a timely manner and have arranged a transfer for us from the flat to the apartment.
整体来说都还不错,房东Carmen也挺热情的,还给了很多贴心的小建议,这套公寓里面也贴有温馨提示的小标签,唯一的不足就是淋浴,由于热水需要提前烧好,建议大家在洗澡之前,先烧半小时左右

Carmen was a helpful and approachable host with a wealth of local knowledge and excellent suggestions particularly if it is your first trip to Hong Kong. She was understanding towards us on multiple occasions. Her apartment was perfect for our family of 5 - location is great for food, shopping and access to public transport. I highly recommend and would stay here again myself.

花费9000+人民币预定了四晚,想体验小但如照片所示的“精美”的香港房子,一进屋便觉上当,住了几个小时实在不能忍受,房东坚决不协商,为了家人健康考虑,立即重新预定的附近酒店｡总结几条给大家参考:1. 房子没有光线,有种“山洞”的压抑感,除非你喜欢别轻易尝试;2. 房间霉味很重,跟没阳光和紧邻洗手间有关;3. 隔音很差;4. 地面非常湿滑,缺乏必要方便的用品;5. 床和床上用品很差,所谓床只是个劣质床垫,沙发很不舒服,被子很厚而且都是真空棉(我感觉就是房东家不用的东西,拿来可怜我们的吧);6. 房东非常难沟通,airBnB也帮不上忙(他们的意思是我需要提前问这些,一旦定了,一切看房东意见,按此逻辑就算房子要倒了,或者肮脏到不堪,只要房东说ok,他就ok,消费者需要承担所有责任!),我大概只能自我安慰了｡写在这里,希望他们不要再骗人了,开得起这个价格,也请对得起这个价格｡大陆人不是SB,钱多人傻吗?做人请对得起良心,做企业也需要责任感｡

name: Casa da Hera - The Ivy House
summary: Beautiful 150 y/o house in the heart of the old town of Porto. If you want to get the taste of real life in town, in a lively neighbourhood, come and stay at our 3 bedroom house, where you'll find all the comfort you need for your stay in Porto. Waiting for you, there will be a complimentary fine bottle of Douro wine from the famous brand Poças Júnior!!
space: It's almost impossible to find a house with more caracter. It's a 3 floor building with 11 big windows and a large conical skylight over amazing spiral stairs. In the center of the staircase, hanging from the second to ground floor, you'll find the 25 y/o beautiful ivy that gives name to the house. You'll have access to the entire house, with a dinning-room with stone wall, next to a large fully equipped kitchen, large living-room with chill-out area, large LCD TV and library, 3 rooms (2 double rooms and 1 twin room), 3 complete bathrooms (one in each bedroom) and 1 toilet. All bedrooms have private bathroom and are equipped with modern double-glass windows for extra comfort. The entire house is equipped with air-conditioning (5 independent machines in every bedroom, living-room and dinning-room).
description: Beautiful 150 y/o house in the heart of the old town of Porto. If you want to get the taste of real life in town, in a lively neighbourhood, come and stay at our 3 bedroom house, where you'll find all the comfort you need for your stay in Porto. Waiting for you, there will be a complimentary fine bottle of Douro wine from the famous brand Poças Júnior!! It's almost impossible to find a house with more caracter. It's a 3 floor building with 11 big windows and a large conical skylight over amazing spiral stairs. In the center of the staircase, hanging from the second to ground floor, you'll find the 25 y/o beautiful ivy that gives name to the house. You'll have access to the entire house, with a dinning-room with stone wall, next to a large fully equipped kitchen, large living-room with chill-out area, large LCD TV and library, 3 rooms (2 double rooms and 1 twin room), 3 complete bathrooms (one in each bedroom) and 1 toilet. All bedrooms have private bathroom and are equipped with modern
neighborhood_overview: This is one of the oldest neighbourhoods in Porto, with narrow stone stairs and streets climbing the hill. Centuries ago, there was a jewish quarter which, until the present day, give names to some streets. The house faces a beautiful patio where you can see children playing and the neighbours in their normal life. Across the street is the old customs house, nowadays home of 3 museums and a congress venue. This is a very traditional neighbourhood, full or genuine life and local people.
notes: Free Douro wine, Portuguese coffee, tea from the Azores (the only tea produced in Europe), traditional marine sea salt from the Algarve, family made olive oil, etc.. Free wifi with broadband connection. 140 TV channels in several different languages. We have hundreds of books you can read and we invite you to bring one more, in your own language or about your homeland, to had more flavour to our library.  (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) From March 1, (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) the Municipality of Porto began to charge the municipal tourist fee. You will be charged 2€ per overnight and per person, up to a maximum of 14€. Payment must be made on the day of check in. The amount is delivered in full to the City Hall of Porto.
transit: Bus and tram at the door step. Boat cruises 5min walking. Airport 20min by car.
access: Entire house.
interaction: We'll be happy to provide you all the information you need to take full profit of your stay in town.
house_rules: This is a private family house, which can be yours during your stay. Please treat it as if it was your own house.

host.host_about:
I'm a professional photographer and Director of Photography, always traveling around the world. 
I recently moved to another city and I decided to rent my own private house, so others can enjoy this beautiful building and neighbourhood. Our guests can read some of my books, relax at the chillout and meet the famous ivy that gives name to the house. 
I love to meet people from different countries and cultures, so I'll be happy to receive new guests.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
We needed to find a suitable apartment for a family consisting of a grandmother, two couples and one small child on fairly short notice.  Carlos was very responsive to my initial inquiry and to all subsequent inquiries about the house.

Although Carlos was out of town, he arranged for Vitor to be available to us during the rental.  Vitor was very helpful.  We had to open some locked windows and Vitor came within an hour to fix the problem.  Also, we had a hot water issue, but again Vitor was at the house and fixed the problem immediately (so fast I didn't have a chance to read his response email - he arrived before it did!).  These issues happen and the most important thing is to get them fixed as quickly as possible.  I was impressed with the level of responsiveness.

The house is well designed and charming.  The pictures are accurate - the house is beautiful.  The beds are very comfortable.  We used all the appliances and all worked.  There are plenty of pots and pans and sufficient dishes, glasses and cutlery.  We bought fish at the Bolhao market and had a great dinner at home one night in the dining room that we cooked in the kitchen of the house. The internet was also fine.

The host supplied a decent baby bed and a very good high chair for the baby.  The house was very clean upon arrival.  The locks work well, but are tricky for North Americans.  Be sure to try them with the host present.

It isn't clear from the pictures or description, but there are multiple levels to the house all reached via a spiral staircase in the middle.  There is one double bedroom on the ground floor that has its own 2 piece bathroom.  People using this room have to go upstairs to someone else's bathroom to bathe or shower.  (The other two bedrooms have beautiful ensuite full bathrooms). This was not a problem for us at all.  There is also one other 1/2 bathroom in the house.

This house is in a very residential neighbourhood but in the old part of town.  It's about a 10 minute walk to the restaurants along the riverside.  We walked to the port houses from here - about 20 minutes walk with a great view of the river the whole way (and we were pushing a stroller).  There are a couple of good neighbourhood cafes very close by and a small grocery store a few metres away where we could buy meat, cheese, wine, milk etc. - limited selection, but all the necessities are available.  The location is reasonably quiet at night too.  It's a good location to be in to feel as if you are living like a local but close enough to walk to the main sights or catch a bus if necessary.  The tram to the beach at Foz do Douro stops nearby as well.

I would stay here again.

Carlos was super friendly and helpful. His place is beautiful, clean and tidy. We broke a window through an accident, and he was very helpful in fixing it. If I come back to Porto (which I hope I will) I would very much like to stay there again.
Very great place to stay, feeling really in the nice quarter of Porto. Clean and professional, if you have the money, worth to visit it

Casa da Hera house is very special and well located place to stay in Porto.
You have a real feel of what is a local life staying there. Neighbourhood is very calm and safe with small local shops/restaurants around and with the old Eletrico (tram) passing in front from time to time to complete the bucolic feeling. House is very well equipped and pictures are very representative. Talking about pictures, staying there you will have a personal Porto photography exhibition from the owner that decorates all main rooms. Vitor, the house manager is very nice and ready to help the guests. We would definitely recommend it to friends!

Carlos was a great host. He collected us as soon as we arrived with the taxi. He was extremely kind and provided really useful information.
The house is clean and elegantly furnished, and there are lots of restrooms with showers.

The stairs have to be taken into account if you are not used to them, since reaching the top floor might be uncomfortable.
The room located on the side of the main street is quite noisy early in the morning, when the city awakens and the bar in the square opens.

The location is perfect if you want to visit Porto. The center of the city is really close, and you can reach almost any point of interest on foot.

Porto is a beautiful city, and Casa Da Hera is a great place to stay!
Très jolie maison et très bien placée ! Parfaite pour un court séjour à Porto

Superbe maison! Super accueil!
C'était très propres et la literie très confortable... Génial pour un séjour entre amis... 
Quartier super mignon face au douro, facile de se garer gratuitement en plein mois d'août et tout se fait à pied ou en taxi après...

The house is simply beautiful and amazingly decorated. The location is perfect, as you are very close to the River Douro and within walking distance to the Clerigos, Galerias Paris, Lello. The contact with the hosts was very easy.  They are responsive and kind. I absolutely recommend  this property.

We were greeted by Carlos's friend Vitor who was very friendly and helpful. Vitor helped us organise a return taxi as I was unsure whether i had been understood by the cab company. Thanks Vitor - you put my mind at rest!
The house is beautiful - stunningly decorated and had everything we could possibly need. It's in a central location and so everything was in walking distance, we found some super small bars close by.
It was also a short bus ride away(and bus right outside the house) to the fab beaches.
I think the only thing I would say was that if you are a light sleeper (as we i am), bring ear plugs as the noise from the road and revellers is incessant
It was amazing house with the spirit of Pot:)

Casa da Hera is a well appointed house, with plenty of room for 6 people. We had a baby so there was a good cot and high chair. The bean bag chill out area was great for sitting with the baby.
The area is good with two great restaurants just in the square. We would recommend this to anyone.
Super schönes Haus. Sehr sauber, super Lage. Wir hatten eine tolle Zeit in Porto.

Carlos biedt een prachtig huis aan, direct aan de rivier en zeer dicht bij het centrum. Dagelijks werden we bij gestaan door hen met toeristische informatie en hulp. Wij danken hem voor zijn gastvrijheid!

Agréable appartement très propre à partager en famille ou avec des amis, vraiment bien situé. Vitor a été patient et à notre disposition.
Nous reviendrons. Cordialement

La casa esta muy agradable y limpia; caminando se llega a los sitios más importantes del centro histórico de Oporto.
Ampliamente recomendada.

Perfect appartement not far from the city centre (couple of minutes by foot) appartement was nice decorated, clean, spacious for 6 and we enjoyed the stay. Arrival was smooth and communication quick & helpfull. Would recommend it

Carlos  home is really very cozy and comfortable and we could not get much better. In a few minutes you can easily reach the lively area of Ribeira but also in the square just under home, by Mrs  Rosario  we ate a fantastic Portuguese food, not to be missed !!
Thanks Carlos for your hospitality!
Giuliana

GOOD:
- Carlos is really nice and hlepful. He arranged the staff waiting for us at the house who showed us around the house and provided a lot travel tips for us. And the next tenant will arrive later so Carlos also offered us a late check-out.
- The house is near the river and 15min walk to the center. It's clean, quiet, and confortable.

Maison très bien rénovée, tout en hauteur,  avec une excellente literie et située près du fleuve dans un quartier où les gens sont serviables. Le tram et le bus touristique sont à 150 mètres de la maison pour une découverte de la ville. Nous n'avons pas utilisé la cuisine, au pied de l'immeuble il y a un café où le petit déj coûte 1.20€, et en longeant la façade de la maison sur le même trottoir à 300 mètres vous trouverez un petit restaurant très pratique pour le soir, chez Dany qui a vécu en France, fait une cuisine du tonnerre, vend sa bouteille de vin pour trois euros, donc succulent dîner pour moins de dix euros.

The house was in good condition. Close to the port. Was a bit noisy to sleep as at night can be very busy with nightlife. I think overall was good, we were a bit concerned with the wifi as it did not work well, the kitchen does need an upgrade since we used it a lot for breakfast only. Some of the plugs or connectors did not work on some areas.

A very comfortable house within a quick walk to the centre of Porto. Our group was happy to have such spacious accommodations and 2.5 bathrooms! The restaurant just around the corner is also highly recommended. 
The house manager who met us had informed us that we could call her anytime - however, we experienced a few minor inconveniences on our last day (tv didn't work, nor the outlets in the kitchen), but since we would not be staying longer we didn't request to have them fixed. We would still highly recommend staying here.
A general comment - if you arrive by taxi, make sure your taxi driver from the train station knows where they are going!

Me and my family loved the ivy house - central location and a good amount of space. House was left clean with tea and coffee etc. The hosts were really friendly and got back to my emails quickly - only downside was that the neighbourhood can be loud.
We werden welkom onthaald door Vitor en Filipa, die daarvoor het huis nog even goed schoon hadden gemaakt.

Tivemos uma experiência deliciosa no Porto e na Casa da Hera. Super bem localizada, estávamos com um carro alugado e conseguimos estacioná-lo na rua tranqüilamente. A casa é tão linda quanto nas fotos, e super bem cuidada. Espaçosa, acomoda seis pessoas com bastante conforto. Minha única consideração: o quarto voltado para a rua é bem barulhento. Se vc tem o sono leve, opte por um dos outros dois quartos ou leve protetores de ouvido. Além dos carros, bondinho e ônibus, o bar que fica na esquina da frente abre cedinho e se ouve tudo... Fora isso, foi tudo perfeito! Ah, nao conhecemos o Carlos mas fomos recebidos pela Filipa e ela foi muito atenciosa. :-)

Highly recommended! We really enjoyed our stay in the Casa da Hera. It really is the most delightful house. Beautiful with lots of character and situated next to the old town - it was easy to walk from the house to the sights and to eat and drink. The house was immaculate and certainly contained all that we were looking for to provide a comfortable base and cook the odd meal. Carlos was helpful and easy to deal with.
Beautiful house in a brilliant location - would definitely recommend staying here for your visit to Porto!!

Casa da Hera was the perfect place to spend the weekend. The home is beautifully situated in a great part of town, a short walk from all of the great parts of town. Likewise, there are two great little cafes less than 20 m from the house. 

Carlos and Vitor made the trip extremely easy for us. I would recommend this place to anyone. Thanks again!

We really enjoyed the Ivy house! It is beautiful like pictured, perfectly located to explore the city and we got a very warm welcome from Margarida and Filipa. Thanks to them and Carlos for the opportunity to have such a great stay.

La entrega de llaves y recepción según lo acordado. 
Se trata de un barrio en "auge",  pero nosotros no tuvimos mucha suerte y nos rompieron dos cristales del coche. 
La casa está bien decorada, las habitaciones de los pisos superiores tienen mucha luz y son muy espaciosas; la habitación de la planta baja tiene mucho ruido, no tiene ducha y necesita cambiar el colchón.
En general la casa está bien, pero no reune condiciones para el invierno ( está mal aislada), no tiene garaje y tiene 2 baños completos y dos aseos.    
A pesar de todo tuvimos una estancia agradable y   pudimos ir caminando a todos los sitios, ya que está bien situada.

Carlos' place was great. It is a 150 year old house. Carlos' team was very flexible with our check in and check out time. The house 3 has  bedrooms, 2 of them have separate bathrooms and the first one has a separate toilet. Flat was spotless clean. We quite enjoyed our time in Carlos' place.

The Casa de Hera is a stunning house in a great location. Everything is as pictured in the photos. Beds were very comfortable. Though we didn't do much cooking ,the kitchen was stocked with everything needed to cook. The taberna right next door was a fantastic little restaurant, would highly recommend. We only had one issue - a fuse blew when both the heaters were on and some electronics were being used one morning. We couldn't get in touch with the host for 8 hours, but luckily we were out of the house all day. When we got back the host contacted us and we were able to resolve (press the black button in the fuse box if this happens to you!). All in all, a great stay in a charming city.

La maison est très bien pour 6 personnes avec un très bon rapport qualité-prix; elle est située dans un des anciens quartiers de Porto aux pieds de la ville. Il faut savoir que la ville est sur des collines donc cela grimpe doucement pour remonter du côté du centre touristique. Comme dans toute maison centenaire, habillez vous chaudement pendant l'hiver.
Il y a un supermarché Continente à 15 mn à pied côté mer, très pratique pour se réapprovisionner pendant la semaine.

The house was just beautiful! The furniture and the decoration really made us feel like being home. The location is perfect. Close to the city center and the historic tram stops right in front of the house. Carlos did take very good care of us when the river was about to flood. He is very concerned about his visitors well-being.

Everything was just perfect. We had a really warm welcome from Carlos and vitor. They helped us in any way And are so incomplicated. The location Is super cute. It's such a charming house with a lovely neughborhood. Everybody was so helpful and friendly to us, which made our stay unforgettable. We had a blast and a perfect weekend there. Absolutely high recommended. Thank you Carlos and Vitor!

The house is nice and comfortable.
However 2 rooms are quite noisy: you can hear people talking, cars and  party music... During a big part of the night. 
This is a litlle bit irritating...

This beautiful house is located in the riverside with close to the center of the city. We did not have any problem in check-in and Vitor provided all the relevant information on the facilities in the house. We very much enjoyed staying in this house and highly recommend for the visitors of Porto.
Great location and beautiful house

Das Casa da Hera ist sorgfältig und geschmackvoll renoviert, die Ausstattung ist sehr gut (Bad, Betten, Wohnraum) bis zweckmässig (Aufbewahrungskasten im Schlafzimmer). Die Bäder sind gut ausgestattet.
Gegen die feuchte Kälte in Porto im Februar halfen Elektro-Heizofen. Sie brachten genügend Wärme ins Haus. Sehr sympathisch: Café, Schokoladepulver, Teebeutel werden vom Gastgeber zur Verfügung gestellt. Noch besser schmeckt der Café natürlich im kleinen Restaurant gegenüber. Das Mara ist eine gute Frühstücks-Anlaufstelle.
Und abends ist die Taberna do barqueiro prima fürs Dinner.
Wir vier, zwei befreundete Paare fühlten uns sehr wohl im Haus. Bei Anliegen war auch sofort eine Ansprechperson erreichbar und half rasch! Super.

Vitor accueillant et courtois en annonçant que la machine à laver la vaisselle venait de tomber en panne. Au regard de l'état de la vaisselle
je reste dubitatif. D'ailleurs, aucun dépanneur n'est venu la réparer pendant notre séjour. La vaisselle est plus que vieillissante et juste suffisante pour 6 personnes.

Maison typique avec une distribution par demi étage dans les pièces.
Literie correcte sans plus, pas sommier mais plutôt des planches en bois. Attention il vaut mieux prendre une douche à la fois, le débit d'eau chaude à de la peine à suivre.

La maison est un peu excentrée par rapport à la ville basse mais reste assez centrale (proche du port et du pont Louis 1er). L'environnement est relativement calme tout en sachant que l'isolation phonique et thermique est quasi inexistante.

Le petit restaurant situé sur la place et en dessous de la maison est
un incontournable : très très bon !

  
Une des trois chambres n'est pas très agréable, situé au rez de chaussée et très sombre.

La maison doit-être agréable en été mais pas en hiver (10 à 13°C pendant notre séjour) car humide et froide. Il y avait trois radiateurs d'appoints.
We had a brilliant stay at Carlo's place. Everything we needed and in a good location.

Our trip in Porto staying in Carlos house was perfect. The house is exactly as described. Lots of space and lots of charm. We enjoyed taking our coffee in the cafe on the little place downstairs. Location is just off the center, so much more quiet and typical. Everything is accessible in a walking distance. Check on was super easy with a persons waiting for us when we arrived, with lots of explanations and advice for our visit. Great experience overall. Highly recommended!
The house and location was great. Close to shopping, restaurants, historic places.

We were met as planned, even though our train was late.  

The house was as pictured.

Fuimos un grupo de amigos y nos encontramos muy cómodos en la casa! Es muy amplia, cómoda y esta  muy bien ubicada.
Tuvimos un problema con el agua caliente pero enseguida nos lo resolvieron! Experiencia positiva

A very beautiful and large house, tastefully renovated, just near the Douro river. Very clean. And Carlos and his family help us at our arrival, giving us some tips about the city.
The city is just 10 min walking (tram stop just near if you don't want to suffer the Porto's street !)
Only detail : the front bedroom is a little bit noisy -because of the tram- (the 2 others are very quiet). But that's also the charm of the old buildings...

Check in went very smooth and Carlos even spoke to our cab driver to give him directions to the house.  The Ivy house is newly renovated and beautiful inside.  For 3 couples the only downfall was the two showers being in the bedrooms. The Ivy House is in an amazing location in Porto and I would highly recommend!

We had an exceptional experience.  The house is so beautiful and the location was perfect.  We found the greatest restaurant around the corner, Wee Porto, which we visited both nights.  I highly recommend staying here if you visit Porto.

Nous avons été véritablement séduit par le charme de cette maison qui nous a permis de vivre notre voyage autrement . La décoration est superbe , l'agencement parfait pour recevoir 6 personnes . La localisation permet de visiter Porto sans trop marcher. Le seul bémol serait le bruit de la rue passante à côté , mais quand on le sait, ce n'est plus un souci .
Une tres bonne adresse !

Nice stay in a beautiful house!
It was quiet and easy to find.
Just in front of the Douro.
The house looked Like exactly the pictures :)
Porto worth it!!!!
Der Empfang war sehr freundlich und alles hat bestens geklappt. Das Haus ist sehr gepflegt und ideal für 6 Personen. Die Lage ist genial. Vielen Dank!

The house was exactly as described and we felt like home. We were greeted very friendly and got a lot of tips for the City, e.g. ... In the front of the house was a little Café with an excelent breakfast. We ate every morning in this Café. 
We really enjoyed the stay in Porto and highly recommend this house.
Thank you very much for this wonderful time
Hope to see you again
Damaris & Dennis
We had a wonderful time at the Ivy House in Porto. The house is just wonderful, exactly as in the pictures and the location could not have been better. We would definitely recommend it!
We were made to feel most welcome when we arrived at Casa de Hera, which is a beautiful and unique house in a great area of town and near the river.

We had a fantastic three night stay in Carlo's Ivy House.
The house is very well located, and it was well fitted out and extremely clean. 
We felt at home, and we were very sorry to leave.
We would definitely stay again.

The house is exactly same as picture shows. It is big and well equipped. We had very good experience in the house. The communication has been good and smooth as well. Thanks for everything and I will recommend it.

Thanks Carlos for a lovely stay in Porto. The location was great, close to the action. The house was clean, bright and airy. It was rather noisy in the morning but only really a problem because it woke our young children earlier than we would have liked! The nearby cafes were all lovely and heaps of restaurants to choose from. Communication with the host was speedy and helpful. A great stay in Porto.

Nous avons toujours eu un contact par téléphone,  notamment avec les problèmes de vols suite aux grèves. Nous étions attendus et on nous a bien tout expliqué. Lits faits, serviettes propres avec le savon et  shampoing à disposition, super agréable ! Le logement était propre avec tout ce qu'il faut dans la cuisine. La TV accessible de suite.
跟描述的一样 不过底楼的房间略潮湿 路上的两个房间都很好 尤其是房顶和旋转楼梯! 房子的位置距离景点不行大约10分钟距离 好评!

Wunderschön und liebevoll hergerichtetes Haus, in dem man sich wohlfühlt. Wir wurden herzlich empfangen, alles lief reibungslos. 
Das Haus hat eine tolle Lage mit Cafés zum Frühstücken direkt vor der Tür. Sehenswürdigkeiten und Restaurants sind alle gut zu Fuß erreichbar. Alles in allem: jederzeit wieder :-)

We arrived in Porto a day early. Carlos was unable to accommodate us in his apartment but went out of his way to arrange a night's stay at elsewhere. The description of the apartment was very accurate. The location was excellent, close to old town & river.

We had a very pleasant stay in The Ivy House. When we arrived early in the morning it was no problem to drop our luggage and change our clothes, while they were cleaning the house. Afterwards, everything was very clean and they explained what to do and who we could call in case we needed a taxi, had a problem with the fridge or anything else. The location of the house was perfect. On walking distance of the city center and near the river. I would definitely recommend staying in Carlos’ house. Except for the noise you hear from outside (it’s an old house so not much isolation) I don’t have any remarks.
Maison de charme et très bien située ! Parfaite pour un court séjour à Porto. Par contre, un peu bruyant dans la rue le matin.

Really amazing house in a perfect neighborhood!
Thank you very much for the pleasant stay in Porto!!
Manager was very flexible upon arrival and very nice and helpful. The apartment was exactly what we epected and more, it was even in a very central location. It was an amazing stay at carlos's !

This house is absolutely amazing. From the moment we walked in to the moment we left, this house felt like our home right away. There is plenty of space for six people to sleep and even enough space to watch a movie together or eat. The rooms were clean, the kitchen had everything. Our host was very friendly, received us the day we arrived and answered later questions promptly. This house is close to everything and gives you an authentic Porto experience. We loved it.

Carlos was very responsive and accommodating before our trip, and Vitor who met us at the house was also very helpful when we had some questions.
Before our trip we were a bit concerned about the noise around the house, since there are a couple of cafes/restaurants right outside the house.
But the cafes were not open late at night, so apart from some minor construction work in the neighborhood it was quite ok with the noise level.
By the way we can recommend a visit or two to the "Taberna do Barqueiro" right outside the house.
The food is great and prices much lower than at the city center/seafront.
We were very happy with the location of the house, and it was very easy to get around from here.
We mainly walked around, but there’s also a tram/bus (to the beach) which has a stop close to.

Todo es y fue perfecto :)
Nos ayudo con todo lo que necesitamos. Incluso con el favor personal de comprarnos una botella de cava para una amiga que celebraba un evento especial.
Además estuvo esperándonos mucho tiempo en la casa, habiéndonos retrasado nosotras más de la hora acordada.
En general todo fue inmejorable. Una estancia 10

Carlos was very responsive upon booking. He had a relative meet us, she was very nice. We felt terrible as we got lost on our way and she waited for over an hour for us! They had plenty of coffee and the wifi worked well. There is the most delicious restaurant/cafe right downstairs, nothing fancy but the food is incredible. The home was great, very nicely taken care of. The location couldn't be better! You can walk right out your door and be to the waterfront in 5 min. If you go in the summer keep in mind that there is no air conditioning so it was extremely hot. We did a day tour to the Duoro Wine region which was beautiful and the port was delicious. I would absolutely stay here again.

La casa es preciosa pero algo ruidosa. 
La situación es bastante buena.
Las personas que nos atendieron a la llegada fueron muy amables.
Das Haus hatte eine super Lage und war sehr schön eingerichtet und sauber wir würden wieder dieses Haus mieten wenn wir zurück nach Porto gehen würden.

It was an incredible house and we had an amazing stay at Carlos's house. We enjoyed our time in Porto and would highly recommend that house because it's pretty big and really clean and enjoyable. Vitor who's working with Carlos was very helpful and available.

L'appartement est plutôt propre et très bien situé dans le centre de Porto. Le contact est très facile avec Carlos avec qui nous avons échangé avant notre arrivée et Vitor qui nous a accueilli. Bien qu'il y ait 3 chambre - 3 lits double, la maison n'est agréable que pour 4 personnes. La literie de la chambre au rez de chaussé est veille, le matelas peu confortable et il n'y a pas de salle de bain. Il faut donc passer par une des deux autres chambres pour accéder à une salle de bain. Aux petites heures du matin il faut s'attendre à avoir un peu de bruit (tram, poubelles, personnes qui parlent dans les rues,...) mais je pense que tous les appartements à Porto sont les mêmes sur ce point !

Great house in a remote location but close to everything! 
Welcome was great and we enjoyed all the amenities!
Don't forget to try the restaurant just next to the house that is great value for the quality!
Note that the house has lots of stairs and might not be suited for those who would have difficulties climbing and going down stairs. Fortunately there was a room just next to the entrance so we left our many luggage there.

The home was amazing and our host was incredible.  It exceeded our expectations.  The area was perfect for walking everywhere and catching the tram to the beach area.  He also put us in touch with the best walking tour guide.  I would highly recommend The Ivy House and visiting Porto was a wonderful experience

Dejligt hus. Nem tilgang til den gamle bydel i Porto og flodens liv, men ligger roligt tilbagetrukket.
Vi spiste på restauranten nedenunder, en fantastisk restaurant.

We were great as soon ass we exited our taxi by a charming representative.  We were introduced to the house and all of is accommodations.  This house is very special in every detail. You stay in this house and you feel you are in the heart of Porto.  One step out the door your enjoying a coffee and pastry with your neighbors.

Our first visit to Porto, The position of Carloss house was excellent, close to the river, close to lots of restuarants, small supermarkets close by. Carlos assistant was waiting at the house for us when we arrived, she explained everything in the house, showed us where everything was. She also provided us with a contact by (Hidden by Airbnb) for taxis, which was really convenient, to enable us to get our bearings. The house was beautiful, better than we could have imagined. We were 4 ladies who have been friends for nearly 40 years, and just loved the whole Porto experience. Would highly recommend Porto, and also The Ivy House. The Portugese people we met in every situation, were so friendly, and helpful. The position of The Ivy House  for us was great, it was on the tram line,bus line and the Red and Yellow tourist bus line, worthwhile using. We had the best time ever.  Thankyou so much Carlos and friends for making our stay so wonderful.  The house was so comfortable, and we loved coming back in the evenings to sit in the sitting room.  Loved the decor, pictures, and the lighting furnishings etc, all beautiful.

We are totally satisfied with our stay in the Ivy House and would like to go back. It corresponds to the description and the photos, it is centrally located, close to public transportation and everything we needed. The house is beautifully and smartly renovated, has every modern comfort and lacks nothing! The price to pay for being so central is of course the noise of the streets... 
Margarida and Carlos were extremely helpful and went out of their way to make us comfortable.
The location fits perfectly with the overall character of Porto, which we loved especially at this time of the year.

We had a fantastic vacation in this wonderfull house in Porto. the house is very beautiful, very spacious and very comfortable. The house is very well situated in a nice neighbourhood, with a lot of good restaurants. You should certainly try the coffee bar and the tapas bar on the little square next to the house.
Carlos is a very kind and flexible host.
We certainly recommend this house.
Lovely home in a residential area close to the centre of town.
Perfect place. Perfect apartament. Perfect host.

From booking, arrival, help during our stay & return taxi, our stay went like a dream. Carlos was extremely helpful. House is really lovely, in a great spot (not touristy - which we loved). There was even a fab restaurant/bar just downstairs! We would definitely recommend & wish we were still there. Porto & Ivy House exceeded our expectations.

Altough we arrived much later than planned we got the keys right when we arrived. The house is a beautiful renovated old house and we felt really welcomed. 
Super clean and spacious and parking directly in front. 
Thanks for this great experience.

We kregen een rondleiding in het huis.Het huis was ook super proper.En als extraatje stond er een fles wijn voor ons klaar. Echt geweldig .
De advertentiebeschrijving klopte volledig.Nog veel mooier dan op de foto's
Het is daar een zeer rustige buurt ,ook een zeer goede uitvalsbasis je bent overal dicht bij   .Als we terug naar Porto komen willen we daar zeker terug verblijven .Zo mooi,zo rustig echt top

Carlos' home was everything it was promised to be and more. Situated in a neighbourhood that while centrally located, still has many people who live their lives in the hilly streets. It was everything I hoped it would be. Furthermore, when a mistake by myself in booking the correct dates left us homeless for an evening, Carlos and his property manager arranged for us to have a lovely evening at his families Guest house in Vila do Conde, where we had a lovely stay, that became a highlight of our trip! Not only would I love to return to Porto, I would never consider staying anywhere else!

Casa da Hera is exactly as in the photos - very stylish and comfortable, with nice bottle of local wine to welcome us (which sadly we did not get time to drink as so many great places to dine out)!  We loved the location - an easy stroll to restaurants and bars of Ribeira and port cellars of Gaia.
Carlos was very quick to respond to emails with advice about travel from airport and check-in was easy (a friend  met us and showed us around the house).  
I would just mention two things - first it was very noisy at night, just general street noise (mostly the refuse guys who were the noisiest I have known!) but we did not mind this too much.  Second, this is the first time we have stayed in an AirBnB property and there was NO info about the local area, places to shop for essentials, restaurant recommendations (didn't stop us enjoying our stay at all as most things on doorstep but would have been helpful).
We loved our stay at Carlos's house and would definitely try to book again if visiting Porto (which is likely as it was really beautiful, relaxed and fab sunny weather even at end of October).

We had a wonderful experience at the Ivy House of Carlos in Porto.
Shortly after we arrived, Vitor greeted us and  even secured a parking space for us to park our car only 20 meters from the apartment. 
The apartment was very nice and homie, very well furnished with all the essential you might need. It is perfectly located for all the sightseeing Porto has to offer.
I highly recommend the LOFT for your next visit.
Armand, Lise, Heather and Derm

The house is perfectly located in the old town of Porto. It's very spacious and cozy. We even got a bottle of wine from the host as a welcome present. All in all wonderful stay, great host and a perfect house. I can definitely recommend this airbnb to other visitors! Thank you Carlos

The house itself looked beautiful, just like on the pics. Very stylish. The kitchen was well equipped and the owner left us tea, cafe, sugar and all the essentials and a bootle of wine, which was a nice thought. But be prepared, the third room of the flat is on the ground floor and it is wet and smells terribly. We removed the mattresses and took them to the living room. Also, the house is very noisy, be sure you packed your earplugs too. But for a 3night stand it is well located, 10 minutes walk to the main sights and a nice local tapas bar is available just on the corner.

Realmente la casa es tal como se aprecia en la información facilitado. No nos atendió directamente el anfitrión pero nos informo de todo lo necesario y a la llegada nos atendió Margarida muy correctamente.

We loved Carlos's place. My fiance and I were staying with my parents and the set up of this place was perfect for two couples. The house itself was also very cool. It's a  beautiful, historic home and a neat spot on the water in Porto. Very close to the center of town.
Great spacious apartment with loads of character and close to everything, we had a fantastic stay. Could not fault it, and very helpful hosts. Highly recommended
Wonderful apartment, wonderful location, wonderful host. Highly recommended!

A lovely house, near to the centre and great communication. 
5 stars can't fault it in any way.
Many thanks Carlos and Vitor.

Das Haus liegt ganz zentral in Porto. Das Viertel hat viele Ateliers und Künstlerflair.
Der Gastgeber hat uns total nett mit einer Flasche Wein begrüsst und wir haben uns wunderbar wohl gefühlt. Zu empfehlen!
We received great welcome gift. House is nicer than on the pictures.  Great location. Wonderful host. We would definitely stay there again.
Great location, beautiful apartment and great host!

We had a wonderful time in Porto and absolutely loved staying at Casa de Ivy. The home was clean, a five minute walk to Ribera which was our favourite spot to visit and very comfortable/safe feeling. This was our first time booking a place with AirBNB and it was an overall fantastic experience. The description is completely accurate.
Thank you Carlos and thank you AirBNB!

A beautiful home, could walk anywhere in Porto from here. Great communication and helped us with storing luggage due to late departure and called taxi to pick us up.  Porto is a lovely location, and Carlos' home has been beautifully renovated.
Casa stupenda, super attrezzata e arredata con gusto, un sogno alloggiare lì. Vitor è stato gentilissimo nell'accoglienza. Consigliatissimo

We stayed at Casa de Hera as two families in January. The house is at a great location and has tons of character. There are three floors and a lot of stairs involved but this adds to the fun and character. Although it is not shown in the photos, all rooms has air conditioning, which kept us warm during cold winter times. The house is very close to Ribeira and the area is mostly quiet during our stay. We rented a car to visit Douro and didn't have any difficulty parking outside. We suggest a visit to Taberna do Barquerio which is a simple restaurant just under the house with delicious food and great hospitality.
Carlos was prompt on answering our messages, Vitor was very helpful and the check-in was swift. Strongly suggested!

La casa es estupenda y carlos un encanto. La pena es que he dejado el coche justo al lado y se suponía un sitio seguro y me han robado. Así es que si llevas matrícula extranjera deja el coche un parking y ve a pie, no lo dejes en el barrio.
Todos nós gostamos, a localização é muito boa, bem próximo da Ribeira e tivemos uma boa surpresa que foi o restaurante Taverna Barqueira.
One of the best stay in my Airbnb stay. Very good people, location and clean. I really recommend here.
Good experience

My 3 friends and I really enjoyed our time in Porto and Carlos's place was a big reason we had a great time. The location is excellent, and were able to easily walk to the river front and bars/restaurants in the city center. There is plenty of space and the whole apartment was very comfortable. I would stay at Carlo's place again if i'm ever back in Porto.

Ótima opção para famílias. apartamento muito bem localizado. Anfitrião muito atencioso e educado.
Recomento muitíssimo

Carlos is an excellent host. This house is absolutely well-equipped and well-tendered, nicely done up, bright and cosy. The surrounding of the beautiful house is very charming. It is ideally located for exploring Porto - just a short walk into the historic centre of the city. Moreover there is a tram station nearby to the ocean. Carlos´ house manager Vitor is absolutely reliable, always available for questions and very obliging. For our next trip to Porto this house would be on top of our wish list again. Thank you very much, Carlos and Vitor!
Appartamento in buona posizione tranquilla arredato con gusto.

Carlos's house is just as beautiful as it looks in the pictures. In terms of space, location, cleanliness, it's really fantastic value for money. We stayed in March and it was quite cold in the rooms at night but as long as you give the heaters enough time it warms up nicely. Carlos's communication was excellent and his friend Margarida made check in quick and easy. We had a great weekend and will definitely stay again.
Great host and great house. The house made the trip!

Super centrale, pulito e decisamente più bello delle foto. Siamo rimasti sorpresi. Si va a piede nella parte più bella e caraterística del porto. Vicino anche al posto dove si assaggiano i vini. La casa ha tutto. Vitor, il ragazzo che lavora con Carlos ci ha ricevuti con eccellenza. Stra raccomando

Super smooth checkin and property is as the pictures show it. Great easy location to amazing food, sights, and more. Would absolutely recommend! Pluses to have the kitchen nicely stocked for cooking and lots of extra towels etc.

At tip after you book: Getting here via car is a little tricky...look for cafe Mara get out, then take a right.
Awesome house! The house is a destination in itself. Very central to everything.  Communication and check in was very good. Everything was as per the description. Thanks for a great stay in Porto!
Thank you very much. We enjoyed it very much in your house and in Porto. It was a great experience.
Das Haus liegt zentral und doch ruhig. Bushaltestelle 2 Minuten entfernt. Das Haus war sehr sauber und wir haben unseren Aufenthalt in Porto sehr genossen.
Tres bien situé , tres propre et contact internet facile
Great location with a wonderful small restaurant right below us.

Very spacious. Air con in all rooms. We even got a complimentary regional wine. Kitchen is big and the dinning room is perfect to dinner with your friends and family. The 2 showers are in the top 2 en-suites, therefore whoever gets the downstairs room will have to shower in "someone else's" bathroom, which is not a major issue. Just 2 minor issues, the shower holder on the top room was broken, there is a reasonable morning noise due to proximity with restaurants (which are good and cheap by the way). The house is walkable to most parts of town. Overall, totally recommended.
Bella casa caratteristica vicino al centro.Molto ben curata e con ottimi (Website hidden by Airbnb) consiglio!!!
Beautiful house, great location.
Great location and great house. We can only recomment this property.

We had a great time at the ivy house. Thanx to Carlos and Vitor!!! All comments I read before were right. The house is lovely, perfect for 4 people, very nice located and perfectly equipped. The Organisation for our late arrival was perfect. We enjoyed our stay. Porto itself is worth to stay there for a week at minimum. Also the little restaurants close to house were very nice, good food and drinks and very good prices. Being in the ivy house means to be in the centre of the lovely Porto.
Great restaurant just below the house.
Numa palavra, excelente.

It was a great stay. Everything works perfectly ok at the house. Very clean and has everything you will need. It is very well located. Stores where you can buy basic food are not the best. So prepare when you walk other neighborhoods. But that is really not a big deal.
It is a nice apartment with amazing location and nice inside equipments including full set kitchen tools, air condition and over two bathroom. Suitable for family and group to stay. Highly recommond.

Carlos and Vittor were excellent hosts and very communicative. They offered suggestions on what to do during Sao Joao festival and checked in to see how we were doing. The house was well-equipped, clean and spacious with lots of charm. We would not hesitate to stay here again!

I can highly recommend a stay at this house. It is very close to the city center, clean and beautiful. The family who manages the place is very easy to talk to, answers very quickly and provides whatever help you might need. Thanks a lot for a great time.

A beautiful house close to the old centre of Porto (only a 5 minute walk away), and well equipped. We stayed here with two couples and had plenty of space. 
There's a simple breakfast spot (croissants & muffins) just at the corner, a small supermarket one block away and a very nice small restaurant next door. During our stay there was an issue with the fridge but it was solved as good as was possible.

We loved the place! We felt like being a part of this wonderful vibrant city as the house is right in the center of porto with Bar, Restaurant, Supermarket, Bakery all nearby. (At the same time it is not loud.) Any sightseeing is in walking distance and of course the Ribeira as the heart of Porto for restaurants and bars and atmosphere. The rooms are well furnished , the kitchen well equipped and the house in whole has a wonderful atmosphere. It was very enjoyable to have our meals in the big dining room or to relax in the living room with good view to a little plaza. For us it was perfect and we can highly recommend it.

Wir hatten eine tolle Zeit in Carlos Haus. Es liegt sehr schön, mit einem kleinen Café und einem guten Restaurant direkt vor der Haustür. Alles, was wir brauchten, war vor Ort, die Kommunikation mit dem Gastgeber unkompliziert und freundlich. Wir können diese Unterkunft unbedingt weiterempfehlen!
Dank an Carlos und Vitor.

Beautiful home!!!!
Great location in an amazing city
We loved the home. It was very central and easy to walk to the main areas. Nicely decorated and communication with Host was great. I would recommend you staying there.
Tres agréable maison, aménagée avec beaucoup de soin. Emplacement tres sympa, avec de petits bars et restaurants au pied de la maison. Nous avons passe un tres bon séjour en famille.

one of the top homes we have stayed in w/ Airbnb. fantastic, high end and right in the middle of the action. tons of space and everything worked perfectly.
do the Ivy House.

This place is an absolute charm.  Location is central to everything.  The coffee bar just outside is so convenient and the owners so accommodating.  The home itself is a surprise on every level.  Well equipped for families or couples traveling together.  Vitor was a wonderful host and super responsive.

Staying at Casa da Hera was like living in a dream!  Each space has been put together with such  an eye to detail it will make you feel right at home.  My husband and I stayed with another family with two children.  The sleeping arrangements were perfect in that respect, although it would have been nice if one of the full bathrooms were in a common area.  The air conditioners (on every level of the home) were an absolute lifesaver!  There is even a great little restaurant right below the home.  If you get home late and there is no room, just ask if you can take the plates up with you.  You can have dinner in the beautiful dining room of your home away from home!

Wir waren mit 4 Erwachsenen und zwei Kindern im Haus. Das Haus ist wunderschön, die Zimmer um ein gewundenes Treppenhaus angeordnet auf verschiedenen Ebenen. Alles sehr sauber und geschmackvoll. Sehr gut gelegen in Laufnähe zur historischen Altstadt. Recht belebte Gegend, deshalb nachts ziemlich laut, aber aushaltbar. Gerne wieder!
Fantastic location and gorgeous house.  We enjoyed our stay very much and would highly recommend anyone to stay at the Ivy House. It's beautiful!
Great home for a group of friends or big families. The location is perfect if you want to feel like a real Local.  They are restaurants nearby.
Ein sehr schönes und geschmackvoll eingerichtetes Haus in einer tollen Lage.

We had a fantastic stay, though were a bit surprised by the cold water for showers one morning as the gas needed to be replaced for the water heater.  Problem was resolved same day.

The ground floor bedroom does have a musty smell to it.  We ended up bringing candles downstairs to improve the smell.
