Incredible location--close to everything...just about a 10-15 minute walk to anything and everything in any direction.  Perfect!  Oh, and do eat breakfast at the cafe just around the corner.  Coffee and pastries for 2 people for three euro--you can't beat it!

Thank you Carlos!

Great location to visit Porto by foot. Close to everthing you want to see. Friendly host, comfy beds and just down the road from fantastic restaurants by the river Duoro. We recommend the 3 euro water taxi to the port wine cellar tasting spots across the river. This is your home away from home while in Porto. We loved it!!
Super place!!
Bela casa em local muito bem localizado.

this house is really well situated for living like a local but close (after some uphill climbs!) to the sites. the local restaurants (steps away) are fantastic with friendly owners, great quality food and incredibly reasonable. virtually no information is provided in the house about local amenities/attractions which is a shame. the café on the corner is great for breakfast and ridiculously cheap - owners are lovely. Backsons is a great restaurant close by and the casual corner establishment which is practically under the house is just great - the lady who owns it is so friendly and helpful and her food is terrific. go to the odd looking vintage shop/warehouse along the road which houses a bar as well as antique stalls - very funky! we used all these places over and over. the wee bar/cafe where football is on a screen evry night is good fun and the owner so kind - on our last night he sent us home with a gift of a special bottle of port! these places are out of the main tourist streets and made us feel like we were locals. I would go back to Porto in an instant - beautiful city steeped in history.

We had a wonderful stay in Porto!  Carlos was more than helpful with any questions we had.  The place was clean and the location was so easily accessible to anywhere we wanted to go.  We would definitely stay there again.
Carlos place is fantastic for exploring Porto. It is full of atmosphere and taste. We would recommend this place for everybody.

Very good location for visiting the old town of Porto. We all enjoy so much of few days stay there. All places, restaurants, supermarket, riverside,bridges are in walking distance. Highly recomend to stay there.

Really nice place!peace and warm rooms.
Strongly suggest you don't bring too heavy luggages to Proto. Because the roads are so difficult to walk if you take 28

Beautiful tall structure with many split levels all connected by a beautiful spiral staircase with domed skylight on top. Lovely relaxing feeling about the place and was spotlessly clean. Perfect location, close to centre and public transport.
Great location. Quiet street, but easy walk to everything you need!  Beautiful, unique and comfortable house. Great communication before and during our stay.  Couldn't have asked for more!

I highly recommend this for your stay in Porto. Check in was early and easy. The house was very comfortable. Every morning we would get our coffee from the little cafe downstairs (get galaos). Close by to the river, river cafes and bars, and a great antique store with an outdoor bar and cafe. I will stay here when I return to Porto.

I would highly recommend this flat as it is beautiful and in a great location.  Vitor was very nice and couldn’t have asked for anything better. Great cafe next door. It added to our amazing experience in Porto.

The apartment is beautiful and very stylish. The location is close to main areas of the city and also easy to access the beach (via the 500 bus, the tram or (our favourite) by hiring bicycles). There is a good, and large, supermarket called Continente to the West along the river and on this trip you will pass a number of good and reasonably priced restaurants.

Porto is delightful. We enjoyed walking along the river and crossing by the amazing bridge and cable car to visit the south side. We spent 3 days on the beach (even in November) and we had a lot of memorable meals.

Je recommande cette adresse, maison pratique et joliment décorée. Très bien située pour visiter, avec des petits cafés et restos à proximité. On a passé un excellent séjour avec le soleil et la douceur en prime!!!
A very nice house close to everything!

We stayed in this house for a weekend and had an amazing time. It was incredibly clean on arrival and Vitor provided us with lots of local tips for during our stay and a bottle of local wine on arrival. One of the best AirBnBs I've ever stayed in.

An awesome building and location to stay in Porto.  Very rustic neighborhood with lots of local restaurants and residents.  Great restaurant downstairs and unique antique market few steps away, quick access to the river or a nice hike up the back hills to the old town.  Manageable for my wife and our moms who are in their 60's.  Air conditioning was wonderful to have in December, lots of space to hang out inside and outside this Airbnb.
Excelente casa, muy original y bien restaurada. Está bien ubicada.

We are a family of 5 and this house is exactly as described, very homely. The kitchen is awesome and the space is just so spacious. Large dining room, multiple bathrooms and toilets. We enjoyed watching a movie in the living room and reading books from the reading corner which is very cosy. All good and made our stay at Porto wonderful. Do not miss the awesome restaurant/ diner just outside the house. The food is good and the family that runs it, so friendly to tourists. The neighbourhood is quiet and safe, away from the main shopping area, but we had no trouble walking to everywhere from the house. We could hear seagulls calling in the mornings because its just near the Douro river, and that's nice. I cannot recommend this house more.

We loved staying in this charming little house! Beautiful rooms and everything we could ever need. It felt like we were living in the real Porto and not living like tourists at all and cooking something lovely for Christmas Day was a pleasure in the well-equipped kitchen. Thanks so much!
Es war eine sehr schöne Wohnung
Super endroit propre bien placé un bon accueil

Great townhouse with plenty of space. Very clean and a few little touches like a welcome bottle of wine, air con in every room, Bluetooth player etc! Waking distance to the centre of town (albeit up some big hills) situated in a small village along locals, but a 15-20 minutes walk to the main amenities. Great stay! Highly recommend.

We really loved staying here. Great location (walking distance to many places)  and so incredibly unique. We were a group of 5 and it was so comfortable. We loved lounging in the den and called it “the womb” because it was so warm and cozy. Heaters were great too. Beds were a little hard but worth it for such an amazing space. Definitely pick this place if you have the chance.
Lovely house, perfect for 6 people (but becareful, there are only two bathrooms). Carlos is very nice and give us advices. The area is quite (but you have to go down to discover the city).
An amazing space in a central location! Loved our stay.
Very good and excellent house

Recomendo o espaço!
Sensação de “lar doce lar”.
Espaço com todas as comodidades necessárias! 
Fácil comunicação com os anfitriões!

Excellent location, perfect communication from Carlos, Vitor and family.  Such a charming property with lots of attention to detail.  We spent most of our time exploring Porto so location was important but it was also wonderful too have such a lovely home to retreat to each evening.  Thank you!

Thanks Carlos and Vitor for offering such a comfortable beautiful apartment for our family. It was a wonderful experience staying in a place with so much history with all details thought of. It was an incredibly beautiful apartment and Vitor was so helpful in every way. We really appreciate all you guys did to help us have a great time. The neighborhood was charming as well.  Our 82 year old father had been sick with the flu before he arrived but the place was so comfortable for him he recovered nicely over the week. The bed room with the high ceilings and wooden beams are charming, the beds are comfortable. From the house it is an easy walk to the well known water front by the Douro river! Also, we recommend the sightseeing bus tour, it was the best way to start out in Porto to see all of the areas.  
Again we loved the house and we strongly recommend it to anyone traveling to Porto. 

Sonia and Darren

Carlos' place in Porto was great.  Really loved the character of the place.  The winding staircase and all the rooms gave it such amazing charm.  There was plenty of room for our family of four.  It is also in a great location.  We could easily walk to downtown Porto or to the riverfront areas.  There are nice restaurants and bars right down the street and really close to a couple places to rent bikes to tour the area.  Carlos was a great host and was very quick to answer all of my questions.  Check in and check out were very easy and there was a bottle of wine waiting for us when we checked in.  The only drawback was that it can get a little noisy at night.  But after a long day of touring (and some Port wine) it wasn't too bothersome.  I would highly recommend this place.

The house is charming and beautifully appointed with plenty of room and comfortable beds.  Within a short distance of all of the main sites of old Porto.  Heating units were welcome as it was a bit cool in March.  Were very helpful calling us a taxi to get back to the train station the day we left.
Carlis place is perfect!  Great house great location.  We will be back!

The house was fantastic for myself and 5 friends. Good location, easy walk into the old town and even the guy who ran the restaurant downstairs was lovely. Would highly recommend to others, looks just like the pictures.

The location fo the house is excellent for the city centre, just far enough away to get out of the tourist bits, but close enough for 10 minute walk to be in the mix. The house was excellent. All that it claims to be and a very charming if a little eccentric in structure and content. A really good base for a visit to Porto. The hosts were excellent dealing with some minor issues very quickly making sure we had everything we needed. all in all I would recommend a stay. A finally recommendation is to visit the restaurant below the house. excellent food host and prices.
Great location. Walkable to Riberia and Historic Centre. On the bus and tram route to beach. Great restaurants nearby (loved Papavinhos). Bike rentals nearby.
Great house, very stylish in a great location in the old part of Porto. Very close to the waterfront and an awesome restaurant downstairs. Perfect for long weekend breaks.
We loved our stay at the Casa d’ivry! Victor’s home is beautiful with great decor and accents. The space was perfect for our group of 6. Four toilets and two shower!

This is an awesome place to stay
We were greeted and made comfortable. The house is beautiful.... And comfortable. I fully recommend the same. The location was also perfect
Great house, and perfectly located!

We were a group of six and had the time of our lives in this beautiful house. It hasn't lost its character at all and was completely renovated and clean upon arrival. The two bathrooms had everything we needed and the kitchen was fully equipped too. We loved this house and hope to be here again in the future!
Great place with super location with wonderful communication!

Das Haus liegt gut erreichbar nahe der Altstadt. Mit viel liebe zum Detail wurde es renoviert. Es war bis auf die Küche sehr sauber und hat uns gut gefallen. Zeitweise war es Abends recht laut, da die alten Fenster nicht so gut isolieren. Insgesamt hat es uns aber gefallen. Der unterste Schlafraum (den wir nicht benötigten) hätte uns nicht so gut gefallen, da es kein Fenster gab. Die oberen Räume waren sehr schön.

Magnifique séjour chez Carlos. La maison est très belle, situé dans un quartier à la fois populaire, joli agréable et bien pourvu en restaurants, sans être trop touristique. Carlos, malgré une difficulté technique, a été extrêmement obligeant et très disponible. Je recommande fortement ce logement.
This was a great location close to restaurants and the main stop for day tours.

A very nice apartment with a perfect location right across the street from the conference centre where we attended a conference for a few days. We took a nice run along the river every morning. It was easy to get in contact with the host via mail with quick answers.
Great location. Cool house. We really enjoyed it. We traveled with our baby and they had a travel cot and high chair there for us. It was great.

Great central location; only 10 minutes to town center.  Easy walking route. Spacious; bedrooms & bathrooms were fairly large.  Safe neighborhood with a few small, reasonably priced restaurants & laundromat close by.  Eating area with large table and separate living area to relax or watch tv.    Definitely, we would stay again!!
A beautiful and interesting house with a helpful and welcoming host. Great size rooms and bathrooms. Good location, a relatively short (if hilly) walk into the centre.

We had an amazing stay here at Carlos' place.

There were 6 of us and we had plenty of room. The bedrooms are all perfect, and the apartment has so much character. The location is brilliant and just a short walk from the center of Porto. The check in was great and communication was really easy!

Really recommend this place if you're looking to stay in Porto

Thanks!
Ennis & Lisa
Joe & Chara
Stefan & Rebecca

This was one of our best stays yet. Great communication and assistance with transfers to and from rail station and airport. Lovely home with 3 double bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and 4 toilets! Kitchen was very well appointed and it was refreshing to find a supply of tea, coffee, olive oil, vinegar, salt as pepper. Our beds were comfortable with nice quality linen.... and bedrooms and lounge room air conditioned. It was a short walk to everything. Thank you so much for a lovely holiday!

Perfect location for strolling down to the main bridge with lots of restaurants to visit. Then a visit to the Port distilleries on the the other side of the Douro. Fantastic restaurant (recommended in lonely planet books) below the apartment. The apartment itself was of high quality. Heartily recommend this apartment.

Très belle maison grande et très bien équipée. La chambre au niveau de la rue est moins agréable (humidité, odeurs) mais tout le reste de la maison est vraiment superbe. La localisation est près de la rivière à environ 10-15 minutes de marche du centre touristique. Le stationnement sur la rue est gratuit mais est assez compliqué. L'accueil est précis et efficace.
The appartment ist absolutely fabulous. A nice old house in a very typical area, where you get angood impression of Portugal. The contact and the service were very good. We would love to come back.
This apartment is absolutely gorgeous!  And huge!  It couldn't have been any better.  Highly recommended.

We were a party of 6 adults. Great location, air conditioning was very good. Small cafe just outside the door coffee 1 euro& Pastry 1 euro delicious.
Two full bathrooms very nice. We were early and they allowed us to drop of luggage that was great and we just explored city easy walking and great hop on hop of bus to see the city.
Amazing!
Awesome Place in the Centre of Porto with lots of Space for 6. Very quick responses from the host in case of questions - I can fully recommend this one!
Dette er en helt spesiell leilighet med egenartet planløsning og god plassering. God standard og artig sted å bo.

Such a great place to explore the delights of Porto from-stay in the neighbourhood or walk everywhere with ease! Parking can be tricky but aside from that, the vibe of the neighbourhood is super cool, there is a supermarket nearby and lots of unexpected delights wherever you turn! Don’t miss a meal at the Taberna downstairs-one of the best meals we had in Portugal!

Très beau logement plein de charme et très bien située à quelques pas des lieux touristiques, mais au calme. 
Belle expérience Airbnb.

Dear Carlos (en Vitor, )
we realy enjoyed our stay at the house. The location is perfect. And it is a beautiful house. Al the style details are very nice. 
We were there with our kids, and they liked the corner with the pillows to sit.
I realy like to come back with some friends.
Thanks for the good bottle of Port!
Surtenly see you again some time!

Greetings, Mirjam & familly de Kuyper
Once again a lovely stay at this nice house. Look forward to the next stay here.

Authentisches Stadthaus mitten in Porto. Gut zu erreichen, einen Parkplatz zu finden ist jedoch schwierig. Die Ausstattung ist genügen, die Übergabe wahr problemlos und man kann fußläufig vom Haus aus ganz Porto erkunden - nahegelegen gibt es zudem wunderbare Restaurants zu entdecken! Einziger Nachteil: Nachts ist es sehr laut. Ansonsten kann ich ich die Unterkunft nur weiter empfehlen!
Nice house with 500m walking distance to old city and main attractions. Super restaurant below the house.

Our stay in Porto was just perfect! We were 6 people and the beautiful and clean house was more than big enough for all of us. The checki-in as the check-out was very flexible and thanks to Vitor we got nothing but great advices. We loved the location too, in the old town near to so many great places.  
We could cook but also could go out and didn’t have to go too far.
We loved the place, thank you for making our stay in Porto just perfect!
Très bel appartement typique !

This place is so perfect! Within walking distance of all the attractions, down on the water. It is so nicely set out and styled beautifully. We really enjoyed our short time in Porto! We will be back!!

We had a wonderful time at this house.  The location is fantastic!  Close walking distance to the centre of the historic district, with some great attractions right at your doorstep!  We had fresh coffee each morning from the cafe next door and the restaurant downstairs was the best meal we had during our stay.  The house is very spacious and unique with it’s historic feel.  We did not give it 5 stars as it needs a little bit of attention in places and it feels a bit worn.  It’s still good value for the location and was clean.  We would definitely stay there again if returning to Porto.
The house is beautiful but is a little far from the city centre. Very close to the water but not close to the main city attractions.
Meget autentisk og stilfuld bolig med rigtig god placering. Overrasket over hvad der hente sig bag facadedøren.
Great house in a great location

The property exceeded our expectations, it is very nicely decorated with thoughtful touches, really well equipped. It is also a short walk to Ribeira. Vitor was really helpful and efficient. I would highly recommend it.

The Ivy House was even better than the pictures and reviews described.  The house has all the modern amenities you need but at the same time has a lot of character.  All the rooms were a great size and the bathrooms were huge.  The location was perfect for us - on a quiet square in a traditional part of the city but so close to the restaurants and sites of the Riberia and to public transport.  Such a wonderful base for our first trip to Porto.
Beautiful place to stay ! Very clean, spacious house in the centre of porto.
It’s a really good house with beautiful decorations. And the owners are very nice.

Eine sehr originelle und geräumige Unterkunft, gut gelegen, um die Altstadt von Porto zu Fuß zu erkunden. Wer mit öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln kommt (Metro Station Sao Bento), sollte ein bisschen sportlich sein, denn in Porto geht es immer bergauf-bergab.
Casa bem localizada e muito confortável

무척이나 매력적인 집입니다
하지만 중심부가 아니어서 조금 불편했어요

Everything was really good. Check-in on time, the house has three rooms and four bathrooms, it was very comfortable, cozy and clean. The apartment is close to the city center. Highly recommended. I would repeat!

Très bon emplacement dans le Centre de Porto.
Accueil et réactivité parfaits.
Dommage que le logement soit vendu avec 3 salles de bain alors qu'il n'y en a que 2 .
Sinon le reste est parfait.
This is a quirky townhouse in a very convenient location. It is comfortable and well equipped and suited are grown-up family very well.
Unbeatable location, spot and kindness
Thanks for your advices during the stay.

The Ivy house was a wonderful way to spend Christmas. The house accommodated the 6 of us well. The location was great. A short walk to everything.  Carlos always responded in a timely manner.  I would recommend it.

Maison très agréable , bien située.Tres bien pour 6: 2 chambres avec salles de bain privatives et 1 avec WC et lavabo.
Petit problème avec l'eau chaude ( 2 e (Website hidden by Airbnb) mais Carlos a été très réactif .
On a pu garder la maison jusqu'à notre départ à 15h : merci !

This place was wonderful to call home for our time in Porto. The check in process was easy and accommodating and the communication from the hosts was great. They were flexible when we arrived later than expected and we appreciated a local bottle of wine upon arrival. Would definitely recommend and stay again.

Large house with many stairs. Overall, We enjoyed our stay, although it is challenging with young children. Windows in the living/tv room let in a draft, which made it difficult  to keep the room warm despite the heater. Laundry detergent capsule were provided instead of dishwasher soap. The dishes smelled of laundry detergent which was unfortunate.  15 minute flat walk to a large commercial supermarket. 10 minute walk to the center of Ribera. Very appreciative that we were able to checkin early because we had young children with us.

The Ivy House is in a great part of the old town with the river just over the road and the centre of the old town about 10 minutes walk away.

We loved staying here.  There is plenty of space for an old house and a lot of character.

The apartment was perfect and so close to areas we wanted to visit (albeit up some steep hills!). Heating worked perfectly as it was quite cold at night (we visited in January) despite it being lovely and warm during the day.  There was plenty of space for a group of 5.

The vintage tram runs to the beach every 20 minutes from right outside the apartment and it was approximately 15 minute walk to Ribeira (and the bridge) and up to Baixa. 

We booked a transfer through the host as we needed to leave at 6:30am and this arrived exactly on time as promised.

we didn't get to visit the restaurant underneath the apartment as this was closed for holidays although the local cafe opposite and burger restaurant a short way down the street were great. We also loved the vintage emporium with bar/cafe just a few doors down. There is a also a small supermarket a short walk away.
Great location, the accommodation is clean  tidy and well designed.
The best part of the Carlos’s place is the location. It’s easy to walk everywhere. It’s a spacious space that was great for our group.

name: Riverfront Porto & Douro, Spectacular Views!
summary: Spectacular views overlooking the Douro river and the historic center of Porto, Ribeira. Brand new appliances, total confort and fully equipped kitchen. In the heart of the main touristic atractions. Transports, restaurants and comercial area. Car parking across the street, 20 meters away- 6€/ 24h.
space: Fully renovated, very comfortable and decorated with care. Totally equiped kitchen. Independent bathroom with shower.  Living room: Beyond the cinematographic views to the Douro river, Ribeira and historic center, there is a double bed with a high quality matress and bed linen, a very confortable sofa, cable TV,  dining table and design chairs. Exclusive decoration. Inner room: Two single beds with  extremely confortable matresses. This space is  brightened  by a skylight and an inner window that provides a charming natural day light.
description: Spectacular views overlooking the Douro river and the historic center of Porto, Ribeira. Brand new appliances, total confort and fully equipped kitchen. In the heart of the main touristic atractions. Transports, restaurants and comercial area. Car parking across the street, 20 meters away- 6€/ 24h. Fully renovated, very comfortable and decorated with care. Totally equiped kitchen. Independent bathroom with shower.  Living room: Beyond the cinematographic views to the Douro river, Ribeira and historic center, there is a double bed with a high quality matress and bed linen, a very confortable sofa, cable TV,  dining table and design chairs. Exclusive decoration. Inner room: Two single beds with  extremely confortable matresses. This space is  brightened  by a skylight and an inner window that provides a charming natural day light. The entire apartment is at your disposal. Free wifi-fi and cable tv. Available 24/7 for our guests, providing you a complete set of leaflets and city maps, "li
neighborhood_overview: The Cais de Gaia is the Port wine cellars district, with the best views overlooking Porto´s historic center. It is a very pleasent riverfront, with aerial cable cars, plenty of local and international restaurants.  Even though this area is highly visited by tourists it´s really pleasant, clean and quiet. This apartment is less than one minute walking to the D Luiz I bridge and  Ribeira, Porto.  There are several bus stops nearby. You can chose direction beach or city. As you may see in our photos, there are many boat cruises passing by the Douro all along the day. Better than seing this beautiful scenario, you can step abord and go for a 1 hour cruise, just in front. Other cruises options are available.
transit: Some 20m from the D. Luis bridge, crossing to Porto´s Ribeira district. Bus stop and car park just across the street. Nearest metro station: Jardim do Morro, which is just by the aerial cable car station and the Mosteiro da Serra do Pilar. Coming from the airport: Subway to Trindade At Trindade, pick the 901 or 906 bus, direction Valadares or Madalena and exit at the 1st stop after the D Luiz bridge.
access: The entire apartment is at your disposal. Free wifi-fi and cable tv.
interaction: Available 24/7 for our guests, providing you a complete set of leaflets and city maps, "list of to do things"  so that you can quickly settle and enjoy your stay in Porto to the maximum!
house_rules: Smoking is not allowed inside the apartment. If this rule is not respected, we will retain the security deposit. Sleeping hours of neighbourhood should be respected. No parties allowed. Please, respect the space. We don´t charge a cleaning fee but, in case the apartment is left exceptionaly dirty, we will keep 40€ from the security deposit. Check- in: 16:00h till 20:00h Check- out till: 11:00h For check- in after 20:00h we charge a tax of 30€.

host.host_about:
Travelling must be one of the most pleasant experiences of life.
I strive to give you the best travel tips so your Porto- Douro stay will be memorable. 

Voyager doît être l´un des plus grands plaisirs dans la vie.
En voyageant j´ai appris que parfois, un chaleureux accueil est plus marquant  que la propre destination.
Notre appartement vous place dans une carte postale de Porto/ Douro.  
Nous serons à votre disposition pour que votre séjour soît une experience memorable.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Very fast response. Everything arranged quickly and easily. We were greeted by Marcelo and Marcelo junior who were extremely friendly and helpful.

Nous avions initialement pensé rester 3 jours, nous nous sommes décidé pour 7 tellement nous étions bien dans cet appartement et dans cette ville. Le logement récemment fait à neuf offre sans doute la plus belle vue qu'on puisse imaginer sur Porto et deviendra sans doute un des lieux incontournables d'AirBnB, et nous aurions pu rester rêver à notre fenêtre tout le séjour, si les conseils prodigués par Marcelo ne nous avaient mené à la découverte de la ville et notamment de ses parcs magnifiques. Tout en respectant notre intimité, nos hôtes étaient toujours disponibles pour nous renseigner ou nous rendre service. Nous reviendrons certainement.
Nice apartment with beautiful open view. Very clean and well design

My kids and I stayed in this apartment the first week of August. It was a wonderful experience! We received a very warm welcome and support throughout our stay. The apartment has a perfect location. It offers in my opinion one of the best views of a Porto, and is just 5 minutes walk from the town center. The apartment is well equipped for a short stay. You will find good quality towels in the bathroom, and comfortable beds. There is no air conditioning, but we did not miss it at all, although we always had sunny days. Marcelo provided us a fan, but even that was switched off all the time. I would definitely recommend it!

We were rather late in the evening arriving to Porto but Marcelo  and Marcelo Jr were available to help us find the apartment and to help carry in our luggage. Marcelo gave us a long and detailed list of places to visit and suggestions for dining.

The apartment is even more stunning than the photos with beautiful views of Porto. A bottle of Port wine, fruit and Portuguese tarts awaited. 

The apartment is perfectly situated across the bridge from the famous banks of the city. This is perfect for several reasons. Most importantly, you wake to an incredible view. The walk across the bridge is about 5 minutes. The yellow bus stops a block away from the apartment - would highly recommend this. The Port Wine Cellars are at your doorstep. It's absolutely amazing. 

Marcelo's Family, our stay in Porto was unforgettable. Thank you for hosting us in your little piece of paradise!

No words can describe our amazing experience in Porto and particular in Marcelo's appartment. The combination of both gives an ideal picture of Portuguese hospitality and the breathtaking landscape of the city.

Very nice flat in Porto. Clean, well equipped and centrally located.  The view of the Douro river from the apartment is fantastic. Thank you Marcelo for welcoming us in Porto. We have appreciated the greeting drinks and your helpful info about the city.

Marcelo welcomed us with a lot of care and nice attentions for us and for our children. The apartment has an extraordinary view and a good location with a public carpark near it. We would recommend it!

We have explored Porto during our stay in the nice flat of Marcello and Ana for 4 days in August 2015.

Everything was best. We´ve enjoyed very kind and friendly hosts and a new renovated tasteful furnished flat with an exciting view on the Douro and Ribeira, we think personally, you can´t find a better experience with this incredible vistapoint.

Marcello and Ana and their son welcomed us with a bottle of fine porto.
First they thought, we are lost and phoned us careing, while we were sitting in the metro coming from the airport.

The flat is easy to find. Trust on Marcello´s description.
Ribeira is only a short walk over the bridge. 
The bakery Soares is near, so you can get your “petit pans “etc. for foreigners on a very low pricelevel for your breakfast. A few very small supermarkets with trading the essentials are around.

Thank you Marcello and Ana for hosting us.

Olaf + Martina
Tres bel appartement avec une vue parfaite sur le ponte luiz. Hote tres gentil et accueillant. Tarif justifié

Marcello and Marcello Jr. made us feel very welcome at their apartment in Porto, going above and beyondour expectations. They were very flexible, especially with the initial meeting key exchange. Also, very prompt and helpful with information before and during our stay, helping us with a taxi booking the night before departure.

The apartment itself was above expectations and lived up to the photos. It was clean, functional and obviously recently renovated to a quality standard. The view of the river from the main room was simply amazing, which I impressed the rest of my family with. The neighbourhood is safe and is pretty much as central to the action in Porto as you can get!

My boyfriend and I splurged a bit to have this beautiful apartment to ourselves and it was worth every penny and more! Marcelo and Marcelo Jr. were extremely responsive as soon as we made our booking and were waiting for us in front of the apartment as soon as we arrived to greet us.  We've stayed in a lot of apartment rentals and they are the absolute sweetest hosts we have had the pleasure of meeting :).  We were greeted with port wine and pastries, in addition to recommendations for the area. 

The apartment is exactly as described, if not better.  The place is immaculately maintained with nice, clean design and the views are phenomenal to wake up to.  We were only in town for three nights so did not make much use of the kitchen as we wanted to experience as much of the local food as possible.  We ate very well on both the Porto and Gaia neighborhoods. 

The location is right on the River Douro across from Porto, right near the bridge.  We enjoyed the quick 5-10 min walk across the bridge to Porto to explore the historic center, taking in the views and exploring the neighborhood on foot.  It's a bit more quiet on the Gaia side which we appreciated and in our opinion the better side to stay on for easy access, better views and a bit more quiet to come home to each night. 

We would come back and recommend this to anyone in a heartbeat!

Superbe appartement avec une vue splendide sur porto !!! Appartement conforme aux photos , très propre et clair. Sa situation est idéale pour visiter porto à pied ou en transport. 
Nous avons été accueillis avec un verre de porto et un pasteis de nata . Nous savons oú dormir lors de notre prochaine visite.

Marcelo and Ana were amazing hosts - they made our stay in Porto an unforgettable experience. Upon checkin, they had even prepared some Port Wine and delicious tartes for us. They were super helpful with all sort of local information and even booked our airport transfer for us as we don't speak Portuguese. The condo is in a super central area with a magnificent view onto the Duoro River. We definitely recommend this place to everyone visiting Porto and its famos Port Wine cellars which are located right next door.

Accueil très sympathique avec un verre de porto et une spécialité locale, Marcelo sait recevoir ses hôtes et est toujours prêt à donner des conseils pour les visites. Le logement est superbe, très propre, lit confortable et surtout vue magnifique sur le vieux Porto. Bref très bon logement, peut être un peu cher mais il vaut son prix et je recommande.
Unbelievable view... The same as every postcard picture you see advertising Porto .  Close to old Porto without being in it'. Can't recommend this enough

Marcelo and Marcelo Jnr were charming and helpful in every respect. They were also very flexible with us regarding check in times as we had flights at strange times. The apartment was simply beautiful and the attention to detail outstanding. Every one talks about the view and I won't be an (Website hidden by Airbnb) was spectacular. We loved staying out of the centre of Porto.. That was my choice as I prefer a less busy side of town. We hadn't realised Porto was so hilly so be prepared to do lots of walking up hills with good comfortable shoes. Marcelo and Marcelo Jnr we would like to thank you for an exceptional stay

Spent one night here and wished we could stay longer! Probably the best views you can get in Porto, overlooking the river, the bridge and the historic center. The apartment was very nice, newly upgraded and clean. Our hosts Marcelo and Marcelo jr were very welcoming and had complimentary port wine and pastries waiting for us upon arrival. They were helpful with everything from taxi booking to giving recommendations on what to do in Porto. We highly recommend this place! Best regards Maria and Hallgeir, Norway.

Appartement très bien et propre !
L'emplacement est exceptionnel ! Tout près du Ponte Luis en plein coeur de l'action !
Nous le recommandons fortement !
François

L'accueil a été chaleureux et efficace avec assez de retenue pour ne pas être intrusif. Parfait. 
Marcello junior parle un excellent Français.
L'accès en voiture est assez difficile et relève un peu du rallye, mais l'arrivée est tellement éblouissante qu'on oublie tout. Laisser la voiture au parking en face et utiliser les transports en commun très bien conçus. 
La situation est idéale, la vue inouïe, dans cette catégorie on ne peut pas rêver d'un meilleur produit

Marcelo's flat has the most amazing views and location. The flat itself is also beautiful, with a crisp, clean, white design. When we arrived at the flat, there were custard tarts and port, which was a great welcoming treat!

We didn't actually meet Marcelo, but he was flexible with our check-in time and sent us messages on occasion throughout our trip to make sure we were okay, see if we needed anything, and help us arrange a taxi back to the airport.
I can recommend Marcelos flat. It's very clean, bright & in a very good central location. Also it's not too noisy at night.
This really was a great accommodation, with a fantastic view. Marcelo Jr was so helpful, and we would recommend highly for anyone looking for a place to stay in central Porto for 2-4 people.

Wonderful apartment. Everything was just as described and pictured. Marcelo and his family were terrific host. Always available and willing to suggest local places to go. The location of the apartment is unbelievable. Couldn't have a better location for enjoying all that Porto has to offer.
Spent a few days in in Marcelo and Ana's apartment. Could not have asked for a better location, apartment, or hosts. Everything as advertised and previously reviewed and did not disappoint.

Er und sein Sohn sind tolle Gastgeber. Wir haben uns rundum wohl gefühlt. Top Lage des Apartments, sehr sauber, super WLAN Verbindung und fantastischer Ausblick auf den Sttadtteil Ribeira und dem Douro River.

Marcelo Jr. GAb uns hilfreiche Tips zur Stadt und war immer erreichbar, wenn wir Ihnen kontaktiert haben. Kann nur positives berichten!

We had a FABULOUS stay at Marcelo´s Airbnb!!! 
The apartment is in the best location you can be, just perfect!!! The neighborhood is very calm and the views from the apartment are spectacular. A real postcard! The place is spotlessly clean and beautifully furnished and decorated. The appliances are new and top quality. Very, very comfortable beds and high quality bed and bath linen. This was by far, the best place we stayed during our Europe tour.
Marcelo and Ana are perfect hosts, so helpful, kind and friendly. We would most definitely stay here again and highly recommend this wonderful place to everyone. Thank you Marcelo and Ana. We will be back.

Accueil parfaite de la part des propriétaires. La vue est magnifique. 10 mn a pied du centre. Cependant si vous décidez de partir pendant l hiver, l isolation est mediocre, il fait donc un froid de gueux ! De meme si vous avez l attention de vous faire à manger cela va poser problème tant le réfrigérateur est minuscule et la cuisine pas fonctionnelle du tout. Experience moyenne sauf la vue mais bon on reste pas toute la journée dans l appart..
O Marcelo foi muito simpático no acolhimento e deu as indicações muito precisas para o ponto de encontro.
Very nice flat with an outstanding view. That flat is a bit small for 4 people but in good condition . And Marcelo is a super host very helpful and responsive.

We had a lovely stay at the Riverfront apartment. Marcelo en Marcelo jr. made us feel very welcome  with a glass of port and a special sweet treat. 
The apartment was roomy and  spotlessly clean with a very good bed.  And... the view is really spectaculair.  Walking distance from the big Port houses, the Luis I bridge and the cable car. 
Would certainly recommend this apartment.

Marcelo and Marcelo Jr. welcomed us at the apartment in such a timely manner. To say that Marcelo and his son were great hosts is an understatement!! They truly bent over backwards to make sure my mom and I had a comfortable stay.  We had a last minute dilemma with our boarding passes and they took the pleasure of helping us get it fixed. They welcomed us with some Port wine and Pasteis de Nata along with a list of suggestions of what to do/see/eat in the city. Seriously, I have never been hosted by more hospitable, warm hearted people. The bed was sooo comfortable, the heater worked perfectly, the whole space was so clean (and I'm very picky about the cleanliness of a place), and of course, the view was phenomenal. thank you so much Marcelo! We loved our stay and we love your country!

This stay was immaculate in just about every way.  

It is obviously a perfect location, with an amazing view, and a lovely apartment.  But more than that...

It was perfectly organised, really welcoming and the apartment was spotlessly clean.  I'd highly recommend this appartment for a couple or a family of four.
It was a good time, hosts are very kind and sweet! And the house is clean and new. Last.. view is fantastic!!

Séjour très agréable. Ana et Marcelo nous attendaient avec des pâtisseries portugaises et du Porto, avant de nous envoyer par mail des suggestions d'activités à faire. Ils étaient à l'écoute, et la communication avec eux etait très facile. 
L'appartement était propre, bien décoré avec une vue exceptionnelle. 
Je recommande fortement !

We were first greeted by Marcelo's wife, Ana. She was quite lovely and flexible in meeting us at the apartment. The apartment is beautiful. There were traditional Portuguese pastries and port wine waiting for us. The kitchen was equipped with coffee and filters which was very nice. The second bedroom is a bit small with two twin beds, but it was very comfortable. The apartment is beautiful and the location is perfect. Walking distance to everything on either side of the river with port cellars everywhere. 

Thank you Marcelo and Ana!

Nous avons séjourné du 4 au 9 mai et avons particulièrement apprécié l'hébergement et l'accueil. Le logement est conforme à la description et aux photos. La vue est réellement magnifique et l'appartement est très propre et très bien entretenu. Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Marcello et son fils qui nous ont donné les informations utiles et offert un porto d'accueil. Ils sont restés joignables tout le séjour. Nous recommandons fortement cet hébergement, le meilleur airbnb que nous ayons loué jusqu'à présent.

Very nice apartment fully refurbished on the shore of Gaia, in front of the historic center of Porto, close to the cellars. The location is ideal and the view superb. The historic center is 5 minutes away (Luis 1 bridge to cross). Very good connection to transportation (metro 5 minutes away and station 10 minutes). The owners are really nice people and helping you to find the right places to visit. A very nice stay!

Marcelo Jr. was very helpful and provided detailed information about Porto. The view from the apartmeng is amazing and it is quite close to the city center and just about everything. Would highly recommend.

I highly recommend Marcelo's apartment. The location is absolutely perfect and the view from the front windows is as good as it gets. The flat looks exactly like the photos. Marcelo is a wonderful host, very thoughtful, gave us tips on things to do and ensured we enjoyed our stay. I have no hesitation in recommending this apartment for couples going to Porto.

This is a fantastic apartment with great views! Marcelo & Ana met us on arrival and made us feel very welcome. The apartment was immaculately clean and well equipped. I would recommend this apartment to anyone looking for a weekend in Porto.

The views from Marcelo's Porto home will make you want to relax with wine and pastries while watching boats sail by. When you manage to peel yourself away from the picturesque views you'll be steps away from local wine cellars. 

Marcelo was a gracious host.  He was on time, helped us with our luggage, provided many local tourism suggestions, and welcomed us with a little taste of Porto. 

Thanks Marcelo!

It was a great appartement indeed great view and a great welcome. 
everything perfect, thank you Marcelo!!
Marcelo was a fantastic host and the flat was phenomenal, an amazing location! This might be one of the best flats on AirBnB
Marcelo a été très accueillant et disponible pour nous donner des renseignements supplémentaires.

Wir haben uns in der Unterkunft sehr willkommen gefühlt. Unser Gastgeber hatte für uns Portwein und Natas als Begrüßung.
Ich könnte mir keine bessere Lage für die Unterkunft vorstellen. Es ist alles wie beschrieben und der Ausblick ist grandios.
Das Apartment ist liebevoll eingerichtet und sehr sauber.
Wir kommen gerne wieder.

La vue est remarquable et le quartier de nova vita de caia est la ou il faut etre à porto. Marcelo est tres serviable et tres disponible. Peut commander un taxi. Accueil en francais. Appartement tres bien équipé ( sauf frigo trop petit). Tout est prévu ( sel poivre café huile...) rien à acheter. En plus delicates attentions à l accueil mais j en laisse la surprise. Appart pas trop grand et peut etre un peu bruyant vu la localisation. mais on ne peut pas tout avoir compte tenu de la vue.

Il y a des petits magasins pas loin et le marche le samedi. On peut aller via une navette gratuite au grand magasin corto ilglese pas loin mais courses limitées a cause de la taille du frigo

Marcelo and Ana were wonderful hosts. Even though we did not get to know them personally, they replied within minutes and made our stay wonderful. 

We arrived by car and the car park near the S. Luis bridge is just across the street. When we entered the flat, there was a warm and bright energy. The view was absolutely stunning! Everything was so comfy and clean. We loved every bit of it and really felt at home!

The location is definitely another plus. By passing the bridge, you can reach the ribeira and discover the city. Or just down the street, you can ride a boat and make a six bridges tour on the douro. We experienced so many things in Porto and were always happy to come back to the flat. So, muito, muito obrigado to Marcelo and Ana who made this possible!

Great accomodation with the best location in Porto next to the port wineries and just 200 metres from the old town with the best views from the living room. Very clean and well appointed. Definitely a great place to stay in Porto, would repeat next time in Porto. Thanks Marcelos.

Excellent moment passé à Porto !
 
L'appartement est vraiment super, la vue sur Porto est incroyable, les caves sont à deux pas et le centre ville est facilement accessible à pied. 

 Accueil très agréable avec vin de porto et pâtisserie. L'hôte, joignable de jour comme de nuit propose de nombreuses choses à faire. Une sorte d'hôte guide du routard ! 

La literie est confortable, l'appartement est impeccable. 
Si il fallait faire une critique : la chambre avec les deux lits simples est ensoleillée tôt le matin, et il n'y a pas de rideaux pour lutter contre ! 

Pour les amoureux du vin qui souhaitent passer un week-end à Porto, c'est l'appartement rêvé !

Commentaires de mes parents ( 70 et 73 ans) :
La Deco est comme dans les magazines , c'est tout neuf, Ana est charmante et parle parfaitement français ! Ils ont très bien conseillé et ont même réservé le taxi ... Bref ce fut parfait !

We arrived at the apartment to be greeted by two wonderful people, Marcelo and Marcelo Jnr. They made us instantly welcome, provided a mine of information about Porto and even recommended somewhere to eat at our late arrival time.

When you enter the main living room and look out of the window it is exactly as shown in the photos. The views of Ribeira are breathtaking and I spent an awful lot of the next few days just looking across the river.

The apartment is spotlessly clean and looks very modern. The beds are very comfortable, the kitchen and bathroom facilities are excellent.

Marcelo even left us a decanter of Port and some denatas which were not just welcome, they were both top quality.

The hosts are so helpful, nothing is too much trouble and they made our stay an absolute dream. We think Porto is probably our favourite city now and every time we come back, we would love to stay here.

Thank you once again Marcelo, Ana and Marcelo Jnr for everything, our break was just perfect.

Dom, Jayne, Carolyn & Nick

Simply a wonderful stay. The location of the apartment could not be better, the views spectacular, the apartment gorgeous and spotless. Marcelo was a  fantastic and accommodating host. We were so lucky to stumble upon this Portuguese gem!
Nice neighborhood, very nice, friendly and helpfull owner.

The apartment was just as described: perfect location with an incredible view, tasteful & modern decoration, clean. Marcelo & Marcelo Jr were perfectly on time for the check-in, with a nice touch (local pastry & a glass of Porto wine, plenty of tourism information). Overall a very good experience.
If like me you come in October, be aware there is no heating in the apartment, so it can be a bit cold and (being by the river) humid. However Marcelo told me he would bring a couple of electrical heaters for the next visitors, apparently they were just removed for the summer.

The main room, with the lovely view, is both a bedroom (queen size) and a living room (sofa, TV, table & chairs) with a tasteful & modern decoration. There is another bedroom with two single beds but no window. The kitchen is small but functional. Although the apartment can host up to four people I'd say it is ideal for two (e.g. a couple).

Even though you should enjoy Porto instead of watching TV I should mention the flat screen is very big and I could even connect my laptop using HDMI :)

Bottom line - slightly pricey for Porto but worth it. That view!!!

The location and view of this apartment are outstanding. I couldn't get enough of the view!  We  loved the linens on the bed which was amazingly comfortable.   A Spotlessly clean and lovely apartment !
vista fenomenal, ubicación perfecta, muy comod

Hemos pasado un fin de semana espectacular. El apartamento está ubicado al lado del Puente Don Luis I y en frente de la Ribeira de Oporto. Las vistas son inmejorables, estaba muy limpio y Marcelo es una persona excepcional. Ha sido muy atento con nosotros en todo momento. Merece la pena ir. Volveremos a Oporto gracias a él.
Nous avons été bien accueilli apr Marcello. Le logement, confortable et très propre, est idéalement placé (à pied, en bus ou en métro) avec une très belle vue sur Porto.

O apartamento do Marcelo é incrível e conta com uma das melhores vistas do Porto! O ambiente é espaçoso, mas ao mesmo tempo bem aconchegante, super limpo e moderno. O Marcelo nos recebeu muito bem, foi pontual e ainda nos ofereceu pastéis de Belém e vinho do Porto! Por fim, nos enviou uma mensagem com excelentes dicas! Com certeza se eu voltar a Porto, vou tentar ficar no apartamento dele novamente! Super indico!

A nossa estadia foi excelente. Marcelo é muito simpático e solícito e nos deu muitas dicas preciosas. Seu apartamento é muito confortável, com excelente localização e uma vista maravilhosa. Para quem vem de carro a Porto é o local ideal. O estacionamento fica a 30 metros do apartamento e custa 6 euros por dia, super barato.
Voltaremos e recomendamos.

도오루강과 동루이스 다리를 매일 아침 저녁 볼수 있어서 너무 좋았어요 집도 깔끔하고 무엇보다 일찍 체크인 할 수 있냐고 요청했었는데 허락해줘서 일찍부터 짐 놓고 일정 시작할
수 있었어요 다만 처음에 주소로 정확한 집위치를 찾기 힘들었고 집 근처에 계단이 있어 짐 옮기는데 조금 힘들었어요 그치만 뷰가 너무 환상적이고 집이 깔끔해서 또 머물고 싶어요

El apartamento de Marcelo superó nuestras expectativas, tanto las fotos del apartamento como de las maravillosas vistas de Oporto son mucho mejores que lo que se puede apreciar en las fotos de airbnb.
El apartamento no tiene ascensor y hay que bajar y subir algunas escaleras pero Marcelo nos recibió y nos ayudo a subir las maletas y nos esperaba con una botella de Oporto para degustar y toda la información necesaria para recorrer y visitar la ciudad.
El apartamento está muy bien decorado y es supercómodo, agua caliente en todo momento y muy buena ducha, las camas muy cómodas, tienes todos los electrodomésticos necesarios para hacer tu estadía lo más confortable. Está muy bien ubicado , llegas caminando a todos lados y tienes restaurantes, bares, etc a unas 2 cuadras. SUPER recomendamos el apartamento de Marcelo y seguro que volveremos si es que regresamos a visitar la ciudad.

O listing do Marcelo está numa localização perfeita, a vista é magnifica. A casa é muito confortável e muito limpa. Adoramos a nossa estadia. Recomendamos. O Marcelo foi anfitrião muito atencioso e simpático. Deu-nos sugestões de vistas e esteve sempre disponível. Recomendo o listing do Marcelo, excedeu as nossas expectativas.

Marcelo's place was exactly like the pictures. We were met by Marcelo upon arrival and were given very good instructions with respect to the apartment and good tips about the area.  Communication between us before and during our stay was excellent.  My daughter and I stayed for three days and nights and wish it could have been longer.  As we were across the bridge (like a two minute walk) from the night life in Porto, we had no trouble having very peaceful and restful nights.  The view from the apartment was amazing and I would recommend Marcelo's to anyone.  I can't wait to go back

우선 풍경이 너무 멋졌던 숙소입니다.
루이스브릿지 건너자마자 위치해있어서 소개에 나온 그 풍경그대로를 즐길수 있었습니다.
시설들도 소개사진과 다를바없이 깔끔하고 청결하며
host 인 marcelo가 주는 가이드팁들도 유용했습니다.
혹시나 다시 포르투에 가게된다면 꼭 다시가고싶은 숙소네요. 적극 추천합니다. :)

Marcelo went above and beyond to welcome us in Porto. He made himself available to answer any questions we may have had during our stay. The apartment itself was clean, welcoming, and decorated nicely. The view really is the best in Porto. Overall it was a great experience!

We really loved this place. Marcello and family  were so helpful and they made us really feel apart of their family. The place can get a quite cold in winter but the host provided us with heaters which got the place quite warm. Also the double bed is in living room. The view is AMAZING. We really had the 'best view in Porto'. We knew it was good when other people were taking photos of the view in front of our door. Also location is great. Very central and near all port caves. I would highly recommend this place when in Porto

What else to say than "perfect" ? I couldn't expect a more fantastic experience for my first trip in Porto. Non only Marcelo is a kind and generous host, but his appartement is purely the best secret plan in town. The view, the location, the confort; I recommend it without a single doubt.

Cheers
Nathalie

Marcelo Sr. and Marcelo Jr. were absolutely lovely people. Extremely helpful with all questions I had and their hospitality was unmatched by any other hosts I have had. They gave me tons of travel guides and references of where to eat and go. I would most definitely stay here again.

This has possibly been my best airbnb experience yet. Marcelo and his son went above and beyond to make us comfortable. Our flight from Seville was delayed several hours, resulting in missed train connections and a very late arrival to Porto. I was extremely stressed but they were so accommodating and friendly I instantly relaxed. Not everyone would have been so nice about an 11pm arrival! The apartment has the best view of Porto you can imagine and the location is wonderful, right next door to the wine caves, near the sky  gondola and close to the bridge and river cruises. The little cafe downstairs is also great, very friendly staff and great pastries. Excellent experience all round.

We stayed here for 3 nights. Marcelo and Marcelo Jr welcomed us at the bus station and helped us with our bags, which was highly appreciated. They were very flexible for the check in and check out time. The apartment is perfectly in line with displayed pictures. The view on Porto city is amazing, clearly the most beautiful we can get. The apartment is well equipped and ideal for a family. The beds are very comfortable and bed sheets 100% linen. We were also welcomed with the famous pasteis de nata (great ones) and some Porto wine. Both father and son are so kind and they shared lot of information so that we can get the best out of our city trip. Porto is a very nice city to visit. We highly recommend it as well as the apartment ideally located to enjoy both Porto and Vila nova de Gaia. Thanks Marcelo, Marcelo Jr and Ana for your kind attention. See you soon !

Marcelo's place is beautiful - the view of Porto is amazing, and it's only a 5 minute walk over to the heart of the city. It's walking distance to everything you want to do in Porto, especially all the port houses! Could not be better!
The view from the apartment is amazing! Marcelo was a great host! He gave us good tips and was very helpful and responsive. Special credits for him for meeting us 02:00 am after a delayed flight! :)
Great location!

We loved this beautiful apartment with a spectacular view. Marcello met us at the bus stop when we arrived. He brought us to the apartment and was very helpful with local information. It is very convenient to the tourist attractions. We plan to return someday!

accueil sympathique de Marcelo...l'appartement est bien conforme au descriptif,propre et lumineux idéalement placé pour découvrir la (Website hidden by Airbnb) recommande pour un séjour dans cette belle ville de Porto     Daniel
Appartement propre, idéalement situé et conforme à la description. Bon accueil de Marcelo qui a communiqué de bonnes adresses et que je remercie pour le verre de Porto de bienvenue.

The apartment has breathtaking views, is in a fantastic location and has everything you could need for a comfortable stay. Comfy bed, linen bedding, spotlessly clean and well equipped. Our hosts couldn't have been more welcoming or helpful. We're very impressed and will definitely be back. Worth every penny.
Great stay! Perfect views and a host that was easy to communicate with!
The apartment is on the third floor overlooking the Douro river with a beautiful view of Porto.  It is in the center of the Port houses, so is very convenient for Port tasting.
As advertised this apartment has an amazing view. Just across the river from Porto. We had a great stay in this beautiful apartment.
Perfect location, apartment and host!

There was  no iron in the flat as stated on the amenities, but Marcelo brought us one the next day and he was a great host overall.  The view is breathtaking and the location is excellent to explore the city - everything is on your doorstep.  You don't want to stay anywhere else.

We had a fantastic time at the apartment. Marcelo is an excellent host, nothing was too much trouble. The view must be the best in Porto, we never tired of it and waking up to it every morning was amazing. It's also very close to everything and just a quick 5 min walk over the bridge to Ribeira. The apartment is well equipped, spotlessly clean and very comfortable. If we ever return to Porto we'll definitely stay here again. Thanks for a lovely holiday.
If this flat is available, definitely book it asap. The location is perfect and it must be the best view in Porto!

We had such an amazing time in Porto and the apartment was better then we expected. Great location and fabulous hosts. Marcelo made sure we had everything we needed and gave us suggestion for sights to visit. We would come back in a flash.

The best place in all of Porto! You will not find a better view of the town, and the location is fantastic.

I found myself often looking out the window and losing track of time just admiring the city and the river.

I have absolutely nothing bad to stay about the apartment, I would happily stay here again with out even wanting to look around.

Marcelo, Ana, and Marcelo Jr and wonderful hosts who certainly know what they are doing when it comes to accomidation and service.

We arrived from the airport by taxi and Marcelo and his son were there to welcome us. Marcelo Junior speaks excellent English. The apartment has a wonderful view of the old city of Porto on the other side of the River. It was lovely to wake up and see this in the early morning light.  Marcelo Junior provided many details and information about what to see in Porto and booked a taxi for us at the end of our stay.  We had a great holiday.
Amazing apartment, excellent location, and Marcelo is a wonderful host. Highly recommended.

What a view. The pictures are exactly what you will wake up to each morning. 
Location is fantastic and you are able to walk to everything you need. 
Marcelo is also fantastic and always willing to help.

최고의 에어비앤비였습니다! 방 모습과 뷰가 올려져있는 사진과 동일합니다. 최고의 뷰를 가진 방이었습니다. 시내에서 조금 떨어져있기는 하지만 포르투가 워낙 자그마한 도시이다 보니 왠만한 관광지는 모두 도보로 접근 가능했습니다. 오히려 중심에서 좀 벗어난 곳이라 조용히 쉬기에 좋았고, 강가에 위치하고 있어 창문을 열어 놓으면 저녁시간에 음악이 들려와 그 또한 너무나 좋았습니다. 
부엌시설도 훌륭하여 집에서 끼니를 해결하기에도 편리하였습니다. 위치 뿐만 아니라 전반적으로 청결하고 좋은 숙소였어요. 침대도 적당히 단단하고 침구도 깨끗하고 촉감이 좋았습니다. 
무엇보다 Marcelo는 매우 친절한 호스트였습니다! 끊임없이 부족한 것은 없는지, 도움을 줄 것은 없는지 확인하였고, 도움을 청하였을 때에는 신속하고 친절하게 도와주었습니다. 경험해본 중 최고의 호스트였습니다.

유일한 단점은 샤워 수압이 조금 약하였다는 정도이나, 조금만 마음을 느긋하게 먹으니 아무런 문제도 되지 않았습니다. 

포르투에 가신다면 자신있게 추천하고 싶은 숙소입니다!

This place was absolutely amazing and has the most stunning views of Porto.  It was like waking up in a movie each morning! The location is right across the bridge to all the major Porto sights so you are away from some of the hustle and bustle.  That being said there is a lot to do on this side of the river as well!  I would book this flat again in a heartbeat!!! And Marcelo and Ana are very courteous hosts!!

Perfect location overlooking Ribeira which is a two minute walk away across the bridge. A few steps to get into the apartment so not recommended for less than able. A room with a spectacular view and thoroughly recommended.

When they say it's the best view in Porto they mean it!  The flat is bright and clean, it's surprisingly quiet at night, the bed is comfortable, and the view out the windows is outstanding.  Marcelo and Marcelo Jr were very kind and welcoming.  We couldn't have asked for a better experience and will definitely be looking them up again on our next trip.

We really enjoyed our stay in Porto and Marcelo’s place was perfect for us. We liked being across from Porto - easy to get across the river and the view was wonderful! Definitely recommend the apartment - very, very clean and just like the photos

Marcelo’s apartment is in the perfect location for enjoying Porto - great views of the river and very easy to get into historic Porto.  Marcelo was a great host with very helpful top tips for getting the most out of our stay, and was very amenable with regard to our check-in and check-out which helped our enjoyment of our holiday enormously.

Marcelo's and Ana's apartment is amazing.  Would thoroughly recommend it to everyone.  Has a few stairs but should be fine for most people.  Very comfy bed with view of the river.  Very close  to everything.  Communication was great.  Only had to text and received a prompt reply.

Thank you Marcelo and Ana
I was happy throughout my stay in this house. The view outside the window was so good and the house was clean. The landlord was kind and responsive. It was cold because it was only north.

Marcelo’s flat is really nice. The location and views are unbeatable, just as we imagined. We would stay here again if we go back to Porto. Marcelo was a great host, communication was easy and he gave us tips to go around the city. Thanks Marcelo!
Marcelo's place is clean, it's in a nice location and the view is spectacular. Highly recommend it. Marcelo was very responsive and during check-in, he gave us lots of tips. Thanks!

This is a beautiful apartment and the views are unbeatable. The apartment is very clean and welcoming, with great amenities and the location is perfect! I would definitely stay here again on another trip.

We met Marcelo and his son when we arrived and they let us leave our bags even though check in wasn't for a few hours. They have us tips on the area and things to do which was very helpful. We enjoyed many of the activities they suggested.

Thank you for being such wonderful and helpful hosts!
무엇보다도 정말 멋진 뷰를 가지고 있습니다 바로 옆 와이너리에서 사온 와인과 함께한다면 그저 집에만 있어도 좋을만큼! 숙소 바로앞에 중심지까지 가는 버스가 있고 하루쯤은 걸어서 다리풍경을 보셔도 너무좋을것 같아요 일단 호스트가 주변에 살고있어 즉각적으로 도와줘서 굉장히 편한 여행이었습니다 :)

El alojamiento tiene las mejores vistas de Oporto. Se come espectacular muy cerca. La habitación/salón es increíble. La habitación de las dos camas individuales es un poco más fria y las camas podrán mejorarse. Pero en general es un apartamento muy curioso, cuidado y la ubicación impresionante. Marcelo atento y amable. Gracias !

Vše super.Skvely výhled a poloha.Marcelo spolehlivý a milý.Vybaveni dostačující.Meli jsme smůlu na počasí,pršelo a v apartmánu byla hrozitanska zima.Jinak vše super!
Marketa

Soberba localização sobre o rio .
As dicas prestadas por Marcelo foram fantásticas .
O apartamento estava muíto bem limpo e tudo o resto em muito boa condição .Sem duvida uma experiência a repetir .
António Fonseca
Best view in Porto!

The location, the view, the host, all fantastic. We had an amazing stay and the small thoughtful details were so appreciated. Several restaurants & shops just outside the flat, easy transit to Porto and airport/train station, honestly there is so much to love about this place. Thanks so much Marcelo, hope to stay here again some day!

We really enjoyed our stay at Marcelo's apartment. The view from the apartment was breathtaking, the location is hard to beat - few steps from wine cellars, river boat tours and restaurants and only 5 min walk across the bridge to the Ribeira. Hosts were super responsive and provide many recommendations. Thanks again guys!
Great apartment, amazing location & views, great host, superb experience!

Wow , best AirBNB for us so far ! Exactly what we hoped for from the pictures we saw.
The view from the appartment is simply incredible, its a quiet place but restaurants at La Ribeira and the waterfront in Vila Nova de Gaia from a walkable distance.
Marcelo was easy to contact and left plenty of info for us to discover the city. Apartment was easy to find and check in was simple, as we like.
Everything was also perfectly clean.
Thank you !

Originally we were a little concerned about staying in the Gaia side. But I’m so happy we did because the view from Gaia is much better. It was one of the most beautiful views I’ve ever seen from an Airbnb. The bedroom window overlooks the river and it is breathtaking! 

The location couldn’t be better. It’s about a 5-10 minute walk to the Porto side (suuuper easy) and the walk across also has great views.

We were unable to meet Marcelo, however, he gave us a message with things to do and places to eat.  Communication was very good.  The view is stunning.  No air conditioning and on hot days, it is quite difficult to be comfortable even with window open at night.  A fan is provided.  The location is perfect but be aware it can be a noisy, popular area.  Beds are comfortable and double bed is in the living room.  Great restaurants and wine tastings are a few steps away.  Overall, we would recommend as a place to stay.

Schöne Wohnung mit allem was man braucht für einen Städtetripp. Lage und ÖPNV sind klasse, Abends etwas Betrieb vor dem Haus (keine Autos) aber wir waren ja auch unterwegs. Sollte ich wieder einmal in die Stadt kommen versuche ich die Wohnung wieder zu buchen. Alles bestens organisiert und alle sehr hilfsbereit. Vielen Dank
Clean place, excellent location, great value

This place is amazing!! We had a wonderful stay in Porto and Marcelo’s place was perfectly located to serve as home base. We loved the view and being across the river to enjoy seeing the action but in a quiet area just minutes away. The place is perfectly clean and well equipped with everything you need.  We walked all over the city, enjoyed the hop on/off bus tour, did the river boat tour and the sky tram.  We would love to return and take a day trip to the Duoro Valley. We just didn’t have enough time. 
We would highly recommend this beautiful place!!

We had a fantastic week in Porto, we particularly appreciated the local tips, as vegetarians, it is often challenging to find options but Marcello made this easy by listing good vegetarian restaurants. Communication and hospitality was excellent, Marcello greeted us on arrival and booked our taxi back to the airport on departure. Perfectly located across the bridge, in Vila Nova de Gaia; postcard views of Porto, great ambiance with plenty to do; not forgetting the obligatory Port!
Attentive host, unbeatable location (bus stop metres from door), walkable to Ribiera/many restaurants and who could forget the riverfront views. Spotless and stylish place!

Glæd jer til den mest fantastiske udsigt samt perfekte beliggenhed i forhold til seværdigheder. 
Vi fik hurtigt svar på beskeder samt gode tips til mad og ting at opleve. God og venlig service.
Lejligheden blev hurtig varm og fugtig, og vi var glade for, det var en mild sommer under vores besøg.
Køkkenudstyret kunne være bedre eller bredere og køleskabet større.
Alt i alt vil vi varmt anbefale stedet, især hvis du for eksempel er veganer som værterne.

Marcelo was an excellent host, providing lots of suggestions and answering questions quickly when we messaged. The location could not have been better, absolutely beautiful. We would definitely stay here again!

도우루강 건너편에 있으며, 바로 아래에 유명한 와이너리가 밀집해있습니다.(밤늦게까지 조금 시끄러울 수 있습니다) 그리고 사용하는 집 아래는 살짝 화장실 냄새가 나서인지 모기가 굉장히 많았어요...집 안에까지 모기가 들어와 고생했네요..그치만 이것 빼고는 완벽했습니다!
포르투가 워낙 작은 도시라 주요 관광지는 도보로 다 이동 가능했습니다.
무엇보다 숙소 창밖으로 보이는 뷰가 정말 멋져요! 기차로 이동하시면 보통 상벤투역 이용하실 텐데 저는 택시로 7유로 정도 나왔어요. 짐 있으시면 호스트에게 문의해 콜택시 이용하시는 걸 추천합니다!
다시 포르투에 간다면 이곳 고려할 것 같아요:)
There cannot be a better view in all of Porto. Marcelo is an attentive host and the house is spotless.

Marcelo and Ana’s apartment is immaculate, stylish, and offers views of Porto and the Douro river that make you want to pinch yourself with wonder that such a world is not only possible but exists just outside your door. The apartment is convenient to everything. Vila Nova de Gaia is slightly less hectic than Porto which is a welcome change, and you have access to all the port wine houses right outside your door. Also, you’re near the Dom Luís bridge and just a mere 3 minute walk to Porto. All in all, a fantastic apartment and an unbeatable location.

Marcelo and his son greeted us and shared lots of tips about the area.  We were able to check in and leave our bags while they finished up.  The view is right off of a postcard.  Absolutely gorgeous.  We enjoyed our easy location and would for sure recommend this accommodation!  Obrigada!

Marcelo and Ana’s apartment is absolutely wonderful. It’s close to everything you need, there’s fantastic food, wine, entertainment as close or as far as you want to walk. 

Marcelo was a great host! Many suggestions, attentive to any questions, quick with suggestions and genuinely helpful. 

The images in the listing don’t do the location justice. A truly great find here on Airbnb! 

Thank you Marcelo!

Views to die for, 
the hustle and bustle of portside life  probably not changed for hundreds of years. A safe place too.

Marcello and Ana are super helpful, and super kind. Their apartment was clean and spacious with the best view in all of Gaia! Wonderful location close to everything you would like to see, and every port you would like to taste. We had a wonderful stay.

This was absolutely hands down one of the top Airbnb places I have stayed in and I have traveled the world and stayed in many. The view was amazing, location was absolutely fantastic and Marcelo was so gracious and accommodating on our departure. Place was very clean and nicely appointed would highly recommend the only place to stay if you are in Porto
Outstanding location, worthwhile exploring the Gaia side of the river before venturing across the bridge.

The view of the Douro River is awesome. We stayed for 5 nights and the apartment was perfect for the two of us. It was clean, well equipped and comfortable. Marcelo was a fantastic host. He met us at our arrival and helped us with our luggage. He provided many recommendations of sites to visit and how to get around. Highly recommend.
Great location with a beautiful view looking at Porto and all the amazing places you will visit.

Marcelo's apartment was fantastic. While not "in" Porto, we did have a fantastic view of Porto and it was a quick walk across the Luis I bridge to get into town. Marcelo and his daughter were very hospitable and quickly responded to questions. I would definitely stay at Marcelo's apartment again if I return to Porto.
Wonderful location and excellent space. Highly recommend
Wonderful place to stay with great location!

Two doors from the bridge  with a perfect view of Porto. 
Very convenient
Great view and good spot to stay at

We had a great stay in the apartment, it’s very nice, very clean and the vieuw (location) is spectacular. During the winter you might need a pair of house slippers, and an extra sweater to stay a bit warmer. But everything else is perfect!

name: Romantic Red for 2 in Beyoglu
space: This uniquely furnished room will make your stay in Istanbul very special.  Our place is here to arrange accommodation for travelers from all around the world in the magical settings of ancient Istanbul. We are experienced in the old Pera (Beyoglu) district which is in walking distance from the main touristic, cultural, shopping and entertainment sites. We will be supplying you with accommodations in local settings having all comforts of modern life and with assistance for anything a traveler can ask for. Our hotel even though is very central located, the silence and its beautiful garden makes our guest have comfortable moments. We can offer you assistance for communication with local transport agencies, restaurants, clubs etc. Information on cultural, artistic happenings Transfer from/ to the Airport, (optional) Private driver (optional) Dry cleaning service (optional) City, Boat and night tours (optional) Private guide (optional) Ticket assistance to shows, exhibitions and museums Tr
