host.host_about: Currently located in Macedonia but traveling anywhere and everywhere on any opportunity I get. I was a host myself with TripAdivsor awards so I have high standards when it comes to hospitality.

name: Mihmandar Sultanahmet aprt 3
summary: Restore edilmiş bir konakta 2013 yılında hizmete girmiş olan mihmandar apart, Sultanahmet semtiyle iç içe, Sultan Ahmet Cami gibi tarihî mekanlara yürüme mesafesinde yer almaktadır. Tesis, ücretsiz Wi-Fi ve özel mini mutfak klima içerir.
description: Restore edilmiş bir konakta 2013 yılında hizmete girmiş olan mihmandar apart, Sultanahmet semtiyle iç içe, Sultan Ahmet Cami gibi tarihî mekanlara yürüme mesafesinde yer almaktadır. Tesis, ücretsiz Wi-Fi ve özel mini mutfak klima içerir.

name: Chic and Cozy Heart of Williamsburg
summary: Feel like a local! This is a semi-private room with a comfortable bed in a great Williamsburg apartment! 2 blocks from the Bedford Avenue stop on the L Train. Depending in which direction you want to go, you can be in the East Village or Bushwick in 10 minutes!
space: Feel like a local! This is a semi-private room with a comfortable bed in a great Williamsburg apartment! 2 blocks from the Bedford Avenue stop on the L Train. Depending in which direction you want to go, you can be in the East Village or Bushwick in 10 minutes! This apartment has great feel to it. Everything in it has been chosen by me. I love to cook, host and entertain so be sure that whatever you need will be here. If there is anything you need before your arrival, please let me know. Come home to a big comfy couch, watch a movie on Netflix or hang out in the backyard! The living room has a deep comfortable sofa and a flat screen tv on which you are welcomed to watch Netflix or Hulu. There is an outdoor space that is divine. I love to have my coffee outside every morning. You can use the fully functioning kitchen. The bathroom is clean and basic toiletries are provided. You also have access to my very playful cat, Harry. I work a lot but I love to enjoy my apartment as well so I wil
description: Feel like a local! This is a semi-private room with a comfortable bed in a great Williamsburg apartment! 2 blocks from the Bedford Avenue stop on the L Train. Depending in which direction you want to go, you can be in the East Village or Bushwick in 10 minutes! Feel like a local! This is a semi-private room with a comfortable bed in a great Williamsburg apartment! 2 blocks from the Bedford Avenue stop on the L Train. Depending in which direction you want to go, you can be in the East Village or Bushwick in 10 minutes! This apartment has great feel to it. Everything in it has been chosen by me. I love to cook, host and entertain so be sure that whatever you need will be here. If there is anything you need before your arrival, please let me know. Come home to a big comfy couch, watch a movie on Netflix or hang out in the backyard! The living room has a deep comfortable sofa and a flat screen tv on which you are welcomed to watch Netflix or Hulu. There is an outdoor space that is divine.
neighborhood_overview: Williamsburg feels like a little village to me, which is so special in a city like New York. There are great restaurants, bars and cafes nearby, my favorites are Cafe Mogador and Cafe Colette. I'm near the water so you can walk to the river and catch beautiful sunsets. Macarren Park is nearby, you can lay out in the sun or visit their farmer's market on Saturday. Some delis are open 24 hours.  * McCarren Park is a few blocks away. (website hidden) * Cafe Colette is down the block.  (website hidden)  * Cafe Mogador is another favorite.  (website hidden)  * The Wythe Hotel has a great restaurant and rooftop bar. (website hidden) (website hidden) (website hidden) * DOC Wine Bar has a great wine list and a small but delicious menu. (website hidden)
notes: * Nespresso coffee available every morning. * I provide fresh linens. * Amazing restaurants, coffee shops and delis abound. * Great shopping for any budget.
transit: * The Bedford Stop on the L Train is 2 blocks away.  * You can be in Union Square in 10/15 minutes. * Bushwick is 10 minutes away by train. * Greenpoint is walking distance away. * You can easily take a taxi.
access: Come home to a big comfy couch, watch a movie on Netflix or hang out in the backyard! The living room has a deep comfortable sofa and a flat screen tv on which you are welcomed to watch Netflix or Hulu. There is an outdoor space that is divine. I love to have my coffee outside every morning. You can use the fully functioning kitchen. The bathroom is clean and basic toiletries are provided. You also have access to my very playful cat, Harry.
interaction: I work a lot but I love to enjoy my apartment as well so I will be around to guide you in any way I can.
house_rules: * ACCOMMODATES 1 PERSON ONLY * Please respect my home. * Guests have access to the whole apartment except my bedroom. * NO CRAZY PARTIERS PLEASE.  * Please keep the toilet seat down. * No shoes in the apartment.  * Slippers are provided. * Be nice to the cat. * No smoking inside the apartment. You can smoke in the backyard.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: My name is Guillerma, my friends call me G. I am a massage therapist, a yoga instructor, and I have a small wellness brand called BHATI. I love to host. I love design, and I believe that reflects in both my home and office. I am originally from Honduras but I‘m a New Yorker at heart. Welcome to Williamsburg, welcome to Brooklyn, welcome to my home.

reviews.comments:
Guillerma is so lovely and her home is peaceful, calm and clean. She was a wonderful host. Her linens are the finest, the backyard is a little piece of heaven and her company is divine. The apartment is like an oasis in the lively neighborhood of Williamsburg, which is packed with shops, restaurants and bars. 
I will definitely be staying here every time I return to Brooklyn. 
And Harry the cat is a joy.

The home was very clean and neat; fresh fruit and hot coffee available every morning at home. good location, within minutes to walk to the subway station and the neighborhood is convenient and had a lot of street arts. There's a park nearby so u can go jogging in the morning. G is a nice lady and she showed me around the first day, provided me with a lot of tips for me to get fully involved in NYC. Harry the cat is so cute and clean!!

Guillerma's Private Room is terrific.  The neighborhood is excellent and Manhattan is only 10 minutes away via the L Train, which is only 2 blocks from her.  Guillerma was an excellent host, provided instructions and overall guidelines.   The Room is perfect for sleeping, not having to wake up to street noise is hard to come by in NYC.  I would certainly stay at Guillerma's again.   Harry was cool, too.

My stay in Guillerma's flat was just perfect : great location with a lot of bars, restaurants and cool places around, very close train station on the Line L which is going in 10 min to manathan and very nice appartement where you fell immediatly welcome. Guillerma is really helpful and great to talk. I definitively recommand this place.
Such a lovely experience! The apartment is comf and very clean! Guillerma is a amazing person! Love to stay with her! Love it my days in her home ❤️

Super host with a lot of good advices about the city (things to do, restaurants, bars,...), a confortable bed and an amazing bathroom. Really useful after an entire day walking.
Book now !

Guillerma was the most fantastic host!  I loved my time at her beautiful apartment.  Her place is in such an awesome location - I fell completely in love with Williamsburg and Guillerma's is right next to so many fantastic bars, restaurants and gorgeous shops.  I was a solo female traveller, and felt totally safe coming and going from the apartment on my own late at night.  If you're a yogi, ask Guillerma for recommendations - she gave me lots of tips for really great studios nearby.  And make sure you check out Cafe Colette at the end of the street - delicious!

Thanks, Guillerma, for a fantastic stay.  I hope to visit again soon!

G is a wonderful host, kind and willing to help. She attended to things that need attention promptly. Communication via email was very good. 
The bedroom is a partition so no closing of doors. Not an issue as she was hardly there. When she was she was respectful ie quite. I feel this is a good stay for a single traveler due to the size of the bed (double) and the apartment. 
Note there is no washer dryer.
Truly a gem! Perfect home away home. Harry the cat is cool. Don't lose him, he is the cozy keeper of this chic home.

Guillerma was a lovely and generous host! I loved her apartment's style and amenities. It was close to everything in Williamsburg, including the L Subway so it was an easy commute to Manhattan. Harry was the pièce de résistance, her gregarious and playful feline roommate. The place looks as good or better than in the photos and it was easy to communicate with Guillerma for check in and out! 5-stars all around.

G. is for great. Guillerma was a great host. cooperative, availble any time for any need. her appartement is very warm clean and equieiped with every thing from cooking to the best hair dryer. the best lication in williansburg which is the best location in NYC right now.
very recommended to women who travel by themselves.
and if you need to have a cigarette from time to time one can smoke in the backyard :)

G was a wonderful host! Super accommodating, lovely and helpful - a great communicator before and during my stay.
The apartment was in a fantastic location - just a stones throw away from the main street and train station. Its comfortable, clean and quite spacious. It has a great courtyard out the back and all the essentials. It was a calm and quiet apartment which was great to come back to after the hustle and bustle in NYC.
The rooms itself is a partition, but was set up to still feel like your own little private sanctuary! I would certainly recommend this for any solo travelers. 
Thanks again G for a wonderful stay!

Guillerma was great - super friendly and always available.
The house is really nice as well - clean, cosy and with good location. I definitely recommend it!

G was such a lovely, wonderful host! I definitely want to stay in her apt when i come back! The location was the heart of Wburg, and L train is just right around the conner! Just so much enjoyed staying here. Thank you G!!
Great host and beautiful home in a perfect location. G makes a real effort to ensure you have everything you need and that you feel relaxed and welcome

Very nice place close to the Bedford station (took me one minute walk) which is one stop from Manhattan. The neighborhood itself is full of stores, coffee shops, restaurants, and bars. So even at night is feels safe.
Guillerma was great host! super friendly and always available to answer any questions and give excellent recommendations. The apartment is really nice as well - clean, cosy, quite, and have a great backyard. The rooms itself is a partition like shown, but felt completely privet to me.
Stayed with Guillerma again.  It is terrific place in the heart of one of the most trendiest parts of Brooklyn.  Place is clean and exactly like the pictures.  Great place, I will be back!

Very nice apartment just as described. Clean and comfortable, nice bathroom. Perfect location next to Bedford av and close to L line to Manhattan. Flawless communication with Guillerma. She was very helpful and kind!

My stay with Guillerma could not have been better! She was very nice and hospitable. I felt welcome and comfortable staying with her which was extremely important to me considering this was my first time using AirBnB.

Guillerma's home is great. I love the decor and it's such a positive environment to be in. It was great having the outdoor living space as the weather was gorgeous during my stay.

In terms of location, it doesn't get much better than this. Just a few blocks from the L train made my morning commute to Union Square in Manhattan ~15 minutes. Williamsburg is also a very cool part of town. Guillerma provided me with excellent advice about where to go and what places to check out.

The reason for my stay was actually to find a permanent place to live in the city. Not only has Guillerma been a great host, she also has been very helpful in my apartment search! I highly recommend staying with Guillerma!
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
I had a great time at Guillerma...

Guillerma was the perfect host! Super friendly, reliable and welcoming. It was easy to communicate and arrange everything. I caught a bad cold during my stay and she was so nice. And I loved her apartment! I was so inspired when it came to interior and so on. And my "room" felt like my own little sanctuary. And not to forget about the perfect location in the best neighborhood in New York. But I think her poor cat Harry musn't have been very fond of me; since I am both allergic and scared of cats.

I cannot recommend staying with G enough. She was always really helpful with whatever questions I had, while also making loads of brilliant recommendations for places to visit and restaurants to check out. The location was perfect, not only for its close proximity to Bedford Av subway, but also for the sheer quantity of great restaurants, bars, shops and more right on the door step. Highly recommended!

El anfitrión cumplio con todo o que escribio en su anuncio, departamento limpio y bien ordenado, siempre estuvo disponible y aconsejo donde ir y que hacer. El departamento es tal cual como se describe. El Barrio es muy lindo y tranquilo. La ubicación es excelente a dos cuadras de la estación Bedford de la linea de tren L con lo que se hace muy fácil de conectarse con Manhattan y el resto de Brooklyn. Es muy recomendable y me volvería a alojar en este lugar.

Guillerma is an excellent host--bright, cheerful, and accommodating. Quarters are pleasant and clean. Location is great--quiet side street just off the main thoroughfare in Williamsburg. I hope to stay there again.
Great apartment, very clean and central. Guillerma is very nice and flexible. Highly recommended.

Guillerma is so lovely, I had a great time at her place!  It's close living quarters, but she was very respectful of space.  The location is absolutely wonderful, right there on Bedford Ave close to everything, walk to the ferry, walk to Wholefoods, whatever you need.  And it isn't noisy in terms of street noise from bars or anything, but if you are a light sleeper bring your ear plugs (you'd want them for anywhere in NYC!) as the walls are thin and you might hear the neighbours TV/ walking on floorboards.  Her cat Harry is cute and playful.  Thanks for the lovely time!!!

I had a perfect stay in New York at Guillermas place. She is a fantastic host and made me feel at home from the time I arrived. The apartment is perfectly situated in the center of all the restaurants and cafés ind Williamsburg. Would definately stay there again :)

The this is not a private room, it is a space off the front door and between the host bedroom and living room/kitchen. If you are early to bed or need to sleep late, forget it due to lack of privacy and noise.

I had an excellent stay at Guillerma's! The room is nicely arranged with everything you need and the mattress is very comfortable. Guillerma was friendly and helpful, and Harry the cat is a real character! I highly recommend.

Amazing location, Guillerma's apartment is very lovely quiet and clean. Located right off Bedford Avenue which is very central for great restaurants, shops, bars and the subway. I had a very nice time NY and Guillerma made it even nicer, very open and polite and she is very flexible with her check-in and out hours. I was in New York for a wedding and flew in very late and flew out very early without any problems. She is quick to communicate and very clear. Cat lovers will lover hanging out on the couch with Harry who is very playful. I had a great time, 10 out of 10 would stay again!

Location is great, in a interesting area of Williamsburg, and close to the ferry boat station - a very convenient and confortable transport to Manhattan. 
By the pictures and comments I was aware that the room had no proper walls separating it from the rest of the apartment, and Guillerma made all efforts to keep the apartment always quiet and silent. It was not a issue for me and I could sleep well. Charming place.

Guillerma's house is located in a really convenient and great neighborhood. It's just 1 stop from Manhattan and had great restaurants nearby. The place is also really comfy and had all the things you would need. I suggest Guillerma's place to anyone who is travelling alone or in 2 to NYC.

Guillerma is a great host. She provided everything I needed and the communication was outstanding. I accidentally booked her place one day to late (arrived a day earlier than I booked her place) but she made it possible that I could stay an extra night before the official booking. I was so happy for that! Guillerma is a strong and very nice person, we had great conversations. Only one thing to mention is that the room is not exactly a room, much more a covered area with a bed, drawer etc. But privacy was totally no issue for me, as she is very quiet and respects silence allot. I totally recommend that stay, also because it couldn't be more local – Williamsburg is the place to be, many coffee places and restaurants around. Super nice and beautiful people around that area!

Me hospedar no apartamento da Guillherma foi a escolha (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza ficaria novamente lá. O apartamento é limpo, bem organizado, muito fiel à descrição que consta no anúncio.

A Guillherma me recebeu muito bem. Ela é uma mulher agradável, com uma energia maravilhosa e vibrante, e isso se reflete no apartamento, cheio de vida e personalidade. Apesar de ser um quarto semi-privativo (o que consta na descrição), em nenhum momento senti minha privacidade desrespeitada. Dormi até tarde alguns dias e foi muito tranquilo. A cama é ótima. Amei os travesseiros! Ter um abajur ao lado da cara também foi bom para poder ler até mais tarde. O banheiro também é limpo e organizado. 

Quanto à localização, não poderia ter sido melhor.  Fica a duas quadras do metrô, em uma rua com movimento de pessoas até mais tarde. Mesmo voltando depois das 23h quase todos os dias, pude vir a pé até o apartamento em segurança. Por perto há também boas cafeterias, bares e livrarias deliciosas. 

Ah, e sem esquecermos do Harry, o gato. Ele é adorável :)

What an amazing host! Best Airbnb experience so far! Loved every second of my stay as the place felt very homey. Conveniently located right on Bedford ave, close to the subway station and many coffee shops and restaurants. Guillerma was super helpful  and responsive and her place is very cute and nicely decorated. I didn’t just have a lovely stay, I gained an awesome new friend :) would def come back to stay at her place again.

Perfect location in a safe neighborhood with all the dining options one would need within minutes walking distance. Easy access to the city whether public or private transportation. Friendly, gracious host who was most prompt with responses and flexible with check-in/out. Very clean  and cozy, definitely plan on staying here again.
Great host and great place! Would definitely stay again.
Great spot for solo travelers, comfy and in the best neighborhood!! Love Williamsburg, especially the area where this place is located! Guillerma is very welcoming and so helpful!
Guillerma is so nice and helpful and her appartment is so neat; cute neighbour too.

Great location in Williamsburg. The place is super central. Her place has everything what you’d wish for, you can use the coffee machine and make tea. Night sleep was outstanding,  the bed is super comfortable
I totally recommend this place. Clean, Comfortable, Kind host, Good location and cute Harry. This was first time to go Newyork myself. That was fantastic trip.

name: B103 Waipouli Beach Resort, Sleeps 8!
summary: Waipouli B103 is a beautiful 2 Bedroom, 3 Bathroom Condo on the beautiful island of Kauai. Located on the ground floor in ‘B’ Building, this well decorated condo offers easy access to the pool and beach with quiet privacy. This condo has a fully equipped gourmet kitchen, central AC, washer/dryer and one of the few condos at this resort with 2 QUEEN beds in the second bedroom, comfortably sleeping 6-8 guests! The price includes HI tax (14.42%), out clean and resort fees!
space: Waipouli B103 is a beautiful 2 Bedroom, 3 Bathroom Condo at 1st Class Waipouli Beachfront Resort & Spa on the beautiful island of Kauai.Located on the ground floor in ‘B’ Building, this well decorated 2 Bedroom, 3 Bath Condo offers easy access to the pool and beach with quiet privacy when returning to the condo. This Beautiful Condo features the highest quality designer furnishings for your comfort and enjoyment.  Three LCD flat panel wall mounted televisions and a large selection of channels plus a DVD player. The Master Bedroom Suite has a king size bed, a full size dresser and a Master Bath with it’s own tub for luxurious baths and a separate shower. The Second Master Bedroom Suite has two Queen size beds with a master bath of its own, with a soaking tub.  There is also a queen sofa sleeper, so can accommodate 6-8 people. Please note: this is a vacation rental, not part of a Hotel. We get you started with basic supplies like a few rolls of toilet paper, shampoos, soaps, paper towels
description: Waipouli B103 is a beautiful 2 Bedroom, 3 Bathroom Condo on the beautiful island of Kauai. Located on the ground floor in ‘B’ Building, this well decorated condo offers easy access to the pool and beach with quiet privacy. This condo has a fully equipped gourmet kitchen, central AC, washer/dryer and one of the few condos at this resort with 2 QUEEN beds in the second bedroom, comfortably sleeping 6-8 guests! The price includes HI tax (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) %), out clean and resort fees! house_rules: Resort & Condo Guidelines Please take some time to review these Waipouli Beach Association House Rules that have been designed to ensure safety, comfort and enjoyment for all owners and guests of Waipouli Beach Resort. Absolutely no smoking in the condo or on the lanais or anywhere on the property. Our resort is a SMOKE FREE PROPERTY. All condos are designated non-smoking units. There are designated smoking areas located along the parameter of the property. Our resort facilities may be used only by owners and guests occupying a unit. Privileges may be extended to family and friends visiting our resort only when the owner or the registered guest is present and each guest must be registered at the front desk. Each unit is allowed a total of 6 guests at any given time. Quiet hours are from 10:00 p.m. to 8:00 a.m. but excessive noise should be avoided at all times. reviews.comments:
Condo was clean, well decorated, and felt upscale. Beds were really comfortable and bathrooms were large. It had everything we needed including the requested sand toys, beach chairs, and umbrella. 

The resort had a great pool area very close to the unit. Our 3 and 5yr old LOVED the water slides and kid friendly hot tub. The onsite restaurant/bar was well rated on yelp and offered great views. The resort was also located close to grocery store, great ice cream shop, and town of Kappa. We also found staying on the East side of the Island allowed us to see and experience all of the island without travling extreme distances. 

The condo unit also had 3 great patio areas off the bedrooms and living room.  Though they faced and were in close proximity to the parking lot, we still enjoyed sitting outside and were suprised at how quiet it was at night. 

Candace was a great host. She communicated well in advance, checked in to make sure we had everything we needed, and accomodated our questions and requests quickly. 

Overall, this was a great place to stay and would highly recommend it.
Beau ti fu l place and all is convenience｡And the owner always patiently answer our kinds of questions.
Very nice. Quick responses. Nice location. Love the pool area!

Absolutely fabulous! The location of the condo was ideal for driving to the North or South within a 20-min drive. Close proximity to grocery stores, excellent restaurants and great shops! Condo unit was quiet, clean and comfortable for the 5 of us (adults). Having a washer and drier in unit was very useful. I can't wait to come visit again!

reviews.comments:
Très bonne position géographique de l'appartement : 2 min à pieds de Copacabana 
Immeuble sécurisé par la présence d'un gardien 
Appartement très agréable. Nous avons été très bien accueillies, Maria nous a beaucoup aidé lors de notre séjour. 
La convivialité de Maria fut extraordinaire et nous a permis de vraiment apprécier notre séjour à Rio.
Finalmente no pude hacer uso de la reserva. Pero realizamos el pago. María fue muy amable durante todo el proceso.
Adorei ficar com Maria. Ela é muito boa e atenciosa. Sempre deu dicas pra nós. Seu café da manha é gostoso :) Vou recomendar ela sempre. Obrigada Maria, foi muito gentil connosco.

Maria was very welcoming. She had a very motherly vibe which was good for two girls in a big city during the craziest time of year. She provided breakfast for us which was unexpected but very appreciated! The only thing I noticed was misleading was that there was no AC units in the apartment we just had fans to use. Also one thing to note is that there are 3 bedrooms in the apartment that are also being rented out on AirBnB. So other travelers may be staying there too. It may  not be the best for someone who needs a lot of privacy. 

The apartment was very clean and well kept which was a plus. The location was also great! Literally about 3 blocks from the beach. The staff in the building were also very nice and welcoming to us.

On a été très bien accueilli par Maria, elle nous a offert la meilleur de ses chambres! Disponible et d'une grande gentillesse, elle nous mis 
à notre à aise pendant tous notre séjour. Son appartement est la localisation idéale pour visiter les incontournables de Rio!
On serait bien resté plus longtemps. Merci Maria!

Minha hospedagem foi muito tranquila e agradável. A Maria é uma pessoa muito educada e atenciosa, além de te deixar muito à vontade. Costuma dar dicas de como se locomover pela região, alertando quanto aos possíveis contratempos. Serve também um delicioso café da manhã. A localização do apartamento é excelente, pois fica próximo da praia, como também do metrô, possibilitando uma fácil locomoção.

Todo muy bien! Maria es muy buena persona y preocupada. Ofrece un muy buen desayuno e intenta que esten lo mas comodos posibles. Todo igual a la descripción y salió todo perfecto. //
Tudo muito bem! Maria é muito boa pessoa e preocupada. Ela oferece um muito bom cafe de manha e tentar que são tão confortável possível. Tudo igual à descrição e tudo foi perfeito.
Muy buena anfitriona, nos oriento y guió en nuestra estadía por Rio. Muy recomendada
Lugar maravilhoso... Dona Maria sempre atenciosa te deixando bem a vontade e disponível para te ajudar/auxiliar no que precisar. Café da manhã maravilhoso e boas dicas!!!

María nos atendió de la mejor manera y fue muy hospitalaria con nosotras. Nos recomendaba sitios a donde ir y los cuidados que debíamos de tener por las fechas de Año Nuevo en la ciudad ya que puede ser algo peligrosa. Estuvimos muy a gusto en su casa y nos sentimos muy contentas de que alguien tan buena persona como Maria nos haya acogido. Se notaba el esmero que le ponía a detalles como la preparación del desayuno desde temprano. El espacio donde estuvimos tenía lo necesario para sentirnos cómodas y estar tranquilas. Su casa tenía una buenísima ubicación, tan solo a 3 cuadras de la playa.
Muchas gracias por todas tus atenciones, María! :)
Cabe destacar la atención de Maria, es una persona muy agradable, atenta y que todo el tiempo te hace sentir comoda. La ubicación del apart es muy buena. El hospedaje es muy confortable.

Adorei me hospedar na casa da Sra. Maria! Ela é uma pessoa super simpática e atenciosa.
O apartamento é super bem localizado, no coração de Copacabana,  limpo, bem decorado e  fica em um prédio muito seguro com porteiros hiper simpáticos. Recomendo e em outras oportunidades quero voltar a me hospedar com essa excelente anfitriã.

o quarto que a gente alugou tava um pouco pequeno mas brilhante de limpo, tudo é muito limpio (ela é muito estreita com a limpeza assim tudo ficam bem legal), María é muito atenta, generosa e até deu café de manhã pra gente, o apartamento muito bem locali
