host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments:
We had the most wonderful time at Rawan's flat. The location is very convenient, close to G line, eateries and food markets. The neighbourhood is nice to walk around.
The room was superb! Comfy bed, air-con and privatetoiletm. The kitchen has got everything you need, including a dishwasher. On top of that there is a washing machine and a dryer so we did not have to lose time going away to do our laundry.
Rawan is always easy to talk to and she gave us all sort of info to make us feel at home.
We would recommend to anybody willing to stay at Brooklet to stay at her place. 
We'd like to thank Rawan for making our stay in NY unforgettable.
The apartment is new and clean, everything was working really well, and Rawan is really nice and friendly  : )
Awesome room! So helpful to have laundry after 48 hours in car. Rawan was so nice and polite. Would stay there again!

We were in New York City for some work and leisure. Unfortunately the stay needed to be extended by one more day. Rawan was very accommodating and cordial to accept the stay request on a short notice. The room was pleasant, well furnished and comfortable. The location was just the right one for us. Thank you Rawan for your hospitality, although we couldn't spend more time. Any time, you are in Boston area, do let us know.
Great space with lots of light, washer/dryer, plus private in-room bathroom.  Very happy with my stay.

Lovely place to stay, Rawan wasn't there as she was renting her room during her time away. The room and flat was cleaned by a professional company before we arrived so it was very clean. The private bathroom and the washer/dryer in a room was very convenient and worked well as we used it once.   Rawan make some space in her closet and left few hangers for us that was well appreciate, she left as well in a bathroom shampoo and others staff to use, we had our stuff so we didn't use it by it's a nice gesture . The air conditioning was working well, it was very warm during our time in New York 35 degrees, we used it only when we arrived and cut it during night time as it was a bit noisy but obviously we are happy to have it ! We used the kitchen, there is everything you need to prepared your meal (toaster, fridge, kettle, microwave, oven, appliances). In a flat there is two other rooms, one is occupied by Rawan roommate and another one near to the kitchen area dedicated for other airbnb person. During our stay another guy arrived 2 days after us very nice, we had few talk together ! If you are coming by car it's a good place to stay as you can park in her street or the next one for free just be careful with the sign the Thursday morning between 8.30 to 10am you have to move you car to the other side and the same thing for the Friday morning. If you move your car at 8.15am you will find space, lot of people are going to work at this time.
Rawan was very helpful as I booked the wrong date, she accommodated me, she answered to me in a minute as soon as I had a question for her. Thanks again for all your help, you have been pleasant to deal with. 
The tube station is at five minutes walk I advised you the Clinton/Washington one the G line as the street is nice to walk. If you want to go to Times Square you will have to change for the 7 ( purple line) at court square.
Rawan was terrific. Super responsive and the apartment was exactly as expected. I strongly recommend the place.
Q

Rawan was an amazing hostess. She checked in several times to make sure my mom arrived and was comfortable. She was very available leading up to and during my mother's stay. My mo was comfortable in the room and the apartment as a whole and slept great. We hope to reach out to Rawan again for future visits!
Perfect host, perfect room in Brooklyn really spacious, confortable and clean. I'll come again !!!!

It was very pleasant and the home of the Rawan was comfortable.
She youger sister Sara was living and I exchanged greetings.
Washer and dryer was very convenient in the room.
It was 30 minute streets in a lodging till Manhattan.
I misunderstood the flying time, and we stayed more for the day.
Nevertheless she considered us. Thank you very much.
I really appreciate it.

The bedroom and bathroom are both very spacious by nyc standards. Everything was clean and comfortable. Rawan was also very accomodating and easy to communicate with. Couldn't be happier with the stay.

name: Partial OceanView Waipouli H207
summary: This 1 bedroom, 2 bath Condominium is located in Coveted H building at the Waipouli Beach Resort, on the quiet side of the resort just steps to the 2 acre Fantasy Pool and the white sand beach! This Partial Ocean View 1 Bedroom condo can accommodate 2-4 guests comfortably!
space: This one bedroom, two bath Condominium is located in Coveted H building, on the quiet side of the resort just steps to the 2 acre Fantasy Pool and the white sand beach at the First Class Waipouli Beach Resort and Spa on Kauai. This condo has a King in the Master attached to a large master bathroom and there is another bathroom with a stand up shower! There is a queen size sofa sleeper as well, this condo is great for Honeymooners or small families!  Please note: this is a vacation rental, not apart of a Hotel. We get you started with basic supplies like a few rolls of toilet paper, shampoos, soaps, paper towels, trash bags, sponge, dish soap, laundry detergent, coffee filters, salt/pepper. We are not allowed to provide any more food or spices per Hawaii Health Code. If you would like the cleaners to come change out the sheets and do a general cleaning, they charge $78.12, contact us if you'd like to add this.
description: This 1 bedroom, 2 bath Condominium is located in Coveted H building at the Waipouli Beach Resort, on the quiet side of the resort just steps to the 2 acre Fantasy Pool and the white sand beach! This Partial Ocean View 1 Bedroom condo can accommodate 2-4 guests comfortably! This one bedroom, two bath Condominium is located in Coveted H building, on the quiet side of the resort just steps to the 2 acre Fantasy Pool and the white sand beach at the First Class Waipouli Beach Resort and Spa on Kauai. This condo has a King in the Master attached to a large master bathroom and there is another bathroom with a stand up shower! There is a queen size sofa sleeper as well, this condo is great for Honeymooners or small families!  Please note: this is a vacation rental, not apart of a Hotel. We get you started with basic supplies like a few rolls of toilet paper, shampoos, soaps, paper towels, trash bags, sponge, dish soap, laundry detergent, coffee filters, salt/pepper. We are not allowed to provi
neighborhood_overview: This condo is located at the Waipouli Beach Resort & Spa in Kapaa! This is a privately owned condo, managed by Kauai Calls!
notes: We leave a parking pass inside that condo along with the current WiFi code (changes every few months at this resort). Hawaii Tax ID: TA (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Note: we get you started with basic supplies, like a few rolls of toilet paper, shampoos, paper towels, dish soap, etc. if you need any other supplies while you are on island you purchase from there! Mahalo!
transit: We recommend renting a car as it is the easiest way to get around the island!
access: You have access to all the resort amenities. Everything you may need is within easy walking distance:  Pool, Beach, Ocean, Spa & the Fitness Center offers pool side massage and beauty salon.  Souvenir Shops, Grocery Stores, Drug Store and Restaurants are right across and a short distance to the left or right of the Resort.
interaction: We won't be able to meet you at the condo to show you around. This condo is located at the Waipouli Beach Resort, which is less than a mile from our office. We will be working away when you are on island. :) We will message you the door codes ahead of time that you'll need for entry. If you have any questions or problems you contact us directly, we give you Candace's cell number as she is the on island contact for you.
house_rules: Resort & Condo Guidelines Please take some time to review these Waipouli Beach Association House Rules that have been designed to ensure safety, comfort and enjoyment for all owners and guests of Waipouli Beach Resort. Absolutely no smoking in the condo or on the lanais or anywhere on the property. Our resort is a SMOKE FREE PROPERTY. All condos are designated non-smoking units. There are designated smoking areas located along the parameter of the property. Our resort facilities may be used only by owners and guests occupying a unit. Privileges may be extended to family and friends visiting our resort only when the owner or the registered guest is present and each guest must be registered at the front desk. Each unit is allowed a total of 6 guests at any given time. Quiet hours are from 10:00 p.m. to 8:00 a.m. but excessive noise should be avoided at all times. Owners and Registered Guests are responsible for everyone in their party ensuring that their behavior is not offensive to othe

host.host_about:
I have always known I would have a home on beautiful Kauai and dreamed of hosting guests who come to Kauai to fulfill their own life's dream. My favorite TV show when growing up was 'Fantasy Island' and here I am. Over the past 13 years I have come to realize that all that guests who have stayed at Wailua Riverside Hideaway become ohana the moment they arrive. It is you the guests who are the true stars in this Fantasy Island called Kauai! 

I now run a vacation rental business here on the island: Kauai Calls! managing over 40 properties with co-hosting help from Cathy and Michelle, my ohana! 

I look forward to greeting/meeting you here at the Wailua Riverside Hideaway! We have self-check-in set up for all other properties on the island!  

Mahalo nui loa! 
Candace, 
Owner P RB
Kauai Calls!

reviews.comments: A great visit! Check-in was easy and clear. The room was excellent -- modern, clean, spacious for our group of 3, comfortable (especially the main bed!), well-equipped kitchen, in-room laundry facilities, and a surprising good view of the ocean, not just from the lanai, but from living room as well. We were impressed! Although the road through Kapaa is a little too commercial for my tastes, the Wapouli resort has done a good job of carving out a private niche along the beach -- easy to forget the highway is just out front. Pool is at least as good as the pictures indicates. Our teenager gave it high marks, and especially with the slides, would expect it to be popular with younger kids too. No hesitation about recommending Candace and this location.

This condo is BEAUTIFUL. It is luxurious and very spacious. We wish we had more time to actually spend at the condo! The pool area was amazing, perfect for kids ! It is huge, has water slides, a hidden cave area under a waterfall. We actually stayed here for a wedding that was at the Oasis (the restaurant on the ocean behind the pool area). Food was great, really cool restaurant. We definitely recommend this condo!!

name: Private Room in Very Convenient Location
summary: Neighborhood: -right off 125th ACBD subway lines (literally 10 min. to Times Square) -just a few blocks north of M60 bus which goes to & from Laguardia Airport for only $2.75 -world famous Apollo Theater, Columbia University, Manhattan School of Music, City College -lots of great restaurants & shopping (plenty of grocery & convenience stores for longer stays too) Apartment: -high ceilings, big windows -newly renovated -well kept elevator building -surveillance at all times -laundry in basement
space: ** My home is a safe space for all people. Racism, antisemitism, homophobia, transphobia, misogyny, etc. will not be tolerated.**
description: Neighborhood: -right off 125th ACBD subway lines (literally 10 min. to Times Square) -just a few blocks north of M60 bus which goes to & from Laguardia Airport for only $2.75 -world famous Apollo Theater, Columbia University, Manhattan School of Music, City College -lots of great restaurants & shopping (plenty of grocery & convenience stores for longer stays too) Apartment: -high ceilings, big windows -newly renovated -well kept elevator building -surveillance at all times -laundry in basement ** My home is a safe space for all people. Racism, antisemitism, homophobia, transphobia, misogyny, etc. will not be tolerated.**
house_rules: - Our biggest concern is that the apartment be clean when you leave, so that it is ready for the people who will be staying after you. - While you're here, please wash your dishes, and clean up after yourself when cooking in the kitchen. Please remove your hair and makeup, etcetera, from the sink and shower when using the bathroom. - Please do not use the towels to wipe off makeup as it often stains, and please, please make sure you always hang them to dry after use so that they do not mildew. - As a reminder, food is not included, but feel free to use the kitchen if you prefer to cook while you're here. The blender is the only "off-limits" item. - If you choose to eat in the living room, please use the black benches, which are easy to clean, rather than the couch. I do not want to have to charge anyone for professional fabric cleaning or reupholstery. - As another reminder, toiletries are not included. If you have left anything at home, and need to borrow something of mine, please ask

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I love people, and I love that in a time when the ability to trust seems to be escaping from our world, Airbnb has created this great platform based on the concept that indeed, we are all good at heart!

I'm and actor/singer/dancer who loves yoga and photography. I have eclectic taste in everything- music, clothes, food, art, people. Sometimes I'm silly, and sometimes I crave philosophical discussion. I love exploring every corner of the city & learning about the world. New York is my soulmate.

reviews.comments:
Sarah was easy to reach and was very prompt at responding to any questions or concerns we had. My boyfriend and I visited New York for the weekend, so it did the job. The room wasn't set-up when we arrived due to a personal issue she had with an old tenant. However, she got in contact with us in advance and mentioned the problem. The room could've used some dusting and there was a fly problem. 

My boyfriend and I got back late one night and we had trouble unlocking her door. After so many attempts we decided to give her a call to see if she was at the apartment. We proceeded to call her a few times and she not once picked up. We waited outside of her apartment for several minutes and luckily we found someone kind to open the door for us, only to find Sarah up roaming around the apartment.  The location was fairly convenient and the subway was at close proximity.  We also had the opportunity to explore Harlem which was something we were looking forward to.

Sarah was a great host, who was receptive to my arrival time and whose communication was excellent. We only crossed paths a couple of times, but in that time she helped make the place feel comfortable and homely. The room was was cosy and clean, and was a great base to explore Harlem and NYC for a few days. The soundproofing to the neighrbours wasn't great (as is the case with so many tenement buildings), but if you're a light sleeper then it's nothing a pair of earplugs won't sort out.

Sarah was very warm and welcoming. The kitchen is big and the bathroom is a good size. Has hardwood floors that are nice and clean
Subway is about 2-3 mins walk. Would definitely recommend staying there.

We spent 3 nights at Sarah's flat. Sarah is a wonderful host, we didn't see each other that much but she was careful all time long by text. And she was very nice to let us put our stuff at the flat for the last day till we go to our bus. 
The bedroom is realy simple: a bed, a table and a chair. It is enough for few days but no much longer.
Big advantage : very close to very convenient subway lines, 2-5 minutes by walk.

We had a great time at Sarah's place, clean and comfortable bed with clean sheets and towels, a place with a fantastic location only a block away from a subway station with xpress lines that take you to center Manhattan in no time, and the comunication with Sarah was great

If you are looking for a quiet and affordable room to stay from where you can visit Manhattan easily, this is the perfect place!! It's super close to the subway and the express lines, so you are in midtown in only 10 minutes! It's REALLY convenient!
The room is also very quiet and perfect to have a rest. No street noise and we had no problems with noises from neighbors. 
Sarah is fantastic and a great host. She is super kind and fun and answers all the messages very fast. She was amazing with our son! Thank you, Sarah for being such a great person! :)
We found the room and common area in the apartment to be a little bit dark. But we also spent quite a lot of time in the apartment. If you plan to visit the city, I don't think this should be an issue. 
The only detail that made that we didn't feel totally at home was Sarah's roommate. Maybe it's just the way she is or maybe she had a couple of bad days, but we had the feeling that we were disturbing her and especially that she wasn't very happy about the presence of our baby boy. That's just a feeling and something very personal and subjective, but still I wanted to mention it. I'm sure, guests who aren't traveling with a baby and who don't spend much time in the apartment won't have this experience at all and in any case her roommate is most of the time out of the house. 
Again, this is such a convenient place!! It's looks a bit far on the map but it's sooo close to everything! I would recommend it to anyone who wants to visit the city with a small budget.

Sarah went above and beyond to accommodate our late arrival and she was friendly and engaging. Room was was perfect for my me and my wife's stay. Large closet with hangers was also made available for our use. Didn't utilize the kitchen as we didn't spend much time in the apartment. Short walk from 125th and MLK and tons of shopping and restaurants nearby. Metro bus and train stops are close as well. Would recommend to anybody looking to spend a few days in Harlem!
Sarah was a wonderful host, her aparment is very coasy and everything went well as expected. I would recommend Sarah to anyone.

El piso es espacioso, y nuestra habitación muy acogedora, con calefacción y una cama muy cómoda, nos levantábamos como nuevos! La chica era muy dulce y simpática, muy pendiente de todo lo que nos pudiera hacer falta. Está a 5 minutos del metro, muy bien comunicado, hay supermercados y bares cerca. Repetiríamos sin dudarlo!

Sarah was terrific -- friendly, accommodating, and helpful. Her place is conveniently located in a great neighbourhood close to the subway, local restaurants and delis (where we bought probably half a dozen sandwiches in 4 days because they were so tasty).  Definitely good value.  We would stay again any time!

Excellent AirBnB private room! Sarah made sure that everything was perfect, even though my request was rather short notice. The room and bed are great (even has a memory foam mattress). Very well located. And all in all great.

the house was very clean very orderly and has all the services, is very close the sin and the bus stop is a place very silent for rest after a day of walk, Sarah is a very beautiful host and i will boom again with she when i come back to New York

I would highly recommend staying with Sarah in NYC. She is a very kind, responsive, and accommodating host. The location is great -- very brief walk to the subway with lots of express options to get around quickly. The room was clean, comfy, and nicely warm for the winter. Great wifi and bathroom. Flexible check-in and check-out as well! And of course, you really can't beat this price!
Sarah was great! Very helpful and the room was in a good location.
Accessible place, near to a metro station which is the best way to go around in New York, also there are a couple of grocery stores that you can get what you need.

Great place to stay, very close to the metro. Nice and warm in winter time . 

Whenever you've a question (for a place to go out eating, a good comedy club, ...) Sarah will do her very best to answer you quick and good. 

We had the most wonderful time there and would book again with her without hesitation.

Sarah was great with everything.  She was very prompt in responding to messages and she made sure we felt comfortable in her apartment.  The apartment was very clean and very quiet.  Very much recommend staying here.

Sarah´s apartment is in a very good location, it is near the subway and a stop for buses. The price is really good. 
It was really clean and the bedroom was big. 
Sarah is a great host and she help you if you need to. 

My boyfriend and I would definitely stay there again. And we are very thankful with Sarah for everything.
Sarah and her housemate are delightful people. The room is clean and comfortable, the shared bathroom and living space are all just fine.

Sarah was so easy to communicate with and made check in and out easy. The room just has the basics, but we felt very comfortable and safe there. It's right around the corner from the 125th St subway stop, and takes 20 minutes to get to midtown. It's also really close to a fantastic restaurant, the Maison Harlem, which was a delight for a late night dinner.
Definitely recommend this apartment for a weekend stay in New York.

La casa de Sarah es muy grande y espaciosa. Teníamos todo lo que necesitabamos. El lugar era seguro y estaba muy cerca del metro. Sarah es una persona muy agradable y amistosa, cualquier cosa que necesitases ella estaba allí.
Sarah was an amazing host, friendly and kind, her home was great and well located... Transportation is very close and all around was safe and beautiful... Thank you Sarah!!!!

Sarah Is a wonderfull host. The bedroom Is great, Is Bigger than we thought and Is so confortable. The aparment Is near the metro and all metros (express or not) they drop you in the station in Sarah house and downtown.
The neighborhood Is great, quiet and safety.

Appartement tres bien situé dans Harlem, à quelques minutes du métro (d'une ligne express en plus), on rejoint directement times square en 15 minutes. Il y a des restos et des commerces dans l'avenue à coté. La chambre était comme décrite, très calme, juste un défaut les rideaux de la chambre qui ne couvrent pas toute la fenêtre du coup le jour passe.
Sarah était très accueillante malgré notre arrivée très tardive.
Je recommande cet appartement et y reviendrai avec plaisir!
i loved the place and the host was really nice and friendly

Sarah was great, the area was extremely convenient with fast access to the best parts of town. The room was very spacious, simple and clean. Sarah also gave us suggestions when needed but ultimately let us do our own thing with no complaints. Highly recommend if you do feel comfortable with the subways due to easy access less than a block away, if not Uber will be your friend but can get pricy at night so be prepared!

Sarah is very sweet and her place is super convenient! Only 2 blocks?from the subway and bus stop. The neighborhood is safe and the building secure. My daughter and I felt safe coming home late at night. Sarah has great tips on transportation and restaurants. Our experience was really good, but keep in mind it's not a hotel, but like staying with a friend who has a busy busy schedule. I would definitely stay with Sarah again!

Sarah is friendly, helpful and great with communication. We had a blast in NYC and found it easy to get around with convenient bus and subway access close by. We especially liked Maison Harlem just around the corner and had the best quiche there. This location and price is a great value.

Sarah is a super host. The room was comfortable and spacious. The apartment was clean and had everything I needed. Sarah was very accommodating with check-in, check-out and overall communication. It was a convenient location for attending the graduation of a friend from Columbia University. I would not hesitate to stay there again or recommend it to friends.

Truly in a great location, a few minutes walk to the subway station, very quick trip to Columbus circle or Times Square. Very clean, bathroom looked newly updated and memory foam bed was awesome! Sarah is an excellent host, provided everything we needed and more, super responsive and attentive.

Příjemné ubytování v dobré lokalitě se skvělou dostupností do centra. Okolí nám připadalo bezpečné, v blízkosti je několik obchodů s potravinami i rychlým občerstvením. Komunikace se Sarah probíhala bezproblémově a ve všem nám vyšla maximálně vstříc. Určitě doporučujeme
Excelente localização: 5min do metrô. Wi-Fi funcionou perfeitamente. Sarah é muito atenciosa.

L'appartement de Sarah est très bien situé par rapport au métro New yorkais, et permet de se rendre rapidement partout. Sarah fut une hôtesse attentive et réactive à nos besoins , ce qui est très appréciable ! 
Effectivement les rideaux étaient trop courts par rapport à la fenêtre et la propreté pas toujours à notre convenance, néanmoins je recommande vivement cet endroit pour visiter New York.
Sarah was a wonderful host. Very hospitable and willing to help. The apt was close to subway and convenient to go anywhere in town.

La habitación de Sarah era tal cual se muestra en las fotos, sólo cuenta con una cama y una mesita de noche pequeña. Ella facilita que guardes ropa en un armario del pasillo. Estaría bien disponer de algún mueble más en la habitación en el que dejar las pertenencias.

En cuanto a la cocina, nosotros desayunábamos en el apartamento y echamos de menos una mesa en la que poder comer tranquilamente. Disponen de 2 mesitas plegables que llevábamos a la habitación para no molestar, ya que nos comentó que evitáramos hacer ruido porque trabaja de tarde-noche y necesita descansar.  

En cuanto a la limpieza, en general bien, salvo por el hornillo y el microondas que estaban muy sucios.
La ubicación está muy bien; el metro queda a 2 minutos del apartamento e incluye varias de las líneas que pasan por el centro, incluso 2 líneas express que te llevan al centro en 15 minutos.

Sarah como anfitriona ha estado bien; por las noches solía preguntarnos cómo habíamos pasado el día, qué habíamos visitado... Se ofreció en varias ocasiones en ayudarnos en cualquier duda que tuviéramos. De hecho nos echó una mano con un percance que tuvimos con una tarjeta de memoria de la cámara de fotos.

En general estamos contentos con nuestra estancia. Repetiríamos sin duda.
Comfortable and spacious room walking distance from a subway station.

My wife and I stayed here for a few days and we were absolutely pleased with our stay here! Sarah is an amazing hostess, completely accommodating & such a warm personality to be around. Highly recommend staying here- great location, too!
Sarah's place is in a really good location, easy access to everywhere. The room was suffice for a short stay.

Communication with Sarah was top notch, any issues we had were quickly taken care of. The place itself was tidy and the bed was extremely comfortable. Be aware that there is no air conditioning in the apartment but Sarah provides fans so you can sleep comfortably. It's a 5 minute walk to the subway which takes you anywhere you need to go and there are a lot of restaurants nearby so you won't go hungry. Highly recommended
Nice location. The room is as it is describe
You'll love everything about this place. It's very safe.
L'appartement est très bien situé et facile d'accès. La chanbre était très propre et spacieuse. Le lit était très confortable également. Finalement. Sarah s'assuré qu'on avait tout dont a besoin .
Lovely apartment in a good location right next to an express metro into Manhattan.

Stanza,bagno e appartamento pulitissimi e comodissimi per la posizione.
Praticamente 2 minuti per arrivare alla stazione della metropolitana su una delle linee principali di New York.
Quartiere Harlem molto caratteristico e,per quello che abbiamo
Vissuto noi estremamente sicuro.
Da consigliare vivamente!

Great place to stay on a budget for a few days if you're going sightseeing in NY. Easy access to the metro, with an express stop too. Fast food places very close nearby. Area was pretty quiet too! And Sarah's really nice and great. Would recommend

Sarah was super nice during our stay. The house was super clean and we had everything that we needed. The bed was soooo comfortable!!! The area is very safe, the subway is only a couple of minutes from the block and there are a few bars around with live music for the night

Although I didn't get to meet Sarah in person due a super early check-in arrangement, I thoroughly appreciated her being super accommodating and responsive. Shout out to her lovely roommate, Anna, for letting us into the apartment building when Sarah was unable to. Don't let the location deter you from staying here - it was so easy to get to the subway (less than 10 min walk for us) and really close to Central Park. I will definitely stay here again the next time I visit NYC :)
Close to public transport made things easily accessible to the sights

El precio es muy accesible y por lo mismo obtienes lo que pagas. En la habitación no hay una mesa donde poner las maletas. En la parte de la cocina se ven cosas amontonadas el lugar luce desordenado y los olores desagradables en el baño por exceso de Basura en el cesto. Mi esposo y yo no nos sentimos cómodos en general y por lo mismo no lo recomiendo.
Incredibly convenient location right next to the metro and the room was a quiet spot in the apartment. You could hear the neighbors in the evening but they were very quiet later.
Not very nice area to be around at night

Podem reservar sem medo o Apartamento da Sarah, ele é limpo, seguro, a menos de 5min do metrô, tem DELI por todo lado para você tomar aquele café da (Website hidden by Airbnb) uma pequena caminhada você chega na Dollar Tree, Marshalls, TJ Maxx, Old Navy, Bed Bath & Beyond.
Internet wi-fi era boa, toalhas limpas e cheirosas, só tem que lembrar de ter seus produtos de banho e higiene pessoal, tem escrito na descrição, se não tiver comprado ainda, vai na Dollar Tree e faz a festa por lá, tudo por $ 1,00.
Sarah é muito simpática e te faz se sentir a vontade, me senti como se estivesse em casa, não tenho do que me queixar.
Na minha próxima viagem a NYC, com certeza o Apartamento da Sarah será minha primeira opção.
집근처에 지하철역이 있어 매우 편했고 방과 화장실도 항상 깨끗했다. 인터넷도 잘 됐고 방도 넓어서 짐관리하는데 많이 편했다.

Everything was fine. Sarah was very friendly and gave all necessary information. The apartment is close to the subway, it doesn't take a lot of time to get to mid- and downtown. The room is clean and quiet. Рекомендую эти аппартаменты, хозяйка очень гостепреимна, энергична и жизнерадостна, близко к метро, хорошее соотношение цена-качество. В комнате чисто и тихо, отлично, чтобы отдохнуть после исследования города.
good location and clean room

Como puntos positivos del apartamento: buena ubicación (muy cerca de la parada de metro), habitación espaciosa para dos personas (aunque sin ningún mueble donde poder poner la ropa), y una cama muy cómoda, donde hemos descansado bien que es el objetivo principal para nosotros. La atención de Sarah ha sido correcta, nos recibió a la llegada y nos ha despedido a la hora de irnos. Durante la estancia nos preguntó varias veces si todo estaba bien. Como punto negativo: la limpieza del baño, cuando llegamos el baño no estaba muy limpio y no se limpió en toda la semana que estuvimos.

Sarah was a very nice host. The bedroom was clean and the bed was very comfortable. The distance to the subway is 4 minutes by foot and the ride to Times Square is only 10 minutes with the express subway. We never felt insecure in the neighborhood so please forget about the Harlem Story’s. These are so 1990. It was my third stay in Harlem and every time was great. 

The problem is that the walls of the apartment are very thin, so you hear all the noise. Whether the conversations of the neighbours, the barking dog and crying baby of them or if someone in the apartment turns on the stove or is making any other noise. 
Since Sarah works in the evening and comes home late at night, you really hear every step when she prepares something to eat then. We bought ear plugs, so it was okay. We therefore really recommend that anyone who does not sleep like a stone should take ear plugs. We were around Helloween and Sarah had a very tight schedule so we barely saw her. It was absolutely no problem for us because we like being independent. Unfortunately, you also saw the absence in the cleanliness of the bathroom and the kitchen. There are dust and dirt in the corners. I do not want to say that it was absolutely bad, but it was not really clean either.

The fact that Sarah works at night you should be very considerate in the morning, so it is better to get the breakfast away from home, otherwise she will notice everything and her sleep will be interrupted and since you are good guests you don‘t want that to happen ;-)

You have to live out of the suitcase. It would be great to have a little rack or closet in the room to store the luggage. Also a small mirror on the wall would be perfect, so one could get ready in the bathroom and the other in the bedroom. But these are only little suggestions no real big problems. 

Considering the price for a New York accommodation, I'd like to point out that you can not expect a 5 star hotel but a solid place to stay if you're in NYC all day.

Therefore the following points:
Price: 5 out of 5 points
Cleanliness: 2,5 out of 5 points
Noise: 1,5 out of 5 points
Host: 4 out of 5 points
Neighborhood: 4,5 out of 5 points
Equipment: 2,5 out of 5 points

Total: 3,5 out of 5 points

Easily reachable by subway and walking distance to Columbia University.  Sarah was accommodating for check in time.  The bed was comfy and it was nice and quiet at night.  Lot's of privacy which I appreciated.

Die Wohnung ist super gelegen. Man ist schnell mit der Ubahn im Zentrum. 
Das Zimmer ist groß und das Bett bequem. 
Auch in den anderen Punkten stimmen wir den vorherigen Bewertungen zu. 
Eine gute Bleibe!

L'appartement est parfaitement situé à Harlem. Proche de toutes les commodités. (Shopping, Subway express, épicerie, bus aéroport LaGuardia)
Je recommande ! Sarah est réactive, sympa et toujours disponible. Elle se soucie vraiment de ses voyageurs pour qu'ils passent un bon séjour.

We stayed for 12 days at Sarah’s place, communication was okay as Sarah always messages us for her concerns and at the same way we could ask her questions too. The room is exactly as pictured, so if you are visiting NY for less than 3 days, i guess its not that hard to open ur suitcase each morning. For convenience we would recommend installing at least a mirror and a small cabinet in the room for future guests. The walls between the apartments are thin but this wasn’t an issue for us. All in all Harlem was a positive experience, we can vouch for the safety even at night.
Sara was great! Was very happy with the rooms. Some mishaps during check in that were mostly my fault. Other than that it was very clean and in a fantastic location for the price.
Sarah was very welcoming and we had a comfortable stay! Convenient location- short walk to the Metro.

A great stay in a good neighborhood. The post is very accurate and the room seems even bigger in person. The apartment is very clean and Sarah is very nice and accommodating. The apartment is a 3 minute walk from a metro station that will take you anywhere you need to go!
Great and affordable room in a nice location :) Sarah was also friendly and made sure that everything was in order for our visit.
Super friendly and a great room.

My teenage daughter and I had a great stay at Sarah's place.  Everything is as she listed, our room was spacious and comfortable, the apartment was great.  Sarah was a great host, very helpful with tips on how to get around the city, ( (Hidden by Airbnb) maps was our BFF), and advice on great attractions and experiences.  She reassured us her neighborhood was very safe, many nights we walked from the subway to the apartment at midnight and later and had no incidents or concerns.   The people around the city were very kind and helpful, especially with directions and subway info.   We had an amazing trip and we are so thankful to Sarah for allowing us to stay with her in this amazing city.
Great host and location is perfect
Very clean place.
Accueil très chaleureux et appartement à deux pas du métro. Dommage que la literie soit un peu dure et qu’il n’y ai pas de volets

Localização ótima, muito perto do metro, deve dar cerca de 3min a pé até a entrada da estação (a qual tem trens expressos), em 10min está na times. Há lojas boas próximas (Website hidden by Airbnb) relação à segurança, MUITO tranquilo, não é um bairro de alto padrão, mas em nenhum momento nos sentimos em rico. Encontramos poucas vezes a Sarah em seu apartamento e sempre foi muito receptiva, assim como Danish seu "Housemate". Quarto aquecido e espaçoso. Recomendo

Sarah's apartment was decent, but she had way too many rules.  She was micro monitoring us, which was annoying. And it was really inconvenient to share the bathroom with a guy, she had informed us that she was the only other person living in the apartment and she works late in the evening. We had to wait around for each other to finish using the bathroom. Wish she a had mirror in the room, so we could get ready in our room itself. Wifi in the room was terrible. The apartment walls are really thin, one night we were just siting and talking, for which she said she received a noise complain. So, we had to whisper and tip-toe around the place the whole time. Decent apartment, safe neighborhood, very close to the subway station, but wouldn’t recommend this place if you want to have a nice time.
Everything as described, it’s close to the subway station and in a safe neighborhood. I really recommend Sarah’s place.
Great location and Sarah is a nice host. Recommended!

Sarah's apartment was great. Exactly as described in the pictures. It was very clean and tidy. The room although being not really sunny was big and the bed very comfortable. The building and neighborhood was safe and quit. It is close to the bus and metro station. In addition to that, Sarah was welcoming and helpful to us.
Great location near subways and nice environment, quiet and good for people who are looking to rest.
Sarah is very sweet and a very welcoming host! The location is very close to public transportation so is a great option for visiting the city without spending a fortune to stay downtown .
Good place
Stanza pulita, vicina alla metropolitana, Sarah disponibile e simpatica.

Photo conforme à la description, lieu du logement très proche des transports + des boutiques d'Harlem 
ce que nous pouvons reprocher est l'isolation sonore ( voisin, ) ainsi qu'un lit très dur 
Une armoire ou commode serai appréciable dans la chambre car pas facile de vivre pendant 10j avec une valise ( serai un plus pour le confort ) 
Merci à Sarah pour son accueil
Sarah is very responsive and welcoming. The apartment clean and the room is more spacious than it looks on the photo. Very close to Columbia University, great value for money.
Wil je New York een keer bezoeken dan raad ik deze Airbnb zeker aan.

Sarah heeft een leuk appartement in Harlem. Het is schoon, netjes en de slaapkamer is groot genoeg voor twee personen. Het appartement ligt dichtbij metro en bussen. Central Park is op loopafstand te bereiken. Daarnaast is Sarah een perfecte host die zich om haar gasten bekommert. Al met al een fijn verblijf!
Perfect crash pad for a trip to the Big Apple!

Appartement très bien situé et propre, quartier vivant. Seul bémol, le mur de la chambre est collé au salon du voisin, prévoir des boules quies si vous faites des grosses journées et que vous vous couchez tôt.
Proche du métro Mais excentré du centre ville. Appartement propre et accessible. Bon séjour.

Sarah accommodated my business trip at short notice. I needed to rest for 1 night before meeting a tech client the next day and she responded quickly and let me settle in and sleep undisturbed. The entire experience was Exemplary of good accommodations. We talked only briefly but she is very nice. Her place is right around the corner from the train. Perfection.
The apartment was clean and comfortable.  Sarah was really nice and gave us good tips about ny. It is algo very close to Subway station.  I really recommend it.

Sarah is a great and very helpful host. The room itself is smaller but sufficient, it is also private as it is located in the middle of a long hall in the apartment. Close to the apartment you can find many shops, restaurants, also subway station is really close. The Central Park is in walking distance as well. All in all, it was a great and pleasurable stay, I can definitely recommend.

We had a fantastic stay at Sarah's!! The location was great. The apartment was on a safe, quiet street but only a short walk away was the lively, historic and interesting parts of Harlem. Great proximity to public transport (and onto downtown Manhatten). The apartment was clean and comfortable. We arrived to Harlem at 3.30pm and check in was at 6.45pm, so you might need to organise luggage storage. We couldn't find anywhere close by when we looked online, but we found a friendly street fruit vendor who minded them for us while we walked around. Communication with Sarah was great and she was very helpful with tips on getting around/recommendations. Many thanks Sarah!
Parfait! Environnement un peu bruyant le week-end (viva fiesta !) mais cela ne nous a pas empêché de dormir ! Sarah est top, accueillante, et très ouverte à la discussion ! Nous reocmmandons !
Clean place, quick responses, great location.
Das Apartment war super gelegen. Sehr nahe bei diversen Öffis und für diese Stadt eine relativ ruhige Gegend. Sara war sehr hilfsbereit.
Very good trip in Sarah’s house ! the location is ideal, the equipment too. more sarah is an accommodating and friendly host! I recommend it to you

The room itself is bigger than it looks in the pictures. There is a full-length mirror in the room (earlier reviews suggested this). The neighborhood is great. I had a nice, quiet night and it was great to be able to sleep with an open window.
Would recommend this place to anybody spending a night in the city -- the location is fabulous, and the apartment is absolutely pristine and welcoming!

Sarah's place was perfectly located, getting around on foot or subway was simple and convenient. I appreciated the safe environment and a clean, quiet place where I could get all the rest I need and want. Timely communication was much appreciated and all the fine details provided regarding resources (like a handy umbrella) and getting around the space made settling smoother than usual. Meeting the roommate was a bonus moment and the hospitality extended to me was appreciated given the schedule and weather I experienced. Would recommend and return again!

The place is clean, the bedroom is spacious enough to dispose of your luggage with the strict minimum of equipment (bed, nighstand and a chair) and the location is good : at 5min from the subway wich is at 20min from Time Square, we didn’t ask for more. I would just suggest to put a plank of wood on the bedhead to avoid the building opposite to have a view on your room like they have now. 

Sarah is a joyful person and it’s visible that she wants you to enjoy your stay, but you have to follow the rules, so many rules. In fact, they are not really constraining at least for someone who just wants a place to sleep (which was our case), but when you receive a message at 2am to remind you to put down the toilet seat, or, more serious, when you wait 30min outside in the rain because « the check-in was at 12, not 11:30 » while she was at home, it put some stress on your nerves. We understand that she might not have been ready, but we were here in advance, not by choice, but because of the rain, she could have proposed to wait in the hall for example. 

I’m not saying that Sarah isn’t a good host, she is kind and you quickly understand that she wants you to have a great stay, but she forgets that for most, you are in a city you don’t know and even if you want to be faultless, you won’t always be.

In short I would recommend this place, but remember that you’re an extra and must not be noisy.
Bon séjour chez Sarah malgré que nous ne l’avons vue qu’une seule fois pendant notre séjour ...
Excellent place and very clean. It is near the subway station and M60 Bus to LaGuardia airport.
It was okay for a night

Good location with easy links to the city, just make sure you get the right subway stop since there are several 125st stops and only one is the right one! (ABCD stop on blue/orange lines)

We had plenty of contact with Sarah who gave us loads of information, the room is a good size and the bathroom and kitchen are great. Had a good stay!

Appartement plutôt bien situé. Pas loin du métro, on arrive rapidement dans le centre grâce au métro express. Appartement récent et propre. 
Plusieurs restaurants dans la rue entre le métro et l’immeuble. 
Je recommande cet appartement.

Sarah's place was great! It was right next to a subway stop, and only a 20 minute subway ride from downtown Manhattan and all of the typical touristy things in NYC! Her place is very clean, and the bed is really comfy! Sarah is sweet and friendly, and gave us chocolates when we came in! All in all, a great stay in a beautiful and clean space in NYC.
Newly renovated upscale apt. Close to Columbia and Barnard Colleges, perfect for this mom.  Sarah is helpful and friendly.  Would highly recommend
pokój jak i całe mieszkanie bardzo czyste i przyjemne, bardzo blisko metra.

Nice and safe location, easy to reaching downtown with subway.
Clean room and batroom.
Great room in a great position in the city. The Subway station is two blocks away and it is very efficient day and night.
Sarah is an amazing hostess that will work hard to accommodate all of her guests. the place is homey and in a great location.
The window curtain too short, head board by the window, feel not comfortable , and didn’t feel the heat on, so so cold , check in time too late, but clean and host Sarah very nice

We had a great experience on this flat. Sarah and her roommate were really friendly and helpful. 

The flat is 3min away from the subway and has two lines that allow you to reach almost all manhattan by subway.

Common spaces at the apartment were really clean and organized.

I would definetely recommend it.

From the very start Sarah was very complete with communications. Sarah’s place was just what we needed for our stay in NYC. It was unbelievably clean and organized and very cozy. It is also very easy to get to the subway station from her place and we found several great spots to get meals easily.
We would definitely recommend this  spot if you need a nice place to rest.

Sarah was very accommodating to me and my friend. We arrived very late in the evening and she was able to make arrangements for us to pick up the apartment keys even if she wasn’t home. She was also very communicative and made sure everything was okay during our stay. The metro station was really close to her apartment and made it really convenient for us when traveling. I highly recommend her place for anyone looking to stay in NY!

It's a nice little place, very close to the subway station. The only issue was a noisy neighbor, but that's not Sarah's fault though.  She also allowed us a late check-out, which was extremely helpful.
Great host. Great location. Great price.

Sarah's place is great! It's full of paintings and art literally everywhere, I really liked that. The apartment is just as described, and it is actually better than how it looks on pictures. Except maybe for the bedroom, the bed might not be big enough for two very tall people, but I personally had no issues at all. 
Sarah's rules are clear and respectable, she is great with communications as well and always answered very quickly! 
Her roommate was very nice and respectful as well. 
I definitely recommend this place.
Sarah’s place was very convenient and perfect for our needs! It was clean and comfortable.

This is a nice private room. The e location was super convenient, right around the corner from the train. The bathroom was clean. Sarah was very friendly and helped us get settled. We appreciated that she offered us umbrellas because it was raining.  Good find!

Sarah is a good host and her home is a nice, clean, modern apartment in a well-lit neighborhood; <5mins from convenience stores, restaurants, and most importantly - the subway station. Would recommend for anyone staying in NY!
Sarah’s apartment is in a great location, just a short walk from 125th street subway station. She was very accommodating and friendly, and our room was clean and comfortable.
Sarah’s place is very nice and clean, the location is convenient as well
Sarahs home is great! A perfect location near a subway and Harlem has a good atmosphere! The home is very clean and Sarah was very friendly! We recommend !
Great location.  Walking distance to subway.  Super easy access to Manhattan.  Surprisingly street parking was easy too.  Highly recommend!

Sarah's apartment is a great place to stay! I was here for a month and had absolutely no issues. The apartment looks cool, the room had exactly what I needed to be comfortable for such a long stay, and it's about a 3 minute walk to a bigger train station. Sarah was very good about responding to my questions, a fun person to talk to, and an overall great host. I highly recommend staying here!

Sarah’s place was convenient in all cylinders! The only thing was that it was super hot in the room, but that’s pretty much out of her control! I recommend this stay to all who are looking to stay in NYC for a little while.
Sarah was very hospitable. It is in a very convenient and safe location, close to all transportation, shopping and restaurants. The apartment was sparkling clean.

name: Paradise Getaway near Pahoa
summary: We look forward to being your hosts as you travel, and we welcome your questions.  We pride ourselves on providing a clean, peaceful, comfortable, safe &  affordable home. We feature many eco friendly features, and basic amenities. Please contact us! We are happy to help! We hope  to hear from you soon.
space: Come and enjoy our peaceful cozy home, explore and enjoy the Tropical  East side of the Island. We look forward to your inquiries, and we appreciate the opportunity to be your host during your travels. We welcome your questions, and want to help you create a memorable travel experience. Come explore the uncrowded side of The Big Island! It's a great house. This is a clean and affordable place to stay, with many value added and eco- friendly features,  that help make your stay comfortable.  Although our neighborhood may appear close to past volcanic activity, we are fortunate that our home and surrounding land is in a safe area.  Our home is approximately 8 or more miles away from the area that was recently active, and our home is also at a slightly higher elevation. The area that was impacted is about a 20 minute drive away. Typically the air quality near our home is good. There are typical  wind patterns for the entire  Island, and the trade winds typically are blowing the VOG towards
