transit: Havatas Buses (from airports) Metro Tramway Closed parking for motorcycles upon request
access: You will have access to the whole apartment (except for my bedroom) and its equipment ! No check-in / check-out times.

host.host_about: Easy going :)

name: 5 minutes to Sabiha Gökçen Airport
summary: It's close to Sabiha Gökçen International Airport in Asian Side of İstanbul
description: It's close to Sabiha Gökçen International Airport in Asian Side of İstanbul

host.host_about:
I am 29 years old, working for an airline company as a flight attendant.
I like travelling..
I love this life...
Hope to enjoy :)

name: Room in front of Parc Laurier
summary: Large room in a confortable and convenient appartement in the heart of the Plateau. A few minutes walk from Laurier metro station and many good restaurants, cafés and attractions.
space: The balcony over Laurier park is really perfect for a calm and relax diner or even a break during the afternoon.
description: Large room in a confortable and convenient appartement in the heart of the Plateau. A few minutes walk from Laurier metro station and many good restaurants, cafés and attractions. The balcony over Laurier park is really perfect for a calm and relax diner or even a break during the afternoon. You would have access to all the appartement, a small computer would be available for internet access, Netflix is also available in the living room. All the restaurants, the nightlife, the Laurier park, the cafés... Parking is easy. Laurier metro station is a 4 minutes walk. The building owner lives just a floor underneath, so it is not a place to party too much, they will let you know right away. There is many bars around anyway.
neighborhood_overview: All the restaurants, the nightlife, the Laurier park, the cafés...
notes: The building owner lives just a floor underneath, so it is not a place to party too much, they will let you know right away. There is many bars around anyway.
transit: Parking is easy. Laurier metro station is a 4 minutes walk.
access: You would have access to all the appartement, a small computer would be available for internet access, Netflix is also available in the living room.
house_rules: Not pets are allowed No smoking anywhere in the appartement No drinks on the piano

host.host_about: I speak english and spanish too. Je suis un jeune professionnel, j'ai voyagé dans  plusieurs pays durant les 10 dernières années et j'ai maintenant envie d'aider les gens à découvrir Montréal. J'aime faire en sorte que les invités se sentent bien lorsqu'ils entre chez moi.

reviews.comments: We had an awesome stay at maxime's, one of our best airbnb experiences!!! Beautiful apartment, Nice and clean, very good location, central, great park in front of the door and many cafes and restaurants in the neighbourhood and last but not least a great host! We really felt at home because maxime was always there for a chat and to give us recommendations. We would love to stay with him again and would recommend his place to anyone!

Maxime was the best host! He made us feel very welcome and made us feel right at home. He accommodated to every one of our needs and went out of his way to make us have an enjoyable stay. By far the best airbnb experience I've had!
Maxime was very accommodating and easy to communicate with.

We had at great stay at Maximes. First of all the location is perfect in the heart of the Plataue, right by the beautiful and buzzing Laurier park with lots of great cafes, restaurants and shops nearby. The atmosphere of the area is very relaxed and boho. The apartment is pretty in itself and it's kept neat and clean. Maxime is a very helpful, respectful and friendly host, who offered us alot of great advice and guidance on Montreal. He is very knowledgeable and his love of the city shines through. I would love to come back anytime and highly recommend both apartment and host.
Great location and Maxime was super friendly. Beautiful house, fast wi-fi and great area... highly recommended!

Maxime and his girlfriend Jessica were really nice hosts. We chatted to them when we arrived and they advised us where we should visit. The accommodation was as stated and it was very clean and comfortable. We really enjoyed out two nights in Montreal. Many thanks.

name: Sunrise Oasis I
summary: Let the sun kiss you good-morning in this family-friendly, private space that is 500 sq. ft. and provides the comforts of home with its own private bathroom, separate entrance, shared full kitchen, laundry room, lanai with grill and spacious yard.
space: Surrounded by rain forest, this large private space comfortably fits 4 with access to a private bathroom, full kitchen and lanais with grill overlooking a fenced yard.
description: Let the sun kiss you good-morning in this family-friendly, private space that is 500 sq. ft. and provides the comforts of home with its own private bathroom, separate entrance, shared full kitchen, laundry room, lanai with grill and spacious yard. Surrounded by rain forest, this large private space comfortably fits 4 with access to a private bathroom, full kitchen and lanais with grill overlooking a fenced yard. Enjoy a full private bathroom, full kitchen and lanais with all of the essentials needed to shower, cook, sleep and experience the beauty of Hawaii. We are home bodies that homeschool our 11-year old son. Usually at home, we'll be here to guide you on the best known and unknown places of Hawaii. We are here to serve. Our neighborhood is situated in one of the largest private subdivisions in the country, with each property being at least 1 acre. Relax and enjoy nature with long walks down our country road or sit on the lanai enjoying your morning coffee or a cold drink as you wa
neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is situated in one of the largest private subdivisions in the country, with each property being at least 1 acre. Relax and enjoy nature with long walks down our country road or sit on the lanai enjoying your morning coffee or a cold drink as you watch the sky change colors as the day begins and ends.
notes: NOTE: The room and the rest of the home is wheelchair accessible, however the private bathroom is not. We do have a shared bathroom that is big enough for a wheelchair and has a tub that a shower chair can be used in.  A shower chair is available upon request.  At this point, there are no handle bars. We are happy to accommodate people with special needs as much as possible.
transit: Most easily reachable by car, there is public transportation about a mile down and up the road.  This is about a 20-minute walk. The Hele-On Bus will take you North to town toward Hilo or South toward Pahoa where you can see the lava and visit the more local beach hang outs.
access: Enjoy a full private bathroom, full kitchen and lanais with all of the essentials needed to shower, cook, sleep and experience the beauty of Hawaii.
interaction: We are home bodies that homeschool our 11-year old son. Usually at home, we'll be here to guide you on the best known and unknown places of Hawaii. We are here to serve.
house_rules: This is a family-friendly home where we want all of our guests, with and without children, to feel comfortable. 1. For liability reasons, guests may not bring any visitors or any others to my home at any time, for any length of time.  Only those individuals who are registered guests, whose full names have been provided in advance and who have been paid for in advance, may enter the premises.  No other individuals may be on our property.  2. In the case of significant violation of house rules, the reservation will be immediately terminated and all fees and monies paid will be forfeited.   3. Please watch your language as there are children present. No swearing.  4. Keep your belongings to your designated room.  5. Quiet time between 10 pm and 7 am.  6. Keep to your designated private area and designated common areas.  Entry into the owner's bedrooms is forbidden. 7. Clean up your messes in the common areas immediately.  8. Please bring the food and drink that you'd like to eat and drink

host.host_about:
We are a close knit family of three who homeschool our 11-year old son, Keo. 

We moved from the Bay Area of California in 2006, to slow down and enjoy a quality of life that allows us to appreciate and value what's truly important: family, friends, community and nature. 

We also enjoy traveling and going on adventures that allow us to have new experiences through various activities, food and people.  

We hope that we can provide a comfortable place for you to rest your head and start your day so that you can experience all that life has to offer.

reviews.comments:
We were the first guest for staying in sunrise oasis. Absolutely wonderful. The family was super friendly and the huge room very comfortable. We felt very welcome and like at home all along hour stay. Thanks  Pauline, Ted and Keo for you kindness.
Mahalo loa; Yoann, David, Anthony and I, really appreciated our stay and would have spoke more if our English had been better.
Lukas

In our transition to the Big Island this Airbnb was the Key. Pauline Ted and Keo are hosts that make your travels seem effortless and enjoyable. If your passing through or require a longer term this locations is central and ideal. Our two young boys ages 2 and 3 felt at home in minutes with a warm Island Welcome! Not an easy task with children =) The accommodations are very modern, clean, and well kept. We personally enjoyed the Sunrise Oasis I with private bath, living area, extra bunk beds. Our boys loved the huge grassy back yard to run around in! The home is large enough to share but feels private with ample space to escape! This home is a paradise and the people like family. Thank you Guys

We received a warm welcome and were treated as part of the family. Nice quiet neighborhood, and lovely large clean bedroom with private bathroom. 
Wonderful helpful hosts.

Ted,pauline & Keo, I thank you from the bottom  of my heart. we had wonderful experience in your house. I'll never ever forget seeing stars in the night sky. walking up around volcano is something we'll never forget. : )

In English and Spanish,
Ted, Pauline and Keo made us feel welcome from the beginning, they are a very nice family.   Everything lived up to our expectations.  Very spacious room with lots of windows.  The house is located in an area away from traffic, which I liked.  I kept telling them that I slept like an angel every night, very comfortable beds and specially love to hear the sound of rain and small animals from outside.  I also liked that we had our own bathroom.
It was very nice to have a fresh cup of coffee every morning which our host made.  
We were just a few miles from Hilo, but near by were other food shops and gas station.  They offered us space in their refrigerator and pantry for our food.  We were able to wash and dry our clothes.    
The best of our stay was too when our host took us to see the burning lava coming down the mountain, it was a long hike but is was worth every step, this experience will be one that my daughter will always remember.
You leave that house with a feeling that you are part of their family.
I have to say that they were also very informative about suggesting what to see , where to go or which routes were best to take.  
Thank you very much Pauline, Ted and Keo.
Marina

Spañol,
Ted, Pauline y Keo nos hicieron sentir como en casa desde el momento que habrieron la puerta, son una familia muy agradable . Todo estava a la altura de nuestras expectativas. La habitación era muy amplia con muchas  ventanas. La casa está situada en una zona alejada del tráfico, lo que me gustó mucho.  Cada día yo les decía que dormía como un ángel todas las noches, porque la cama era muy cómoda y especialmente durante la noche me encantaba escuchar el sonido de la lluvia y el ruido de los animales pequeños de afuera.  También me gustó que teníamos nuestro propio baño.
Me gustó disfrutar café fresco que Ted nos preparó cada mañana.

Estábamos a unas pocas millas de Hilo, pero más cerca había otras tiendas de alimentos y gasolinera.  Nos ofrecieron espacio en su refrigerador y la despensa para nuestra alimentos. 
Pudimos  lavar y secar la ropa sin problema.   Cuando nos despedimos, fué como decir adiós a familia. 
Lo mejor de nuestra estancia fue  cuando nuestro anfitrión se ofreció a llevarnos a ver la lava ardiente, que eventualmente llegará al mar, fué una larga caminata, pero cada paso que tomamos valió la pena, ésta experiencia será una que mi hija siempre recordará.
También ellos nos proveían con información sobre sugerencias de lugares que podríamos visitar y consejos sobre las rutas más convenientes que tomar.
Gracias Pauline, Ted and Keo.
Marina

여러가지로 힘든 중에도 저희가 편히 잘 지낼수 있도록 최선을 다해주셨습니다.
한달간 지내며 현지에서 갖가지 별일이 다 일어났는데 그때마다 도움을 주셔 잘 해결할 수있었습니다.
정말좋은집, 호스트라고 생각합니다.

This place was very nice, quiet and clean. You will find everthing you need here (very nice bathroom, nice bed, fully equiped kitchen). Ted was very friendly and helping us on details of our trips.  Would definitely stay here again!! Thanks Ted!

The most fantastic thing is: Ted is an expert of volcano adventure! You have to talk with Ted about how to discover Lava... Which's my unforgettable memory in my lifetime. Also Ted told us some great places that only local knows... Much more beautiful than some traveler places! And, Ted and Pauline's house is so nice and clean and in a super location - quiet but convenient to everywhere from Volcano to east coast to Maunakea! I like the room. It's so big and bright. It also has a nice private bathroom, not too big but very clean. You could also use Ted's kitchen, and he even invite us try his tea and some fruits from his backyard. Anyway, I'd recommend here to everyone if you want to travel in Big Island.

Airbnb når det er bedst! Pauline, Ted og Keo er framragende værter, og super behjælpelig med tips til sightseeing i området. De er super gode til balancen iforhold til at bo sammen. Vi nød vores ophold rigtig meget og havde nogle gode dage hos familien. Placeringen er perfekt i forhold til at besøge the volcano park. Skal du til the Big Island er dette område også et must see!!

Pauline, Ted og Keo is the greatest hosts. They where very helpfull with ideas to sightseeing. We enjoyed our stay very much and highly recomend the place. The location is perfect if you wanna visit the volcano park. The room was nice and clean!!

Could not have been better hosts. Fabulous people who go the extra mile to make visitors welcome. Ted & Pauline are former Californians who know how to treat people well and communicate easily. We thoroughly enjoyed our short stay with them. Their fluffy cat & happy dog make friends with their guests. Space is good, parking is easy. Ted shows where to go and what to see on a very large screen in living room. Very glad to have met them and would return again. Hilo is a quiet, peaceful town with lots to do and see away from the bustle of Honolulu.

Der Aufenthalt bei Ted, Pauline und Keo war großartig. 
Die Familie war so herzlich, so das wir uns sofort dort wohl fühlten.
Auch die Lage war ideal, da man nur ein paar Minuten vom Zentrum entfernt ist. 
Die Buchung bei Airbnb war ein Volltreffer und ist auf jeden Fall weiter zu empfehlen.
Excellent accueil et séjour dans cette famille très amicale! Chambre très confortable avec toutes les facilités de l'immense maison. Le plus : les bons conseils du tourisme local...
테드.너무 좋은 주인이예요..그는 정말 배려 깊고 우릴 너무 잘 도와줘요..모든 질문에 자기일 처럼 알아봐주구요.. 넓은 집 .저렴한 가격..단 위치가 힐로시내랑 좀 멀단건 와에는 굿...강추입니다.

Ted a Pauline byli vynikající hostitelé. Moc nám pomohli s plánováním programu i při telefonickém zajišťování aktivit. Jsou velmi přátelští a milí. Prostorný pokoj, krytá terasa a dobře vybsvená kuchyň  plně vyhovovala potřebám čtyř lidí.

Ted and Pauline was very friendly and they help us very much. Large room and large lanei suits perfect for 4 persons.

I absolutely enjoyed my stay here. The hosts are wonderful people. The house is on a big plot of land and had clean big room. The beds are big and nice. They have a beautiful porch/lanai which is a perfect place to hangout. Ted gave us some good advice on which places to see. Overall a perfect place to stay.

A definitely stay when visiting Big Island.  Owners are generous and friendly.  We can even use kitchen for light cooking.  Ted and Paulina also recommended us places to go.  We will give 6 stars if we could
It is a very nice place and all family is great, we felt very wellcome and Ted & Pauline always were there to help and to make aour stay great.

It was a great place to stay. The room is very big compared to a hotel room. We got some great tips and advice from Ted and Pauline. They mentioned some places that weren't in the guide book that were great to go. Would stay here again for sure! Great hosts !

Ted and Pauline are very friendly and helpful and beautiful people. This is a home with a lot of love. Two other bedrooms are available and it was really pleasant to chat to the other travellers. Our room was extremely spacious with a comfortable seating area and a private bathroom.  Ted made beautiful hot coffee for us each morning. We could use space in the fridge and the cupboard for our food and we were welcome to cook although we were on the run the whole time and didn't need to. There is a very lovely cat and dog who are mostly outside and completely no issue.  The directions are perfect and the photos are a very good depiction of the reality. There's plenty of room to park the car. I was able to wash some clothes in the washing machine.  As it's a humid climate things can take a while to dry if you hang them on the rack inside or the lines outside. Ted always replied very promptly to my requests for information.  Keo is a super young man and I enjoyed our conversations as he showed me his school programs.  The location is excellent as it's only half an hour to Kalapana and about 1 hour to the National park visitor centre and Jaggar Museum where the lookout for the Kilauea Volcano active crater is.  I'm very happy I chose to stay with Ted, Pauline and Keo.
Room was as advertised and very nice.

Ted, Pauline & Keo were amazing hosts with an equally amazing home.
The room itself is a lot more impressive than the pictures suggest, with so much space to spread out. The bed and couch were really comfortable. It in the common area of the kitchen and lounge, the mornings and evenings are lovely with everyone chatting before heading out/returning from their day's adventures. Ted & Pauline were at hand to help with providing any tips on what too see & where to go. It was always nice chatting to other guests as well, but if you prefer more privacy & seclusion, you can easily retreat to your room.
We had a great time with this family, and look forward to staying here again if we come back to big island.

한적한 시골에서 힐링할 수 있어요.
쾌적한 환경, 친절한 가족들....
영어가 서툴러도 너무 친절해 불편하지 않습니다. 
침대는 너무  편안하고, 방은 넓습니다. 5명도 문제없이 숙박이 가능합니다. 
편안한 시골집에 방문하는 느낌을 느낄 수 있어 좋았습니다.
힐로 시내에서 조금 떨어져있지만 불편하지 않아요.
저희 아이들과 Keo가 너무 신나게 사이좋게 놀았습니다. 좋은 친구를 사귀었네요. 아이들이 있는 가족에게 적극 추천합니다.
相遇总是短暂,离别稍有伤感!我们在TED家度过了三天｡房子非常大,房东非常热情和友好,我在这里感受到了家一般的温暖｡家里的洗衣机,烘干机等等给我们使用,我们特别感谢他们｡唯一感到不足的问题就是我的英语词汇量太少,以后多学习......可以更好的沟通交流!

We choose this place because it is excellently located to visit Hilo, the volcano and the lava fields. We had an excellent stay at Ted, Pauline and Keos house. They are great hosts, making us feel at home immediately. We had a huge room with very comfortable beds and an own bathroom with all amenities. It is very quiet and we can absolutely recommend it.

아이들 둘과 함께한 즐거운 여행이었습니다.
화산공원과, 힐로, 마우나 케아 등 빅섬의 서쪽 여행을 하기에는 아주 적절한 위치입니다.
세탁기 건조기 등 거의 모든 시설을 사용 가능해서 더욱 좋았습니다.
적극 추천합니다.
Nice place and lovely host family! It  was very good to stay our 4 family.
Ted, Pauline, and Keo were very helpful and gracious hosts. They have great food recommendations and amazing recommendations for viewing Kiluea. Our room and bathroom were very clean and comfortable.
Great South Hilo location for exploring the area. Ted had lots of suggestions about places to go. It was fun visiting with other guests and when we left we felt like part of the family!

Schon bei der Ankunft wurden wir richtig herzlich begrüßt und Ted hat uns sofort super Tipps gegeben, was wir alles machen können, darunter auch viele gute Insider-Informationen.
Das Zimmer ist einfach unglaublich schön und die Bettlaken sind sehr weich. Wenn ihr euch auf Hawaii wie Zuhause fühlen wollt und die nettesten Menschen auf der Welt treffen wollt, dann geht unbedingt hierher. 
Wir können nur sagen: Das hier ist ein Glücksgriff!

We stayed at Ted, Pauline and Keo's place for three nights. We had a wonderful stay at their place. We only met Ted, his family was not there during our stay. Ted is a very friendly and helpful person. It was very nice of him to give us guidance on what to see and do in big island. He knows a lot about the place. Without his guidance we wouldn't have got the most out of our stay there. The room was nice and private. We had a separate bathroom for our own which was great. Overall its a great place and Ted is a great host. I will stay here again in my next visit to big island.

Words alone cannot express the deep and heartfelt gratitude that John and I have to Ted, Pauline and Keo for the preparation, duration and Ted seeing us off as we were quite touched with all his wonderful hospitality!  Ted goes beyond the call of duty in making sure we are comfortable with getting up early to prepare coffee for us (sometimes at 4 a.m.) on the day we were leaving as we had to finish packing so we were up early! Ted had wonderful suggestions of where to eat and sight see. Pauline took very good care of us prior to our arrival with suggestions of where to shop for groceries since we like to eat healthy! It was our second time to Hilo but did not know that Target offered such great deals! At times Ted and John (my husband) would have a blast teasing me as I can be gullible and I am sure Pauline heard me calling her name as I was outnumbered with being the only female for a few days until other guests arrived but it was fun just like being part of the family.  We had the most beautiful and spacious room and bathroom, awakening to the Hawaiian sunlight and the sweet aroma of coffee brewing; doesn't get any better than that.  Ted even offered some of his delicious cooking (steak and pancakes) when we had first arrived as we were forced to stay in during the first two days of our trip due to working  on our taxes.  If you want a place that you can call "home" and not feel like a simple guest then you must stay at Ted, Pauline and Keo's beautiful home-you will feel like family after you arrive! We are already planning our next trip there in 2018  and have only been home 3 days, when the Merrie Monarch takes place again! Thank you again Ted, Pauline and Keo, we miss you and look forward to seeing you again!  God bless you all! Mary Ann & John Rabonza

The bedroom I had a very large including a sofa in my room. Ted was great host making me feel like his home was my home. Very knowledgeable about the area. Gave excellent suggestions on tourist activities and knows the best places to eat. When I return again, I would definitely stay at this property.

Unsere Aufenthalt in Teds, Paulines und Keos Haus war ein wunderbarer Abschluss unserer Hawaii-Reise. Unser Zimmer Oasis 1 war mehr als großzügig und bot Platz für uns Drei. Unsere Tochter fand das Hochbett im Schrank absolut cool. Alles war super sauber und wohl temperiert.  Wunderbar war auch das Frühstück auf der Terrasse mit Blick in die Wildness. Den Unterschied hat aber Ted gemacht, der uns viel über Hawaii und Big Island erzählt und tolle Insidertipps für unsere Ausflüge gegeben hat. Wir würden jederzeit wieder kommen. Absolut empfehlenswert! Danke!

Ted was a great host, and our stay was very comfortable. Location is central (30-45 mins drive) to Volcanoes, Lava Boat Tour, Kalapana Lava viewing hike entry and other attractions around Hilo. Restaurants and groceries are in Keaau, 7 miles away.
Excelente anfitrión, casa y ubicación. Pasamos genial muchas gracias por todo!

아름다운 자연과 평온한 숙소.다만 위치는 차 없으면 애매하게 멀고 마트나 기타편의시설까지 가려면 30분 이상 잡아야함.
인터넷 속도가 매우 느림.

We loved our stay with Ted, Pauline and Keo. Our family of four fit comfortably in their large private room. Our kids (4 & 6) loved the bunk beds and the kid-friendly cat and dog. And we all enjoyed the many kitchen table conversations we had with our hosts, whom welcomed us into their home as if we were long lost friends. Keo even shared his Legos and books with our daughters. The location is residential, but put us within a stone's throw of Hilo and the Volcano (and all of Pauline's other local recommendations). We're already planning our return trip.

it was very quiet and clean and the house is very close to the volcano and crater Kīlauea. it's all around perfect. Best place to stay on Big Island and you get a lot of good tips from Ted. Thank you very much.

Ted, Pauline and Keo maintained the communication since the beginning of the reservation! 
They were friendly and helpful! All the family (including the cute pets) and the others in the house! They made us feel at home, also helped us with the laundry and offered a hot coffee in the morning! Couldn't ask for better!

Enjoyed thoroughly our stay with this warm family. Place was spacious and well kept. plus had a huge lawn where I could play with their pet dog and cat. They gave us important tips on the local traffic and about visiting places. Kitchen was easy to use and they lent us their cooler and ice packs for our trips. It was fun and informative to chat with them.

The house of Ted, Pauline and Keo was one of the best real airbnb's we stayed on our 11-month-trip and we enjoyed the 9 days with them so much before leaving home again. It began with a warmly welcome from Ted and Keo on arrival in the evening, showing us all facilities of their spacious house and giving us lots of advices for the fascinating volcano area. Next morning we met Pauline, a very remarcable, strong women and loving heart of the family. We felt like part of this extraordinary family from the first moment on, nevertheless our privacy was accepted all the time. They were very helpful and concerned about our wellbeing and communication was very easy going, interesting and fun. After 2 nights we got the possibility to move in the biggest of their 3 guestrooms and enjoyed the space we had there very much. Coffee was already prepared every morning by Ted, and it was nice to have breakfast outside on their terrace overlooking the big garden. The house is situated in a silent, natural area and a perfect place to visit the Volcanoes National Park, the lava viewing area, Hilo and the beautiful east cost up to Waipio valley, also the value for money is great.  So we highly recommend to stay there when visiting the area. Thank you so much Pauline, Ted and Keo!

The space was perfectly close to Hilo and volcano national park. Great value and lovely friendly hosts who gave us local suggestions. Just FYI , no AC. 

THANKS AGAIN!!

Unser Zimmer war sauber und sehr großzügig und gemütlich. Wir konnten die gut ausgestattete Küche jederzeit benutzen und hatten im Kühlschrank auch unser eigenes Fach. Das Haus ist etwas abseits gelegen, sodass ein Mietwagen  notwendig ist. Viele Urlaubsziele der Insel sind aber von hier aus mit dem Auto gut zu erreichen,  insbesondere der volcanos national Park und die lava viewing area sind sehr nahe gelegen. Die ganze Familie ist sehr nett und hilfsbereit. Wir wurden sehr herzlich empfangen und haben während unseres 10tägigen Aufenthalts immer wieder tolle Ratschläge und Tipps bekommen! Ted hat uns zum Beispiel auch seine Taschenlampe ausgeliehen.
Alles in allem eine wirklich tolle Unterkunft, die wir auf jeden Fall wieder buchen würden.

綺麗なお家で､とても快適でした!
可愛いﾜﾝちゃんと猫ちゃんもいて､娘達も大喜びでした｡
静かな場所なのでのんびりできました!
またﾊﾜｲ島に行ったら泊まりたいです!
ありがとうございました(*^^*)

Our stay was great. Ted gave us some good tips for things to do in the east coast of the big Island, and good addresses to eat. 
We loved their dog and cat, both really friendly. 
We slept well, the sound of the jungle was very relaxing. 
We highly recommend. 
Aurélie & Jessy

Clean, conscientious, and beautiful.  Ted, Pauline, and Keo create a very welcoming and personal environment.  They will treat you like family.  Ted will even be your personal trip advisor with local know-how you can’t find online, showing you the prime locations and access points to avoid unnecessary parking fees and tickets using his big-screen blow-up of (Hidden by Airbnb) maps.  Definitely consider staying here if you’re shopping around.

The house is really spacious, and even though the hosts weren't there, there was a binder full of local recommendations for us to check out. Great place! Just watch out for rush hour into and out of Hilo.

Ted, Pauline and Keo are amazing hosts! They are very friendly and very helpful with any questions you may have. They were unable to be there for part of my stay but they left a notebook with a lot of suggestions of places to visit and eat at. I also love the location, not a far drive to a lot of the places I wanted to visit. Will definitely be recommending them to friends and family!
My family had a really good time at Ted, Pauline and Keo's place! They are very kind and provide us a lot of travel tips. Highly recommend to stay here.

It was a pleasant stay in this beautiful family Pauline, Ted and Keo’s place. They make us felt at home and Ted gave us good recommendation about Big Island, oh ya, love the morning coffee that he prepared for his guests.  If we would be back to Big Island, would certainly stay with them again. Mahalo

Ted, Pauline and Keo are awesome hosts. They were friendly and helpful and just wonderful people. The space is huge and very comfortable at a very generous price. I would definitely recommend staying here!
Clean all around . beautiful kitchen .  Great hospitality. Great hints on places to go. Helpfull offering to bring in luggage.

Great hosts. Incredibly accommodating and provided invaluable advice about seeing the area. Being able to do laundry was a huge plus for our journey as well.

If I ever return to Hilo, I will definitely try to stay here again.
Everything was GREAT except the wi-fi :( I really needed for work, but connection very poor.
非常好的房东,非常热情､周到,令人尊敬,我们去看岩浆,他给我们进行了详细的介绍,并借手电筒给我们,总之,我推荐给后面的旅友｡
房间很大,草坪很大,房东很热情,有条可爱的狗和白色的猫,洗衣和干衣设备非常方便

Watching on their 11 years son’ s behaviour that you will know their family education is very good. We feel warm and helpful. Don’t worry to book this, just do it! Clean, comfortable, helpful.  Haha my English is not good, see you all in the future.

무엇보다도 호스트인 테드는 진심으로 우리를 환영해 주고 주변 여행지에 대해서도 아주 세밀하고 친절하게 답변을 해주 머무는 동안 너무 감사했어요.
힐로 다운타운에서 좀 떨어져 있어 대중교통을 이용하기에는 불편하지만 렌터카를 이용하면 별 문제가 없습니다. 

화산공원 등에 접근하기가 좋은 장소이고 
무엇보다도 숲속에 위치한 아주 조용한 곳인데다가
넓은 잔디정원이 있어 산책하기에 좋아 그냥 머물러 있기만 해도 심신이 힐링되는 것 같았습니다. 다만 고양이와 강아지가 있어 심심치는 않았지만 거실 바닥에 다소 냄새가 나는 것 같았어요. 

다음에 빅아일랜드에 가면 다시 머물고 싶은 곳입니다.

테드씨, 4박 5일 머무는 동안 
당신의 친절에 진심으로 감사합니다. ^^

Ted, Pauline and Keo were fantastic hosts. They were nice, friendly, and caring. The room was also spacious and clean. It came with a spacious and clean bathroom as well. I recommend this place to everyone.
とても素晴らしい家族です!そしてとても清潔で広い素敵なお家です｡夜は広い庭で満点の星が見えます!そしてとても親切なﾎｽﾄさんが､惜しみもなく情報やｱｲﾃﾑを与えてくれました｡居心地最高でした｡ありがとうございました｡

I really love this place, more importantly, this family :P

Out of all the airbnb trips that I have with my parents, my parents rate this one as one of the best they have ever stayed!

The entire house is clean and organized. Our room is very spacious and private. The bathroom is really clean with all the things that you need (even make up remover! I didn't end up using those cuz I brought my own xD). Ted and Pauline gave us lots of local tips and we wouldn't survive, like real survive the night Lava hiking without the "real" flashlight they lent to me. They also offered us coffee in the morning, very nice family and highly recommended! :)

Ted, Pauline et Keo sont extraordinaires! Ils sont vraiment dédiés pour leur visiteurs. Ils nous ont donné plein de conseils sur les différents attraits à visiter. La chambre était spacieuse et la salle de bain privée était parfaite pour nous avec notre bébé de 6 mois. L'emplacement est stratégique pour  découvrir l'est  de l'île. Je recommande les yeux fermés à quiconque.

Merci encore à vous trois!
The family are very nice and the place is very clean and comfortable

English:
This was a spectacular place to stay.  The hosts were welcoming and informative, often helping us with recommendations and tips.  The house is just outside of the city, offering a lovely, quiet place to retire in the evening.  The room was enormous!  We were well pleased with everything.  We would absolutely stay with them again!

Deutsch:
Dies war ein spektakulärer Ort zum übernachten. Die Gastgeber waren freundlich und informativ und halfen uns oft mit Empfehlungen. Das Haus liegt etwas außerhalb der Stadt und bietet einen schönen, ruhigen Ort, um sich am Abend zurückzuziehen. Das Zimmer war riesig! Wir waren sehr zufrieden mit allem. Wir würden auf jeden Fall wieder bei ihnen übernachten!
Pauline and Ted are great hosts. Their place was very comfortable and pleasant.  The pets were very well behaved. Clean house, lots of parking space, you can use kitchen anytime.

Unglaublich nette, aufgeschlossene und sympathische Familie. Ted und Pauline haben sich viel Mühe gegeben, damit wir uns wohlfühlten umd standen uns mit wertvollen Tipps zur Seite. Alles mit einer Prise Humor, die wir sehr schätzten :) Die Unterkunft selbst ist in einer ruhigen Wohnsiedlung, ca. 20min Autofahrt nach Hilo und nicht weit vom Volcano Park. Also ein guter Startpunkt für diverse Ausflugsziele. Auf jeden Fall empfehlenswert :)

We had a wonderful stay with Ted, Pauline and Keo. They have a wealth of information and could easily write an entire travel guide for the Big Island. They were always available and provided lots of great advice to us every day, giving us tips on where to go and what else to see along the way. It definitely helped us get the most out of the Big Island during our (unfortunately) short stay. Super funny too!
Ted and his family are very friendly. They help us to avoid any danger from volcanoes activities. They know the sightseeing and provide local tips  for better design of your trip.

Das Zimmer ist riesig. Wir konnten in der Küche alles benutzen es gab extra ein Platz im Kühlschrank für unsere Lebensmittel. Morgens hatte Ted immer bereits Kaffee gekocht. Die Familie ist grossartig. Wir hatten eine weitere airbnb Person im Haus welche supernett war. Wir haben uns abends über unsere Trips zusammen mit der Familie ausgetauscht welche uns immer super Tips gab was man alles noch Unternehmen kann und wie man am besten dort hin kommt. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und können dieses airbnb jedem nur wärmstens empfehlen. Die Unterkunft liegt in einer sehr ruhigen Nachbarschaft und war einfach zu finden. Zentral gelegen zwischen Hilo und dem Volcano National Park auch wenn dieser aktuell geschlossen ist. Hinsichtlich der aktuellen Vulkan und Lava Aktivitäten war zu unserem Besuch die Unterkunft absolut nicht betroffen obwohl wir nur ca. 20 km entfernt waren. Nachts konnte man sogar das Rot der Lava am Himmel sehen. Wir sind froh trotz der Vulkansituation nicht storniert zu haben. Wir haben uns dort sehr wohl gefühlt und wurden sehr herzlich aufgenommen. Vielen Dank an euch Drei.

Paulina was such a great host! I use to live in Hawaii and it was so great to be back. The house was super cute! My best friend and I stood in one of the rooms and it was beautiful and comfortable! She already had the top shelve of the fridge cleared out so we could be our food up there if we bought things. She had two adorable pets that we loved to pet. Super clean and very friendly. The only thing was that the WiFi was really bad but it was probably because of the volcano right now. Definitely would stay there again!! Thank you so much!!

Réservez dès que possible! L'endroit est paisible et la famille est très accueillante! Pendant notre séjour d'une semaine, nous nous sommes sentis comme si nous faisions partie de leur famille. Ted est très drôle et Pauline nous a conseillé des adresses locales, ce fût très apprécié. Vraiment une belle expérience Airbnb. Nous avions la chambre Sunrise oasis 1. Elle est très très grande avec une salle de bain privée. Seuls petits points à noter: attendez vous à avoir du bruit avec les geckos et les grenouilles la nuit (avoir des bouchons est utile) et la température du côté est de l'île est plus aléatoire. Nous avons eu quelques journées nuageuses et pluvieuses.

Merci à vous!!
A beautiful place to stay at.  We are definitely going back to Hilo n already know that we’re staying at Ted n Pauline’s place.

Great hosts, warm hospitality, great location and affordable! We followed all of their advice to do our daily itineraries and had a great time! Thank you again Ted, Pauline and Keo! We will see you again!

These guys are just perfect! Such awesome people, who always had very good tips and we’re super nice to talk to! We had our own private room which had a lot of space. The bathroom was just the next door and was also private. The kitchen has everything you need to cook and was perfect size. This Airbnb is definitely perfect for the money!

One of the best airbnb accomodations we have ever stayed.
Lovely superhosts. We felt very comfortable and thank for this great stay.
Hosts are very friendly and helpful. room is very large and clean with our own bathroom. kitchen is full equipment.

Thanks Ted, Pauline and Keo.
They are a wonderful family that is very kind and warm.
Their house is much better than photos.
Their house is very perfect and wonderful. Room is very clean and has everything we needs.
My son followed and like Keo well and Keo also took care of my son well.
If someone asks me, I will recommend this place unconditionally.
Velmi příjemné ubytování u milých hostilelů, kteří dokáží dát mnoho tipů na výlety do okolí.

We had the best time staying with Ted, Pauline, and Keo. The accommodations were as described. Very clean and comfortable. Plenty of space and a great value. It was so nice to be able to do laundry. The best part was their warm welcome and hospitality during our visit. We felt like we were staying with friends and look forward to keeping in touch with them. I would highly recommended a visit in this home.

We defenetly recommend this wonderful home on the Hilo side. You get more that you need and everything is very comfortable.  Pauline, Ted and Keo makes us feel like home, they are very lovely and we spend a great time together. We will stay there again hopefully soon. Mahalo and lovely greetings Bernadette and Josua
Great kind family and great hospitality :) I’ll come back in their house next time, only 20 mins away from Hilo center.

This place was awesome! It is super super clean and I'd much bigger than I expected. The hosts were so kind and offered us a lot of information and advice that made our trip even better. My favorite aspect was falling asleep in the wayyyyy comfortable bed while listening to rain outside the many windows in the room. Wonderful place!

We had a very good stay. The host family is very nice and welcome and gave us lots of advice .There are also a cute dog and cool cat. We also used the kitchen without any problem. Thanks Ted, Pauline and Keo.
This place is perfect for exploring the East side of the Big Island! We were very comfortable there :)
테드 가족은 게스트에게 아주 따듯하고 친절합니다. 주방기구가 훌륭하며 잘 정리되어 있습니다. 조용한 곳에 위치하고 있어 정신적 안정을 느낄수 있습니다.

Ted, Pauline, and Keo are incredibly welcoming. They make you feel right at home as soon as you enter their home. They had many helpful suggestions that allowed us to maximize our time on the Hilo side of the island. The space was very comfortable and larger than expected. We loved hearing the gentle rainstorms in the evening and the sounds of the night. Thank you Ted and Pauline for your hospitality!

房东真的超级棒!一家都很热情,而且会提供很多实用的关于当地游览的建议｡我们住的是大套间,完全可以住一家人,一张大双人床,和单人上下铺｡房间非常干净｡厨房用品一应俱全,房东甚至问我们要不要煮米饭,他们有很多米｡离国家火山公园很近,开车去购物中心也很方便,离开机场开车大概30-40分钟｡很安静,社区环境超级安全｡房东家门口停车位很大,草坪房东也让随便停家里的狗和猫都很亲人,可以随便摸!但是一般都关在花园里,所以即使怕狗或猫也没关系｡Keo比照片要大(拍照的时候他还小)如果准备带伴手礼给房东的话,可以考虑12,3岁男孩会喜欢的东西｡总之是非常棒的经历｡

Ted, Pauline, and Keo are fantastic hosts. They were quick to respond when I had last minute questions. Large clean house, bathroom was spotless, and their backyard is perfect for stargazing. Ted and Pauline provided useful travel tips. Ted made us coffee even though we left at 6:30am the first day. Very convenient location to visit the volcanoes national park and Mauna Kea. Overall our trip was way better because of their advice on what to see in 2 short days. Thanks!

Ted, Pauline et Keo sont des hôtes formidables ! A l'écoute, ils conseillent tres bien.
Le logement est bien placé pour visiter l'est de l'île. 
Je vous recommande leur maison ! 

Et la chambre (oasis 1) est vraiment spacieuse et très belle.

Large room and great for folks looking for a room in a families home. Ted is very genuine and wiling to share his families space. He met us in driveway with a hug and we entered through the front door where he offered us some pasta. Felt like we were staying for the night at a family members house as activities such as dinner and laundry occurred ;-). Thanks for the hospitality.

We had a wonderful stay with Ted, Pauline and Keo. They're a fun family and have great local tips on things to do/see around the Hilo side of the island. We had lots of space in the room and they were very accommodating in sharing their kitchen and common space for meals (even with our little one). Thank you!

name: Deluxe Large Apt for 9 px 2bathroom
summary: Welcome to our apartment in Istanbul, dublex large apartment located in a charming 19th century Ottoman house recently renovated in 2011 and designed for our guests into apartments with modern facilities, nestled in the heart of the old city.
space: Welcome to our apartment in Istanbul, dublex large apartment located in a charming 19th century Ottoman house recently renovated in 2011 and designed for our guests into apartments with modern facilities, nestled in the heart of the old city. We have two diffrent entries for this apartment,we have two double bed,two bunk beds,one single bed and two (Website hidden by Airbnb) exterior has been restored to its original grandeur and the interior has been completely gutted and renovated. Our deluxe two rooms apartment on second floor offers additional space with superb quality in contemporary design, this apartment comfortably accommodates a family for four, or even five, can add single bed in. The master bedroom comes with a king sized bed with extra space of a single bed and the second room with a bunk beds. The bathroom is fitted with a power shower. The kitchen is fully equipped with all modern appliances. In a convenient Sultanahmet location, the house is only a 10 – 15 minute walk to

Welcome to our apartment in Istanbul, dublex large apartment located in a charming 19th century Ottoman house recently renovated in 2011 and designed for our guests into apartments with modern facilities, nestled in the heart of the old city. We have two diffrent entries for this apartment,we have two double bed,two bunk beds,one single bed and two (Website hidden by Airbnb) exterior has been restored to its original grandeur and the interior has been completely gutted and renovated. Our deluxe two rooms apartment on second floor offers additional space with superb quality in contemporary design, this apartment comfortably accommodates a family for four, or even five, can add single bed in. The master bedroom comes with a king sized bed with extra

host.host_about: Professional host, able to do anything for guests to make their stay most enjoyable while in Istanbul

reviews.comments: Wonderful host.
The place has a very good location (just 5min walk to Sultan Ahmet area)

There is some descriptions that are misleading here. No electrical converters. Rooms are not connected. One room was not ready. Host appeared to be upset. She didn't communicate clearly. She was going to pick me up at 5:30 am flight but then told me that the check in time is noon. Where was I going to stay? I had a large family. Made the whole trip really bad experience.  There were no reading lamps as per description. There were no electrical converters for 220-110 volts as per description. Called it as a 5 star service themselves. This was 1 star service.
Ok for one night. Far from luxury like advertise say.

name: Beautiful convenient Brooklyn loft
summary: My loft is 1,000 square feet of open space, divided into a fabulous kitchen and quiet bedroom, inhabited in my absence by my long-haired Maine Coon, Bones. Enjoy all the amenities, including central air conditioning and state of the art kitchen.
space: The space has two central air conditioning units, ceiling fans and a nice bathroom with shower/bathtub.
description: My loft is 1,000 square feet of open space, divided into a fabulous kitchen and quiet bedroom, inhabited in my absence by my long-haired Maine Coon, Bones. Enjoy all the amenities, including central air conditioning and state of the art kitchen. The space has two central air conditioning units, ceiling fans and a nice bathroom with shower/bathtub. You will have totally private access to the entire 1,000 square foot open loft space located on the first floor, a few steps up from the street level. I will be away the entire time, but can provide you with the code to the lock to let yourself in. My loft is located in a lovely part of Williamsburg, Brooklyn, within walking distance to cafes, restaurants, supermarkets, parks, music venues and a weekend farmers' market. Located within minutes of the J/M/Z, L and G lines, providing quick rides into Manhattan, Brooklyn and Queens. Bones, is my 12 year old Maine Coon. Goofy, sweet, friendly and lovely but he needs to be taken care of by someone
neighborhood_overview: My loft is located in a lovely part of Williamsburg, Brooklyn, within walking distance to cafes, restaurants, supermarkets, parks, music venues and a weekend farmers' market.
notes: Bones, is my 12 year old Maine Coon. Goofy, sweet, friendly and lovely but he needs to be taken care of by someone who loves cats! So, please, cat lovers only!
transit: Located within minutes of the J/M/Z, L and G lines, providing quick rides into Manhattan, Brooklyn and Queens.
access: You will have totally private access to the entire 1,000 square foot open loft space located on the first floor, a few steps up from the street level.
interaction: I will be away the entire time, but can provide you with the code to the lock to let yourself in.
house_rules: Cat lovers only. No smoking. Please be respectful of my property and leave my loft exactly as you found it.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: My stay was great. The house was clean and comfortable and even had a cat to welcome me home. The apartment was super close to where I was working and has plenty of good places to eat and grab coffee. If I have the chance, I'd stay there every time I have to come to Brooklyn. I never got the chance to meet Linda but we were in communication the whole week and she was very good about responding to any questions I had.

We enjoyed staying in Williamsburg and living with Bones, the cat. The apartment is good located and there are two subway stations pretty close. Lindas directions were very helpful and she responded very quickly when we had trouble to get into the apartment. She also gave us recommendations for restaurants, bars and other stuff. Altough the kitchen could have been cleaned it was very nice to stay at her apartment. The bed is perfect for 2 people and very comfortable. Bones is a friendly, pleasant and cute cat that loves to be petted.

Staying in Linda's apartment was an amazing experience. The pictures do not fully resemble the space and don't mention that there is a backyard with a very beautiful garden! The flat is very spacious, decorated in Japanese style - Linda, you've done a great job! - and very cosy. Most of all we enjoyed the company of Bones, a very delicate, well-behaved and absolutely loveable cat. 
Also take into account the apartment is really close to the metro station and several really good supermarkets, not mentioning it's in Williamsburg packed with bars and cafes. We definitely recommend to stay in this apartment! Linda, thank you for hosting us and warmest regards and hugs to Bones!

Linda was a really nice host. We haven't met her personally but it doesn't matter. Bones the cat is an awesome roommate and was very handsome and nice to us. The Appartement is in a good location and perfect for exploring NYC.

Good location, nicely comunicated and a lot of amenities around. The house is exactly as depicted in the photos in the description, although we found it wasn't very clean (a lot of dust specially in the bed area, too many things and the kitchen a bit oily). Mr. Bones is a lovely cat, loves cuddles and attention, but because the flat has no walls between areas it will go on the bed and make noise, if you are not use to this it would probably wake you up.

name: Clean & Cozy- Private Room by Park and Subway!
summary: Welcome to our comfortable and clean home. Located in Brooklyn's up and coming Lefferts Gardens, this private room is three minutes away from beautiful Prospect Park and the subway station. Come to relax and explore all Brooklyn has to offer!
space: Clean and clutter free, this bedroom is located in a spacious, recently renovated two-bedroom apartment.  In your private room, you'll have a comfortable queen sized couch bed complete with linens and towels.  Each guest will have two pillows. You'll have full access to our kitchen/living room that is equipped with the basic amenities.  Please use any of our spices to cook a meal, or just brew yourself a cup of coffee.   The shared bathroom has a full-sized tub with amazing water pressure.  Feel free to use our shampoos, lotions, and soaps.
description: Welcome to our comfortable and clean home. Located in Brooklyn's up and coming Lefferts Gardens, this private room is three minutes away from beautiful Prospect Park and the subway station. Come to relax and explore all Brooklyn has to offer! Clean and clutter free, this bedroom is located in a spacious, recently renovated two-bedroom apartment.  In your private room, you'll have a comfortable queen sized couch bed complete with linens and towels.  Each guest will have two pillows. You'll have full access to our kitchen/living room that is equipped with the basic amenities.  Please use any of our spices to cook a meal, or just brew yourself a cup of coffee.   The shared bathroom has a full-sized tub with amazing water pressure.  Feel free to use our shampoos, lotions, and soaps. Access to kitchen/living, bathroom, and wifi.  We hope you'll take advantage of the close proximity to the park as well! You'll be staying with a couple that loves to cook, eat, and travel.  We'd love to give y
neighborhood_overview: Lefferts Gardens is a diverse, up and coming neighborhood on the southeast end of Prospect Park.  Our home is a three-minute walk from the park as well as the metro line.  We are excited to be a ten minute walk away from the newly renovated Kings Theater in Flatbush.  The area also boasts historic churches and unique culture.  We are less than twenty minutes from the Brooklyn Botanical Garden and the Brooklyn Museum.  Brighton Beach is only 25 minutes away. There are a variety of delicious bars and restaurants within walking distance of our home.  Additional, Park Slope and Prospect Heights is just a short ride or walk away.
notes: Please note that check out time is 11:00 am unless special arrangements are made. Street parking is available on our street as well as the surrounding blocks.  Please read parking signs carefully.  There is also a parking lot you can pay to use just one block away. -------- FAQ Does your place have a curfew or quiet hours? In one word: No.  NYC never stops and you don’t have to either.  Regardless of whether you plan to get up early to explore or spend your nights out late, you can come and go as you please.  You will have your own key to the building and our apartment.  We are heavy sleepers so don’t worry about waking us.  As musicians, we hold odd hours and we truly don’t care when you choose to come and go. Is your neighborhood safe? Yes!  This is one of our most frequently asked questions.  As a woman, I feel perfectly safe walking around at all hours even by myself. Remember NYC is a busy city so it is normal to see people out 24 hours a day.  There is a very active police force
transit: The apartment is a 3 minute walk to the Parkside Station (Q train) and a 5 minute walk to the Church Ave Station (B and Q train).  You are 3 stops away from Atlantic Ave/Barclay Center where you can connect to the B, D, N, R, 2, 3, 4, and 5.   Manhattan is a mere 20 minute ride away.  Within 35 minutes you can be at Union Square, Times Square, or Penn Station.   The apartment is easily reachable from both JFK and LaGuardia.  Using public transit, you can be at either within 70-80 minutes.
access: Access to kitchen/living, bathroom, and wifi.  We hope you'll take advantage of the close proximity to the park as well!
interaction: You'll be staying with a couple that loves to cook, eat, and travel.  We'd love to give you suggestions on local places to dine as well as unique sites to see in the area.   Having moved to Brooklyn just three years ago, we are very excited to share our home and make new friends!  We look forward to meeting you and making your Brooklyn stay as enjoyable as possible. Please note that we are both musicians who work in and out of the home.  We thank you in advance for understanding that there may be times you'll hear us practicing.  We will keep any playing to reasonable hours (10 am to 8 pm).  We are also happy to recommend a variety of venues in Brooklyn and Manhattan if you are interested in listening to live music during your stay.

host.host_about:
Colorado native who loves to travel.  After living in India for a few years, I'm excited to make NYC my new home.

I am a music teacher and work in a Waldorf school teaching general music and choir.  I also teach private voice and piano.  

In my free time, I love to cook, listen to podcasts, hike, hula hoop, and play board games.  I sing with a few choirs in Manhattan as well.  I enjoy exploring new places and experiencing various food and cultural activities.

reviews.comments: Wonderful musicians.  Incredibly fun to talk to and the nicest people I've ever had the pleasure of staying with.
Awesome stay!
I felt very welcome. House is very conveniently located to public transit.

First I have to say a big thanks to Jayanthi! Her place was really great, very clean and calm. I was really sick when I got to her place and from very beginning I felt really comfortable and slept so long. Although I was sick I had a good conversation with her, she's very warm and kind. Near public transport and very nice neighbourhood. Highly recommend this place. Thanks again ;)

Jayanthi was a welcoming host, her and boyfriend were friendly and happy to give suggestions whenever we asked for them. She was accommodating even when we got lost and didn't arrive when we had planned. The air mattress is one of the nicest I've ever seen.

Jayanthi & Akash are wonderful hosts! They were warm, helpful & so much fun to talk to. If I had more time I would've loved to spend more time talking to them about their music & travel experiences. 
Their place is very close to Prospect Park & Parkside subway station. (The Q train goes directly to some prime spots in Brooklyn & Manhattan). There are also some nice shops & eateries around the area. 

Overall, I'm glad I found their place & I felt very welcome & comfortable staying here. :)

Stay here was nice. The room is small, but pretty and clean. The house is comfortable in a funny neighborhood, close to Prospect Park and the metro. Jayanthi is a good host, she can help you with wathever you need. Good choice!

Soggiorno consigliato in questa casa confortevole a Brooklyn. Jayanthi é molto gentile e sempre disponibile, la stanza é piccola ma carina e la casa si trova accanto al bellissimo Prospect Park e a pochi passi dalla metro.

My husband stayed there with his friend and this is what he reports:
Jayanthi was a very caring host and the apartment was impeccable.  The host was also very tolerant with our late night outings - we wanted to explore the city as much as we possibly could, which meant  coming back to the apartment after midnight.  This bedroom is a great find for budget minded travelers who practically just need to sleep overnight and be out and about at other times.  It does have an inflatable bed, but we didn't mind it at all.
The best host I have ever met. I felt like I was at home. Everything was perfect!
I stayed here for 2 nights and it was great. Jayanthi & Akash are very welcoming and helping hosts. I can definitely recommend staying there, if you are looking for a nice room.

I stayed for one week with my boyfriend at Jahanthi's place. It's a clean place and we had all the comfort we need even if the room seems small. Jayanthi and Aakash are very kind hosts, they did everything to make us comfortable, and respected our privacy.

Mon compagnon et moi sommes restés une semaine chez Jahanthi. Nous avons eu tout le confort possible dans cet appartement bien entretenu, et cela même si la chambre semble petite. Jayanthi et Aakash sont très sympathiques, ils ont tout fait pour nous mettre à l'aise et respecter notre intimité.

Jayanthi and Aakash were great hosts. Both Jayanthi and Aakash were great communicators and very friendly with my nephew Akyro.  They shared tips about the neighborhood and helped Akyro to buy the metrocard. Public transportation oriented location and neat apartment. I totally recommend staying here.
Jayanthi's apartment was very clean and welcoming. It is just as described. It was a close 5 min walk to the Metro. Perfect place for a quick stay in the city.

For location; it is really 3 min. easy walk to flat from Parkside Ave. of Q line. 5-6 stops to Manhattan! Recommended!

For hosts; Jayanthi and Aakash are very friendly, very clean and very helpful. Real artists :)

For the room; clean, well-decorated, enough for a quick stay.

Jayanthi and Aakash are great hosts, friendly and welcoming. We felt very comfortable during our stay with them. The room is fine, and the bathroom with a hand shower was an advantage for us as we're used to them. Everything is exactly as show on the pictures. The location is perfect, literally 3-4 minutes from the metro, it takes about half an hour to get to Times Sq via Q-trains, and they are available all night long, although at really late night, it requires somewhat long waiting - probably, up to half an hour.

Jayanthi was a great host. Reactive and open mind.
Even if I arrived quite late, she was available
Jayanthi was a great host friendly and happy to answer any questions. The apartment was close to the subway and easy to find. I would happily stay there again

Jayanthi and Aakash were wonderful hosts! They were down to earth, interesting, and very hospitable. The room was perfect-very clean house. Perfect location for easy access to transportation and enjoying time in Prospect Park! I would most definitely stay with them again!

Wir waren das erste mal mit Airbnb unterwegs und hätten es uns schöner nicht wünschen können. Jayanthi und ihr Freund waren bereits m Vorfeld sehr hilfsbereit und haben uns dann auch ganz lieb Empfangen. Alles war sehr ordentlich und gemütlich. 
Während des Aufenthalts haben wir uns nicht allzu oft gesehen, da wir oft lange unterwegs waren und die beiden arbeiten, dennoch lief alles ganz unkompliziert. 
Wir würden sofort wieder bei Jayanthi buchen. Klare Empfehlung. 

It has been our first time with Airbnb and it was really awesome. Jayanthi and her boyfriend where very helpful and supportive from the beginning on. When we arrived we felt welcomed right away, the room was comfortable and beautiful. Thanks to them we had an awesome NYC experience. 

 Grüße aus Deutschland.

Anthony and I only stayed one night and couldn't have asked for better hosts! 
Place was lovely, comfy and the Jayanthi and Aakash were/ are absolutely awesome people. We had a great night, thank you! :)

Really happy with my (Jan's) stay! The room is very nicely renovated, the bed is comfortable and the place is even closer to the subway than it looks on a map. Jayanthi and Aakash are amazing hosts and great to talk to as well, I wish we'd had more time to chat. You're guaranteed to feel at home the moment you walk through the door. We might just have found our go-to Airbnb in New York City.
Wonderful stay. Clean and comfortable place, kind hosts and great location. Would highly recommend!

We had an amazing time at New York because of the stay. Our hosts were extremely coopertive and friendly. They have maintained their house very well. We had access to their place anytime we wanted. The neighborhood is decent and safe. I would definitely recommend this place to everyone.

Five stars! Jayanthi + Akash were awesome hosts, very helpful with recommendations. 

Accommodations were very clean and located conveniently. Will definitely stay with them again if I am every in town!
Jayanthi was a wonderful host. Her apartment was clean and uncomfortable. I felt perfectly at home.

It was good for the price, Jayanthi was a great host. Bed was a pullout couch, and you could feel the slats, but not too bad. In the middle of the night the radiator would make incredibly loud sounds, so we woke up a few times.

Jayanthi and Aakash made us feel very welcome in their home. They greeted us warmly and offered tea and coffee. They were very easy to talk with and had some good conversations while we were there. But they also gave us our space and privacy as well. They are great hosts. The room is a small, but cozy and inviting space and is exactly as pictured on their listing page. We enjoyed ourselves at their place and would absolutely come back again.
Jayanthi made us feel so much at home that I can't say enough great things about her & her boyfriend Aakash! It's just been a tremendous experience!

Jayanthi (and Aakash) made me feel welcome right away.  I contacted her beforehand for directions, and she was very helpful.  I arrived on the subway (Q and B are very close), and the apartment is located just a few minutes walk away from the station! Very convenient!  There is also a grocery store very close by.  Jayanthi also provided me with some information about things to do and see all around the city; especially some great music shows happening in town.  The apartment is in a secluded corner of the neighborhood, and the apartment is quiet at night so I slept well during my stay.  The room was comfortable and the bathroom was perfect.  The location is great for access to Prospect Park and I thoroughly enjoyed spending some time relaxing there during the day.  I would recommend staying here if you're in Brooklyn for it's good location next to transport and Prospect Park, but more importantly, for the welcoming hosts!

Jayanthi & Aakash were great hosts. Felt very welcome and they were very helpful with any questions I had during my stay. Great food and music recommends! The train is a 2 minute walk and right across from Prospect Park. Very convenient and local. I highly recommend.  Thanks guys! You made my first week and a half in New York much easier!

Jayanthi and Aakash were such a pleasure to stay with.  They both made me feel welcome and are really interesting people.  I enjoyed our talks and didn't even mind being severely defeated at board games! Their home is really close to the subway and is extremely comfortable.  It's nearly as welcoming as they are!  I can't wait to come visit them again - oh and NYC isn't bad either!

This was my first time using AirBNB and I could not say more great things about the experience. Aakash and Jayanthi were gracious, accommodating, and warm hosts and they offered much information about places to visit and eat in the neighborhood as well as valuable insight to someone that might be moving to the area soon. The place was exactly as described and pictured. I would highly recommend and would definitely be a repeat visitor in the future if the opportunity arises.
Jayanthi and Aakash are great hosts. Very friendly and they have a very nice and clean space nearby a subway station. I would contact them again for future visits to New York

Jayanthi and Aakaash are perfect hosts! Room (and hosts) are very warm; location is well situated in Brooklyn. If you're a musician (or jazz aficionado), I highly recommend staying with them-- Aakash is a saxophonist and Jayanthi a pianist. Also, if cooking is your thing, you'll love having conversations with them. I booked it for my bassist who came in from Spain for a few days. Really grateful A and J are doing this, felt very worry-free that my bassist was in their hands. Artist-friendly, lgbqt+ friendly... generally, they're very lovable and friendly people.
Communication and checking in was easy and Jayanthi and Aakash were very nice.

Die Unterkunft war als Ausgangspunkt für unsere New York Besichtigungen optimal. Mit der Q Linie welche nur eine Straße entfernt  ist,kommt man sehr gut hin und zurück (Alternativ B Linie ca. 3 Straßen entfernt). Mittelgroße und kleine Lebensmittel Geschäfte sind genau wie diverse Imbisse(subway...) in der nächsten Straße vorhanden. Auch wenn es auf den ersten Blick anders scheint, ist die Gegend sehr sicher (haben täglich fast 10 Polizei Patrouillen gesehen) Bis Mitternacht hatten wir keine Probleme und später waren wir nicht unterwegs. Von JFK mit dem Taxi haben wir 40 Dollar  bezahlt. Mit der Subway ginge es auch recht gut aber unser Flug hatte 9 Stunden Verspätung daher hatten wir keine Lust darauf ( Nochmals danke für den problemlosen Late Check in). Das Zimmer ist nicht sehr groß, aber zum schlafen völlig ausreichend  (man fährt ja nach New York  für sightseeing und nicht zum Zimmer sitzen) Die Sauberkeit der Wohnung war sehr gut und zu den Straßen und Häusern muss man sagen,tjadas ist New York. Falls wir nochmal einen Trip nach New York Unternehmen sollten, würden wir wenn möglich die gleiche Unterkunft und die gleichen Gastgeber wählen.
My stay was awesome! They were extremely helpful with recommendations and were easy to communicate with! Very clean and accurate description of accommodations. Would stay again!
Nice cozy room, very welcoming guests, highly recommend.
excellent location for getting around bk, Had at length discussions of all things jazz and good recommendations. Great host

This room is really calm and close to the train station next to prospect park (5min). We even had good interesting conversations and they gave me some good advises of amazing places of the city. The flat is located in Brooklyn near lovely prospect park. It takes your 25min to Manhatten or 25min to brighton beach in the opposite direction. I enjoyed the time at that place very much. Thanks to Jayanthi and Aakash.

Very nice room, there is enough space for 2 ppl and everything is clan, the flat is close to the Q undergound station that is one of the most important lines.  I suggest this room to everyone wants a quite and safe holiday in NY.
Thankyou Jayanthi!
Jayanthi was such a great host. She offered to help bring me and my guest to her place. Bed was really comfortable and more than enough blankets were provided. Thank you for having us Jayanthi.

My stay at Jayanthi's and Aakash's place was great. I honestly was barely there, because I was very busy but the little bit of time I did spend at the apartment was solid. The place is clean and homie, there is a great kitchen and Jayanthi was so gracious to let me use whatever I wanted and even offered for me to enjoy some of the drinks they had in the fridge whenever I pleased. Jayanthi was so laid back and friendly and yet very respectful of my privacy and space. The apartment, just like the room, are pretty small but cozy and comfortable. If you are looking to spend lots of time at an apartment or want to have a romantic vacation stay and dont mind spending a little more for a bigger more open room, then this might not be the place for you... 
BUT, if you plan on being in and out and mostly want to go out to the city, explore and visit new york AND have a homie beautiful space to lay your head, take a lovely shower, be able to cook some home made food and relax at the end of the without breaking the bank or worrying about what time you come back home without having go answer to anyone, then this place, then Jayanthi's IS THE PERFECT PLACE FOR YOU! The place might seem a little far from the action, but it is soooo close to the Q subway (and a few other ones) which take you directly into thr heart of Manhattan in less than 20 min. The neighbourhood has lots of jamaican and carribean residents and can seem a little grungy, but I definitely felt safe walking around and during the day it is lovely to explore the area, check out some unique food and cultures. Awesome stay!!! Good value! Lovely hosts!
Very lovely couple who share their comfortable and clean apartment for guests. No complaints, everything was great!

Me and my boyfriend stayed at the Jayanthi and Aakash apartment for our first trip in New York. We stayed very well. In reality we left the house in the morning and de came back late in the evening but when we met the guys were always helpful and sweet. The room is a bit small as read by reviews but clean. The Q underground, which leads to Manhattan, is very close only a few minutes from the apartment. If we will do a trip to new york we will go to them again  :-)

Jayanthi's place is perfectly located and very clean with everything we need. As we walked up the street to the address, we smelled some incredible food... it turned out to be coming from their apartment! It's definitely been our favorite Airbnb in Brooklyn so far! 

The neighborhood is fun, unique, and full of great culture and great food. It's a convenient 5 minute walk to the subway, and prospect Park is right around the corner. It was close enough to many fun bars and restaurants, yet quiet enough in the room to sleep through the night with the window open. Street parking was easy and safe in the neighborhood, just make sure to read the signs.

Jayanthi and Aakash are great hosts! Very respectful, helpful and easy to get ahold of. We spent most of our time out and exploring, but it would have been nice to have the time to hang out with them. We would love to stay here again!
Very welcoming and friendly hosts with a nice spot in a great location. Couldn’t have asked for more.
Jayanthi was a wonderful host. Her place was comfortable and warm. I enjoyed my stay.

Beautiful couple,  the space was super nice,  our room cozy and perfect location close to the metro station, prospect park and to the coolest vinyl store we found in Brooklyn! Thanks again for the tips, the hospitality  and for making us feel at home!  Hugs

Excelente lugar! La atención por parte de los anfitriones fue buenísima, muy atentos en todo momento y dispuestos a ayudarnos. Limpieza muy buena, el lugar es muy acogedor y te hace sentir en casa. El lugar tiene la ventaja de estar cerca de una parada del metro y esta accesible a restaurantes, bares y tiendas donde comprar comida.
An amazingly well located apartment, accurate description and great hosts. Communication was very efficient, and Jayanthi's place is beautiful. 100% recommended.

Jayanthi and Aakash are great hosts.  Super friendly and easy going. The apartment is comfortable and clean, close to subway Q which is a road away and subway B which is 4 min walk(20-25min to Manhattan). Close to bus stops, loads of deli stores and eating joints. I felt safe in the neighbourhood. They were thoughtful and provided umbrellas, towels and let us use the kitchen. 
I loved the place and this would be my choice if I visited NYC again.
Fue mi primera experiencia y lo recomiendo.  En todo momento me sentí como en mi propia casa. Estuvo atenta siempre.
Jayanthi and Aakash were very friendly hosts, and they provided everything I needed and more. I loved the area and I definitely want to go back to Brooklyn
Jayanthi and her husband are an awesome couple. They make you feel super comfortable, everything about the space is so peaceful, they made the trip worthwhile. Thank you again.

name: Pammy's Place- La'ie
summary: Our cozy beach cottage sleeps 4 comfortably.  Full kitchen, a queen size bed, a super comfortable sofa bed that folds out to a queen, full bathroom, and a large living/dining area.  Bedroom and living room have air conditioning units!  Walk to the beach, shopping, bus, PCC, BYUH, and LDS temple!
space: You will be staying in the apartment attached to our home.  You have a separate entrance.  We are a block off the highway and across from the PCC and BYUH.  There is a parking space available in front of the apartment for 1 car.   The apartment is a 1 bedroom 1 bathroom with full kitchen.   There are a/c window units in the bedroom and the living room.  They cool the apartment down, but won't make it ice cold.  If you need a climate controlled environment, this is not the place for you. UPDATE!  Beginning August 14, 2018, there will no longer be a queen bed in the living room. Instead, we will have a couch that folds out  to a queen size bed. In addition, we are adding a love seat and two new occasional chairs and installing new windows.  Look for updated pictures in mid July!
description: Our cozy beach cottage sleeps 4 comfortably.  Full kitchen, a queen size bed, a super comfortable sofa bed that folds out to a queen, full bathroom, and a large living/dining area.  Bedroom and living room have air conditioning units!  Walk to the beach, shopping, bus, PCC, BYUH, and LDS temple! You will be staying in the apartment attached to our home.  You have a separate entrance.  We are a block off the highway and across from the PCC and BYUH.  There is a parking space available in front of the apartment for 1 car.   The apartment is a 1 bedroom 1 bathroom with full kitchen.   There are a/c window units in the bedroom and the living room.  They cool the apartment down, but won't make it ice cold.  If you need a climate controlled environment, this is not the place for you. UPDATE!  Beginning August 14, 2018, there will no longer be a queen bed in the living room. Instead, we will have a couch that folds out  to a queen size bed. In addition, we are adding a love seat and two new o
neighborhood_overview: I love where I live!  The grocery, post office, and other amenities are within easy walking distance or a quick bike ride.  We are also within walking distance to several trail heads and beaches.
notes: Beginning mid July 2018, we will have more family living on the property.  This may impact your stay as Pammy's adorable school age grandchildren might make things a little noisier after school and on weekends.   There is a one time $75 cleaning fee for each booking.  All prices include local taxes such as the Hawaii Transient Accommodations Tax (9.25%), Hawaii General Excise Tax (4%), and Oahu surcharge (0.5%). This totals 13.75%.
transit: We are only a block from the Bus stop that can get you into Waikiki if you do not have your own transportation.
access: You will have access to the apartment and use of a washer and dryer.  We have a few amenities you may use during your stay such as a small bbq, a few snorkels and masks, and sand toys.  We have surfboards, kayaks, and SUPS available for rent.
interaction: We are always next door if you have any questions, need a cup of sugar, or just want to chat.  Otherwise, we will leave you to yourselves.  We would be happy to tell you about our favorite places on the island.
house_rules: House Rules: -There is an a/c window unit in the living area and another in the bedroom.  Because of the high cost of electricity and our commitment to the environment,  we ask that you turn the a/c and fans off when you are not in the apartment.  If we find that a/c has been left running we will keep your security deposit.  -No smoking, no drug use. -Quiet hours are from 9:00 pm- 6 am.   -Please keep apartment clean, there will be no clean up service during your stay. Please dispose of trash and recycle. Please remove your shoes before coming in the house. -Please rinse off sand  and dry off outside before coming in from the beach.  There is a hose right outside the door.   Also, please rinse sand out of your swim suits before putting them in the washer

host.host_about: Aloha!  My name's Bekah and I'm lucky enough to call paradise my home.  I love living by family and friends.  I adore being in the ocean.  I live with my husband, two tweenage girls and my mother in law Pammy.  Pammy's Place has always been a gathering spot for old friends and new friends alike.  It seems natural to extend her hospitality to everyone who would like to visit.  We're a busy family, but we always make time for fun.  As our guest, you are always welcome to join us for a bbq at Waimea, kayaking Kahana,  or a Saturday waterfall hike.

reviews.comments: Pammy's place was just as described and looks exactly as it does in the photos, such a lovely place! Bekah was such a great host!

Bekah was a great host! She and her family where very friendly and accommodating.  It's a very kid friendly and spacious living area for 4. We appreciated the fruit and fresh flowers! They have some stocked items in the kitchen and plenty of dishes, silverware and pots and pans which really made it easy to cook full family meals. Walking distance to the Polynesian Center and beach! Thank you, we enjoyed our stay. 

Kelsey, Tiffany and kids

The place was homely. Clean and comfortable. Rebekah and the family helped us in many things. They took us surfing and borrow bikes too. There was many nice beaches, seaturtles, water falls, Polynesian Cultural Center and lots of thing's to do. Laie was peaceful and save little town. We liked a lot. We can recommend the place for everybody.

Pammy's Place was a perfect spot for us to stay.  It was close to BYU campus, PCC and the beach.  The home was clean and had all the amenities that we needed.  We enjoyed using the boogie boards and the beach supplies that were provided.  Bekah was a  great host and her family was very friendly.  The area had many ono restaurants and popular places to eat.  There were also many activities available to do in the area with the North Shore just a quick drive from the house.  We  loved the fresh fruit especially the bananas! The most ono bananas I have ever had!!!  The bed in the bedroom was extremely comfortable!! I felt very comfortable and we would love to stay in this sweet family's home again! :) Mahalo!

Pammy's Place was perfect for our family! It was a perfect location, right across the street from the Polynesian Cultural Center (we walked to the center the day we visited - no parking fees!), and walking distance to a darling, quiet beach.
