Rebekah provided fresh flowers, fresh tropical bananas, BBQ grill with everything we needed to grill, and every possible thing needed for the beach: boogie boards, surf boards (to rent) with a roof rack, sand toys, snorkel gear, beach chairs and umbrella, beach mats and towels!  We loved every minute of it. Bonus: there's an air conditioning unit both in the front room AND the bedroom so the whole place cools down fast.  We loved our trip and can't wait to go back! Thank you Rebekah!

Bekah was awesome!   She was super nice and very accommodating.   The apartment was really lovely,  comfortable,  and made to feel like a home away from home.   I'd recommend staying there if the opportunity presents itself.

It was awesome staying at Pammy's Place in La'ie.  It was comfortable and quiet.  It was convenient and close to the beach, shopping, and BYU-H.  I appreciated the games and videos that were available for use.  I would definitely stay here again!
We were warmly welcomed. It was ss advertised. We felt ssfe.

As a soon as we arrived we were welcomed with open arms. Rebekah was very kind as so were her family members. The place was exactly how it was depicted online...beautiful. A definite paradise getaway. It was located in a quaint spot as well, especially since what we had to do and see was in that immediate area, so it was perfect for us. We truly loved the place and would highly recommend it as well as go back again.

This is a little apartment connected to a regular house in a regular neighborhood.  It isn't anything particularly special, but it was neat and clean and comfortable.  We stayed here one night after attending the PCC so we wouldn't have to make the long drive back to Honolulu late at night after the show.  We ate all of our meals out, so we didn't really make any use of the kitchen (other than the ice cube trays in the freezer), and we didn't need to use the laundry facilities, but they were available.  

We had a problem getting the AC to turn on, but Rebekah came right over and got it working.  It was very hot and humid during our stay, but the AC units in the bedroom and living area, and the various fans cooled off the rooms sufficiently so that we were comfortable.  

There are several nice beaches within close proximity.  The next morning, we made use of the beach chairs and boogie boards that they had available for a quick visit to the beach before returning to shower, pack, and checkout.  We had a lovely stay and wouldn't hesitate to recommend this place to others looking for a convenient location in Laie.

This is the quintessential combination of Hawaii beach life mixed with mainland living. The pictures are exactly how we found the place at arrival. It was immaculate and could tell they worked hard to keep it clean & were able to get it ready for us with just a few hours notice.
They had bath and beach towels available, a basket with toiletries if we needed (sunblock, aloe, lotion, & more), shower stocked with shampoo, conditioner, & shower gel. The fridge even had condiments and other items for use. We also were able to use snorkel gear, chairs & umbrella, and boogie boards from their supply.
There are 2 air conditioners that work really well, one in the living room and one in the bedroom. They also had 2 floor fans that could be moved around the rooms. You can park the car in the spot immediately in front of the front door in the driveway. The location is perfect in Laie, you can walk to McDonalds & the Polynesian Cultural Center. Rebekah was very responsive to texts when we had questions. We would love to stay here when we are back to visit again!

Our stay at Pammy's place was great - it is a complete unit, separate from the main house. The setup is great for 3  adults, clean and cute. With a/c in both rooms (couldn't have made it without them). Exactly as presented and more so.
Rebecca (Pammy's daughter) was available for every and any question, the location was perfect (just a short block to the beach, with parking and convenient access to every direction, and local attractions). Adam (Pammy's son) is a n excellent photographer, and his work (adorning the unit) was a pleasure.

We had a fantastic time at Pammy's Place. It was in the perfect location (close to many beaches, close to the Polynesian Cultural Center, close to BYU-Hawaii). It was also comfortable and gave the two of us plenty of space. Our hosts were attentive but not intrusive. Thank you!  We hope to be back!

The location and the room was very nice.   The nearby beach feels very private and is beautiful.  We loved all the free equipment we could use, such as snorkels, sand toys, towels, etc.  It felt like we had all the perks of an upscale resort without all the crowds or fuss.  Our few interactions with Rebekah were very nice and she was very responsive to all our needs.  Overall a wonderful experience that we would highly recommend.

Bekah was very welcoming and we had a wonderful experience at Pammy's place! The home was very nice and cozy on the inside, and had everything we could possibly need. We were traveling with kids and she provided a pack-n-play and a high-chair, which made things very easy. The kitchen was fully stocked with all the appliances we were looking for (toaster, microwave, blender). Beds were very comfortable. Bathroom at kitchen were clean and roomy, and the decor throughout was very fitting for the location. We didn't interact a ton with Bekah, but she was very kind and answered any questions we had when we saw her. We also appreciated all the beach gear! Our kids loved playing with all the sand toys at a nearby beach. Location was perfect for our needs -- close to the PCC, BYUH, beaches, and the North Shore. Shopping was also very close and convenient. We would definitely recommend staying here, and will stay here again if we stop through Laie.

My mother and sister and I had a very enjoyable experience this past week at Pammy's Place in Laie.   The description and photos were extremely accurate, the place was very clean and very inviting when we arrived.  The place was very spacious and the beds were comfortable.  Rebekah was wonderful to communicate with prior to our arrival  and during our entire stay there, she responded back very quickly to any question that I had and was very accommodating to our needs.  She even delivered beautiful cut fresh flowers the day after we arrived!  We were able to enjoy them the entire week we were there which was a lovely addition to the already nice and tasteful decor.  Thank you for making our stay so relaxing and memorable.    Mahalo!
We had a great time staying with Bekah. Fantastic location across the street from the PCC and a short walk to the beach. Would definitely stay here again.

The apartment is right next to the host house and has its own front door and parking spot. Its a single bedroom unit but with an extra bed in the living-dining room. Spacious, clean comun area connected with an open kitchen, wich is good equiped. The bathroon is huge and nice. Beach towels available. Our kids really love the toys and enjoy a cartoons movie. One block from the ocean and walking distance to a supermarket and from the polinesic center

The neighborhood is very safe and it's 100 yards from the ocean, close to Foodland and La'ie Point! Rebekah was awesome and even invited my parents and us over for pies at Thanksgiving :) They had surfboards, snorkel gear (fins, masks, snorkel), and a lot of fun stuff to take to the beach - very giving people!
Apartment was in excellent condition and had everything we needed. Great location close to the beach and shops. Thanks Rebekah

Pammy's Place was delightful place to stay for our long weekend. The home itself was exactly as pictured and very clean and pleasantly decorated. It is very close to the beach and the Polynesian Cultural Center as well as some great hiking. We highly recommend Pammy's Place for your future stay.
Pammy's Place is well appointed, clean, quiet and well located near the beach and not too far from the north shore.

We had a wonderful experience at Pammy's place! Large, comfortable space in a quiet neighborhood. The well stocked kitchen, washer and dryer (Rebekah let us use theirs), and beach gear were a big plus for us. Rebekah and Jesse were kind and welcoming. Would recommend to anyone!
Good. It's a very nice people and everything was like it was suppose to be.

Pammy's Place was lovely, clean, and well put together (with one of the most comfortable beds I've encountered during an Airbnb stay!). My husband and I loved using the boogie boards and beach chairs that Rebekah provided. She even gave us access to a washer and dryer during our stay, which was so thoughtful. Although the apartment is sandwiched between Rebekah's home and another apartment, with some of the windows looking directly onto shared family spaces, we were never made to feel like our presence was intrusive despite the close quarters. All our encounters with Rebekah and her family (and their dog Maggie) were really welcoming!

Laie is a conveniently-located town in a beautiful part of O'ahu, and we really enjoyed how convenient the property was to shops nearby, including a big grocery store and a drug store. Although we're not Mormon, we still felt like there was plenty for us to see, eat, and enjoy in this heavily Mormon town.

We had an excellent stay at Pammy's place. The house was spotlessly clean and the neighborhood was very safe and quiet--exactly what we were looking for. The location is also a great starting point for many different activities on the north shore.

Host was very helpful and welcoming.  Rebekah kept in touch by email promptly to all my queries. The Location was fabulous and so close to several beaches with car parks. Supermarket really handy and well stocked. I would certainly recommend for a few days get away and base.

Laie is definitely a slower-paced Hawaiian town, though the proximity to the beach and some phenomenal food options make this a great place for kicking back.

Rebekah created a warm and welcoming atmosphere with her Airbnb, with comfortable areas to relax and every amenity we could have asked for. Also provided was a map of the area, listing local hikes and attractions, as well as suggestions on where to eat or shop. 

With the windows open we could hear the faint drumming from the Polynesian Cultural Center during the day, which added a fun element to the stay. Would definitely stay again next time we're in the area. Thanks Rebekah and family! :)
everything was good! same like in the website

We had a great week at Rebekahs place, its perfect to enjoy the northern parts of the island. Quiet and really comfortable, the place has all you need. Rebekah is very nice and welcoming, thumbs up! Would always come back here!

Perfection, this is such a cute relaxing home. We really didn't want to leave. Incredible sunsets. Check in was easy.
The beds and linens, towels were really nice, everything well thought out. Curtains in the right places,first aid kit,blow drier, plenty of space to hang clothes,lighting. Well thought out and really awesome.
Quiet part of the island and was so close to the beach.
The boogie board ,umbrella, beach mat were so nice to be able to use.
The place was exactly as described and then some.
We enjoyed watching a movie each night from the collection.
The appliances are modern and nice, we loved blending tropical drinks with the fantastic blender.
Made breakfast each day which saved us a bundle.
 Had everything I needed to cook a meal,nice mugs,plates,good pans,salt,pepper, spices,etc.
There was no clutter,  very clean, no dramas.
I love this part of the island, you have nice beaches, mountains ,peaceful. You could walk places and the bus is at end of block.
 I liked having a car but I love driving the scenic Hawaii roads. I will definitely stay here next time I'm lucky enough to get back to Oahu. The hosts were really nice people.
the Pcc is next door and they bang their tribal drums so you hear that but it was fine.I just went with it .
Great trip, I was sad to leave, Thank You for all the extra touches and conveniences, truly stress free.

What a great place! The location couldn't have been more perfect for us! We loved the decor of the house, the cozy feel, and all the necessary items for cooking our own meals and playing at the beach! Thank you for sharing your home with us. We loved it!!

We loved staying at Pammy's place.  It was a great location in La'ie.  Rebekah made us feel welcome and suggestions of thing to do and see.  It is a great place to go to avoid the crowds of Honolulu. The kitchen was well equipped.  The space was huge for the two of us.  We felt very safe in the neighborhood. We look forward to coming back and staying on future vacations. We enjoyed walking to the quiet beach in the evenings.  It was a great beach with hardly anybody on it!
One of the best i have staying in, very clean she was so helping when i had question definitely will be returing soon!
Pammy's place is lovely, well equipped, clean, cosy....we had a wonderful stay over there! Definitely recommended!

We had a great time! The apartment was perfect for our 20 year old twin daughters and us. It was very clean with plenty of towels and the kitchen was well stocked with food prep essentials. We had a washer and dryer that was really great too! We were close-within walking distance to a grocery store and strip mall that had delicious shave ice! We were also right across the street from PCC which was nice as our ticket allowed us entrance over a three day period. My niece and her family lived right around the corner so we were able to visit them and they gave us lots of ideas for things to do on the island-which Rebekah had many things listed in her notebook at home. It went by too fast! We would definitely go back!

Listing was as described, with comfortable bed.  Very useful having boogie boards and snorkel gear.  Not much contact with the host as the accommodation was separate to the main house but it did make it nice and private.  Furnishings were comfortable and air con was available but we only really used this for cooling the rooms down, and used the fan at night.  Liked that there was a washer and dryer available if needed.  

It should be noted though that some of the windows are shutter-like so cannot block outside noise well such as machine noise which was heard in the morning from the Polynesian Cultural Centre (and maybe chickens outside?!) but this is beyond the hosts control (maybe bring some ear plugs?).
Listing was accurate. Great location. Close to PCC, BYU-H and the temple. Always lots of hot water. We would stay here again.
Fantastic house & location! Clean, comfortable & quiet.  Rebekah was great as well - very welcoming & accessible. Highly recommend this house.
Great accommodation. It felt very homey, and had a great kitchen which was close to supermarkets etc. Rebecca was a good host with quick and helpful replies.

Rebekah communicated well with us prior to our arrival.
The location was noisier than I had expected.
The apt. was clean, but a ceiling light was out, and bedroom fan was quite noisy.
Overall, the apt was adequate since our stay was short but the heavier than expected neighborhood traffic, especially at night, would be irritating for someone staying longer.

My husband has been deployed for the last 6 months and finally got a port call in Hawaii so the kids and I flew out to visit before he had to head back out to sea. We wanted something away from the military scene so we were looking up north and found Pammy's place and the amazing reviews. Our stay definitely lived up to the reviews! It was quiet and family friendly, extremely close to BYU and the PCC. There's a beach within a short walking distance that's quiet and beautiful. The famous North Shore, Turtle Bay, Waimea Valley (amazing farmers market) and Dole Plantation are just a short drive away. The apartment itself is very nice!! It has everything we needed including beach towels and toys, basic spices, kitchenware, comfortable beds, DVDs, books, board games, and I could go on and on. We even found some left over sunscreen and aloe!! It is a VERY family friendly place. We met the whole family and they were very welcoming and a great source of information. If you're looking for a quiet, clean, family friendly place to stay in a great location, definitely consider Pammy's Place.

I was overall satisfied of Rebekah's place.
It was same as the picture and she replied whenever I asked some questions promptly. It was loacated at East-North as I expected and you would take more than 1 hour to reach main town of Honolulu, however I really liked there because it's much more quite and could enjoy driving all the ways in the island.

There's one thing you have to be aware of this place though.
The first 2 days were fine, but after 2days, the "Cockroach" came.. It wasn't small one, was really big ones. I saw total four of them hardly stopped screaming thinking of my kids....

This is why I am leaving this message here.
If you wouldn't mind the cocokroaches, it should be fine. But if you do, you must be prepared to see/catch them.
The host canceled this reservation 15 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Everything was great! I really appreciated having a washer and dryer available!

This was a pleasant surprise for us, myself, wife and son. We stayed at Tiki Moon Villas, couple of blocks away, before but for this trip we couldn't get a room there. Found this place but didn't think it would hold up to the standard of OceanView 1 Bdrm: BAMBOO 1 Tiki Moon Villas, where we stayed. But this place is so comparable in almost everything and for the difference in price, much cheaper here,  overall, I rate this place better, my personal view.
Two things, both were clearly described for us and knew what to expect checking in, my wife and son found lacking were: airconditioner for the wife and wifi for son. My wife found using the fan better than the airconditioner and my son found that wifi is stronger in the kitchen, after moving around a bit.
Me, personally I don't like using airconditioner, I rather open the windows or go for a swim, and prefer to get off the grid when on vacation. 
I think this a perfect place to stay during winter months if you can't handle living without a strong airconditioner in the summer months.
I prefer minimal interaction with hosts. Rebekah was awesome. All the information I needed were provided.
Neighborhood and home were exactly what we expected. Great stay!

What a great time we had!  They had so many things for us to use.   It is an amazing neighborhood, just felt like one of the locals.  So close to the beach!   In fact everything (except Waikiki and Honolulu) is very close! Rebekah and her family were great hosts,  readily accessible if we want, all the privacy we needed.   Perfect balance!

Bekah was great! She checked in periodically through the Airbnb app, which was very thoughtful. Our stay could not have been better and La'ie was a great location for a few days to explore the north shore! Thanks for a great first Airbnb experience!!
Bekah and her family were great! They were so helpful and responsive when we had questions but also were very good at giving space :) This was a fantastic location and we really enjoyed our stay.

I lived in Laie for 2 years so I knew exactly what the neighborhood was like.  It is wonderful if you want a slow paced quieter stay on the island.  It was everything I wanted it to be and I felt like I was home again.  It was also really nice to have all the amenities of home supplied for you at Pammy's place and even use of Beach toys and snorkeling stuff.  I really enjoyed my stay and would highly recommend Pammy's place!

We believe that the listing for  Pammy's place was extremely accurate.

The property is well presented and well equipped. For us, the neighborhood was perfect. There was easy access to nearby stores and the beach, however, so many other places of interest were just a short drive away.

Rebekah could be easily contacted but she was also respectful of our privacy. We always felt that ,had we needed help with anything, she was on hand if necessary.

As there were just the two of us staying, we slept in the double bedroom and we were not affected by any road noise during the night. 

Parking was easy and we would have no hesitation in recommending this property to others.

This wonderful home was located in a quiet neighborhood right in the heart of Laie, walking distance to many great places to eat and the PCC. The home was larger than ee expected and Rebekah was very prompt to help when we needed anything! There are awesome beach supplies and a few boogie boards, paddle boards, and kayaks to rent for a small and very worth it fee! The home was equipped with everything we needed and very clean. We would love to come back and bring our children! We had an excellent experience!

Rebekah was a great host.  If you need anything specific and prefer face to face she is available. If you are more of a private person she is fully savy to use the app and communicate via your smart phone. She has an awesome notebook ready for you with all FAQs about the house and places to go/see. The apt is lovely and clean. Fabulous kitchen utensils, pots pans, rice cooker, gas stove and nice AC for those couple of hours a day it may get a bit warm. Perfect location. Highly recommend.
Pammys Place was great. Everything was as described and the location was wonderful for North Shore access. Rebekah was prompt on responses and we have no complaints.
We had a wonderful stay.  It was in a perfect location.  We were able to borrow some very useful thinks like a portable crib and snorkeling gear.  The pictures and description is very accurate.

We really enjoyed our stay! It was super close to the PCC, BYUH and several beaches. We found the condo super clean and the kitchen well equipped. Rebekah was very available and helpful. We loved that boogie boards, beach chairs and snorkel equipment were available for our use. we will stay here again for sure!

Pammy's Place was an ideal choice for our family in Laie! The apartment was exactly as advertised, with the added bonus of a very comfortable beds...we slept superbly! Rebekah and her family were lovely hosts - friendly, helpful and easy-going. I highly recommend staying here, for others interested in family-friendliness, quick access to great surfing beaches, local vibes, and the PCC. Aloha!

The host greeted us and was very helpful.  She left us alone but was available when we needed her.  The area was nice, but located in a Mormon community, in a dry (no Alcohol) town, near the Mornon University.

The place was cute but there was no privacy and it was quite far from the beach- the windows are all open and people are walking around outside and it's right by the garage so you can always hear cars leaving- it was fine for a night and we walked to the Polynesian cultural center which is really close by so that is good if you are looking for a place to stay around there bc there is only one hotel.

We loved our stay at Pammy's Place. The apartment is clean, well stocked and convenient to everywhere we wanted to go. The hostess is helpful. I'll happily stay here again if and when I am back in this area.
Great place! Loved our stay.

Rebakah's place was just what we needed :) I place up at the North Shore so we could be closer to north shore activities. It was great just being able to come and go from the house and literally everything we needed and more was in the home. We had a great time!

We wanted a nice, quiet place to stay...Close to beach and our favorite places on the North Shore.  It was perfect for the two of us.  Everything was nice, clean and comfortable.  We wish we could have had a longer vacation, but are so happy to have found Pammie's Place right in our old neighborhood where we and our family have so many wonderful memories.  I did not want to leave!
Spectacular accommodations!!  Highly recommended. Very comfortable and convenient. Great to be able to save some money by using the kitchen too!!! Love the area!!!

My husband and I stayed here for 7 nights. It was such a great base for exploring the North Shore. Even though the family home is attached, we hardly ever heard any noise from them. Rebekah was great, sending us emails about anything we needed to know as well as answering questions. The home was very clean, and had all the comforts that we needed.

This was a great place to stay.  It was close enough to the beach to walk.  It's not the Ritz, but it's pretty clean and the beds are comfortable.  The kitchen is nice and there are lots of pots and pans.  It's a cofortable all around place to stay for the money.  Becca is nice and helpful too:)
.

Wir haben das meist so vorgefunden, wie es beschrieben war. Nur Strandutensilien konnten wir nicht wie beschrieben vorfinden. Letztendlich haben wir uns aber sehr wohl gefühlt und die Zeit sehr genossen. Vielen Dank

It's a great place to stay. It was our first airbnb and my wife commented several times how happy she was we choose the area we were in and that it was WAY better than a hotel... And my wife is pretty smart, I'd take her word on it

My husband and I had a great two night stay here. It's a good location with lots of beaches a short drive away. The apartment was clean and quiet, and everything was as described. Rebekah even had beach chairs that we were able to borrow and left a list of tips for things to do in the area. Overall a great spot!
Great location! The place was clean and very spacious.

We had a great stay at Pammy's place. It is in walking distance to the Polynesian Cultural Center and a short drive away from North Shore beaches and fruit stands. They have great beach toys (we enjoyed SUP, surf, and hammocks) available for rent at a very reasonable price and both Bekah and her husband were helpful with reccomendations for which beaches were best for each type of activity. It was perfect for our family with 2 young kids and we would stay there again.

Loved the location. Wished I had more days to feel like a local here. 
Enjoyed our stay, however brief.
Fantastic location next to Polynesian Cultural Center. Convenient to Northshore and it's beautiful beaches.
Just as advertised! Two blocks from a gorgeous beach. Quiet neighborhood. Extremely clean and nicely appointed.
The rental was just what we were looking for: away from Waikiki and a place that feels like home. Rebekah was very nice and was available during our stay with any questions we had.

This place is listed as accurate as can be. Clean, well equipped, and walking distance to the clearest watered beach we saw on Oahu. Perfect for a couple or small group or family that wants to get away from the city/waikiki vibes and just hang on the beach all day. Very close to grocery stores and food trucks, and across the street from the Polynesian Cultural Center. Rebekah provided clear directions, and had a helpful binder with suggestions for food and activities. 

Tips for the area:
- This is a Mormon community. They don't serve nor sell alcohol in the area. Closest was Tamura's market a few minutes drive south.  They also barely serve coffee anywhere, so we walked over to the Courtyard Marriott across the street to get our morning dose of lattes.
- Eating out. There really aren't any sit down restaurants in the neighborhood. All food trucks, or casual/take-out type places. All of these are good, but if you want to have a nice dinner with drinks, you'll have to drive up to Turtle Bay (15mins north). 
- Beaches. The beach across the street had the clearest and calmest waters we saw during out trip. AND, barely anyone around. The softest/white sand beach we went to was Waimanalo which is about an hour South of Laie. We attempted Lanikai, but there was a crowd and they don't allow parking in the area on the weekends, so we skipped it.
The apartment is very walkable for the area! The beach access across the street is easy and beautiful beaches!!!!

Great place, very spacious even for four people. Close to BYU campus and a short drive to other attractions. The only downside was how stuffy it got inside, but with the air conditioning its not bad at all. Plus being on an island you pretty much expect really warm temperatures. We loved our stay here and would definitely stay again in the future! :)
Perfect Location for our daughter's College Graduation (BYUH)

Pammy's place was as Rebekah described. Clean and functional. 30min drive to most of the north shore attractions with the Polynesian Cultural Centre around the corner. Rebekah was friendly and helpful throughout our stay. Good choice if you want a clean and comfortable stay at a good price.
It was really comfy, cozy home :) I stayed Rebekah's home with my father. It was good to stay! But airconditioner is little bit noisy. That's the only thing I don't like.

This is a great location if you're looking for a place right in the middle of all of the great beaches on the Windward side. Rebekah was a great host, and we felt like part of the family, especially when we were greeted by her dogs  while drinking our beers in the backyard. Her husband even shared some papayas with us that he picked from their tree! It's also the perfect location if you want to visit the Polynesian Culture Center, because it's right across the street.
Very clean and spacious.  Walking distance to PCC.  Location was great!
We loved staying here during our trip!

Bel endroit tranquille. Nous avons tout ce dont nous avons besoin. L'appartement est près du polynesian cultural center (endroit à voir...), ce qui rend le retour facile chez-soi facile après le show ( 2 minutes). Laie est un village pittoresque et il y a de belles plages à voir assez près. Merci à Rebekah pour son hospitalité.

Laie is a very special place.
Pammy's is incredible. Clean, quiete and rich of all comodities.
Great area. So close to the beach shopping and food. We were greeted as soon as we got off the car. Very friendly people.
Good base to check out the North Shore. Walking distance to PCC and Foodland (+some shops). Short drive to other areas in the North Shore including various food trucks and beaches.

Beautiful spot in Laie right by the Polynesian Cultural Center.  Very clean and comfortable. Close to BYU and the LDS temple. Nice kitchen too-Rebekah was very easy to work with-so nice to be on the gorgeous quieter north shore...
Great location. Foodland nearby and easy to explore north shore.

the house is right beside polynesian cultural centre and you can hear the sounds coming from there during the day. That's how close it is but the noise didn't bother us. The house was clean and tidy. Lots of things for you to use- snorkelling equipments, surf boards, beach umbrellas, beach towels and etc. To our surprise, there were beers and apples in the fridge too lol! The info book  contained some great tips when travelling in the north shore. We didn't get to speak with the owners much but did get to meet their dog Maggie. The only small complaint I have was that the a/c was quite loud as it was an old machine. I'm a light sleeper but luckily i brought ear plugs so i was able to fall asleep.
Perfect place. Clean, can walk to the beach, PCC, BYU-H, and had beach toys. Owner was on hand when needed, and responded to all emails. Mahalo.

The place was clean and bigger than we expected. It's in a quiet are and a 2 minute walk to a nearly secluded beach. Granted our visit was in September but it was the quietest beach we saw on the island. We would absolutely stay there again!

This place is great. The hosts are kind and helpful. The unit was clean, spacious, and comfortable and the location is ideal, easily the best place on the island to experience some of the amazing stuff Oahu has to offer. Also, if you don't know about it, they have some great rentals available. My wife and I rented their two seater kayak for a day and had a blast. It was convenient (could fit in the trunk of a car) and easy to use. We will definitely stay at Rebekah's place again on our next visit.

Perfect location to explore the north shore. Easy acces with bus. 
Clean and cozy apartment, and nice hostess. 
Only thing we needed, was some outdoor space.

Pammy's Place was perfect for us. Great location by the beach, close to the local grocery store, and great places to eat nearby. Rebekah had boogie boards and snorkeling gear we could use throughout the week. Her recommendations of the best beaches and places to eat were spot on. Loved our stay!

Pammy’s perfect place! It was exactly what we were hoping for. Quiet, clean, walking distance to the beach, and close to everything we wanted to see and do while we were in Hawaii. We spent most of our trip on the north shore. Thanks for perfect place to stay!

Great place close to the beach that was not crowded.  Loved being able to also purchase and cook some of our own food instead of always having to eat out.  The binder that was provided was also very helpful as it has some tips of places to do grocery shopping, places to eat, and places to explore.  Bekah (the host), and her husband were both very helpful and easy to get a hold of when we needed help.  If we ever end up in Oahu again we will definitely plan to stay here.
Great place to stay on the north shore!

Rebekah’s is really awesome. She was very helpful in answering any questions and giving us ideas of things to do. 
Thanks Rebekah!
We felt very at home here, and the place was spotlessly clean. Highly recommended!

Great location and spacious space that easily fit our family of four.  She had toys for the kids when we checked it which was greatly appreciated to keep the kids occupied.  Pammy's Place also had a variety of beach equipment to borrow or rent (surfboards and roof racks are rented but are very reasonable priced).  

The Polynesian Cultural Center is also right across the street from this house so if you are planning a day there, this place makes it really convenient after a long day at the Cultural Center.

I stopped here overnight as was the perfect location for breaking a two day cycle ride around Oahu. Great place, was as described and a short walk to beach, local shops and a variety of food options. That was essential for me as was only cycling with a small backpack. Prompt responses and good tips re dinner etc

Pammy’s place was a great local spot to stay! It’s on the same street as BYU Hawaii and the Polynesian Culture Center. There are a lot of local beaches that were never busy and we usually had it to ourselves. The kitchen was loaded with everything we need. We loved it!
Great location close to Polynesian Cultural Center, hiking and the beach. The apartment was way bigger than expected. Thanks again.

An excellent and accommodating host !

Great location and have a well-equipped place to make us feel at home away from home.

Loved the short walk to the beach to watch the beautiful sunrise.
We loved this place! Great value & we would book again. Laie & the North Shore are a fabulous place to vacation.
Fantastic house, I really love the laid-back neighborhood and proximity to a nice beach.

Apartment exactly as described, except for the washer and dryer situation.  It appears to be a shared washer/dryer and it was disgusting!  Moldy fruit on the washer.  Many evenings the washer or dryer were unavailable which was inconvenient as most days we were out and about all day.
Rebekah is a very nice and considerate host. Her place is spacious and the location is decent. The down side is that the room is not very clean, there was a strong mold odor.
We really enjoyed our stay at Rebekah's place.  It was clean, quiet, and within walking distance to a beach.  We would stay there again.

We really enjoyed our stay at Rebekah's place. The apartment was exactly as described and shown in the picture and good enough to spend the night, take a bath and prepare breakfast in the morning. 

Rebekah was very responsive since the day I booked the apartment and through all our stay in Hawaii. The location is really good if you are planning to visit the north part of the island. It is a block away from the Polynesian Cultural Center, which is highly recommended to visit. However if your plan is to visit the south or south east of the island you may consider to look for another place. We rented a car and to go from south to north usually takes around 1 hr 30 min.

The place is quite and even when you need to share washer and dryer with the family the whole family was very nice and always willing to help us.

The apartment was clean and well stocked and the beds were comfortable.  The location is great if your want to visit the Polynesian Culture Center, also good for stores etc.  There are a few items that I feel should be repaired that I have suggested privately.  If that's done I would say it's perfect and a great value.

I love how Rebecca asked us how old are children to make sure that there was though propria toys for them. The decor in the room in the bathrooms are so homely. The location was perfect for us cuz everything is so close. Definitely would stay here again. This was one of the greatest staycations we had yet.

Rebekah's home is located in a quiet, conservative area of the island. We were staying at various sides during our Oahu trip, so it was nice to experience this part before Waikiki. Her family lives there and there was noise from cars coming and going, laundry being done, dog barking, but that was not unexpected or annoying.

Location, while out of the bustle,  was still convenient to many beaches and hiking. Grocery and restaurant options were limited and had more chain offerings. We didn't care since we cooked many meals while staying here. The kitchen was very well stocked with cooking supplies. Bathroom offered clean towels and soaps. Rebekah's place offered everything needed for a home away from home. She had legos out for my kids, which they didn't want to stop playing with - even with world famous beaches beckoning. 

My biggest issue with this place was the smell. It had such a strong moldy, mildew smell upon arrival. We opened windows to air out a bit but it made for a disappointing stay to an otherwise great property.  The pillows and upholstery were pretty offensive to me and husband (who does not have a very good sense of smell). Were we staying longer than two nights, we would have taken a loss and moved to another property or hotel.
Our stay worked out great.  We were close enough to walk to the beach, the PCC and also the LDS temple.  It was a short drive to the North shore and many sites that we wanted to see.
몇일동안 지내기에는 딱 적당했습니다! 학교에서 가깝다는게 가장 큰 장점이었죠. 시설은 그냥 그럭저럭 했어요. 에어컨이 생각했던것만큼 시원하지 않아서 조금 실망스러웠습니다ㅠ
Very spacious and attractive suite.  Comfortable beds. Close to places I wanted to go.

Pammy’s Place is perfect for a stay on the north shore. The place has everything you need to ensure a comfortable stay. We made use of the surf, snorkel and other beach equipment during our week there. The location was very convenient, the beds were super comfortable and the place was spotless when we arrived. Couldn’t ask for a better place to stay on Oahu.

We were only there for one night as we needed to be in an event in BYU in the morning. This place is super close to BYU and Polynesian Cultural Center. You could walk to both places and you can also walk to the beach. 

Pammy's place is just as described! The stove is gas (awesome)!! And TV is via chrome which worked out perfect for us because we have the same at home. We were able to cast our YouTubeTV to watch the NBA finals, then Netflix to watch Coco. Bekah (the host) has instructions on how to use it in the binder on the table, along with recommendations on where to go (beach, groceries, restaurants, etc). She also has recommendation on family photography! Check in and check out was very easy. ACs were useful in the summer afternoons. Beds were comfortable. Overall a great place to stay if you need to be in Laie/Kahuku area (and it's cheaper than the Marriott by PCC)!!

Loved staying here. We used to live in Laie and staying at this house was like coming home. The family is very quiet. Rebekah was very responsive when I messaged her from 7 months ago until after we checked out. She was very helpful and accommodating.

Beautiful beaches, privacy and convenience
Will stay again if come back to Laie
Host was not very friendly.1st and last time I will stay in a airbnb.
The host canceled this reservation 14 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This home is the perfect location for those looking to escape the hustle and bustle of Waikiki. Located conveniently next to PCC, BYU, and the Hawaii Temple this home is also a short drive to many North Shore beaches and sites. Rebekah was very friendly and made check in a breeze. The home was very clean and having a full kitchen was very nice. The A/C was enough to keep the rooms cool and we were very comfortable. Clean linens for all the sleeping spaces, plenty of towels in the bathroom, and even provided beach towels which was extra great because we forgot ours. The included use of beach chairs, umbrella, and beach toys was awesome and trust me very useful! They also have a nice variety of surfboards and body boards you can rent. Rebekah and her family live on the premises but you'd never know it as they were very quiet and respectful. They were helpful and accommodating to find a solution to an extra need we had that came up. They really are good people and very welcoming. Rebekah's place was spacious which is a nice change from staying in crowded hotel rooms and I highly recommend it.
Great location!
Can’t beat the location! Great place to explore the surrounding areas! Apartment was clean and cozy.

Pammy’s Place was perfect for our stay in Laie. It was extremely convenient. Within walking distance of the beach, PCC, LDS Temple, restraunts and grocery store. Plenty of room. The kitchen was fully stocked. Availability of the washer and drier was great.  The portable AC units were wonderful! The best (Hidden by Airbnb) we have found for the price in Laie! We will definitely be back!
Great place to stay if wanting to be in Laie. Very clean and if you want to eat in, a full kitchen available. Spacious too so definitely better than staying in a hotel.

This home is clean and easy to find. Located in a quiet neighborhood. Plenty of towels, which was a huge bonus. A quick walk from the beach. The washer and dryer access was so nice especially because we packed light. I highly recommend Pammy’s Place!!
We had a great time.  Rebekah is a great host and is helpful with anything you need.  Great location as our boys couldn't get enough of the beach.
The host canceled this reservation 87 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Pammy's place was the best place to stay! 

It was very clean, spacious, beautiful, and the location was very convenient for me and my husband! 

With Rebekah living next door, it was so convenient! She's got the Aloha spirit and she's kind and friendly! 

We'll definitely stay here again! 

Thank you Rebekah!
Rebekah’s place was great for our stay!

Rebekah was a great host. Her place had all that we needed and was located conveniently near the beach, PCC, BYU, grocery stores maybe a little too close to McDonalds, my kids wanted to go there every day! Had a great time here and it was great value for money.
Thank you for the value ,would definatly stay again

We couldn’t beat the price and location with this airbnb! It was homey and had its own little quirks and charms, and our family really enjoyed staying here. We loved being able to cook and play games and watch movies in our down time. Great hosts!
Great location and great value!

Great location, so clean, and a good place for a small family or couple. My only problem and it is a big problem was her grandchildren living with her and the noise. They have quiet hours but the kids are up early and playing and screaming loudly and we felt like we had no privacy at all. Kind of disappointed

Excellent location. Across the street from the PCC. Near the ocean, Temple and BYUH. It was very clean and had everything you need for a great stay. We recommend seven brothers burgers (get the cowboy) and Ted's bakery. Easy check-in and out.
Nice place To stay in north shore. Near the pcc, beaches and a small shopping Center. Very comfy and clean.

Great place to stay in Laie. The apartment is so close to PCC, church and shops. The families who live on the property were so nice and helpful and the apartment itself is a great little home away from home.
Quaint and comfortable. Definitely recommend for 2.

Pammy's Place was comfortable, spacious, and great location If planning to visit the Polynesian Cultural Center, BYU campus and Mormon Temple. Laie Shopping Center, Laie Point (Laie), Tamura's Market, Papa Ole's Kitchen (Hauula) and Giovanni Shrimp Truck (Kahuku) minutes drive away. Highly recommend Pammy's Place. Aloha.

Great house! Loved it! Nicely decorated, spotless clean!!...full kitchen with everything you need! Nice beds, comfortable bathroom with lots of extra touches!
Nice neighborhood near markets and stores.
Thanks again Rebekah!
Hope to return!
Nice place to stay and the host was quick to respond when we have questions about different things.
Stay here if you know what’s good for you.

Great value for money and super hospital.  Clean, organized, and great access to a variety of excursions.  Super friendly hosts and felt very welcome.  My only advice would be to buy groceries in Honolulu before you head north as the local groceries are expensive. I found Target in Waikiki around 1/3 the cost.
Great location, very clean and spacious.  If your looking for a spot with the local vibe and away from the big city, Pammy's place is where you need to stay.
Excellent place and location on in Laie. No complaints whatsoever.

Great location since it is within walking distance of most of the activities in La’ie.  Great communication with a very smooth check-in checkout process.  This space easily accommodated 4 adults with our family.. A wonderful budget find for our north shore stay on Oahu.  Thanks Rebekah!
Rebekahs place is in a great location between beaches food and entertainment. It's a nice quiet place away from the hustle and bustle.

name: D&S - Porto Theater Apartment
summary: A comfortable and warm apartment, thats been completly renovated in 2015. It’s situated in the historic center of Porto behind the Municipal St John Theater, between Main Square “Aliados” and “Praça da Batalha”. Close to services and transports.
space: This modern apartment has 2 bedrooms one with a double bed and the other with two single bed’s. The living room has one sleeping couch that accommodates 2 persons. It has a complete toilet with shower. The kitchen has a fridge, a stove, an oven and a microwave.  The apartment is perfect for 4 persons, but has also a big sleeping couch in the living room for 2 more, accommodating a total of 6 persons.
description: A comfortable and warm apartment, thats been completly renovated in 2015. It’s situated in the historic center of Porto behind the Municipal St John Theater, between Main Square “Aliados” and “Praça da Batalha”. Close to services and transports. This modern apartment has 2 bedrooms one with a double bed and the other with two single bed’s. The living room has one sleeping couch that accommodates 2 persons. It has a complete toilet with shower. The kitchen has a fridge, a stove, an oven and a microwave.  The apartment is perfect for 4 persons, but has also a big sleeping couch in the living room for 2 more, accommodating a total of 6 persons. The guests have access to the entire apartment. I give the guests my email and phone number and ill be accessible during your stay. 3 minutes walk from Sao Bento Train Station/Subway Station and Taxi stop. If you come by plane, I can arrange transport from the airport directly to the apartment  for a fixed price. If you need it contact me via e-mai
transit: 3 minutes walk from Sao Bento Train Station/Subway Station and Taxi stop. If you come by plane, I can arrange transport from the airport directly to the apartment  for a fixed price. If you need it contact me via e-mail.
access: The guests have access to the entire apartment.
interaction: I give the guests my email and phone number and ill be accessible during your stay.
house_rules: During your stay, if anything happens you can contact me at any time to fix whatever problem there might be.

host.host_about:
Hi, I’m Diogo Silva and I was born in the heart of Porto city, 24 years ago. Airplanes and flying have always been my biggest passions, that’s why i love travelling.

I’m looking forward to welcoming you in this awesome city!

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Diogo nos recibió estupendamente nada más llegar, a la hora que habíamos quedado, y con una grata sorpresa de bienvenida, Con un delicioso vino de Oporto, unos dulces y galletas para los cinco, todo un detalle de su parte. También teníamos a disposición información turística con planos de Oporto algo que se agradece mucho. El apartamento tal como en las fotos muy moderno y acogedor, las camas muy cómodas y todo muy limpio, con todo lo necesario para nuestra estancia. El apartamento está muy bien ubicado, bajando la calle ya nos encontrábamos en la Catedral y con una boca de metro cerca. No tuvimos ningun problema en aparcar. Diogo en todo momento  fue muy atento, pendiente de lo que necesitáramos. El wifi con muy buena señal. Nos sentimos muy a gusto en el apartamento. Gracias Diogo por haber hecho nuestra estancia agradable, en tu ciudad.

Una muy buena opción para pasar unos días y visitar Porto en familia.
El apartamento muy nuevo, limpio, espacioso y bien comunicado. 
El anfitrión, Diogo, muy amable, atento y simpático.
De agradecer el detalle de bienvenida y sus indicaciones para aparcar y movernos por la cuidad.
Gracias por una estancia inmejorable!!

I can just say positive things about our stay in Porto in Diogo´s place. The apartment looks just like the photos, everything new and clean and the location is exceptional, right in the middle of the city center. Diogo was there 24/7 for anything that could happen even after we left Porto and he greeted us with local products on the first day. They were delicious! I would recommend this place 100%

The apartment is amazing and looks like the pictures. The location is very good near to metro and train stations. Diogo was very attentive and friendly and pointed us in places to go eat and walk. I would recommend this apartment.

Simplismente "muito bom". Diogo sa come accogliere i propri ospiti e come metterli al proprio agio. L'appartamento è interamente ristrutturato, accogliente, pulito e molto moderno. La posizione è centralissima e tranquilla allo stesso tempo.  Abbiamo trovato l'appartamento davvero straordinario.

Superbe séjour ! L'appartement est très bien situé et il y a tout ce qu'il faut dedans! 
Diogo est toujours disponible pour n'importe quelle question sur la ville ou le logement, vraiment très amical c'est appréciable. 
Je recommande cet appartement.

We really enjoyed our short stay at Diogos place. Perfectly located for exploring the city it is clean, comfortable and well equipped with everything you will need for your stay. Diogo made us feel very welcome. He was extremely helpful and gave us a great explanation of what to see in Porto and how to get there.
Todo perfecto!!

Chegamos ao apartamento pela estação são Bento e a subida da ladeira com as malas foi tranquila (mas talvez não fosse para quem carrega duas malas, por exemplo). O local é agravem, amplo, muito limpo e com bons equipamentos (chuveiro quente, secador de cabelos, forno elétrico muito bons). Um dos quartos não tem janelas para o lado externo, mas nisso não vi problemas já que há uma janela que o liga por cima ao outro - assim se garante iluminação natural e ventilação.  O Diogo nos recepcionou com agrados de vinho do Porto e pastéis de nata, bem como nos indicou vários locais interessantes para se conhecer na cidade como, por exemplo, a livraria lello e a bolsa do porto. Em suma, um apartamento muito agradável e bem localizado, logo atrás do teatro são João,  tornando a cidade antiga de fácil acessibilidade.

Diogo's place is perfectly located in the heart of Porto. Just a few minutes to lots of great places in this beautiful city. You can walk almost everywhere. When we arrived Diogo welcomed us with some Pastels de Nata and a great 10 years old Port Wine. He explained us in detail which places to visit. His flat is brand new - in a renewed building. I can totally recommend his flat to anyone.

We stayed at Diogo's apartment for two days and it was an excellent experience. The apartment is lovely and exactly what we were expecting. This was an amazing experience for us!  We were more than 3 hours late from the agreed time due to a lack of GPS and even so Diego welcomed us very well, in a very polite way and helped us with general tips of the city. The apartment is gorgeous, nicely decorated, recently renovated and clean. It has everything you need for a nice stay. The location of the apartment is good, around 900 mts from the river and very close to Sé Cathedral, a must see point in the city. Overall a great stay! I truly recommend the stay with him. Thanks Diogo.

We spend 2 nights in Porto and we had a great time and a nice and clean apartment. Diogo is a friendly and reliable host and he told us interesting things about the city with the option, to contact him at any time for further questions. The apartment is clean and comfortable and right in the centre of Porto. From there we walked to anywhere we wanted to go. Thank you and best wishes!
Diogo's apartment was perfect. It was in a great location, not far from the centre. Diogo was extremely helpful and organised taxis for us. Would highly recommend this apartment.

The pictures of the apartment were a true reflection of reality. It was exactly as the pictures showed! It was clean and tidy and the kitchen was well equiped. The apartment was spacious and had very good wifi. It was located close to all important sights of Porto.
Diogo was easy to connect with. He responded very quickly to our questions through e-mail or (Hidden by Airbnb) . He gave us good instructions about how to reach the apartment. He was personally welcoming us and informed us about the apartment and give us very useful information about sightseeing in Porto. He took his time to inform us. Diogo has a hospitable and warm personality. We (3 girls) thought he was very charming :-) By the way, his English is very good, which made it easy to talk to each other.
The apartment was very pleasant and accurately described. The location is great and so is the host which did more then necessary to make us fill at home. Thank you very much Diogo

Estuvimos en el apartamento un fin de semana de tres días. Situación ideal, muy céntrico, prácticamente al lado de la catedral. Sin ruidos y muy acogedor. Diago nos atendió muy amablemente, en seguida nos situó en un mapa lo imprescindible que teníamos que visitar y nos acogió con un vino de Oporto y unos pastelitos de Belem, un detallazo! También nos ofreció el servicio de José para ir a recogernos al aeropuerto, e ir al barrio de Foz de Douro y desde allí al aeropuerto para la marcha. Sin duda alguna, volveremos a vernos Diogo!!

Diogo fue encantador y se ofreció en todo momento para lo que necesitáramos. Las fotos se ajustan totalmente a la realidad. El apartamento,muy limpio y cómodo, está en pleno centro de Oporto, con los puntos de interés a visitar a muy pocos minutos a pie. Sin duda, para recomendar.

Diogo was very nice and the house was clean, beautiful and well decorated. It has wifi and television, which is great if you want to chill for little while. We also had welcome goodies, that was a very nice touch :) Overall it was a good stay, would do it again.

Flat is conform with the description, cozy, clean and calm. It is very well located, in the historic city, near of Ponte Luis. Diogo welcomes us very well, with good advice, usefull description of the city and good Porto wine. I highly recommend !

Diogo is absolutely the most professional and welcoming host I have ever met. We arrived Porto quite late in the night and got a bit lost on our way. Not only did he patiently waited us but he also explained everything in the house in detail. He gave us a lot of useful tourism and route information. The flat is amazing, with perfect location and is very clean and bright.
It is a pity that we did not properly say goodbye to Diogo since we wrongly estimated the time traveling to airport but he showed us the way to grab a taxi and even gave me a follow-up call to check if we managed to get to the airport.
Overall, it was definitely an awesome experience in Porto.
Thanks a lot!

Eu e minha familia fomos muito recebidos pelo Diogo, ele fez questão  de nos receber, ele nos deu todas as informações necessairias sobre o funcionamento do apartamento e dicas da Cidade do Porto. O apartamento é bem como mostra as fotos, espaçoso, confortavel, limpo, salas de banho, 2 quartos, cozinha equipada sofa cama na sala e totalmente equipado. Fica localizado no centro historico do Porto, onde pode ser percorrido tudo a pé, local formidavel, area central do Porto e por isso fica muito bem localizado, com area comercial por perto, restaurantes, farmacia, supermercado, etc.
Recomendo este apartamento que cabe 6 pessoas.
Agradeço ao Diogo pela receptividade e prestatividade impar.
Adoramos tudo.
Muito obrigado.
Daniel Ricardo

Very nice apartment for up to 6 persons, however best suits just 4. Quiet surroundings, although located on the ground floor. The second bedroom is without direct sunlight so a bit dark and not ventilated enough. Close to most important touristic places.
In one word: great!
And Diogo, the owner, is a master of hospitality:-)

Diogo's apartment was, as you can see in the pictures, nice, cosy, clean and comfortable. It is loacated in the city centre, next to the train station and it was really easy to visit Porto from there. It was such a nice weekend!

Logement parfait très bien situé au centre du vieux Porto, idéal pour visiter la ville, tout est proche et vous pouvez tout faire à pied.Juste un petit point négatif:L'appartement est un  peu sombre. Hôte très accueillant, à l'écoute et toujours disponible, Merci Diego pour les conseils  et pour le pot de bienvenu. 

Perfect accommodation conveniently located in the center of the Old Porto, ideal to visit the city and everything is close to the apartment. Just 1 negative point, the flat is a little bit dark. Host very welcoming, attentive and always available, Diego Thanks for the advices.
The apartment is really great, we all love it. And it's near the train station , easy to go anywhere. The host is nice and helpful. Highly recommended.

We've been in the apartement for 5 days with 4 person. It was very clean and we had everything we needed. The apartement is very central and near to the attractions of Porto. We had a great time. Thank you Diogo and hope to see you again

Diogo was an excellent host, who made us feel more than welcome in this property. He showed us all the aspects of the property thoroughly and in detail, as well as highlighting the best things to do in the city. Would definitely recommend!
He is a very nice landlord who will answer our problem immediately and also introduced Porto to us very clearly. The house is very lovely and clean, I think everyone will love there!

The host is very friendly and helped us along with our trip in Porto. The house is very clean and I really enjoyed the stay a lot!! 
Thank you!

Our stay at Diogo's place was very smooth. Diogo has been very kind and hospitable -  we arrived one hour late due to a bad accident just outside Porto and Diogo was very patient. We also found a welcome drink and some treats!
The flat is in a great location, only 5 minute walk from the bridge Luiz I, you can walk everywhere and don't need to use any public transportation.
I would say that the flat is perfect for 4 people, with the two bedrooms and the shared bathroom. The kitchen is fully equipped (even washing up liquid) and the bathroom has all you need.

My friends and I got a decent experience staying there. Not only Diogo is helpful, but the location is good to access to most tourist attractions by walk. Tube station is also quite near to the apartment, so it is really convenient for tourists to explore Porto. 
The only tiny shortcoming is that ventilation is not good enough. Apart from the drawback, every thing is perfect.

Eu e meus amigos tivemos uma ótima experiência. O Diogo não pode nos receber, mas o Felipe nos recebeu da melhor forma possível. Explicou tudo sobre o apartamento, deu dicas sobre a cidade e os arredores e ainda nos deixou alguns "mimos".

O apartamento é exatamente como nas fotos, moderno, limpo, com ótima localização e hospedou confortavelmente 5 pessoas. O chuveiro é ótimo e as camas também. Até o sofá cama é muito confortável.

É com certeza uma opção perfeita para se hospedar no Porto.

Diogo was a fantastic host. He was very accommodating when we arrived on a late flight and left us some delicious egg tarts and port to enjoy! The flat is incredibly central, steps away from anywhere you'd like to go in Porto and easy to get to by metro from the airport. I highly recommend this apartment and Diogo is an all-star host.
Appartement sympathique et bien situé, Diogo est un hôte disponible et très sérieux, je vous recommande vivement cet appartement si vous avez l'envie de visiter Porto.

Our stay at Diogo's place was amazing. The place has a perfect location and everything you need. 
We were a little cold at first but Diogo was very caring and provide us with little heaters. 
Diogo is definitely a perfect host  I completely recommend!

Notre séjour chez Diogo a été vraiment super. L'appartement est idéalement situé dans la ville, et dispose de tout ce dont on peut avoir besoin! 
Nous avons eu un peu froid au début, mais Diogo a été très attentionné et nous a apporté  des petits appareils de chauffage. Diogo est un hôte parfait, je recommande vivement!
Une bouteille de Porto avec des gateaux nata à notre arrivée
petit cadeaux de bienvenu

L appartement est nickel et surtout super bien situé!!! En plein coeur du centre historique on peut faire de nombreuses visites a pied... Diogo a répondu a tous mes messages avant de partir et a toutes nos questions sur place,il a été très accueillant et de bons conseils .en prime  un petit cadeau de bienvenue très agréable a notre arrivée tardive!!! A louer sans hésitations!!!! Ha oui pour finir très bonne literie pour chaque couchage en deux mots parfait!!!!

Diogo war immer hilfbereit wenn ich Fragen hatte. War pünktlich in der Wohnung zur Schlüsselübergabe. Auf uns wartete eine Flasche Portwein und 4 pasteis de nata als Begrüßung. Die Wohnung war sehr zentral, sauber, sehr geschmackvoll eingerichtet und für 4 Personen ausreichend groß. Es hat uns nichts gefehlt. Diogo hat sich sogar um ein Taxi für die sehr frühe Fahrt zum Flughafen gekümmert. Würde auf jeden Fall nochmal die Wohnung nehmen.

Diogo est un hôte très accueillant et de bon conseil, là pour nous attendre malgré notre arrivée tardive. Son appartement est très propre et confortable, idéalement situé, à quelques minutes à pied des centres d'intérêt et des lieux de sortie. Je retiens cette adresse pour un prochain dans cette très belle ville !
Everything was perfect, the falt is really great and Diogo is very helpful, he gave us good advice to visit the city :) Thank you for all!

Le logement est idéalement situé pour découvrir porto 
Rue calme proche des transports et des commerces.
Nous etions 4 dont 2 enfants appartement bien équipé.
Notre hôte  n'était pas présent mais nous avons été accueilli par tiago super sympa et de très bon conseil.

This has been a great experience for us: great location, welcoming host, comfortable and fully equipped home. The host, Diogio acommodated all our requests including sorting out a parking for us, and welcomed us with home wine and pastries. He even followed up on us after. Thumbs up for this!

Nous avons été très bien accueilli par Diogo. Une petite carafe de Porto et des petits gâteaux, spécialité de Porto, nous attendaient.
Les photos de l'appartement ne sont pas trompeuses. Cet appartement est très propre et surtout il est idéalement situé : assez près du centre ville tout en étant dans une rue très calme.
Appartement très bien situé, à coté du quartier historique de Porto. Accueil chaleureux, avec de nombreux conseil sur la ville.

This apartment was unique. A small, but amazing place that's located centrally. Multiple times me and my friends were very surprised how close this apartment was to everything. Tools and utensils were provided with little wine cups that were very cute. The only problem we had was forgetting to close the window that made it very noisy in the morning. Closing the window would dramatically reduce noise levels so that is a reminder for future guests. The apartment was clean and cozy. Highly recommended for a group of 4-5.

Diogo and his partner Salvador welcome my family very warmy. The apartment has  the perfect space, decoration and amenities. I highly recommend anyone to book this aparment when staying in Porto. Also main streets are 5 min away by walking. 

Diogo/Salvador, thanks for hosting us in a such warm way. 
See you!
Nous sommes partis entre filles, l'appartement est génial et idéalement placé. Un grand merci à Diogo pour son accueil et tous les bons plans sur la ville. J'y retournerai avec grand plaisir.
We felt welcomed and all our questions  were answered!

The apartment was nice however we had an issue with the host. After our stay he called us to say we had left the key in the door (which we are positive we didn't do) and demanded we pay to have the door lock replaced, suggesting we settle outside of Airbnb. We refused and he said he'd go through Airbnb. He didn't end up charging us as far as I know but it really soured our holiday. It was quite unprofessional and disappointing as his reviews had been so good.

The place is wonderful and in the very center of the city. So you just have to get out of the apartement and in five minutes' walk you'll be at one of the city's curosities. 
The apartement is wonderfully made and I was really amazed to see how fully the spear space  was used. It's very spacious and illuminated. The windows on the first floor gives a lot of light, although strangers from the street can't see you. Take it without thinking.
The host is very helpful and always ready to contact.

We arrived super late and Diogo was still there to greet us upon our arrival at 0130.  He also arranged our transportation from the airport. There was a bottle of homemade Port awaiting us and he took time to answer questions and provide information about Porto.  Very pleased with our stay in Porto! The apartment is in a great location.

The apartment is centrally located and well equipped. Walking distance from main attractions. We got the keys from Diogo's friend and got a bit of misunderstanding about the check-out which caused a 10 minute panic when we couldn't find our luggages in the apartment. I think Diogo is managing multiple apartments and it's hard to reach him sometimes.

Séjour en famille très sympa ! Logement et hôte très sympa avec les patisseries et le Porto du cru....fort apprécié. Belle ville où nous avons pu savourer la victoire de Ronaldo et les siens en compagnie de quelques milliers de portugais très chauds!
A conseiller!

Diogo's place is at a very good location to visit Porto. Even without airco, it keeps fresh during hot summer days and it offers the necessary space for a family of 4. Diogo was a good host and easily accessible.
Il nous a bien reçu et était très bienveillant. Néanmoins, petite déception du logement : rire de chaussée, bruyant et humide.
Insgesamt war es ein super Aufenthalt mit einer schönen Wohnung direkt im Herzen von Porto.
Encontramos o apartamento todo limpo e arrumado. O Diogo e o Felipe foram bastante atenciosos. Nos receberam no local combinado e nos forneceram todas as informações necessárias.

Parfait l'emplacement est à côté de tout 
L'appartement correspond au photos pas de surprise 
Des notre arrive Diogo a proposé son aide pour le déchargement de la voiture (bagage)
Nous avons eu le droit à un verre de porto d'ailleurs TRES tres bon puis les pastel de nata 
Je recommande fortement !!!

The house is very well placed, near the city center and close to the São Bento train and metro stations. All the main attractions and historical places are just a few minutes away walking. The house was really clean and organized. Is equal to the pictures. Diogo is a very cool guy and he left some typical Portuguese pastries (pastel de nata) and some Porto wine as welcome gifts. Really Recommend!

The appartment is a great place to stay in Porto- Very central, everything there that you need. Diogo is nice and helpful and helped us find the place.  We had a great weekend in Porto and walked everywhere we needed to go. The only negative point is the bathroom that will be fixed soon. There was a humidity problem and right now there is mold in the shower. As soon as that is fixed I can recommend the place.

Es war ein sehr schöner Aufenthalt in Diogos Apartment. Die Wohnung ist groß, geräumig und total zentral gelegen - nahe Restaurants und der großen bekannten Shopping Straße. Die Wohnung war sehr sauber. Aufgrund der hohen Feuchtigkeit besteht in Porto allgemein ein Problem mit Schimmel. Im Badezimmer waren einige wenige Stelen, die vom Schimmel betroffen waren, aber Diogo hat sie direkt entfernen lassen. Er war wirklich sehr zuvorkommend und ein sehr guter Gastgeber. Wir würden diese Wohnung auf jeden Fall weiter empfehlen und dort noch einmal übernachten. Es lohnt sich.

Diogo was incredibly helpful and easily contactable. He met us at the property and let us leave our bags as we arrived on an early flight. The apartment was as listed and perfect for a city break. Short walking distance to Sao Bento train station and all tourist sites. Diogo was also on hand to recommend restaurants and things to do. We would thoroughly recommend staying here!
Foi muito bom, localização excelente. Todos nós indicamos.

The apartment is in great location! It is close to everything. Diogo is very nice and helpful, provided us useful travel tips and delicious Port wine and pastry. We had a great time in Porto.
公寓的地点非常好!就在古城内,离各种景点很近,步行就能前往｡房东人很不错,给了不少有用建议,还送我们喝波尔图酒和蛋挞｡对了,在公寓附近有家小餐馆,可以看到很赞的法多表演｡

Diogo's apartment is closed to the center of the (Website hidden by Airbnb) near the train station.The place is quiet and convenience.Diogo prepared some wine and snacks for us.He and his partner are nice guy.Everything is lovely.
O Diogo foi extremamente solícito e nos atendeu com bastante gentileza. O apartamento é ótimo, muito bem localizado e muito limpo. Adoramos a estadia.
GREAT PLACE!!!
Bem localizado
Diogo e Salvador ajudaram em tudo o que precisamos e foram muito compreensíveis. Quando voltar ao porto já sei onde vou ficar! Tudo ocorreu perfeitamente.
Very centrally located in the heart of Porto. You can walk to almost all the view points of Porto.

Appartement plutôt frais voire froid et humide nous avons allumé sans cesse les radiateurs, plutôt propre et bien équipé. Déçu cependant de l'accueil de Diogo qui avait oublier notre venu malgres un contact la veille et d'un manque d'information sur la ville et les environs. Mais sinon bon séjour
交通便利,但是有點潮濕,除此之外一切都好
Buena ubicación y recepción con una copa de Oporto

Good location, walking distance to main attractions. Soundproof windows do a super job. We were 2 adults and 4 kids from 10 to 16 and there was enough room for us all. Diogo is a great host: helpful and available.

Great location, easy communication with the host. Diogo also provided his parking space, which is indoors, for extra 6 euros - it was really nice of Diogo to offer such services as parking in Porto is a nightmare.

Très bien situé, au centre du quartier historique. Bien équipé, hôte sympathique. Quelques problèmes de moisissures à la salle de bain et bruits indésirables la nuit car bar au rez-de-chaussée...avis aux couche-tôt!
Apartamento situado en un bajo pero bonito, muy cómodo y agradable. Recomendable.

Diago is really helpful and nice, who has given great suggestions for us during our trip in Porto. He also arranged a luggage storage for us. 
His flat is clean and tidy, and it's located at very city center, from which you can walk to the Porto Cathedral within 5 minutes. It's quite near to the Sao Bento train station, which will be easy for travelers who take a trip by train. Highly recommended!
The apartment is very close to sights, which is very good for a family. And the hosts is warm, helping us to keep baggages in the last day before we live.
Diogo est un hôte très accueillant. L'appartement est très bien placé et propre.
Accueil très bien , emplacement de l'appartement très bien situé pour visiter porto tout à pied, seul bémol pas de fenêtre pour aéré.

Good location, very close to 2 metro stations and markets.  Very walkable city except can be hilly at time.
Need good walking shoes.
Location of the place is great and place was clean and spacious.

Très bien placé, fonctionnel. Accueil efficace et agréable.
Mal isolé de l'extérieur cependant.

We loved our stay at Diogo’s apartment. He was very prompt with communication and was so kind to offer us a spot to park our car over night (for additional fee of 6 euro/night). It was a huge help as parking in Porto is difficult. The apartment was clean and location was great! He even had some port waiting for us to try when we arrived. Highly recommend you stay here!

El apartamento es ideal, muy moderno y muy céntrico, esta cerca de todo. La calle es muy tranquila y no hay ningún problema para dormir. El anfitrión encantador y nos recibieron con una copa de Oporto, un detalle increíble. Repetiría sin duda.
Ótima localização, o apartamento era incrível e igual nas fotos e o Diogo nos ajudou no que foi necessário. Super recomendo.
The location is very good. We got some tips and advice from Diogo. The apartment is clean and has everything you need. And thank you for the nice touch of a glass of port wine!

The apartment is nice, very close to streets with shops and cafes. It's very clean and has a decent size with a comfortable living and dining room. The mattresses are a bit thin but that wasn't a problem for us. Diogo was very nice to receive us in person, explain in detail about the apartment and city and hand us a small Christmas gift! Overall I highly recommend this apartment.
Muy céntrico y el anfitrión muy agradable.
foi a nossa 1a vez no Porto. o apartamento tem uma localização optima/central que premite conhecer todos os locais a pé. O Diogo foi extremamente prestável, simpático e srlpre disponível. Adoramos

El apartamento es muy céntrico y puedes ir a pie a todos los sitios. Es un bajo pero sin ruidos y bien aislado. El apartamento es moderno pero se nota que ha sido usado bastante ya que hay pequeños desperfectos debido al uso. Aún así está muy bien y lo recomiendo. Además nos recibieron con vino de Oporto y al irnos nos guardaron las maletas!
Tudo 5*. Perto de praticamente tudo. Casa limpa e acolhedora. Recomendo vivamente. (vinho do porto na chegada é a cereja no topo do bolo!)

La casa es tal cual aparece en las fotografías, super céntrica, te permite ir a todas partes andando;  Diogo estuvo muy amable, nos recibió con un Oporto casero; ahora bien, se nota el paso de los huéspedes en el mueble del lavabo por ejemplo, y en las paredes a las que les vendría bien una mano de pintura;  y el baño tiene un problema de humedades.
Diogo, foi uma estadia ótima temos apenas a notar que havia apenas um rolo de papel higénico. De resto tudo impecável!
The best thing about the apartment is its location, it is in the center of the city and you can go walking to all touristic places. Diego has been very nice and we are very happy to choose him.

They surprised us with welcomw drink - port wine and tourist map with all things that we have to see. The apartment is quite close to sao bento station and downtown. Around appartment are shops and nice reataurants. Highly recommended!
Bem localizado. Casa pouco arejada.

Appartement bien situé, mais humide ( déshumidificateur  en marche jour et nuit ) quelque soucis avec un frigo qui fuit et un manque de lampe dans les chambres.
Mais très bon accueil, et de bons renseignements donnés sur place!
Au final: moyen +
Excelente anfitrião. Casa boa para estadia como turista na cidade do Porto
El departamento esta muy bien ubicado, en un edificio reformado. Es ideal para pasar unos dias.

Flat is very well located, however has a very strong smell of mould. Unfortunately our experience of check in was not pleasant as despite of informing Diogo our arriving time, we had to wait almost 30 minutes outside the flat with a tired baby. His excuses were lame. Diogo's colleague, Adriana (I believe is her name) was very friendly and explained thoroughly the information of the flat and facilities around, we appreciate that, thank you Adriana!

The apartment location is amazing, very easy to get around and close to everything. It was a bit cold when we were there, the heating in the apartment worked in the bedrooms but in the main lounge room space didn't do much to warm the room, so it was cold when we weren't sleeping. The mould in the bathroom made that room feel unclean.
Os anfitriões foram extremamente solicitos e gentis. A localização é excelente! Espaço a repetir em outra oportunidade.
Nice place, comfortable for 6 ppl.  Nice kitchen. Location is perfect, right in the middle of everything

We were lucky to find a place last minute in Porto and Diogo was very accommodating and communication was good. Our checkin was excellent and we were given lots of information on the city. The apartment is in a convenient location. The only issue is there seems to be a humidity problem in the washroom which makes it a bit damaged and smelly, but I’m sure Diogo is looking into it.
Great location!! Lovely city :)
La ubicación es muy cómoda y está cerca del casco histórico.

Идеальное местоположение в центре города. Улица тихая. Рядом есть макдачка и продуктовые магазины. Достопримечательности в шаговой доступности.
Из минусов - не было воды в кране над раковиной в ванной.
very good location. Close to the centre  and plenty of space for four people . We were very well looked after . Any problem was sorted and they were very prompt in meeting us .
The location is excellent. The host showed us all the places to visit in Porto. But the host was not very reactive.

位置无敌｡给我们送钥匙的小哥非常热情一直等我们到晚上9点多｡又帮我们拿箱子,又拿地图给我们介绍怎么玩,我们都超喜欢他!不过房子没有预想中那么好,有点中国快捷酒店的干净程度吧,也说不上差｡大家要注意热水器,烧天然气的,洗之前先把厨房水龙头热水打开点燃热水器,然后开淋浴,再关掉厨房水龙头｡不然直接打开淋浴,热水器会时开时关,洗澡忽冷忽热...甚至浴液都擦好了半天都没热水...第一天我们就是不知道,在冷水中洗了澡...冻得要死｡不过第二天很热乎!希望对大家有帮助,在这里还是要很感谢房东,在我们反应过之后,他还专门来了一次房间查看,临走前还把空调暖风打开了,等我们回去的时候一进门就暖暖的!谢谢了!!

name: THE ABSOLUTE BEST EXPERIENCE
