host.host_about: Gosto de viajar , adoro fazer desporto ir ao cinema praia gosto de música  adoro conhecer novas pessoas e culturas diferentes

reviews.comments: Joaquin's property is amazing and we had a fantastic time there. The place comes  with an exclusive parking , very well equipped Kitchen, neat and clean bedrooms , well maintained toilets. The place is very well located to travel entire Porto city and the places around. It has a very beautiful shopping mall which has multiple food joints, nice retail brands and a cinema hall, at a walking distance. The Porto FC stadium is just 200 meters from the flat. Joaquim himself is an amazing host and he ensured that our trip was made memorable. Joaquin's colleague Paula ( who helped us with check in check out and explain the things about Porto ) was extremely gentle and really appreciate her responses to all our queries. She took good care of us. Overall ten on ten to Joaquim and his property. Just one minor suggestion , the cloth stand on the balcony needs to be changed. Rest everything was absolutely fantastic . I would want to stay there again and would strongly recommend everyone to use the property.

Zona alejada pero muy buen acceso en metro para el centro. A lado de buen centro comercial con tiendas de moda y un Continente. Para aficionados al futbol: al lado del estadio del Oporto (do Dragao). Casa moderna con todo lo necesario. Aparcamiento. Nosotros somos una familia de 6 y hemos estado muy comodos. Propietario muy atento. Valoracion muy positiva. Recomendable.

Nous avons adoré l'appartement de Joaquim avec 3 grandes chambres et 3 salles de bain. L'appartement est magnifiquement décoré et équipé. Après un long voyage les enfants ont été ravis de découvrir de quoi préparer de bons sandwichs. Les explications et conseils d'Isabella ont été très précieux pour nous guider dans la ville. Nous reviendrons sans hésiter.

La casa de Joaquim es excelente, amplia, cómoda, bien ubicada (cerca del estadio de fútbol del Oporto y muy próxima a estación de metro). Es realmente como se describe en las fotos de Airbnb.
 Nos recibió Isabel y fue extraordinaria y muy amable con nosotros, nos explicó los mejores sitios para visitar la ciudad y nos dejó incluso un plano para poder planificar nuestra corta visita. Un detalle en la llegada también la fruta y el desayuno que nos dejó Joaquim, estamos muy agradecidos. La valoración es magnífica, y si podemos volveremos a casa de Joaquim en otra ocasión.

Un piso precioso en un lugar con metro,supermercados,tiendas,
bares...cercanos.Muy buena atención por parte de su propietario Joaquín.Oporto,Gaia,Matosinhos todo muy bonito. Si volviera repetiría el apartamento sin dudarlo. Muchas gracias a 
 Joaqim Monteiro.

The appartment was amazing, very modern, stylish and clean, everything was set up perfectly. Very well equipped, also towels, and bath products provided. Located in very nice and safe area, close to a big shopping mall with supermarket where you can find everything you need. Free parking outside, but you can also use nice garage  for free. The landlord is the nicest person, friendly and willing to help with anything, gave us good advice on how to get around city and what to do. They even bought us food for breakfast!  High quality for very nice price! I recommend to everyone!

Mycket bra bemötande av värden via sms när vi landat. Isabel som överlämnade nycklar till oss, var mycket trevlig och berättade om vilka sevärdheter vi inte skulle missa och tips på resvägar och restauranger. 
Lägenheten var mycket trevlig, bra planerad, låg nära shopping och metro. 
Porto som stad är mysig att promenera i, dock väldigt kuperad ner mot floden Douro.

Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Isabella qui nous a donnés des informations précieuses pour la visite de PORTO. Appartement très fonctionnel et propre, conforme aux photos . Proche du métro et des commerces .Merci d'avoir pensé à notre petit déjeuner !

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour à Porto, et le bel appartement de Joaquim y a très largement participé!  3 grandes chambres avec salle de bain chacune, cuisine équipée avec lave vaisselle et tout le nécessaire, lave linge, etc...bref, au top! Quelques courses avaient même étaient faites avant notre arrivée: du pain, de l'eau, des fruits. Parfait! Bien qu' un peu éloigné du centre ville, l'hôtel est proche des commodités: Metro, centre commercial avec supermarché, taxis. Bref, tout ce qu'il faut pour être au calme et passer un excellent séjour! Merci Joaquim, et un grand merci à Isabel qui nous a donné de précieuses informations!

Joaquim was a fantastic host.  Met us at the apartment with Isabelle, and they walked us through the condo.  They us feel like old friends within an hour of arriving and we had just met them. The apartment was exactly as described and seen in the pictures on the website.  Immaculate and clean.  Loved the location which was near the soccer stadium and the Metro which took you downtown in 5 stops.  We asked Joaquim about getting tickets to a Porto game before we arrived and he went above and beyond our simple question by obtaining tickets for us.  Quiet safe neighbourhood and having the ability to park our vehicle in the building was a big plus for us.  Can't say enough good things about Joaquim.    A true gentleman who obviously takes great pride in hosting at his B&B.  He had more channels on the TV than any hotel we have been in!  We would definitely book again at his apartment, especially given the chance to meet him again.  Angelo and Mary

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour à  Porto, l ' appartement correspond exactement  aux photos, propre, spacieux ( vive les 3 salles de bains !), près du métro. Merci à  Joaquim et Isabelle pour leur accueil et leurs précieux conseils. 
Bref, un bon petit week -end à faire ou à  refaire.
Lugar maravilhoso com uma recepção estupenda! Os anfitriões são de uma simpatia ímpar. Recomendamos para famílias numerosas. Voltaremos definitivamente :)

Joaquim's apartment is ideally situated in a neat and quite place just 5 tube stations away from historical center and just by a massive shopping center.
The building is modern and safe. We even had a safe underground locked parking place for us.
The flat has plenty of space with 3 big bedrooms en suite! Modern, well equiped. Very comfortable. And on the top of that, we have been welcome by Joaquim who is very nice and friendly guy who took the time to explain everything to us.
I highly recommend this apartment for those who want to visit Porto.
And by the way we were a family of 5. A couple and 3 teenage kids.

3 nuits passées dans l'appartement de Joaquim. Tout s'est très bien passé: excellent accueil par Joaquim et son assistante. L'appartement est très propre, classe, bien équipé et l'emplacement parfait (proche centre commercial et métro).
Si nous repassons sur Porto, nous y retournerons avec plaisir.

Az apartman egy újépítésű társasházban helyezkedik el a portoi stadion, egy bevásárlóközpont, az autópálya és a metro közelében A ház előtt ingyenes parkoló és park, de mélygarázs is rendelkezésre áll A környék nyugodt, csendes, tiszta Ugyanez igaz a lakásra is Luxuslakás ténylegesen Minden úgy néz ki, mint a képeken A 3 hálószobához külön fürdőszoba tartozik Nappali ebédlővel és konyha Teljesen felszerelt lakás 
Vendéglátónk Joaquim segítőkész, kedves, udvarias, nagyon szimpatikus házigazda Minden információt megadott nekünk ahhoz, hogy jól érezzük magunkat Portoban
Mindenkinek ezt a szállást ajánlom, aki Portoba látogat

5 ESTRELAS
 Ótima receção,  ótimo apartamento, ótima estadia.
 Muito bem situado, amplas divisões, com uma decoração excelente tal como provam as fotos .
 O Joaquim e a Isabel são muito simpáticos, prestaram todas as informações necessárias para nos proporcionar umas excelentes férias .
 Recomendo e voltaremos na próxima oportunidade .
 A família MATOS agradece a vossa simpatia , e deseja as maiores felicidades.
Merci à Joaquim pour son bon accueil! L’appartement est fidèle au photos et nous avons eu droit à une corbeille de fruits, fromages du pays et du pain. Bref, à recommander!

Pasamos unos días estupendos en Oporto. 
Excelente el apartamento. Joaquim tenía todo previsto para nuestra llegada, muy amable con todos y con mis pequeños. Nos explicó lo más relevante para visitar.
Nos ha encantado pasar unos días en esta magnífica ciudad.

PERFECT!! PARFAIS!! PERFEITO!!!
JOAQUIM is a very nice, polite and helpful host. Anytime you need to speak with him he will answer your calls or call you back. He has a map from Porto for us and helped us to choose which place to see in Porto and the cities around it.
The apartment is even better than the photos. It is amazing. It has everything you need to feel like you are at home. Joaquim took care of all the small details like very nice sheets and towels, hairdryer, shampoo, etc. to improve our comfort there. He received us also with some fruits. (It was very nice). The 3 rooms are Just perfect with very nice mattresses in every one. All of them have their own bath. The TV, heat and wifi were working smoothly. It has a washing machine with a dryer. The apartment has a very nice kitchen with all we need to make nice meals or just a cup of coffee. It was perfectly clean! The  apartment is located In a very nice neighborhood and it  is very well equipped and perfectly situated. In few minutes (5 Min.) you are at the shopping mall and in the metro station that can take you to anywhere you want in Porto.
We had a fantastic stay and highly recommend it for anyone who is looking for something like home. We definitely will be back and we will want to stay there again.

We were a group of 5 international students who travelled arround Portugal and stayed for a few days at Joaquims Apartment in Porto.
Joaquim is a really nice guy and a great Host, who try to arrange everything possible to make your stay enjoyable.

The apartment is just awesome and the best I ve been so far via Airbnb. It is very good located (close to the football stadium, shopping mall and metrostation) and the facilities and furniture is luxurious!

I definitely recommend this place, 5 stars!!!

Excelente recepción y comunicación con Joaquim. Buenas explicaciones del entorno, así como para ver en Oporto, sus sitios emblemáticos, como llegar, mapas, etc.
El apartamento perfecto. Acogedor e impecable en todos los sentidos. Todo un placer la verdad.
Gracias por todo Joaquim!!!.
Joaquim is a very kind host. The apartment is very comfortable. Next time we will book this apartment again.

Un departamento estupendo, super limpio y ordenado. Muy seguro y con cochera para dejar el auto.  Ideal para visitar Porto, está a 15 minutos andando al centro histórico y a 5 minutos en taxi.  El departamento está muy cerca de un centro comercial estupendo, con un horario muy amplio. Joaquim nos indicó sitios excelentes para cenar y comer  y la forma más adecuada de movernos por la ciudad. Estuvo siempre disponible para nosotras.
Sin dudarlo un sitio para regresar, tanto el departamento de Joaquim como Porto.

Joaquim is an amazing host and made us feel welcome in Porto.  The apartment is beautiful and very comfortable: on a quiet street away from hustle and bustle, but easy to get to the Porto Center.

Joaquim replied to all messages immediately. When the head needed an adjustment he came to the apartment within 15 minutes to help us with it.  He also gave us great recommendations on places to see and restaurants to eat in.

Great apartment, awesome host!

Superbe accueil de Joaquim dés notre arrivée. De la prise en charge à la visite de l'appartement pour la remise des clefs. Joaquim a eu la délicate attention de nous offrir une mise en bouche (gâteaux, fruits, boissons, fromage etc.). Accueil très chaleureux avec une mise en confiance spontanée. L'appartement est très spacieux et luxueux, conforme à la description. Tout était parfait. Joaquim a su nous donner de bons conseils sur la ville de Porto pour la découverte et le besoin quotidien.  De plus il nous a temoigné d'une grande disponibilité.

Apartamento excelente, próximo ao estádio Dragão, metro e shopping com grande mercado. Decoração moderna, clean e de muito bom gosto.  Anfitrião muito atencioso e solicito. Recebeu-nos com frutas, água, suco e queijo. Ajudou nos com roteiro e outras dicas. Joaquim permaneceu todo o período  à nossa disposição para eventuais necessidades. Recomendaria com certeza e voltaria a me hospedar no imóvel caso voltasse ao porto. Realmente muito bom!
Piso amplio y limpio. Tal cual las fotos, joaquin super atentl y disponible

We arrived at 16.00pm at Joaquim's place where he took the time to tell us about the apartment, show us the rooms and inform us about things to see and do in Porto. He had arranged some pastries for us and there was some fresh fruit as well as a bottle of water. The kids loved sleeping in their big beds that evening! The location has good access to metro stations and to the shopping center Dolce Vita and the surroundings are nice and quiet. 

The apartment is very spacious and could very well accommodate three couples, since there are three double beds and three bathrooms. For us it was very nice that the kids and we ourselves all had our own separate bedroom and we were still very close to the kids. 

The weather during our stay was not so nice, but Joaquim arranged an extra umbrella and we made the most of seeing some sites indoors, like Library Lello, World of Discoveries and Sealife.
The apartment is very nice and Joaquim was very responsive. The apartment is a bit outside of the citycenter however Uber or taxis is a quick and reasonable ride to the center.
Joaquim met us at the apartment (even though we were early) and checked in on us throughout the stay.  Apartment was very nice.

O apartamento é moderno, amplo, iluminado. Decorado com muito bom gosto. Além da excelente localização, Joaquim é muito atencioso e prestativo, nos orientou e nos recepcionou muito bem. Esperamos retornar em breve. Um grande abraço Joaquim.

The apartment was very nice, confortable and really clean. Not only the basic amenities were present, but also many nice and pratical extras. Joaquim was a very nice and welcoming host. We were very pleased!
This place is amazing - great location, great apartment! Joaquim is the best host ever!!! Highly recommend this place to everybody!

We had a great time in Porto staying at Joaquim's place. The layout of the property was perfect for our needs, with our 18-month-old son able to have his own room. We also appreciated being able to keep our hire car parked safely in the secure carpark. There was a heatwave in Porto where it was hotter than usual, so we found the apartment a little hot at times. There's no air conditioning or fan, so we kept all the windows open at night to catch any through-breeze. During the day, my son and I retreated to the nearby shopping centre, where it was cooler, while my husband went to some meetings. The location of the property is a bit further away from Porto centre, but that suited us well, as it meant that my husband could easily get on the freeway to all his meetings. And the close proximity of the shopping centre (3 minutes walk down the road) was perfect for me. As a host, Joaquim was very quick to respond to my enquiry and very accommodating! We literally booked the property the morning of the same night we stayed! Joaquim was very easy to communicate with. All in all, a very positive experience!
Joaquin ha sido amable con nosotros, pero la casa no cumplió con nuestras expectativas. Está lejos del centro y le faltan muchos detalles para sentirse en ella a gusto.

Apartamento muy moderno y muy bien equipado, con materiales y equipamiento de primera calidad. Gran plaza de garaje, WiFi, electrodomésticos, ... Ubicado en zona muy tranquila, cerca del metro, a 15m del centro. Tres cuartos grandes para dos personas, con tres baños completos. Todo muy nuevo y con todas las comodidades.
Cocina completa con detalle de bienvenida (fruta).
El edificio tiene vigilancia durante la noche.
El único punto negativo (en nuestro caso, ya que no somos fumadores) es el olor a tabaco de la casa y de la ropa de casa (camas, toallas, ...)

Hemos pasado una semana en el piso, estaba limpio y es tal y como aparece en las fotos.  Está muy equipado. Los dueños durante nuestra estancia han sido muy amables y se han preocupado por nosotros. Esta alejado del centro para ir andando,  pero tiene muy cerca una parada de metro.

Joaquim's apartment was very nice. It is in a good location, well furnished and comfortable. The building has a lift which is so important. 
It was quiet, comfortable and most enjoyable. We truly enjoyed our stay and highly recommend Joaquim to future visitors.
Todo excelente, el apartamento muy confortable, la recepción de lujo, con una tabla de fiambres incluida. Atención verdaderamente lusitana. Recomendable 100%

Joaquim was very helpful and welcoming when we arrived.  We had no reason to call him during our stay but I'm sure he would have been very responsive if we'd called. Great apartment.  A bit out of the centre but walkable (3-4K) and in an area close by good shopping facilities.

Bel appartement tout confort à la décoration soignée. L'accueil de Joaquim est chaleureux et très sympa. Il nous a donné des adresses et bien conseillé quant à la vie pratique à Porto. À recommander sans aucun doute.

Die Kommunikation vom Gastgeber war von Anfang an super. Wir konnten sogar etwas früher ins Appartment. Er hat uns die gesamte Wohnung gezeigt, und uns Tipps für Restaurants und Nachtclubs gegeben. Es ist ein sehr ruhiges Haus, wo man definitiv seine Ruhe finden kann. Die Wohnung hat drei sehr große Schlafzimmer. Jedes Zimmer hat seine eigene Garderobe und sein eigenes Badezimmer, was wir sehr angenehm fanden. Das Wohnzimmer/Esszimmer war sehr gemütlich. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Auch auf Nachrichten oder Telefonate reagierte unser Gastgeber sehr schnell und hilfreich. Hier nochmal ein großes Danke an Joaquim, der uns zu jederzeit das Gefühl gab, die richtige Entscheidung getroffen zu haben. Wir werden definitiv in die Wohnung zurück kehren, da der Standort (200m vom Stadion) und die Lage uns sehr entgegen kommt. Auch an Ausstattung hat es nicht gefehlt.

Estivemos 3 dias neste apartamento e só temos coisas boas a dizer do mesmo.
Desde a localizaçao que foi perfeita ao pé do Estádio do Dragão, comércio e tranportes publicos. O apartamento é top, com boas areas e tambem limpeza. Um dos pontos favoráveis é a tranquilidade que se tem ao chegar ao apartamento depois de passear pela bela cidade do Porto. Joaquim é uma pessoa fantástica e sempre muito atencioso, indicou-nos varios locais a visitar e tambem aconselhou-nos alguns restaurantes. Gostámos muito de lá estar e voltaremos.
Ficamos por apenas duas noites, uma pena! O Apartamento tenha a cara de casa e a Hospitalidade do Joaquim foi fenomenal!!!  Muito bom e esperamos retornar em breve
Great host, super apartment, easy to access all of Porto.

El piso estaba perfecto, muy moderno y con todas las comodidades. Zona muy tranquila para un buen descanso y muy bien comunicada con el centro. El anfitrión, Joaquim, muy amable, nos indicó lugares para visitar y siempre disponible para cualquier pregunta. Recomendable 100%. Apartamento muy seguro ya que cuenta con portero y el garaje tambien muy bueno (en mi caso me encanta cuidar mi coche y queda cerrado con una puerta sin tener ningun coche al lado). Al lado hay un buen centro comercial y el Estadio do Dragao de Porto F.C.

Très bon séjour. Appartement propre et très bien équipé. Proche d'un centre commercial et du métro ce qui rend facilement accessible le centre historique de Porto. Joaquim est très accueillant et prend le temps de tout expliqué. je recommande fortement
Great flat !! Will come again
Very nice and clean place. Very friendly and helpful host.

Accueil et disponibilité parfait 
Appartement impeccable et très bien équipé, il ne manque absolument rien 
L'emplacement est tranquille mais proche du métro qui dessert Porto centre 
À conseiller vivement
Apto. confortável e exatamente como nas fotos, tudo perfeito e limpo, excelente!

Logement très agréable. Conforme à la description et aux photos. Parking très pratique surtout lorsque vous arrivez le jour d'un match de foot, le stade étant à 500 m de l'appartement !!! (mais nous n'entendions rien). Merci à Rafaela pour son accueil, et ses délicates attentions pour notre arrivée (pommes, fromage, jus de fruit, bouteille d'eau et charcuterie...)
Belles prestations
Excelente apartamento. Amplo, limpo, muito bem equipado. Anfitrião Joaquim muito atencioso e fomos muito bem recebidos pela Rafaela que ainda nos deu dicas sobre a cidade. Mais que recomendamos!!!!!
great place !! love this home
Todo bien y ajustado al anuncio

Thank you Joachim for the lovely apartment and your hospitality. We were six people traveling to Porto and the three bathrooms helped us a lot to quickly get ready in the morning and go exploring Porto. The metro station, supermarket and different restaurants are in walking distance from the apartment. 
We flew in from Germany early in the morning and Joachim was so accommodating in allowing us an earlier check in. 
Everything is as described in the post and pictures and we had a very nice stay at Joachims apartment.

Un grand merci a Joaquim pour son accueille et disponibilité pendant tout notre séjour.
On a adoré l'appartement très spacieux, vraiment conforme aux photos, en plus le garage très pratique .On a eu droit à une corbeille de fruits, fromage, jus de fruit...
Vraiment à recommander!

Descripción del apartamento y fotos reales. Es muy acogedor y te sientes como en casa, a nosotros los colchones de muelles nos parecieron incómodos, y después de todo el día de caminatas echabas de menos una cama más confortable. Por lo demás Joaquín nos dejo entrar al apartamento antes de hora y no nos puso impedimento a la hora de marchar más tarde, muy servicial y pendiente de ti en todo momento. Estás alejado del centro pero en metro que lo tienes a 5 min a pie, llegas en otro 5 minutos. Nosotros viajábamos dos parejas con niños y por El Centro no encontramos nada como este apartamento y con todas estas comodidades. Lo recomendamos.

O apartamento é exatamente como nas fotos. Todos os equipamentos funcionam bem. Quartos amplos e com bastante espaço para as malas. As vagas de garagem são ótimas. A localização é agradável, com tudo muito perto (shopping com vários restaurantes, mercado, ônibus, metrô, estádio do Dragão). Bastante silencioso a noite. A única coisa que estranhamos é que, nos banheiros, não há um chuveiro fixo acima da banheira, ou ao menos um suporte para fixar o chuveiro - mas isso não gerou nenhum problema. Camas confortáveis.

Great apartment ! The flat is clean, well equipped and look recent. Joaquim and Rafaela were available to welcome us and for any question during the stay. They even bought a high chair for our son and some goodies for our arrival !

The flat is 10-minutes walk (uphill) from the metro station and 5 from the Stadium, hipermarket and shopping center. 

Flat is huge, each of the 3 bedroom has its bathroom.  6 adults would fit confortably even for a longer stay. Excellent stay on all means !
Excelente. Sin duda repetiria. Piso muy bien cuidado. Amplio.
Precioso y grande apartamento. Muy cómodo y bien comunicado. Gracias Joaquim
A perfect place to stay in Oporto, it is really a luxure appartment, With three beautifull bedrooms and also three bathrooms, diningroom and well equiped kitchen. Private garage.

The apartment was modern, clean and comfortable. It was a great place to return to after a day exploring Porto. The metro station is close by and you can enjoy a game at the Estádio do Dragão when the FC Porto is playing.

Se trata de un piso grande, de buena calidad, con tres habitaciones y tres baños, además de disponer de servicios como Wifi, tv por cable, cocina completa... A pesar de no tener una ubicación céntrica (ubicado a 100m del Estadio do Dragao), cuenta con una estación de metro y parada de autobús a pocos metros. Adicionalmente si viajas en coche, tiene una plaza de garaje en el mismo edificio. En cuanto a servicios, tiene muy cerca un amplio centro comercial con todo tipo de tiendas, restauración y supermercado. Por último, agradecer a Joaquim y Raffaella toda su atención, siendo unos magníficos anfitriones, mostrando su interés para que todo estuviese bien. Volveríamos sin lugar a dudas.

De um modo geral ficamos satisfeitos com a nossa hospedagem. Tivemos um pequeno desencontro no Check In e o fato de não ter chuveiro atrapalhou um pouco. De qualquer forma gostamos muito da localização e o custo benefício é bastante interessante.
this is the best of the best, we really enjoyed the apartment

Gostei muito da minha estada, local muito bom para o que estava procurando, sossegado, perto da estação de metrô,  perto de um supermercado.
Apartamento grande confortável e bem mobilado.  Garagem coberta para o carro.  Muito bom.
Apto sofisticado, com 3 suítes maravilhosas, sala e cozinha bem equipada não deixando nada a desejar. Próximo ao transporte público, supermercado e ao campo de futebol do Porto FC.

Appartement haut de gamme très confortable. Garage fermé en sous-sol. Situé à proximité du métro ( 7mn pour arriver dans le centre) et du stade du Dragon dont nous avons visité le musée qui est vraiment à voir. Chaque chambre comporte sa salle de bain et une porte qui l'isole du reste de l'appartement pour deux d'entre elles. Une bonne adresse.

The apartment was perfect, very spacious, beautifully decorated, clean. Any problems were dealt with practically straight away. Within walking distance to a metro station and a big shopping mall with restaurants, the area was very nice and quiet and full of the friendliest people. We didn't get to meet Joaquim but he stayed in contact throughout and you can tell he cares about his apartment and guests. We won't hesitate booking with him again when we get the chance!

Great place to stay.

Apartment
- Well laid out and plenty of space for families and/or friends 
- Equipped with washing machine, mirco email, kettle and oven/stove.
- Pots and pans for the cook in you
- Sat TV
- Central heating but no air conditioning so keep door open to catch the breeze
- Private carpark (Get details prior to travelling as the garage numbers don't reflect apartment number)

Location
- walking distance from an upmarket Mall
-Very close to Dragao Station
- Football Stadium can be veiw from apartment.
- Local Restaurant walkable (up towards the MC Donald)

Suggestions
-Firstly, don't locate the flat using the Air BnB location as it's not there - type the address in to (Hidden by Airbnb) maps!!!
- Good for families and Friends.
- each room has a bathroom which makes it very convenient
-Towels, Shower gel, Shampoos are provided so travel light
- Shutters are great for keeping the apartment cool so do use them
- Local shops for food is near the food crescent (near the Mc Donald) so as you have a good size kitchen you could do a bit of cooking if you fancy.
-  Porto is a very hilly town so be prepared as climbing in heels just doesn't work

Recepção muito acolhedora e atenciosa!!! Anfitrião sempre prestativo e fácil para se comunicar!!!  Ótimo, bem equipado e espaçoso! Próximo ao Estádio do Dragão e do shopping Alameda e da estação de metrô!!! Ótima estadia!!!!

O apartamento é ótimo: excelente localização na parte nova do Porto, próximo ao estádio do dragão; é grande e confortável com bons utensílios domésticos (cafeteira Dolce Gusto, lavadora de roupas e lava-louças; os banheiros possuem banheiras muito confortáveis;  o edifício possui uma ótima vaga de garagem, inclusive com porteiro. 
Sugiro apenas a colocação de suporte elevado para a ducha nos banheiros para aqueles que como nós costumam tomar banho em pé.
Ficamos muito satisfeitos e certamente escolheríamos novamente este apartamento.

TIVE PROBLEMA NO CHECK OUT.
QUANDO CHEGUEI FUI MUITO BEM RECEBIDO ,PORÉM A PESSOA QUE NOS RECEBEU ,NOS DISSE QUE SAIRIAMOS NA QUINTA FEIRA DE MANHA,QUE ENTRARIA HOSPEDE NO MESMO DIA.
NA QUARTA FEIRA,NOS MANDOU MENSAGEM QUE PRECISAVAMOS DEIXAR A CHAVE COM ELA ATE AS 12:00 DA QUINTA.
PAGUEI ATE SEXTA E POR DISTRAÇÃO POR ESTAR DE FERIAS, PERDI 1 DIA DA MINHA HOSPEDAGEM.
INFELIZMENTE O SR JOAQUIN DISSE QUE A CULPA FOI MINHA.
FIQUEI CHATEADO COM SUA ATÍTUDE,POIS HOUVE FALTA DE COMUNICAÇÃO COM A SUA FUNCIONÁRIA QUE NOS INDUZIU A SAIR 1 DIA ANTES DO COMBINADO.
APARTAMENTO MUITO LIMPO,TOTALMENTE EQUIPADO, COM GARAGEM,PERFEITO PARA UMA OTIMA ESTADIA.
ÓTIMA LOCALIZAÇÃO, PRÓXIMO AO METROE SHOPING.
O CHUVEIRO PODERIA SER MELHOR, POIS PARA TOMAR BANHO EM PÉ ,PRECISA FICAR SEGURANDO O CHUVEIRO, QUE NÃO TEM SUPORTE.

Excelente apartamento, ótima localização, tudo muito limpo, organizado e funcionando. Fomos sempre muito bem auxiliados por Joaquim em relação às informações de chegada ao apartamento e durante a nossa estadia. Quem nós recebeu no check-in  foi a Rafaela que foi muito atenciosa e simpática, mostrando todo o local e referências da região. Estávamos em quatro pessoas, sendo uma criança de cinco meses e não tivemos nenhum distúrbio durante a nossa estadia.

We arrived a day later because of a flight delay.
Joaquim was in contact with us until late at night and welcomed us on Sundays.
The apartment was just as spacious, modern and equipped with everything you need, as the photos have promised.
Great bathroom, comfortable beds, kitchen fully equipped, living and dining area very generous and a nice cozy balcony.
The environment is pleasant and clean.
Joaqium has always contacted us and asked about our well-being.
We felt very comfortable!!!!!
The stadium of the 1.FC Porto, a nice shopping center and the metro station are almost close to reach.
Thanks for all !!!!   :-)

Appartement très spacieux, les 3 chambres sont avec SDB.
Pratique le garage au sous sol.
Si nous revenons à Porto , nous pensons séjourner à nouveau dans cet appartement
A estadia foi de encontro à nossa expectativa e tudo correu muito bem.
Well appointed apartment close to public transportation.

Appartamento vicino allo stadio, non centrale, adiacente ad un grosso centro commerciale e alla stazione metropolitana. Tre ampie stanze da letto ciascuna con bagno . Mediamente attrezzato in cucina . Molti tappeti e tappezzerie.
The host joaquim was so friendly and cooperative and the house was very nice, we enjoyed our stay there.

Excellent séjour à tous les niveaux! L'appartement est superbe, bien situé, la propreté est impeccable. Nous avons été en contact avec Joaquim et Rafaela pour l'organisation du séjour. Ils ont été très sympathiques et se sont adaptés à nos horaires. La gestion est vraiment professionnelle, tout en restant flexible et chaleureuse. A recommander sans hésitation!

L appartement de joaquim est grand tres confortable, dans un quartier residentiel calme a 5 mn a pied du metro qui nous amène tres vite au centre de porto. Pour ceux qui arrivent en voiture comme nous le grand parking privé est un grand plus! Joaquim nous accueille avec des intentions tres agreables ( jus dorange , lait, pain,fruits....)je recommande ce lieu !!

Joaquim's place was very nice - with three bedrooms and three bathrooms, my two sons, their wives and I found it very comfortable and clean.  it is located in a very nice upscale part of Porto a short subway ride from Cais da Ribeira. I highly recommend it if you're traveling with 3 or more people.
Joaquim has been a great host. The house was spacious and clean and our stay has been really comfortable. Thanks!!

Wunderschöne Wohnung in der Nähe des Stadions, zwar etwas außerhalb vom Stadtzentrum, dafür aber eine sehr ruhige Lage in einer gehobenen Wohngegend ohne Verkehrslärm. Mit dem Taxi oder der Metro ist man in 10-15 Minuten in der Innenstadt. Die Anreise vom Flughafen dauerte mit dem Taxi 15 Minuten.
Die Wohnung ist sehr groß und geräumig und mit allem erdenklichen Komfort ausgestattet. Jedes der 3 Doppelzimmer verfügt über ein eigenes Bad mit Wanne/Dusche. Voll ausgestattete Küche mit modernen Elektrogeräten. Durch nebenan liegende Einkaufszentrum war die Eigenversorgung mit Lebensmittel und Waren des täglichen Bedarfs jederzeit möglich.
Die Kommunikation mit dem Gastgeber funktionierte im Vorfeld der Anreise und beim Check-In perfekt - schnelle Antwort auf E-Mailanfragen und viele praktische Tipps bei der Ankunft, sehr freundlicher Empfang - sehr sympatischer Gastgeber.

A experiência no apartamento do Joaquim foi muito além das expectativas. A propriedade é muito confortável e aconchegante, a localização é excelente, com transporte público para o centro da cidade e supermercados à volta. Destaque também pela atenção dispensada pelo Joaquim e pela Rafaela, que sugerem excelentes atrações na cidade. Recomendarei a amigos e familiares.
Beautiful apartment. Joaquim was very attentive and even had pastries, fruit, milk, juice and water waiting for us! Neighbors are a little loud but the neighborhood itself was quiet.

Geweldig appartement, superschoon en van alle gemakken voorzien, rustig gelegen buiten centrum dichtbij voetbalstadion,ook als je geen voetbalfan bent is het de moeite waard om een keer een wedstrijd bij te wonen. De metro bevind zich op loopafstand aan het einde van de straat. 
Joaquim is super vriendelijk en zeer behulpzaam, kortom een adres om te onthouden voor een volgend bezoek aan Porto.

Monique en Jean uit Nederland

Es un apartamento muy moderno y súper adaptable para parejas y familias de 3! Nos lo hemos pasado en grande! Repetiríamos sin duda! Esta genial ubicado, justo al lado del estadio de fútbol y a pocos pasos del metro, totalmente recomendable!

Another great experience with Joaquim and his awesome apertment. It was the second time we stayed in porto in this apartment because we were so positively surprised last year. We can recommend this apartment refering the hospitality of Joaquim. Thank you for everything, we will be back next year!

O espaço é excelente ,de padrão o  superior  e de muito bom gosto!!Joaquim é um autêntico gentleman  !! receptivo , solicito , interativo desde o primeiro contato !!Nos brindou  na chegada gentilmente com as  iguarias do Porto !!O que faz  seu diferencial !!Nossos parabéns !! Indicamos sem dúvida  à todos !!Até a próxima !! Abcos!!

Estivemos por um longo período hospedados e fomos recebidos e acolhidos por Joaquim com muito carinho e atenção ímpar. Joaquim sempre atencioso com todas as nossas necessidades, mesmo as independentes da habilitação. O apartamento muito bem localizado, espaçoso, bem cuidado e limpinho. Nota máxima ao apartamento e também ao Joaquim. 
Amamos nossa estadia neste apartamento. Super recomendo
Great place in a great location.
Acomodação espaçosa e bonita. O Joaquim e sua equipe são impecáveis. Recebimento perfeito com direito a mimos como tábua de queijos e vinho. Tudo ótimo!
O apartamento é excelente, bem localizado e equipado. Limpo e extremamente confortável

O apartamento de Joaquim é excelente, muito bem mobiliado e equipado, com todo o conforto que se pode esperar em viagem. É seguro, tem uma boa garagem no andar térreo, onde cabe um carro grande ou dois pequenos. A  cerca 300 metros metros de distância, há um shopping center em que se pode fazer compras em lojas de grandes marcas, há uma praça de alimentação, um hipermercado com preços muito bons e onde se escontra de tudo, desde gêneros alimenticios a roupas e eletrodomésticos. Tem cinema, também. Nas imediações há pizzarias e restaurantes, inclusive churrascaria. Há uma igreja proxima, lugares para se fazer caminhadas. Enfim, tudo que se pode esperar para uma boa estada. E é muito bem localizado e de fácil acesso.

Um ótimo apartamento, a começar pelo check in atencioso e pontual, com vários agrados para quem chega de viagem. Apartamento bem localizado, perto de metrô, shopping center com restaurantes e supermercado, e de acesso fácil. Ótima vaga de garagem, considerando que estávamos com um carro grande. Limpeza impecável,  e decoração com muito estilo. Voltaremos com certeza.
Apartamento muito bom. Bem localizado, perto de restaurantes, supermercados e shopping. O proprietário é muito atencioso. Recomendo com certeza.

Séjour très agréable dans ce bel appartement moderne et spacieux. L'accueil et la disponibilité de Joaquim et Rafaela étaient parfaits. L'emplacement et la sécurité de ce logement sont très appréciables. A recommander vivement !!!

Nous avons beaucoup apprécié l’accueil chaleureux de Joaquim. Il a répondu à toutes nos questions et était disponible en tout temps.  L’appartement est propre et très bien situé à 5 minutes du métro et d’un centre commercial.
Recomendo, ótimo lugar com todas as comodidades próximas, supermercado, shopping, farmácia, metro... o apartamento é muito confortável e dispõe de tudo de que se precisa.... òtimo.

Nowoczesny, funkcjonalny, czysty i zadbany apartament. Bardzo miły i pomocny właściciel. Lokalizacja zapewnia dogodny dojazd metrem do centrum Porto, a jednocześnie bezproblemowy wyjazd na autostrady dla osób, które planują zwiedzić więcej niż tylko Porto. Spokojna okolica. W pobliżu znajdują się liczne sklepy, apteka, restauracje i stacje benzynowe. Polecam!

Nous avons adoré séjourner en famille dans ce bel appartement spacieux et bien décoré. Chaque chambre a sa salle de bain, wc et son placard. Chacun a son espace. Les photos sont totalement conformes au lieu. un garage souterrain est pratique. Le métro est à proximité tout comme un centre commercial avec supermarché à 100m. L'appartement est calme et bien situé. Nous avons apprécié l'attention particulière de Joaquim qui nous a mis a disposition un lit bébé et une chaise haute pour notre fiston. Joaquim est très attentionné et nous a même conseillé les incontournables de la ville de Porto... et en français!

Very nice, roomy apartment in Porto— a quiet, safe location although not in the central part of Porto.  Easy to each by car or taxi / Uber and there is an enclosed parking space provided free, as well as lots of street parking near the apartment. The host, Joaquim, is very responsive, easy to reach, and hospitable.
Séjour très agréable. Appartement superbe et conforme à la description. Accueil des hôtes avec une attention durant tout le séjour car soucieux de notre bien-être. A recommander sans hésitation.

Très bel appartement. Spacieux, propre et chacun possède son espace. En famille c’est parfait. Le stationnement est un luxe que nous avons apprécié bien que tout soit facilement accessible puisque le métro est à 5 minutes de marche. Parfaitement situé et facile d’accès. Très bel accueil et grande disponibilité de Joaquim. Ses conseils nous ont été précieux. Je recommande sans hésitations.

I would highly recommend this property. It is in an excellent location, with transportation, shopping, restaurants in the immediate area. Joaquim was an excellent host. His property was spotless. We had any questions responded to very quickly. Our group was delighted with our stay. We would return to the apartment again if we vacation in Porto in the future.
Joaquim is a wonderful host and the apartment is beautiful and spacious. Nice touches and very helpful host.

Really nice apartment, easy check in and all in all really good value for money. 
The location is a little far from centre, but that is no problem when you can just use Uber :) 

Thanks Joaquim for a nice stay I will definitely recommend.

L'appartement de Joaquim vous comblera. Il est idéalement situé pour se rendre en centre ville en métro ( 15 mn ) et faire des courses au grand centre commercial situé à deux pas ( ouvert de 10 h à 24 h ). L'appartement est très grand et permet l'occupation de 6 personnes ( 3 grandes chambres avec leur propre salle de bain ). Tout le matériel est à disposition. Il y a même un gardien le soir dans  le grand hall d'entrée bien sympathique. Et si vous aimez le football ( c'est mon cas ) le stade du FC Porto n'est pas loin.

Muito bem localizado, perto de transportes públicos e de acessos rodoviários, perto de lojas e supermercado.
Anfitrião simpático e sempre disponível para qualquer eventualidade, o que no nosso caso não foi necessário visto a nossa estadia ter decorrido sem qualquer problema no alojamento.
Apartamento novo e confortável, sendo que a melhor característica considero ser a existência de 3 WC´s o que facilita bastante numa estadia com várias pessoas.
Recomendo o Alojamento.

First of all, Joaquim is a very kind and thoughtful host. He speaks both French and English. We stayed at Joaquim's beginning of July. Joaquim's apartment was very clean and very well located. 5 minutes by walk from Alameda mall, 10 minutes max by walk from the metro station. The apartment is just near FC Porto stadium giving you an amazing view. We arrived before check-in time and arranged with Joaquim to leave our luggages at his place. You have a survival guide of Porto and Joaquim will give you all the tips to feel at ease and enjoy your trip in Porto. You can contact him via (Hidden by Airbnb) and ask him whatever you want. We had an amazing time.

This is a real gem of a find. Great location (not far from the metro) - only a short ride into the centre. The apartment was great - having three bathrooms was a great luxury and the apartment is a good size for 5 or 6 people. Joaquim was a great host - unfortunately our plane was delayed by an hour so we did not get to meet him but he answered all questions very promptly. We were checked in by Sara who was very accommodating and gave us great tips. A great experience and would highly recommend.

This spacious 3 bedroom/3 bath apartment is exactly as shown in the pictures - very comfortable and well appointed, with king size beds. It is located near the Estadio do Dragao.  If you want to stay outside of Porto (about 10 minute walk+20 minutes by metro with a transfer to Porto), this is a great spot. It also has great access to the freeway if you have a car.  It is very quiet and there are shopping and sports amenities close by - the soccer stadium,  large mall and the biggest grocery store we have ever seen. However, it does not have local restaurants to visit. It is all about what you want during your stay.

Excellent appartement ! Comme les photos. Joaquim est un « Superhost » . Toujours soucieux de notre bien être.  Trois  suites magnifiques, cuisine complètement équipée, salon et séjour confortables et un très beau balcon. Le garage fermé est la cerise sur le gâteau. L’emplacement est idéal. Au calme et proche de tout. Je conseil vivement l’apparte. À refaire. Merci Joaquim et à bientôt !

This is the second time we stayed in Joaquim's apartment, a very good decision!
We felt very comfortable again and enjoyed the spacious and well-equipped apartment.
The contact with Joaquim was excellent from the beginning of the journey until leaving the apartment.
Joaquim was always available and, if necessary, he provided quick help (THANK YOU)
If we were to travel to Porto again, we would go back to Joaquim's apartment.
Joaquim is a very special host. ***** :-)

Muy recomendable. El departamento es grande, muy cómodo, con varios baños. Tiene todo lo necesario.  Joaquim fue muy amable. Recibimos algunos obsequios.  De muy buen gusto.  Con parking. A pasos del estadio del Porto y del metro, para ir al centro. En general, muy recomendable y sin duda regresaría.

Casa accogliente, vicino allo stadio e stazione della metro. Quartiere tranquillo, con centro commerciale a 2 min.
Eccezionale la disponibilitá e l’accoglienza di Joaquim, merita ampiamente il suo titolo di superhost!
Excellent host and great apartment.
Truly a beautiful Appartment with 3 big bedrooms and bathrooms. Very stylish and clean. Joaquim is an amazing host who took the time to give us some tips on what to do during our short stay in Porto.

Pictures and description are accurate . Joakam is an exceptional host that goes above and beyond to make your stay as pleasant as possible.  Everything including greeting us at the door  and explaining everything so well ... plus what is best to see and what is not worth the time. He even set us up with a little to eat. He is so positive and excited about everything that you can't help but get excited too.  We loved our time in Porto and recommend  this apartment very highly - you will not be disappointed.

A hospitalidade, atenção, limpeza e qualidades das suites nos deixou impressionados.
O Joaquim é uma pessoa muito educada e nos recebeu com frutas, queijo, biscoito, etc,etc...
Localização previlegiada com uma garagem muito ampla, ótima decoração, cozinha impecável.

EM RESUMO: TUDO MUITO MARAVILHOSO!!!

Perfect place for 3 couples, great location (far enough from busy downtown, but close enough to get downtown when needed), a short Uber ride (4-5 Euros). Joaquim greets you on schedule & gives you a great orientation for your stay!
O apartamento é ótimo, muito bem localizado. É como descrito, O Joaquim nos recebeu, passou todas as informações, deixou um pequeno lanche de boas vindas, recomendo.

Apartamento espaçoso, confortável, como nas fotos! Localização privilegiada com comércios e um excelente shopping a poucos metros. Silencioso e muito bem ensolarado e arejado. Super equipado. Excelente hospitalidade do Joaquim que nos recebeu muito bem e com uma mesa com um lanche de cortesia. A comunicação era rápida e eficaz e quando pedimos um utensílio de cozinha ele atendeu rapidamente e conseguiu o utensílio para nós.

O Joaquim é um excelente anfitrião! Nos recebeu com pastéis de nata, queijo e frutas para o próximo café da manhã. Nos forneceu dicas sobre todo o divinamente da casa, das proximidades do apartamento e da cidade do Porto.
O apartamento é amplo, e as fotos o descrevem muito bem. Deixei comentários específicos ao Joaquim do que pode melhorar.
Recomendo o local, e o Joaquim como um excelente anfitrião!

Local extremamente agradável , confortável , bem localizado e com uma infra estrutura que nos proporcionou muito conforto . Acrescenta-se a isso a forma cordial e prestativa que fomos recebidos pelo Joaquim . Excelente! Recomendo!!!
Muito bom!

Nota 1000 
Localização excelente , apartamento muito confortável perto do shopping  e a uma quadra do supermercado , garagem privativa super espaçosa , fica localizado na área nobre do Porto , eu recomendo 
E ao chegarmos um tratamento vip um lanche completo com frutas queijos pães sucos leite etc

O Joaquim é um excelente anfitrião, o apto é como nas fotos e ótima localizado, fomos recebidos com um
Lanchinho especial, o que demonstra a atenção do Joaquim. Foi tudo perfeito, muito obrigada por tudo.

This apartment is excellent, as shown in the photos and as described. Joaquim is very responsive and helpful. He provided us a detailed tour of the apartment even though we were a bit late to check in. He checked up on us often and answered to our questions in a timely manner. He also generously arranged for our tickets to watch a FC Porto game. we'll certainly stay here again.
excelente localização e acomodações,  perfeitonpaea familia, anfitrião atencioso e muito claro com o check-in

Joaquim welcomed us with sweets, water, fruit. He spent almost an hour explaining about his place and gave us tips for sightseeing and tours around Porto. Joaquim' place is located in a prime residential area of Porto, it's across the street from Alameda shopping center (one of the largest in Porto) with a large supermarket. The metro is about 7 minutes walk which will take you to the railroad station of Campagna (one stop) and center (5 stops).  The apartment is tastefully decorated and the bedrooms are very quiet which was very important for me.  The three bedrooms have total privacy so three couples can easily stay in the apartment.  If you are looking for a quality apartment, away from the center, this is an ideal place.

Thank you Joaquim for your hospitality, I will be back in May.

High
Au top, tout était parfait !
Excepcional anfitrião

Joaquim’s place is really nice.  Very easy to reach it. It is close (less than 10 min walking) to any public transport (bus or subway), or mall and supermarket, or restaurants. The apartment is well equipped, with all facilities we needed. Check-in was done by his daughter, and she was very helpful and caring. We were welcome in a very special way. Easy check-out. For sure we would stay again in this luxury apartment. Joaquim, once more, thank you very much for everything.
We strongly recommend.


O lugar de Joaquim é muito legal. Muito fácil de chegar. Fica perto (menos de 10 minutos a pé) de qualquer transporte público (ônibus ou metrô), shopping ou supermercado, ou restaurantes. O apartamento está bem equipado, com todas as comodidades que precisávamos. Check-in foi feito por sua filha, e ela foi muito atenciosa e agradável. Fomos bem-vindos de uma forma muito especial. Check-out (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza ficaríamos novamente neste apartamento de luxo. Joaquim, mais uma vez, muito obrigado por tudo.
Nós recomendamos fortemente.

Apartamento excelente, com boa localização e conforto, próximo ao Centro do Porto, com shopping a 200 metros, assim como metro.
Recomendo e com certeza voltaria a me hospedar.
O espaço é muito bom, confortável e próximo do comércio e transportes. Joaquim é muito atencioso.
Joaquim é ótimo anfitrião. O apartamento é muito confortável e espaçoso. Próximo ao metrô e supermercado. Bairro ótimo também. Recomendo!

space: 1 200 pi2, 2 chambres fermer, très grand et confortable. Tout équipé pour faire à manger, pour lessive. Peut coucher8 pers. 2 lits, plus 2 sofas lit. Stationnement de voiture disponible.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 25 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

L'appartement de sylvain est très bien situé et assez agréable, 
Sylvain n'était pas à Montreal mais il a été présent par téléphone et disponible pour mon arrivée, ce que j'ai trouvé très sympathique.

name: SPECIAL $87/NIGHT! MOLOKAI!
summary: This clean & cozy condo is located at Hotel Molokai on the ground floor of a two story complex. Hotel amenities are included with the condo. Hotel amenities are: Pool & Lounge area, Restaurant & Bar, Coin operated laundry, Free parking, WiFi & Concierge. The condo includes a king size bed, air conditioner, a Keurig, a microwave, a flat screen cable TV & a lanai (outdoor area) to enjoy your morning coffee & the beautiful weather. Hang by the pool and enjoy the spectacular panoramic ocean view.
space: The condo includes a KING size bed, air conditioning, a Keurig, a microwave, a flat screen cable television and a lanai (outdoor area) to enjoy your morning coffee and the beautiful Hawaii weather. The condo is embellished with charming accents of the Islands. The condo is part of Hotel Molokai, which is located right on the ocean, and is a short drive to shops & restaurants in Kaunakakai town. It boasts an incredible panoramic view of the ocean and surrounding islands. The hotel has a pool and lounge area right next to their recently renovated restaurant and bar. The comfort and convenience of the condo makes it a perfect place to stay during your Molokai trip!
description: This clean & cozy condo is located at Hotel Molokai on the ground floor of a two story complex. Hotel amenities are included with the condo. Hotel amenities are: Pool & Lounge area, Restaurant & Bar, Coin operated laundry, Free parking, WiFi & Concierge. The condo includes a king size bed, air conditioner, a Keurig, a microwave, a flat screen cable TV & a lanai (outdoor area) to enjoy your morning coffee & the beautiful weather. Hang by the pool and enjoy the spectacular panoramic ocean view. It boasts an incredible panoramic view of the ocean and surrounding islands. The hotel has a pool and lo
neighborhood_overview: Molokai is one of the only Hawaiian islands where you can still experience the unspoiled natural beauty of Hawaii. Things move at a slower pace without a skyscraper or stoplight in sight. Many residents still practice traditional Hawaiian customs, including warm hospitality. The small town of Kaunakakai has everything you need with a large dose of small town charm. Head to Kanemitsu bakery for a tasty brunch or late at night in the back alley for their famous hot bread - the perfect late night sweet treat. Molokai Pizza Cafe and Molokai Burger serve up familiar foods as well as local specials. Pick up groceries and other essentials at Friendly Market or Misaki’s. Souvenir shop in all of the locally owned businesses in town. If you’d rather explore the great outdoors, Molokai has everything an adventurer needs. The island has beautiful hikes, pristine waterfalls, incredible views and spectacular beaches without the crowds. From the hot and sunny west side to the lush and green east side
notes: Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions regarding rates, additional accommodations, transportation, etc..
transit: I highly recommend getting a rental car when visiting the island of Molokai. There is limited public transportation and a few taxis, but to truly experience what the island has to offer the freedom and cost of a rental car can’t be beat. The roads are not crowded and are easy to drive. With one main road, things are not hard to find. If you need help finding a rental car or if you have any other questions regarding transportation, please let me know!
access: This condo includes all hotel amenities (except for daily cleaning) such as a beachfront pool and lounge, hammocks, a gazebo, free parking, ice and vending machines, free WiFi, lush and tropical landscaping and a sense of ‘Ohana (a family type of hospitality). It’s only a short walk (less than 2 minutes) from the condo to the beachfront pool and the hotel’s restaurant & bar. The condo is a 5 minute drive to Kaunakakai town which has grocery stores, restaurants and unique shops. It is centrally located, which gives visitors access to all that Molokai has to offer.
interaction: The guest(s) of the condo have the entire unit to themselves, and is ideal for privacy - so there isn’t much contact with guests during their stay. But if you have any questions, concerns or curiosities leading up to your stay, please feel free to reach out to hotel staff or myself. We are head to make your trip as enjoyable and memorable as possible.

host.host_about: My name is Raymond N Kalilikane III. I was born and raised on the island of Molokai. Attended high school at Kamehameha Schools on Oahu and Oregon State University for college. I work as a Project Engineer at the Honolulu Airport and spend most weekends on Molokai. As a passionate outdoors person and a local country boy, Molokai is where I will always call home .

reviews.comments:
We had spend a great time in the condo! We got good instructions how to find the location and details about the check-in procedure. We didn't meet Raymond but the communication was very nice and friendly!
The location is perfect if you plan to stay a few days on Molokai. We can definitively recommend this location.

This was like staying at the hotel for much less than the hotel rates were. Place was nice and clean. Bed seemed new; comfortable. Iron & ironing board, coffee maker, coffee cups, glass ware and soaps were included. There was A/C, although we didn't use it; night breeze through the unit kept us cool enough. Centrally located on the island nothing was a difficult drive. Raymond was quick with communication. Provided easy instructions for key card in lock box. Hotel has a nice smaller pool (7 ft deep end) and the bar/restaurant are convenient on site. Great ocean views on property, especially off the pool and bar areas. Has been one of our favorite places and plan to return on our next trip to Molokai.

The room was very clean and nice, we never even used the ac unit. The location is GREAT. Right next to a restaurant/bar on the beach (does it get any better?). Molokai is a fun place to explore. Highly recommend.

Very cute little room, clean and comfortable. Good location.Easy check in. Only downside was having rude/noisy neighbors late at night as noise traveled through the closed windows easily, it's also very light in the room due to there being no coverings over the frosted glass, so if you need a dark room to sleep in I recommend bringing some dark towels or something to hang over the windows. Food options on Molokai are quite limited and expensive.
Great little place to stay! Raymond gave very clear directions and everything was very clean and comfortable.
Very cute little room at the Hotel Molokai. The room suited our needs perfectly and was a great price. Everything was very clean and well appointed. We loved our stay. Mahalo!

I was there for a week, and found it very comfortable, peaceful, and well located. The host was quite professional, cordial, and exceptionally responsive. The hotel is a pleasure to stay in - very relaxing and unlike the polished and glitzy resort style hotels so often found in the islands. And their restaurant-bar veranda at the water is a tropical treat - there are even delightful and sincerely friendly local Hawaiian musicians entertaining  every night. Service can be slow, but it's such a perfect place to relax - or to learn to relax - that this is no real problem. I'll definitely look forward to coming back!
This was a great place to stay!restaurant and bar on site. Also just a short walk to a quite relaxing beach.
Listing description accurate. Satisfactory room. Able to use Hotel Molokai facilities. Convenient for shops.

Das Zimmer liegt in der Anlage von Molokai Hotel. Es ist gut zu finden und wir hatten einen super Aufenthalt dort. Es war alles da was wir brauchten und mit der überdachten Terrasse, konnten wir alles auch bei Regen genießen! We enjoy our stay there!!

Raymond's private suite was as described - clean, comfortable and well appointed. The use of Hotel Molokai's facilities are a bonus along with the central location. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay here  :-)

Had such a great time staying here. The studio is perfectly located within Hotel Molokai and after a day of racing round the island to check things out it was lovely to relax by the pool over a beer or two overlooking the water. The grounds are beautifully well kept and the locals/staff are friendly and welcoming. Location was only 10-mins drive from airport, a couple of mins from petrol/food market so it felt very conveniently located. Would stay again!
If you want to stay on Molokai, this is a great, central location!

We enjoyed our time there.  the AC was surely important. The bed was comfortable. However, the electrical circuit tripped multiple times which seemed to involve both our room  and the room next to ours.  Communication during the reservation process was very good however, on arrival communication regarding the entry lock box was lacking.  Fortunately the hotel desk was finally able to assist us.
Great location, great help at the hotel, really nice unit.

2nd stay at the Hotel Molokai, but Raymond's unit was a much better location. Neighbors were quiet, locale is safe, but then... it's Molokai! 

The bed and pillows were fantastic, and we appreciated all amenities. Greatly appreciated being able to reach Ray easily! Mahalo nui loa!

This was a private time share/condo in the hotel. So although we didn't have maid service daily (which we didn't need anyway), we still had access to the hotel's facilities and amenities such as the pool (didn't use cause we're on an island and surrounded by beautiful beaches), restaurant/bar (didn't patronize cause we ate at dakine local grinds spots instead), hammocks (which we chilled on every night), and washers/dryers (these we did use and were very inexpensive). There were some nice extras too like the beach chairs in the room which came in handy as we took them with us all around the island. We also got to borrow snorkeling equipment from the front desk for free. Also, when we lost our card key for the room, we didn't have to contact our Airbnb host. Instead, the hotel just made us a new one. Oh, I would also like to mention that the Wifi is through the (Website hidden by Airbnb) free and was pretty good.

This location is a pretty central spot on Molokai, just minutes from any direction. We enjoyed our stay on this very laid back island and would stay here again if and when we revisit this lovely place!

Fantastic location and so relaxing. Nice and quiet. Bed was big and comfy!  He had a Keith so if you are picky about your coffee. Bring you own coffee pods. I loved taking my coffee out by the pool/ ocean and reading. Nightly live music while we were there also

The place was neat and clean.  However, the A/C is not as effective as I would hope for because how it is placed.  The wall is blocking the cold air.  There was a sewage smell from the bathroom at times and had to close bathroom door from spreading the room.
Ray was very accommodating.  The place was nice and clean.  The odor is still in the bathroom and does not want to go away.
As described!  Bring hand soap.
Molokai is a special place. Grateful I had the opportunity to visit and was able to stay at Hotel Molokai. It was a great place to rest at night after our adventures during the day.
The place was great!  It's very quiet and everyone was very friendly.  Host provided everything in listing.  Place was cute and cozy and close to town.

This place is top grade as far as local standards go.  I had a wonderful time exploring and immersing myself into the local environment, culture and people.  Raymond's place is ideal. Being part of  the Hotel Molokai, this helps tremendously in terms of comfort, entertainment, meals and ease of access to the town and most parts of the island. Mahalo, Raymond.
It was a great stay at Ray's place. Can only recommend it!!

The stay was great. It was all we needed for comfort. The patio off the room was nice. The screen doors make it nice to have the breeze blow through. Great centralized location on the island in a quiet neighborhood. We saw deer on the beech and whales blowing in the ocean. Great vacation!
Great room , great location and friendly host. Wish we could have stayed longer we loved the resort and amenities especially sunset at the bar watching the world go by!

We loved Raymond's place. The bed was soft and comfortable. The pool was refreshing after a long walk on the beach. I was on the island for work, but we got to play too. We hope to come back in a few months. 
I will remember next time to bring my own soap and shampoo. Thank you
Centralized location. Neat and clean unit and employees at the hotel were friendly and helpful
We had a great, relaxing time at Raymond's place. Molokai is an incredible island, and I recommend staying here when you come visit.

Zimmer war wie in der Anzeige beschrieben, mit Kühlschrank, Mikrowelle, TV, Klima, Bügelbrett. Das Bett war bequem und das ganze Zimmer und Bad war sauber. Einziger Negativpunkt war der Sitzplatz, da die Hühner diesen versch..... so war das sitzen auf Sitzplatz eher ungemütlich.
Leider schloss das Hotelrestaurant vor ca. 1 Monat. So musste man fürs Essen immer 1.5 Meilen ins Dorf fahren. Evtl. öffnet es ja in naher Zukunft wieder.
Das Zimmer kann aber absolut weiter empfohlen werden.
Nice place. Clean and comfortable.

This airbnb is one of the best values on Molokai. The hotel staff are helpful and courteous. Ask for Doreen at the front desk to arrange trips. You are only minutes from Kanakakai. People are very friendly. The Saturday market is fun and your trip won't be complete without getting Hot Bread. Paddler's Inn is a nearby restaurant, and it's a treat to hear the local talent. Molokai is the kind of place to experience rural Hawaii. The Halawa Valley Cutlural Hike is incredible and your experience at Kalaupapa will stay with you long after. The Macadamia Nut farm is interesting. Food is expensive and choices are limited; however Kumu Farms is a good place for local produce. There are only 2 gas stations on the island. Most shops close at 4:30 or 5:00 p.m. Just remember to slow down - you're on Molokai.

Great, affordable and centrally located accommodation. Raymond is an awesome host and makes sure you're comfortable and responds quickly to all questions ! Definitely recommend this place for those visiting Molokai and prefer to be close to town and airport.

Tolles Hotel, alles schön gemacht und gut gepflegt. Das Restaurant hat neu eröffnet und ist toll und die Speisen sehr lecker. Guter Ausgangspunkt um die Insel zu erkunden, und sich anschliessend im Pool abzukühlen. Der Preis ist sehr fair (etwa die Hälfte vom normalen Hotelpreis).

Straight forward and seamless stay. 
Easy communication with Raymond who was only a quick text/phone call away if I needed anything which I didn't. 
Great affordable rate to stay in Hotel Molokai which is otherwise a lot more expensive. Great onsite restaurant with beautiful view across the reef at sunset.
The banana foster is crip
Raymond's place is conveniently located at Hotel Moloka'i in Kaunakakai (biggest/main town).  Great place to lay your head after a day of hiking and beaching. Aloha

This room is a great value compared to the Hotel's actual rates. The bed was very comfy, the AC kept the room cool, and it was QUIET. Locals were actually surprised when I told them the rate. Just FYI, this room is privately owned so don't expect daily room service. The trade off is well worth it. I'm coming BACK. Thanks Raymond, a hui hou, malama pono.
Great location, very close to the Town. Nice and clean room, with AC. Next door is great restaurant with great food and with live music in the hotel.

The room was comfortable and was exactly what we needed for our stay on Moloka'i.  The king-sized bed gave us plenty of room to stretch out. The room's access to the hotel's bar/restaurant was a plus. We relaxed there with iced tea or wine several times on our short visit to enjoy the ocean breeze and view. We also had Wifi from the hotel. Everything about our stay here was easy. We would definitely stay here again.  Thanks, Ray.

Great low key place to stay. Easy to communicate with host and very simple check in/out process!  The ac works but can still get very hot so just know that it's not a perfectly cool system. Would gladly recommend Raymond and his place!
Nice place. Easy check in/out. Ray was very helpful.

This was a very lovely place in  a very convenient location. Such an affordable price and we got to enjoy the hotel amenities. We had a great time celebrating our birthdays! I would definitely recommend Raymond's place!
You're right on the ocean front and there is a great little restaurant at the hotel.

We really  loved our one night stay in Raymond's rustic but well kept, clean unit. We were leaving early in the morning to hike down to Kalaupapa so really appreciated the very comfie bed and the Keurig coffee. 

We arrived early the day before our hike, but Raymond graciously allowed us to stash a few supplies in the frig while he got the room ready since we wanted to take off for some exploring on the west end of the island. It was lovely enjoying a beverage by the pool when we got back and to watch the amazing Molokai sunset before getting ready for  dinner right there at the restaurant on the premises. The ahi was fantastic and the ambiance and live entertainment delightful....right next to the beach! Be sure to make reservations. We didn't so had a little wait but the staff went out of their way to give us the best available table as quickly as possible. 

All of the resort staff were friendly and helpful. Our only complaint is that we only booked for one night. We fell in love with Molokai and this quaint hotel. You couldn't ask for a more responsive, gracious host than Raymond. We will be going back!
Great location. Nothing fancy, but is clean and affordable. Hotel bar and restaurant is nice. Good for a 1-2 night stay.
Great spot for a great value.  Ray provided a beach towel which was a nice touch. Hotel Molokai is an excellent location.  I had a great stay!
Thanks so much. We really appreciated the keurig coffee in the morning.

Raymond's place is ground floor unit, part of the hotel. It's just like the pictures. We especially liked having beach chairs and towels provided and having a coffee machine, fridge and microwave in the room. You will hear the people upstairs so bring ear plugs if you're noise-sensitive. The restaurant/bar has a magnificent sunset view and staff are very friendly. We just wished we could've stayed longer! Moloka'i is a gorgeous island and I would highly recommend it to anyone considering staying here.

Superb! This little apartment was exactly what i needed. A king size bed, AC, and super clean!  Raymond is fantastic host. Very helpful! I went to visit some friends who live in Molokai and when they came to visit me at the hotel, they said that this is one of the best apartments in Hotel Molokai that they've seen. I would definitely recommend staying at Raymond's place.

This place is basic and fine. The price is great! And having access to the amenities of the hotel is also great. Good coffee maker, and beach chairs and beachtowels. But nothing to stir the coffee with, not even a spoon, and no tea bags, Kleenex, or other small amenities that I have grown used to in previous Airbnb bookings I’ve made.

Raymonds place was very clean and tidy..... best part of our stay was the bar/ resturant just down the path. There was a little confusion with checkin and pricing but it was resolved quickly. Cheers for having us.

Raymond was a very accommodating host. He allowed us to check in hours early after learning we had been unable to reserve a car rental and had no place to put our luggage upon arrival on the island. His place was very comfortable and clean with access to many resort amenities. He also provided thoughtful extra amenities, including beach chairs and towels. It is close to local services in addition to those available at the resort. It is a beautiful setting, right on the ocean, although no beach on the property. We recommend it as a central location for touring the island.

The condo is part of Motel Molokai. There is a patio outside the condo or you can sit by the pool close to the water with beautiful sunsets. The room is basic with no daily cleaning which is fine with us. It’s has WiFi, refrigerator and coffee. You can use the computer and printer at the motel. There is a shampoo, conditioner and soap dispenser in shower. Hotel Molokai seemed to be one of the few nice restaurants to eat at in the evening with very good food.

Perfect spot for staying on Molokai! It's a bit of a walk to downtown, but the shuttle is only $5 per person, so it's pretty convenient. Staff is lovely and the beach is small but not crowded at all. We were the only people on the beach for hours. We loved it. 
Only complaints we had were the shower had a few hairs in it, and there was only one half roll of TP when we arrived. Totally minor.

Hotel Molokai was just the quiet getaway I was looking for and Ray’s unit was great. The amenities at the property are good: bar/restaurant, pool, hammocks, beach access. If you can’t rent a car (I wasn’t able to) you can easily pay the hotel shuttle for rides to town, airport, and tour activities.
Great place to stay!
Ray is great!  He was able to accommodate us last minute and made our Island getaway perfect!

This private apartment in the complexe of Hotel Molokai was exactly what we were looking for. A nice place to stay and we had all the amenities of the hotel for a good price. The apartement was clean and the check in was very easy. On my next trip I shure will consider this again!!!

Raymond, our host was responsive and helpful. His simple and clean unit at Hotel Molokai is in a convenient oceanside location near the main town. Great for the budget traveller who just wants the basics.  The kitchy/cute complex has a nice restaurant for lunch or dinner with live music in the evening. Also recommend local Molokai Car Rental for decent used-car wheels at affordable rates. Be aware that cell service can be spotty there and elsewhere on island (T-Mobile did better, AT&T mostly skunked out). But hey, you're on Molokai to "get away from it all", right?

Raymond is a great host! He responded quickly and allowed me to check in earlier when I had an emergency to take care of. The place is located on Hotel Molokai so the cleaniless, amenities, location, view was great! I was only troubled by the barking dog next door but I don't think it belongs to the owner next door so don't worry too much about it. Overall, I had a great stay!

Hey, when you are in Hawaii and need a great place to rest your head after visiting the sites on Molokai this is a great place. Yummy warm coffee to start your day. 
My host had the air-conditioning on prior to my arrival so I felt welcomed 
One of the best restaurants I went to during my 12 day stay on the island
Was right on site, fresh fish, steak, ono delicious.
One of the perks, several chickens, roaming, no kidding, great to reduce bug population, especially mosquitoes!!

Awesome! Awesome! Awesome! 
We can’t wait to go back & stay at Raymond’s Place. It’s minutes from everything you need on Molokai. It’s perfect!
The sheets are sooooo soft we slept like babies. The Restraunt at the Hotel Molokai had the Best Live Hawaiian Music & we sat at a table right on the ocean. The Best mini vacation we ever had!
Quiet and close to outside bar and pool.  Recommend rental car for cruising around if bicycling is not your style.  Loved the lanai and the neighbors.

This is actually my second time staying at Raymond’s. I came a few months back with a friend and stayed here after doing the mule ride to Kalaupapa (an unforgettable trip). This time around we just wanted to relax and have a weekend getaway from Oahu. So first of all, you can’t beat the location! Raymond’s place is located at the Hotel Molokai, just a couple miles outside of the main town of Kaunakakai. The bar/restaurant attached to the hotel is just footsteps away from your room, and it’s open 7 days a week for lunch and dinner. We had dinner one night  there and sat right on the water and watched a beautiful sunset. The big bed in the room is so so comfy—it felt like a pillow. There are extra bathroom towels, beach towels, beach chairs, and  keurig coffee available. Check in was simple and the a/c unit cools the room quickly. This room and the hotel in general are not what I’d consider luxurious, but rather quaint and comfortable and pretty perfect for anyone who would be interested in visiting Molokai. If I come back again, I’ll probably request to stay at Raymond’s a third time.
The place was just what we needed! Clean, minimal and comfortable.  We would stay again if we are ever back in Molokai.

There aren’t many places to stay on Molokai. There are just a couple of condo complexes, the Molokai Hotel, and then single family homes with air BnB. This unit is s condo-ized former room at the Molokai Hotel. It’s okay, clean and centrally located. The lock on the lanai door was just a chain that left us feeling insecure. However, we had no problems whatsoever. This place will do, but you might be happier in condo with a bit more space and a kitchen as there are literally only 4-5 places to eat out and even then only one place remains open on Sundays.

Great little bungalow!  Hotel room.  Friendly and helpful host. Very nice inside and outside. Friendly patrons and employees at the restaurant and hotel.. Refreshing pool..  Quite place to relax, base your day trips from, meet locals and other tourists if you like or, just chill if you will..
This is more than a normal place to stay because you are staying at a hotel! It was clean, quiet (except the roosters/chickens, but that is Hawai'i lol), and I would be glad to stay here again

Great little room on a mini resort. It has air conditioning, a super comfortable bed, tv, mini fridge, and microwave. We borrowed a(n old) movie from the front desk. There's a pool and restaurant with great food if a little pricey. Raymond's communication is spot on. Loved it!
First time using Airbnb. Good experience, better than expected.

A lovely clean and bright room with nice bathroom. We enjoyed the TV, fridge, microwave and coffeemachine. Lovely restaurant and bar on the premises which  overlooks the sea, complete with a small  pool and sunchairs and hammocks to sunbathe. A very relaxing location/space for a holiday and my husand and I enjoyed being there.  Raymond was helpful and responsive when we had an inquiry and we recommend his place.
Such a cute place, bigger than we expected and it really suited us well. Spacious and we loved the portable AC. Very clean, absolutely loved it!
Great small condo on Hotel Molokai. Comfortable bed, clean towels, beach towels, fridge, Keurig and good WiFi connection! It is only a few minutes to Kaunakakai shops and eateries.
Wonderful stay!! Raymond was easy to communicate with. Everything was clean and we loved all the chickens!! :)

We enjoyed our stay at Raymond’s place. It was nice and relaxing for the end of our Hawaiian trip. The pool was a nice thing to have as the ocean on the south coast is not the most welcoming. 
Mahalo.

Great space - private but near enough to both town and the rest of the southern coast that we made so with a couple of rented bikes. Ray was hugely responsive, flexible, and has a deep love for his home island. He made everything supremely easy for our short stay.
Nice place, has a nice restaurant on the property which was pretty convenient! Pretty centrally locates to explore the island! Would definitely stay again!
All around fantastic!  A++

Raymonds place was a perfect place to stay on Molokai. The place was very clean, check-in/checkout was easy, the amenities were great, overall we loved it! Definitely worth a stop here if you are looking to relax

Raymond’s communication was immediate and attentive from booking onward. His unit is a sweet little hotel suite unit that was impeccably clean and comfortable. The bed was so comfortable...worth the stay alone! He provided soaps, shampoo, conditioner, body wash and there was even a variety of coffee pods to choose from so we could enjoy coffee on the patio in the mornings. He had beach towels, beach chairs and a beach mat available to use. The grounds were beautifully manicured...hammocks next to the ocean...a (Website hidden by Airbnb) on-site restaurant and lounge. It was a great base for us to enjoy our days exploring the island of Moloka’i and relax at night poolside while listening to the ocean waves lap the shores.
Great place

Raymond's spot was clean, convenient, with great amenities offered by hotel Moloka'i like the pool.  The check in/out process was super easy and it was an all around great experience. I definitely recommend it if you're looking for a place to stay in Moloka'i.
Great location. Close to the main town. Central to everything else. Had coffee, mini fridge, towels and soaps.
Perfect location for sightseeing in the island. Would book the apartment again.
Great location, good value.

Good location to tour the island, as it’s quite central. 
Comfortable bed. 
Checking was super easy.
If you need a place, consider his place. Great value and very hospitable
Great location, nice clean and updated room. The bed was INCREDIBLE - King size and so comfortable. Just steps away from the hotel bar, restaurant, pool, or hammock.
