I would recommend this place to anyone.  Paulo,  his wife,  and children make this place special.

Fue nuestra primera experiencia en airbnb. Super positiva. Era como estar en un hotel pero con la comodidad de una casa. Viajamos con nuestra hija de 11 meses y fue todo espectacular. Excelentes anfitriones. Poblenou nos encantó. Un barrio a escasos minutos del centro pero mucho más tranquilo...a una cuadra de su propia rambla y de la playa. Volveríamos sin dudarlo!!!

Estuvo muy bien nuestra habitación privada en la casa de Paulo. El barrio tiene una pequeña rambla donde encuentras muchos restaurantes y supermercados, la playa está muy cerca y te puedes mover fácil en bus a las principales atracciones turísticas de Barcelona, compra en el metro o en la parada del tranvía las tarjeta de pasajes  sale un poco más barato que pagar directamente en el bus. La casa de Paula tiene cocina que puedes usar con todo lo necesario para hacer el desayuno o la cena, es compartida pero en el tiempo que la usamos siempre estuvo libre.

Our stay was good at Paulo's place. All the amenities were available and the neighborhood was lively.  It is also very close to the beach and the connectivity  (public transport) to almost all the important places is pretty good. Only drawback was the size of the room. It is sufficient only for two people. Since we were four it was a bit congested.

Primera vez en Barcelona y ha sido una experiencia sobresaliente, el apartamento esta muy bien ubicado y a no mas de 3 cuadras de la playa (bogatell). Todo ha sido de maravillas, totalmente recomendable! 

Saludos chicos y espero que nos volvamos a ver a futuro.

Great location! Will stay here again if we come back to barcelona! Walkable distance to various bus lines. Rambla de Poblenou around the corner and beach/clubs walking distance! It's like a hostel, own living space and individual entrance to rooms.
This is a very nice and down to earth couple how will go out of their way to make sure you are happy. I had a nice large well kept bedroom and extremely large bath!
Great location near the beach. Paulo and family were very nice and welcoming. Room was as described and furnished nicely. Would recommend this to anyone traveling to Barcelona.

Paulo's rooms are really clean, spacious and comfortable.  The communal room is really large and really comfy. There is everything that you need for a comfortable stay. Kitchen facilities are excellent. Anything you need just ask, Paulo will do his best to get you anything that you need.

Eine wirklich sehr schön eingerichtetes Zimmer mit einem riesigen Bad. Alles war sauber.
Die Wohnung liegt wirklich sehr ruhig gelegen, aber dennoch mittendrin. Die Rambla Poblenou ist direkt nebenan.
Danke für den tollen Aufenthalt!

Excelente alojamiento! Tuvimos un problema en la reserva por un descuido de nuestra parte (pusimos 1 huésped cuando en realidad éramos 3), pero por suerte Paulo y su familia tenían lugar para alojarnos y nos atendieron muy amablemente. La habitación fue sumamente cómoda e íntima. Pudimos usar el lavarropas las veces que lo necesitamos e incluso nos prestaron sombrilla y toallas para ir a la playa que queda a pocas cuadras. Está lejos del centro pero el transporte público queda muy cerca del alojamiento! La zona es muy tranquila, la Rambla de Poblenou queda solo a 1 cuadra, mucho movimiento de gente, bares y supermercados. MUY RECOMENDABLE, volveríamos!!!
Очень хороший хозяин. Отделный санузел. Близко к пляжу.
This place is great for going to the beach and enjoy the night life in Barcelona!
Personnes très sympathiques, aider et tout conseiller

Staying at Paulo's place is like visiting a family. They are very kind and help us with many things. The place is spotless clean and spacious. It's very close to the beach and bus stops. The whole place is well stocked for a short stay. We had a great time in Barcelona and meeting people here. Thank you. Will come back!

Nous avons été ravis de notre séjour chez Paulo et sa femme ,l'accueil est super, ce sont des personnes chaleureux chez qui l'ont se sent bien !
Le côté «auberge» avec la partie commune est très pratique et bien équipée. 
La chambre 5 est top pour les familles avec enfants, nous étions à 2adultes, un enfant et un bébé et avions toute la place nécessaire et une très grande sallle de bains. De plus la climatisation est très appréciable.
Très bonne adresse à conseiller.
Encore merci à la femme de Paulo qui a été aux petits pour notre petite famille !
appartamento vicino spiaggia e Rambla

We really enjoyed our stay at Paulos accommodation. Everything was as described. 
We totally recommend it!

When I am in Barcelona again I wouldn’t picture myself staying anywhere else. I truly had an amazing time and staying here contributed to that without a doubt. Thank you so much for having me and I will see y’all next time!

He only gave us light sheets to cover our beds, so it was not enough bedding for the night.  I ended up sleeping with my additional shirt and jeans on.  Room is clean, but you will not be able to walk bare feet.  The Lighting of the room and common area (kept dark) were very poor.  His photos show really nice bright room, but it ended up a lot darker.  
It is Great location to go to the beach.  To the Metro or Tram line, you need to walk some distance.

Cris and Paulo are amazing hosts and we are ever so thankful for their hospitality. Their photos are accurate and their place is very comfortable. Minutes away from the beach which was very handy. Their kindness contributed greatly to our enjoyment in Barcelona!
A very good Location...5 min walk to the Beach. Very good Host. Price-Value is great.
Place is great; clean, big room, close to the beach! And a beautiful neighborhood. And having a shared kitchen is a big plus.

Our stay at Paulo's was great. There was a large kitchen and living space before you get to your room. The room was really spacious - and not to mention the bathroom! The bathroom was really big, everything was really neat, and there was a TV and A/C. Great privacy. Their Airbnb is located in a great area, with cafes and restaurants around. Paulo and his wife were amazing hosts - they were welcoming, caring, and kind! I would love to return and stay with them!

La ubicación es muy buena, es un barrio con muchas posibilidades y muy cerca de la playa. Fueron todo facilidades tanto a la llegada como a la salida. Son una familia estupenda. La habitación es como en las fotos. Lo único q hay escaleras pero nos facilitaron un lugar abajo para dejar la silla de la niña y así q perfecto! Muy recomendable

It was our first stay in airbnb in BCN and it was a great experience thanks to Paulo's hospitality. We were very warmly welcomed by Chris, she was always very helpful and we felt like home. The room was clean when we arrived and even cleaned once during our one week stay. Very close to the beach and well communicated with all tourisric places, however we were walking quite a lot and visitng almost everything by foot. Thank you and we hope to see you again!
Great place, located near the beach, clean, huge room, confortable and surrounded my great bars and restaurants
Si el viaje es para estar en la playa es el lugar ideal, adicional buenos restaurantes, bares. La habitacion es tal como la describen.

Great location - very close to the beach, the H16 and V27 buses or llacuna metro station  is also close by. Lots of variety in restaurants and supermarkets within walking distance. 
Lovely host and his family - easy to communicate with and very accommodating for us to leave our luggage prior to heading to our afternoon train.
Good kitchen facilities and nice to have a private fridge in the room.
Highly recommend!
Super host, very friendly and helpful. Location of the place is just amazing. I recommend Paulo to every one.

The apartments location is great, close to the beach and a Metro to the heart of downtown. You also have access to a kitchen which was very useful. Paulo gives a lot of tips and advice on where to go and what you can do around the apartment! Overall I would stay here again.
Great stay! Location can't be beat!
Lovely place in a great neighbourhood. It is easy to get around Barcelona via the public transit and it’s a 5 minute walk from the beautiful beach. Easy and quick communication as well :)

name: Secret Falls Retreat  Pool View Rm
summary: This is a large property located on the Wailua rim with amazing views of Mt Waialeale, the wettest place on earth!.  Centrally located on the island, with close access to most all the amenities the island has to offer. We have a solar heated salt water pool and Jacuzzi, all rooms open to the pool deck and outstanding views!
space: This is our largest room.  It has a Cal-king Tempurpedic bed, private bath, ceiling fans, T, small fridge, can with additional fees can accommodate a total of 4 people. (2 is standard price). It opens to the pool deck with majestic views of Mt. Waialeale and the Wailua River Valley.
description: This is a large property located on the Wailua rim with amazing views of Mt Waialeale, the wettest place on earth!.  Centrally located on the island, with close access to most all the amenities the island has to offer. We have a solar heated salt water pool and Jacuzzi, all rooms open to the pool deck and outstanding views! This is our largest room.  It has a Cal-king Tempurpedic bed, private bath, ceiling fans, T, small fridge, can with additional fees can accommodate a total of 4 people. (2 is standard price). It opens to the pool deck with majestic views of Mt. Waialeale and the Wailua River Valley. Access to solar heated salt water pool, Jacuzzi, living room, kitchen, all pool decks, and BBQ's. We live on the property, so we are available to answer questions and assist you with your island itinerary. Very quiet neighborhood, beautiful views of the mountains and valley, centrally located on the island, no need to stay North Shore, then South Shore, each is just approx 45 minutes fro
neighborhood_overview: Very quiet neighborhood, beautiful views of the mountains and valley, centrally located on the island, no need to stay North Shore, then South Shore, each is just approx 45 minutes from the house.
notes: We are 5 minutes from the beach, shopping and some of the islands best restaurants. The Sleeping Giant hiking trail is within walking distance, many more trails are just up the road, and a beautiful biking trail along the beach is just 10 min away.
transit: You will need to rent a car. There is no public transportation available in this area.
access: Access to solar heated salt water pool, Jacuzzi, living room, kitchen, all pool decks, and BBQ's.
interaction: We live on the property, so we are available to answer questions and assist you with your island itinerary.
house_rules: Smoking is allowed outside in the front of the property away from other guests Pool and jacuzzi close at 10 pm, and quiet time on pool deck is after 10pm All parking is on property, no on street parking.

host.host_about:
Aloha!

Welcome to Secret Falls Retreat in Kapaa, on the island of Kauai in Hawaii.

We are a permitted Homestay with the County of Kauai!:).

Use Permit No. U-2015-14
Class IV Zoning Permit Z-IV-2015-15

This property formerly called Mohala Ke Ola, has been running as a BnB for over 25 years. You will find it listed in the old Kauai guide books, we renamed it in 2011 when I purchased the property. You can really hear the water falls roar on a quiet night after the rainfall, and you can hike to the falls from the back deck. Hence, what a better name than Secret Falls Retreat!. 
We were closed for a while as we did many renovations and upgrades, but are up and running 100% now and look forward to hosting you and receiving new reviews soon!:).
 
I am origainlly from California, grew up in Northern British Columbia, Canada. 
I love the outdoors and am a workaholic, always busy! Tim was born and raised in Hawaii, so you have all the local inside information you need:). We have 3 children ages 8, 12 and 15 that attend a private and public school here on Kauai.  They help out with the BnB when time allows between their studies and extracurricular activities.  We enjoy the beach, hiking, horseback riding, paddle boarding, beach Volley Ball, fishing, and soccer. 
As we love music, we also own an event company called Hawaiian Muzik Factory, so we do weddings, anniverseries, baby parties, graduation parties ect. We also have large event tents, tables, sound systems, lights, and live bands.  Between the kids, the BnB and the Muzik Factory, it is a busy fun life in paradise! We look forward to meeting you!

Our property has a solar heated salt water pool and jacuzzi. Located right in the middle of the island, so you can go to north shore or south shore in 45 min to an hour either way.  No need to bounce accomadations to see the whole island! We live on the property and are available for assistance most of the time. Some of the best restaurants, beaches and shopping is only minutes away. Hiking trails on the Sleeping Giant are within walking distance. We offer a continental breakfast that varies depending on availability of local produce and fruits ect. We do not have breakfast on Sundays and Holidays as that is our family time:). We are a family run operation and look forward to hosting you:).
Mahalo,
Darcy and Tim

reviews.comments: Fantastic property and accomodation. Perfectly located for visits to the Napali Coast and the Waimea Canyon. Lily was so welcoming. Would definitely stay again.

Dies war nach 2001 (noch unter anderer Leitung) unser zweiter Aufenthalt im Secret Falls. Für uns immer noch einer der besten Plätze auf Kaua'i, sei es von den Entfernungen auf der Insel, vom Ambiente und nicht zuletzt von der Stimmung her. Der Garten und die Poolanlage sind immer noch eine Augenweide und ein Platz zum Verweilen. Quiet and easy - triffts wohl am besten und eine herzliche, perfekte Betreuung durch unsere Gastgeber Lilly und Jade.
The reservation was canceled the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The photos for Darcy's place don't do it justice.  It's an amazing experience to be in the space.  As a host, Darcy was very thoughtful and went the extra mile to make our stay great.  You can't go wrong with this stay :)

A quick note: this location is a full bed and breakfast and a cut above most airbnb offerings.  We stayed in a very accommodating master suite with a fridge, several chairs, and tv.

Tim and Darcy were fantastic hosts; they were kind enough to let us follow them to the local farmer's market and gave detailed directions to nearby hikes!  They were always willing to respond, even at odd hours and for unusual requests.

The location was private with beautiful views and a pool.  The provided breakfasts were well done with fresh fruit daily.  

Our only critique was hearing footsteps on the floor above.  Darcy and Tim informed us that they were aware of this concern and were working to soundproof the room within the next couple months; it may be worth checking to see if this concern still holds up.

All in all, we were extremely pleased to have stayed there.
Very nice B&B. Good breakfast, wonderful hosts with lots of local tips, stunning views

Darcy and Tim are the loveliest hosts around! They made us feel SO welcome and treated us like family the whole time we were there. The place was sparkling clean and no funky smells — pool and hot tub were clean and well-functioning as well (honestly for all the plants and such around the place, I don’t think I saw a leaf in the pool the whole time!). Big plush bath AND beach towels for guests to use! We were also allowed to use bug spray and sun screen that prior guests had left behind, which was much appreciated. View from the place is breathtaking and no words can do it justice. 10/10 you should stay at the Secret Falls Retreat!! I hope I get to again some day!! :)

Had the most amazing experience at Darcy and Tim's. From the pool temperature, to the VIEWS to the amazing hospitality they bestowed upon us. It was my birthday when I was there and they were so excited and gifted us some local chocolate and wine. Incredible, informative and sweet people matched with an absolutely beautiful space. This was the icing on the cake for a unforgettable trip for us. Thank you both!

Darcy and Tim made my stay in Kauai lovely. Secret Falls was the best place to relax and unwind after my days hiking or touring. They recommended a great hike and the breakfasts were amazing (lots of fresh fruit)! Highly recommend if you’re looking for a secluded, relaxing place. And it’s still not too far from restaurants and stores.
Best view in Kauai! Stay here if you want to enjoy a refreshing saline pool and an amazing mountain / forest view. The hosts are very friendly and super accommodating.
Friendly hosts. Amaxing views!

After five nights at Secret Falls Retreat, I would never stay anywhere else in Kauai. The location is ideal for crisscrossing all over the island. I loved how quiet and peaceful it was, away from most hubs of tourism. The breakfast each morning was spectacular - with fresh fruit, an assortment of bread, and specialty coffee that I am now addicted to. Darcy and Tim made me feel so welcome as a solo traveler and gave me great recommendations for restaurants and things to do. I felt so lucky that I stumbled upon this listing and that it was available.

Der grosse Pool View Room ist ein fantastisches Zimmer, das keine Wünsche offen lässt. Darcy und Tim stellen leckere Kaffeemischungen zur Verfügung und jede einzelne Mischung ist ein Genuss! Das WiFi ist schnell und die Aussicht einfach toll. Der Ort und die Aussichtspunkte sind schnell zu erreichen. Ich habe mich bei Darcy und Tim sehr wohl gefühlt. Danke!

name: Grande chambre au coeur du PLATEAU
summary: Cette chambre est très grande, spacieuse et lumineuse en journée. En plus de la localisation, nous avons choisi cet appartement pour son côté convivial, spacieux et pratique.  Quartier dynamique près de toutes commodités possibles et imaginables.

name: MODERN APART. IN THE CENTER - 3 BEDROOM- BLANCA
summary: Bright and cheerful apartment, in a neoclassical building from 1908, completely renovated with materials of the highest quality.
space: Spacious apartment, with a separate living room and kitchen. It also has a cheerful gallery that looks out over a typical Eixample-style inner courtyard that includes a dinning room as well as a nice corner with a large desk that is perfect for reading and writing. It has two double rooms with double beds, a room with bunk beds perfect for adults and/or children and two bathrooms with shower. Tourist registration code: HUTB-008670
description: Bright and cheerful apartment, in a neoclassical building from (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , completely renovated with materials of the highest quality. Spacious apartment, with a separate living room and kitchen. It also has a cheerful gallery that looks out over a typical Eixample-style inner courtyard that includes a dinning room as well as a nice corner with a large desk that is perfect for reading and writing. It has two double rooms with double beds, a room with bunk beds perfect for adults and/or children and two bathrooms with shower. Tourist registration code: HUTB (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Myself, Cristina, owner of the apartment and my colleague Ramón will be available during your stay for anything you may need. :-) The goal of Glocal Apartments Barcelona is for our clients to feel like a Barcelona native and for them to enjoy the city the way a local does. The apartment is located in the middle of a lively and animated neighborhood full of shops, restaurants and p
neighborhood_overview: The goal of Glocal Apartments Barcelona is for our clients to feel like a Barcelona native and for them to enjoy the city the way a local does. The apartment is located in the middle of a lively and animated neighborhood full of shops, restaurants and places frequently visited by city natives, allowing visitors to feel and experience the city just the way someone from Barcelona would. We are located in the central Eixample district, just 300 meters from the Rambla de Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia with their famous monuments by Gaudí and just 150 meters from the Avinguda Diagonal. We are also just a 15-minute walk from Plaça de Catalunya.
notes: 2,48€ CITY TAX PER PERSON PER NIGHT NOT INCLUDED IN PRICE. Free WIFI. Feel free to check our web (Website hidden by Airbnb) We have selected some of the most emblematic places in the area to help you enjoy the city just as a local does. :-) HUTB-008670
transit: Parking available nearby: 25 euros/24 hours Metro just a 10-minute walk away: L5 Hospital Clínic. Carrer de Rosselló, between Comte d’Urgell and Villarroel. Bus stops:  •Muntaner/Londres: L58, L64 •Córcega/Aribau: L (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)  •Casanova/París: L63, L67, L68
interaction: Myself, Cristina, owner of the apartment and my colleague Ramón will be available during your stay for anything you may need. :-)
house_rules: WE KINDLY REMIND YOU THAT YOU ARE IN A RESIDENTS COMMUNITY, SO PLEASE RESPECT THE NEIGHBOURS RIGHT TO PEACE AND QUIET.

reviews.comments: Fantastic apartment, very spacious, clean. Check-in and check-out were seamless. Excellent communication. Very recommended

Appartement satisfaisant pour un Weekend

La casa estaba en perfectas condiciones, muy bien decorada y con una buena situación
Cris estuvo muy atenta antes de la llegada
ottima soluzione e ottima posizione nulla da eccepire salvo per il letto a castello che nella parte superiore pendeva ed era corto per un  adulto di circa 1.80 .

name: Guindais Well House - Porto downtown
summary: Single family house recently restored located in magical place in the old town, opposite the medieval walls. Big private patio suitable for outdoor dining. Fantastic views to the opposite bank of the river. House  of 140 sqm, . At 200 meters from the Cathedral. Unique location in the heart of  Porto, to enjoy all the things the city can offer to you and experience the popular festivities like the famous São João.
space: The perfect single family house for a great holiday in the city of Porto. in the middle of all the tourist attractions. It is a single family house localized in the heart of the historic heart of the city. It has 3 floors and a big private space outside.
description: Single family house recently restored located in magical place in the old town, opposite the medieval walls. Big private patio suitable for outdoor dining. Fantastic views to the opposite bank of the river. House  of 140 sqm, . At 200 meters from the Cathedral. Unique location in the heart of  Porto, to enjoy all the things the city can offer to you and experience the popular festivities like the famous São João. The perfect single family house for a great holiday in the city of Porto. in the middle of all the tourist attractions. It is a single family house localized in the heart of the historic heart of the city. It has 3 floors and a big private space outside. No rés do chão tem sala de jantar, cozinha ampla, varanda virada para o pátio privativo, e um quarto com casa de banho privativa com sanita e lavatório. No primeiro andar tem um  quarto de casal muito grande com uma área autónoma dentro do próprio quarto com uma cama individual. Tem um salão amplo que pode ser convertido em qu
neighborhood_overview: The location is outstanding, being close to everything worth visiting, the street ending in stone steps, leading you to the river allowing only pedestrians. Only 200 meters there is the Cathedral, the National Theatre S. João, renowned Art nouveau ”Café Magestic” and shopping district. São Bento Railway Station, the main square and Nasoni’s Clérigos Tower easily reachable by foot. Very close to our place you find the funicular cable car named “Guindais” that takes you right down the Douro river bridges, Port wine cellars, picturesque shops, bistros, bars and restaurants. 5 minutes wolking from Santa Catarina Street, the most famous shopping street in the city
notes: In winter the house is heated Guests have Oil, Salt and  Vinegar
transit: Metro station, five minutes walking Railways station, 7 minutes walking. Bus station, 300 meters away
access: No rés do chão tem sala de jantar, cozinha ampla, varanda virada para o pátio privativo, e um quarto com casa de banho privativa com sanita e lavatório. No primeiro andar tem um  quarto de casal muito grande com uma área autónoma dentro do próprio quarto com uma cama individual. Tem um salão amplo que pode ser convertido em quarto com 2 camas de solteiro (que se podem juntar), e uma casa de banho ampla e completa com chuveiro.  No piso -1 tem lugar o acesso ao patio que se enconta desnivelado (a uma cota inferior) comparativamente a cota da entrada na casa. Neste piso há uma cama de casal e uma casa de banho completa com banheira.
interaction: We will be always available to help you with more informations about the house and the city. We'll be gals to help you  for all we can
house_rules: This house is where we normally live. We rent it just few weeks per year. So we ask you to treat the house with the maximum respect and care.

host.host_about: Me and my husband are both architects and designers. I am Italian but I live in Porto. We love the historic city center of Porto, that's why we restored this house in a so magical place!

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
Excellent moment in Porto, in this marvelous house! The place is just perfect, recently and well renovated, with a lovely and great terrace. The situation is excellent, 5mn by foot to the lovely Douro bay, 15mn by foot to the city center, and 3mn away from metro.
Irene and Alex are wonderful host, very helpful to make us discover the good places in the city, warm and nice!
I really advise this place when you will discover the lovely city of Porto!

A wonderful house, in an excellent location! Irene was the perfect host. Emails were answered promptly and everything was extremely well organised. The accommodation was tidy, modern, contemporary and very spacious. Nothing was too much trouble. Our stay was perfect! Thank you!

Great House in the center of Porto. Everything you need is in walking distance. The house is well equipped and Irene was reachable whenever we had a question. We were a group of 4 aduldts and one child an enjoyed our stay very much.

Great house in a perfect location
Would not hesitate to stay there again
Beautiful home in a fantastic location!

Casa bien situada en la ciudad con acceso a pie a los principales monumentos turísticos de la ciudad. Decoración diáfana y con buen gusto, a lo mejor vendría bien disponer de sofá en la sala principal por confort.

We had a great stay! The place was ideally located to explore Porto. The house was well equipped, very clean and having the private  courtyard was an added bonus.
Thanks!
such a beautiful house in the perfect location! spacious and stylish with a great courtyard. only downside was lack of cooking essentials- oil, salt and pepper

A big, beautiful and stylish house in the heart of Porto! Walking distance to everything. So much space. So clean and comfortable. We were a group of 8 adults and cooked meals and lived comfortably in this modern, stylish house! 100% recommend, we loved it! 
Thank you
Great location, nice house!

The location is great, close to both the riverfront and other neighbourhoods. The house is spacious and fit comfortably a 3-generation family of 7. The check-in and communication was very professional.
Great location!

This house is perfectly located and stylishly decorated.  But we had a bad time due to building works on both sides of the house with unbelievable noise from a bulldozer demolishing and digging on one side and a carpenter’s electric drill on the other.  This was not disclosed to us before booking.  I feel there is no hospitality offered as the kitchen had a few herb teas and a few coffee pods with a few sachets of sugar.  No oil, salt, pepper, washing powder. There was no TV or microwave as advertised. Only 1 key for a family of 5.  The one shower drain was blocked.  Most windows were impossible to keep open and the aircon was not working and had no instruction manual.  No response to our communication during our stay was received from host or concierge service.  Because of the location, I would love to stay here again if these problems are resolved.
Es una hermosa casa y está perfectamente ubicada. ideal pata familias grandes. Filipa es muy amable.

The apartment is large in size, has great space for our large group of 7 people. The kitchen has the main things you would need to cook but you would need your own olive oil etc. The location is ideal, so close to the ribeira for and an easy walk to the center. There are great pastelerias near by. The only unfortunate part was the bathroom on the main floor was not working, this was inconvenient otherwise it is a great place and we would recommend to stay here.
Excellent location, airy apartment and the host was very helpful and responsive.

This spacious appartment turned out to have a perfect location in the older parts of Porto. The appartment was nice and clean when we arrived, and being three couples we enjoyed sharing a livingroom and kitchen together. The two bedrooms upstairs were very nice and spacious, the one on the ground floor OK, but the bedroom in the cellar was dark and with a slight smell of mold. Being just three couples we solved that by using the second bedroom upstairs, but the bathroom in the cellar. All bathrooms were nice and in good condition.
Otherwise we received very good service from the people running the place, who also helped us with suggesting and booking good restaurants.
As for Porto we would love to come back.

This nice house is perfectly located for a visit in Porto and offers everything you need. The hosts are very friendly and the communication is quick and easy. We did not miss anything. And Porto is amazing !
Great historic well house in a wonderful location!
super Lage, super Unterkunft. Der Eindruck hier wird ein privat genutztes Haus vermietet, täuscht. Trotzdem war alles gut und wenn mal was sein sollte ist sehr schnell jemand erreichbar und hilft
Perfect location and great house in the center of Porto! We had a very nice stay!
Great place to stay!   3 levels, great for a group.  Don’t suggest parking a car there.

Really great accommodation in the centre of the city.  Imaginatively refurbished house with lots of space and far more amenities than we ever used.  I would thoroughly recommend this accommodation for families or groups of friends
Nice house in a good location. Very reasonably priced, clean and spacious and we were looked after well on arrival by the agent with lots of local recommendations.
Big house and fantastic locatiion

Great place to stay in Porto! Very central and  steps from the river! We were a group of 7 adults and it was a great size for us. One of the rooms is meant for a single which worked out well for us but we would not recommend for a group of more than 7 (unless everyone is very very comfortable with each other). There was lots of room and everything was very clean. 5 out of 5.
Sehr schönes Häuschen mitten in der Altstadt Portos, sehr gemütlich und vor Allem, gross genug mit verschiedenen Badezimmer.
Irene's house is in an excellent location and has loads of space. Perfect for five adults travelling together.
Great experience

name: Putnam Gardens -Brooklyn Brownstone
summary: The Gardens is a cozy, newly renovated garden apt located on a beautiful tree lined block in the heart of Bedford Stuyvesant.  The Gardens provides you with a living and dining room, bedroom, bathroom, spacious kitchen and a gorgeous patio garden.
space: Conveniently located in the Stuyvesant Heights neighborhood in Brooklyn, NY, The Putnam Gardens is walking distance to trendy new restaurants, bars, and cafes in this vibrant neighborhood. The Living Room:  The living room is fully furnished with a leather sofa, love seat, and chair along with a full size sleeper sofa that comfortably sleeps two.  There is also a 42" television which has premium cable channels .. The Dining Room and Kitchen:  In the dining room there is a table and chair set that seats 4 and located right next to the full reign kitchen which has a large island, built in wine cooler, dishwasher, coffee maker, cooking essential, a TV and stainless steel appliances. Bathroom:  The bathroom has a tub /shower combination, sink with a vanity along with a hair dryer, towels, wash clothes, soap, shampoo/conditioner and additional toiletries.. The Bedroom Garden Suite:  The bedroom has a desk, chair, dresser, poufs, and an extremely comfortable queen size murphy bed.  During th

neighborhood_overview: Over the last few years the historic neighborhood of Bedford Stuyvesant has been one of the most popular real estate markets in Brooklyn.  Home of beautiful brownstones and now newly developed condominiums and great local restaurants; this extremely diverse neighborhood allows guests a true experience of life in New York City. The Putnam Gardens is located within walking distance to some of Brooklyn's favorite restaurants, bars, and shops..  Here's a list of a few places you must try while visiting:  Saraghina - An authentic Italian restaurant that serves amazing pizza! Peaches Restaurant - A Classic American restaurant serving all your favorite dishes  The Hothouse - (sister restaurant of Peaches) An American restaurant with a twist of comfort soul food.. The chicken is a must try! Bed-Vyne BREW - A place to hang out and meet the locals while enjoying your favorite craft beer or wine outside Bed-Vyne Wine - A wine store that carries wine from all over the world Eugene & Co - A casual
notes: Please let us know what time your flight arrives.  I can be flexible with check-in times just give us advance notice.  However, check-out time will be at noon.
transit: You are a few short blocks from the local C train and less than 7 blocks from the A express trains; both will get you to lower Manhattan in less than 15 minutes; Times Square in 30 minutes, and less than 10 minutes to the Barclays Center in downtown Bklyn.
access: Guests will have a separate private access to the garden apartment which also allows them complete access to the backyard where you can relax and enjoy the view of the lovely garden while lounging on the backyard furniture
interaction: Living upstairs allows us to be available to our guests in person or via email or phone if we stepped away.  We are more than happy to assist you with directions to the popular places in our neighborhood or in the city!
house_rules: No Smoking  No Pets  No Parties  No visitors that have not been approved by us Please don't be very loud at night.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: We loved our stay at Putnam Gardens! Debbie is a very kind and gracious host and it's quite evident she takes great care in making her home comfortable and welcoming (not to mention VERY clean). There was plenty of room for my two adult daughters and I and it was great to have a nice kitchen to enjoy a cup of coffee and breakfast before we hit the town. The garden patio is very beautiful, peaceful and a cozy place to relax. Once familiarizing ourselves with the neighborhood, we felt very comfortable and safe making our way to local restaurants, markets, and the short walk to the train. Debbie was very quick to respond to questions, both before our arrival and during our stay. Check in/out instructions were clear and easy. I highly recommend this location!

Un très bon séjour à Brooklyn dans la maison de Putnam Garden. Quartier résidentiel, agréable et familial.
L'appartement est très propre et confortable. Debbie a été très réactive pour répondre à nos questions. Le jardin est très agréable.

The area we were in was pleasant. There are lots of convenience stores in the area. The area is slowly but surely getting gentrified. Restaurants and cafes were about 10-15 min away walking. 

There were fresh towels when we needed them. We really appreciated the privacy and the sweet basket she left with toiletries and the tourist pamphlets and restaurant take out and dine in menus. Other than that it was mostly clean and bug free!! 

The apartment's locking system is great! The cell phone service in the apartment is not that great. But I we were able to do wifi calls with the free wifi. The AC was a life saver since it was muggy during our trip. There are a few things that could've made our stay better however I'll leave those suggestions for Debbie. 

We all had a pleasant time! My family and I would consider staying there again. We recommend staying here!!

This place was great. Debbie provided us a bunch of amenities like soap, toothpaste and coffee. That back bedroom was a tad small, but the bed was amazing and commonly found myself not wanting to get out of bed. Debbie was incredibly responsive and attentive to us the whole time. The coffee machine was broken when we got there and she brought as a new one that night. The parking out front was free to us, but it's definitely a battle to find a spot and due to street cleaning, you will either need to move every other day or get a parking ticket. The subway station is only a few blocks walk which we used every day to get into Manhattan. I would highly recommend this to anyone who is looking to stay in Brooklyn and wants to visit the city.

The Putnam Gardens apartment was good stay overall...
The good- Debbie is very responsive and accommodating. I messaged her several times prior to booking with questions about the neighborhood, apartment, transportation, etc. She always replied in a timely manner. Upon arrival there were instructions on the table as well as an awesome welcome basket filled with goodies. toiletries, menu and maps! Her apartment is in a nice neighborhood, walking distance to the C train which takes you into Manhattan, times square, central park, china town and little Italy without transfers to a different subway line. There are several restaurants and bars within walking distance. Her place is cute and big enough for to comfortably fit my family of 5 which she kindly agreed to accommodate. 
The bad- The apartment wasn't clean. I'm very particular about my space, some might say I'm OCD but when basic maintenance isn't performed there's a problem. I spent about 2 hours cleaning before I was comfortable enough to sleep there.
If Debbie corrects this this place will have 5 stars from me! If I ever visit N.Y. again I'd definitely consider the Putnam Gardens apartment again.

Me, my husband, and our friend stayed in Putnam Gardens and found the apartment to be a great value. The location was convenient to almost anywhere in Brooklyn, and was confortable and quiet. Debbie is an amazing host and provided a guest basket and lots of helpful guides, as well as bottle of wine to welcome us. We would definitely recommend a stay!

Nous avons loué l'appartement de Debbie pour une dizaine de jours avec 3 autres amis. La maison dispose de tout (fer à repasser, aspirateur, sèche cheveux, serviettes, ustensiles de cuisine, etc), nous ne manquions de rien. Le jardin est un grand plus, il est aménagé et très plaisant lorsqu'il y a du soleil. La maison correspondait à nos attentes, et Debbie était accessible à n'importe quel moment pour répondre à nos questions, rapidement. 
Le quartier est safe, le métro est à 10mn environ et dessert très bien Manhattan. 
Je recommande pleinement son appartement ! encore merci.

The apartment was very comfortable and the pictures were right on point.  The hostess left a very nice welcome basket and contacted us to make sure everything was going well.  Would definitely stay here again.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Putnam Gardens. Not many taxi drivers know the address/street name so it may be a good idea to have an app (MapsMe helped us a lot.) The place is in the lower half of a gorgeous town house, I felt very safe, and Debbie was an excellent communicator when we had questions/concerns. Approx. 5 blocks from the C train which will take you directly to Times Square in approximately 30 minutes. Lots of neat cafes in the area! Would love to visit again and explore more!!

When you book a trip to Brooklyn, you *must* stay in this beautiful Bed Stuy gem.  Debbie is an excellent and instant communicator--her descriptions were spot-on and the place exceeded our expectations.  The backyard space is compact, but divine!!!  The kitchen is stocked like you cannot even imagine!  There was an overflowing Welcome Basket with everything from coffee, tea and wine to snacks and city maps and an abundance of toiletries.  There was super-comfy bedding, generous space, lovely furniture (poufs, outdoor couches, throw rugs, extra pillows etc.) and extra decorative touches (and reading material) that truly made this place feel extravagant.  We stayed here with our three kids and Debbie even had a blow-up mattress for us.  Very minor things:  although there was a dresser, there is no place to hang clothes (we only noticed b/c my husband had 'work clothes' that couldn't be folded).  Also, there is only overhead lighting--maybe a lamp or two would have been nice in the main living area.  As far as public transport, there are buses nearby--we drove, though (we came from NE) and walked--parking on Debbie's street was enevr a problem, either.  When you visit Brooklyn/NYC, you will be quite sorry if you miss out on this absolute haven in the city.

We had a great time at Debbie's house. The house is very convenient, well equipped, cozy and very clean. It is well situated, very central to both Brooklyn and Manhattan, close to the subway, so Manhattan is easy to reach, plus the neighborhood is nice and the street is quiet. The neighborhood is a good starting point for discovering Brooklyn. Debbie was easy to communicate and eager to answer our questions. We definitely recommend the Putnam Garden place !!
Quaint place in Bed Stuy close to public transit. Host supplied a bottle of wine, water, and maps. Great experience. We would definitely stay again.

The Putnam Garden is a great location for spending vacations in NYC with a family. The main room is large enough and well-equipped.
We did not use the yard, but it is really a good point.
We went to Manhattan by subway everyday. It is at walking distance from the apartment and it gives an easy access to the island and its main points of interest.
We warmly recommend this place! And we thank Debbie for her kindness and prompt answers when it was necessary.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Nice place to stay and a nice location. Would stay again.
The host canceled this reservation 31 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The apartment includes the following amenities and services: 2 bedroom one with Queen-size bed and the other with two separate beds. 1 bathroom with bathtube Living-room with a sofa  A well-equipped kitchen with cutlery, pots and pans, microwave, toaster, coffee maker, kettle, fridge-freezer, washing machine, etc. Air conditioning / heating A small balcony TV Wifi internet connection Hairdryer Iron and ironing board Linen and Towels Cot and baby’s high chair (upon request) The apartment is located in Sicilia Street, in the Eixample district. The neighbourhood is quiet and safe and offers a wide range of shops, coffee bars and restaurants. It is very close to the Sagrada Familia, Antoni Gaudi’s colossal church and perhaps the most famous attraction in Barcelona. Within walking distance you have the commercial centre of Barcelona and home of luxury shops such as Chanel, Gucci or Armani. Some distances from the apart

house_rules: This apartment can accommodate only 4 persons maximum. A baby count as a person and count for the maximum capacity. Please be quiet in the apartment and in the common areas past 22:00 hours until 08:00 am City tax is not included in the accommodation price it costs 2.48€ per person and per night. People who has 16 years old or fewer than 16 are exempt.  Please proceed to pay through the AIRBNB resolution Center. The Payment must be done in EUROS please. Passport or ID data of each guest will be required at the time of booking or upon arrival.  For reasons of national security The Catalan police ask us the data of each guest.

host.host_about:
Ofrecemos una amplia selección de apartamentos turísticos y estancias de corta duración en Barcelona . 
Contamos con una amplia experiencia en alquiler de  apartamentos y con un experto  servicio de atención al cliente.
Estaremos encantados de recibirte en nuestros apartamentos, dónde podrás descubrir  desde una perspectiva diferente, la ciudad y sus vecinos barceloneses, con sus costumbres y fiestas populares.

Nuestros apartamentos están diseñados , amueblados y equipados con el máximo esmero. Son ideales para estancias de ocio,familia, pareja o amigos, así como para viajes de negocios.

Nos apasiona nuestro trabajo y te ayudaremos en todo lo que necesites, sólo preguntanos.

We offer you a variety of apartments for short and long stay in Barcelona. We have extensive experience in renting apartments and an expert customer service.
We will be happy to welcoming you in our apartments, where you can discover from a different perspective, the city and its neighbours from Barcelona, with their customs and popular festivities.

Our apartments are designed, furnished and equipped with the utmost care. They are ideal for leisure stays, family, couple or friends, as well as for business trips.

We are passionate about our work and we will help you in everything you need, just you need to contact with us and we will be very happy to help you.

reviews.comments: Un apartamento muy limpio, tranquilo, muy bien situado, con todas las comodidades para poder disfrutar de una grata estancia.

The apartment is good enough. It has new fixtures, wooden floors, warm showers, a lift, a small balcony, etc. It was missing a few things that would been helpful, like a dish drying rack when there is no dishwasher. The apartment is near Sagrada Familia, but the neighborhood is a bit sleepy overall and a long walk to La Rambla (though near to a few metro stations).

The host inspired much confusion after sending an email saying I should provide her with all of the passport details of my family members and pay directly to her a "tourist tax." Through communications with Airbnb, I learned these are apparently Barcelona legal requirements, but the request wasn't originally explained that way and just seemed so dodgy. The host also wanted a security deposit paid directly to her, instead of through Airbnb, which also seemed dodgy. Ultimately I didn't pay it. In the end, it all worked out fine; I just had to sort it out with Airbnb Support.
Apartment was very spaciuos and clean. Good location. Little bit loud from the street and another apartments

host.host_about:
Hi Everyone, Im David. 

Graduated fromThe New School University majoring in Media Studies. By day I am a Real Estate Broker & by night Im a freelance Filmmaker. I am very out going and a people person. I love to help and give. I love to dance, eat, workout and network with people in my industry.Many people would say that Im a problem solver. I love to read books that I can gain knowledge from. I'm extremely passionate about film, music, and creating change. 

Looking forward to being your host!

reviews.comments:
Great place! The neighborhood is lively. The supermarket and subway stop is literally right around the corner. Laundromat is a block and half away. Central Park is really close as well! It's really such a convenient place to be. The apartment was really nice. The bed was comfortable. Everything in David's description was spot on. 

We did run into a few problems. There were cat or dog hairs in the space. The ad said no pets allowed but somehow the hairs were there and it set off my husband's allergies a bit. In addition to the animal hairs, the space could have been a tad bit cleaner overall. It wasn't too big of an issue though. We just did a wipe down ourselves. Also, the heater was CRAZY hot and we were unable to adjust it. We had to leave the window wide open or have the AC running most times. 

Overall though, if we had to stay there again, we would. Great convenient place to be.

The apartment is very modern and clean. The apartment looks the same as in the pictures and the description of david fits perfectly. An enormous advantage is the subway connection. With the 6 train you can get everywhere in manhattan. There are also very much restaurants & shops close by. 
The house is relatively quiet and the neighbors are friendly. David was always to be reached if there were problems or I had questions.
I would recommend the apartment to anyone and i really enjoyed my stay :-)

I stayed at David's place for a month in September 2017. It is a nicely furnished, small studio. Besides bathroom, it has only a common space where all the living/sleeping furniture is placed together with the kitchen cabinets. So, I would not recommend this apartment for more than 2 people. However, if you are 1-2 people, this apartment can be a perfectly affordable and convenient accommodation for you. 
The apartment is equipped with all the basic stuff one might need for a few-weeks stay. Small grocery items (e.g. pepper, oil etc.) were the only thing that was missing compared to other airbnbs I stayed in. So if you want to cook anything at home, you would have to either bring these items with you or buy them in a local store (which is just around the corner). 
A Subway stop is just around the corner (train 6) and a ride to Midtown takes about 20 minutes.

David's place was exactly as pictured and described. It's nicely furnished with high ceilings and all appliances in working order. The neighborhood has some good spots to eat/drink, along with good subway access and proximity to the park.

David himself was a pleasure to deal with. Would stay again!

reviews.comments: The listing was exactly like in the picture. Well maintained, clean, and a great shower. He was flexible with the check-in times and just left the keys for me to take. I never got to meet David but the listing is awesome. East Harlem is a cool area with tons of nice and inexpensive restaurants. Might be a bit loud at times, but hey, its NYC.

The check-in process was straightforward, and the place is in a prime location! The super is very nice and having a Roku in the apartment was great. I stayed by myself, so the size was just right for me. I was able to text David when things came up and he usually responded within 24 hours. Good stay overall!
We stayed for two months and it was a perfect location for a lower budget stay. Plenty of access to the Park and lower Manhattan via the 6. Very lucky to have had the chance to stay here.
Great experience in NY in David's apartment! Everything was as expected, the apartment has a great location and he was always ready to help with any problem.
Super approachable and friendly guy, everything you could ask for in a host.  Very accommodating.  Would highly recommend.  10/10.

The apartment needs a deep clean, new furniture ( Bed ), a door lock without a carton to cover the gap between the wall and the door and an air conditioner without tape in the window.  Also, the shower didn't have heat water all time.

Great experience and very close to all. David is extremely responsive to any and all concerns and quickly fixes them. However I had very little to complain about. I had a good time while there. If a neat studio is all you need and to be central in the city, this apt is ideal.

The Q47 is located at the corner. It goes to all major subways towards Manhattan. There is a Starbucks up the block next to the supermarket.
