The apt is clean and there is a dishwasher and a washer/dryer to make it even easier for you! ;-)  The apartment is located in the heart of Harlem, walking distance to 2,3,C,A,D and B metro stations (5-7 mins) and the neighborhood has lots of different restaurants
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is walking distance from the legendary Apollo Theater, noted venue for African-American performance and key on the carriers of amazing artists such as, Louis Armstrong, Duke Ellington, Aretha Franklin, Jimi Hendrix, The Jackson 5, Lauryn Hill, Ne-Yo really to name a few! Studio Harlem Museum, which offers free entrance to Harlem's history and contemporary art, the Shrine World Music Venue, just across the street, were you can hear live music, and of course all stores at the historic 125th Street.  You can also walk to St. Nicholas Park were you can find the Hamilton Grange National Memorial and checkout the beautiful Neo-Gothic architecture of City College's campus.  Additionally you can find groceries around the block and also you can walk to the newly open Whole Foods in 125th.
transit: Very convenient with 6 different subway lines within 2 blocks and access to buses that go to Central Park and all Museums in the East Side right in front of the apartment.
access: - Internet - Kitchen appliances -Living room -Dishwasher -Washer/dryer
house_rules: Respect the space and Clean up after yourself ;-)

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Clement is an African male in his early 30's, born and raised in Ghana and lived half of his life  growing up in the Netherlands, Europe. Natalia is Colombia and moved to NY in 2008. We both live and work in New York, we are  friendly as well as clean and organized people. Clement is a professional dancer and travel a lot because of his work and Natalia is performance arts administrator. We love meeting new people and share our favorite spots of New York City.  

Our motto: Life is an experience, there are no mistakes!

reviews.comments:
I've had the best time in Nyc, thanks to great hosts.
Clement was very nice to talk to and I defently felt like home. 
I could've not wish for a better place to stay.

Transport was very easy, by taking the train, just one-two blocks away from the house. This was my first time using Air Bnb, and i couldn`t have made a better choice, by staying at this place with the best hosts. I will defently like to stay here again!

Clement's apartment is a very nice place in a good location in Harlem. Though we didn't have the pleasure of meeting him as he was abroad, my girlfriend and I were warmly greeted by Clement's  girlfriend. She provided clean sheets and towels and offered bread, jams, and eggs for us to make ourselves breakfast. She also went out of her way to provide an iron and ironing board for me, as I had a job interview the next day. 

The building was secure, and we were given keys to come and go as we pleased. Our trip was very short, but I would definitely recommend it to an individual or couple who's looking to stay in Manhattan at a really reasonable price.

Thanks, Clement!

It a a good deal. The apartment is clean and functional. For the same price in new york, u have to literally camp with some other people in the room. Therefore I can nothing but recommend the host. The location is not really central. But u can make ur way very easy.

We didn't actually get to meet Clement as he was on a tour, but his girlfriend Natalia was very helpful.  The place was clean and well kept and we immediately felt at home!  The bedroom was small, but the apartment was very open and welcoming so we never felt cramped.  It was also very close to the city, only a half hour by subway for me to get into work!
There is a club downstairs that you can hear at night from the living room, but we didn't have any issues from the bedroom and slept very well.  The area was friendly, and I would recommend it to anyone looking for something affordable in Manhattan and within easy commute to downtown!

EXCELLENT place to stay !!!!! Clement and Natalia are the most wonderful couple I had the pleasure to meet. Both helped us a lot (me and my girlfriend) within my stay at NYC, indeed all the time I felt very comfortably.
The apartment is nice, cozy and warm!, The room is excellent!, and the WIFI connection too, bathroom excellent, everything indeed very nice. Also great location, very close to the subway.
We had clean sheets and towels.
The building was secure, and we were given keys to come and go as we pleased. 
I would definitely recommend this place to stay!, no doubt at all !

Thanks Clement and Natalia!!!
:)

This was our first experience with airbnb and it was a very pleasant one. Clement and Natalia were fantastic hosts: warm, friendly, courteous and discreet. They were also glad to help us with a personal favor that we had to ask them! The apartmnet was clean and cozy and for us it had the feel of a real home, just like the description. It is located on a very central spot in Harlem with a convenient bus stop right in front of the building and two subway stations almost two blocks away each. There are several inexpensive restaurants within walking distance so you won't get hungry, plus grocery stores and pharmacies. For those of you who are not familiar with Harlem, the neighborhood may look a bit shady at first but it is safe and at the end we enjoyed the fact that we felt the pulse of a very special community.

It was the best place where we have never been. Clement and Natalia are the best hosters in the world. We feel like being at home and they were like our family there. They are great persons and the best place to be in New York.

The house is exactly like in the pictures and very clean. There are many cheap restaurants near, supemarkets and the subway, of course. Harlem is a beautiful and safety neighbourgood, well, all neighbourhood are good there but I think that Harlem is the best for me, maybe because Clement and Natalia accepted us like one friends more. We have felt like we had already known us before. 

It's a very good choice to go to this house, of course. We recommend you!

I had a great time staying at Natalia and Clement’s apartment.  Clement had to go away on the first day but I managed to see him before he had to go to the airport, which was nice.  Natalia looked after me well and even lent me a Metrocard to get me started.  I had lots on my to-do list so I didn’t get to see Natalia too much unless it was first thing in the morning or late at night!  We did manage to catch up for dinner which was nice.  Subway was easy to get to from the apartment.  I didn’t ever feel unsafe in Harlem.  Would definitely stay there again if I was back in New York.  Thanks guys!

We had a really good time. We didn't meet Clement but Natalia was very nice and helpful. The apartment is clean and comfortable. We used the kitchen in the morning which helps saving money. The Subway is only two blocks away.

Natalia is a very nice and positive person! When my husband and I met her, I felt as if we've known each other for a long time!))) We didn't see her often but she accepted us like an old friends!) The apartment has a good location - several subway stations is near it and it's only 30 min to Midtown and 15 min to Central Park and most museums!!! There was everything what is necessary in our room - comfortable bad and enough space for stuff. Great thanks for Natalia! We're glad that met her and choose her apt as our place in NY!
Olga & Alexey

Very nice place with everything provided what was needed. We stayed for 6 days and at that time Clement was traveling so we only met Natalia.
Loved that we had a table in the room.
Fresh Towels, clean sheets etc were provided and we could make our own meals in the kitchen which of course helps saving some money in NYC.
Subway stations are very close so that was pretty convenient.

Everything worked out great and Natalia is a aweseome host. I would definitely recommend staying with her.

Hola! Recomendamos el lugar, Harlem es un buen barrio  y cerca al metro, con este medio de transporte fue muy fácil movernos en la isla. El apartamento es acogedor y cuenta con todo lo necesario para los huéspedes, salíamos temprano y llegábamos tarde. Natalia & Clément son excelentes anfitriones, muy amables y colaboradores. Súper queridos... Nos ayudaron demasiado! Un abrazo.

You couldn't wish for more welcoming and lovely hosts than Clement and Natalia! Staying with them gave me a perfect home from which to explore NYC. I loved the community vibe in Harlem - it's a vibrant and colourful neighbourhood and the subway stations are close by, so it's easy to get anywhere. The room is simple and clean and the flat comfortable, with everything provided. I highly recommend Clement and Natalia as hosts - thanks heaps!
Great base for exploring the city, ten minutes from 2 Metro stations on different lines, apartment was clean and well worth the price despite the lack of air conditioning.
It was a very positive experience - extremely nice, welcoming host(s) that gave me advice on everything from local crafts stores to hang-out spots. Safe, easy to get to via subway and awesome hosts.

Je recommande fortement cette adresse, Natalia et Clément sont d'excellents hôtes.
La chambre est sympa, quartier tranquille avec un accès a manathan rapide par le metro.
Encore merci à eux.
Jérôme et Mélanie

Nos encantó quedarnos en la casa de Clement y Natalia, llegamos el primer día bastante tarde en la noche y nos estaban esperando.
Sentimos realmente que era nuestra casa, teníamos nuestra propia habitación con una cama cómoda, sábanas y toallas. Si bien el aparatamento está un poco lejos del downtown (15 min en subway) nos manejamos perfectamente con las líneas de metro que están a 3 cuadras y pasan a todo momento. Además hay dos restaurantes muy ricos a una cudra y lugares cerca para comprar comida y desayuno. Un placer!

This was our first Airbnb experience, and we will be booking again. Clement and Natalia were welcoming, kind & laid back hosts. Harlem is a buzzing area, everyone we met were helpful & friendly. People are always out, so even at night you won't feel alone. There is a community feel in Harlem: everyone talks on the buses & holds bbqs & chess/dominos matches on the street. Central Park is only a 25 minute walk from the apartment, there's also 1 bus on Adam C Powell Jr Blvd that took us all the way to the south side of the park, along 5th Ave. We got to see so much more of the city & NYC life than if we had stayed in a central hotel. The apartment itself is as pictured. Natalia & Clement made sure we had bathroom & fridge space. We had easy access to grocery stores & laundromats in the area which were 24hr. We would recommend Sylvia's soul food restaurant, which was 2 blocks down, very yummy. We have loved our stay in NYC & wish we had more time!

Loved our time at Natalia and Clement's place! Natalia was a really kind host, we felt home right away. It was a very comfortable and homely place to come back to after our long days in the city. Really the only disadvantage was that Natalia was so busy she didn't have time/forgot to buy toilet paper, haha apart from that everything was super. Would love to host you and Clement some other time if you make it back to Amsterdam :)

natalia y clement nos trataron maravillosamente bien y realmente nos hicieron sentir en casa, ayudandonos en lo que necesitaramos, compartiendo desayunos o cenas y charlas cuando podiamos y abriendonos totalmente su casa. en el anuncio habria que agregar que hay dos pisos por escalera. y el barrio, si bien es un poco lejos del centro, el metro esta a dos cuadras y funciona muy bien las 24 horas y en 15 min estas en times square. nuestra vacacion fue muy buena, y la pasamos muy bien.
Foi a minha primeira experiência no Airbnb e eu e meu marido ficamos muito muito bem! Natalie é adorável!

Deze kamer is een absolute aanrader. Clement en Natalia zijn erg leuke en gezellige mensen en heel gastvrij (echte gezelligheidsdieren).  Wij hebben ook echt het gevoel gekregen dat ze het leuk vinden dat je bij hen verblijft. Helaas hebben we ze (door ons drukke programma) niet heel vaak gezien, maar de keren dat we elkaar zagen, was het hartstikke gezellig! 

De kamer is verder netjes onderhouden en schoon. Het appartement ligt een levendige buurt en je bent in no time in Lower Manhattan. 

Wij hebben er een topvakantie gehad!

Natalia est une personne très agréable, souriante qui nous a très bien accueilli. Elle a su répondre à toute nos questions à su nous mettre à l'aise pour notre première expérience rbnb. Elle n'est pas du tout envahissante mais sait se rendre disponible et nous rendre service. 
Le quartier de harlem est vraiment atypique est très proche du centre ville en métro.  Environ 15 min en métro.  
Il y a aussi des églises ou l'on peut voir des gospels à 100m à pied. 
Ce fut une superbe expérience que nous conseillons à tout le monde. 
Ps: grand merci à natalia à qui on souhaite une bonne continuation.
Great location with a sincere host. I will be staying here again when next in New York.

Super accueil de Nathalia et très sympathique. Clément, étant absent, nous n'avons pas pu faire sa connaissance. Quartier calme à 15 min en métro de Time Square. Appartement comme décrit, très bien et rien à dire au niveau rapport qualité prix! Expérience que nous renouvellerons avec grand plaisir.

They were excentes hosts , I arrived very late and were waiting for me awake.
I got all kinds of information to handle me in NY. The house really is very comfortable and  it has an location accesesible (several subway lines only 3 blocks )  .
Loved staying with them!

Clement and Natalia are the best hosts. Warm, welcoming, sincere and inviting - I could not ask for a better place to stay in New York. Their place really did feel like home and I felt completely safe in the neighborhood. It was so easy to get to anywhere I wanted in NY.
Natalia and Clement have a beautiful space. I was welcomed and treated very while for the week I was there. All in all I had an easy and peaceful stay.  Great location. Would book again!
Wonderful experience! Natalia is so nice, it's easy to get everywhere from Natalia's apartment!

The stay at Clement's and Natalia's home was really great! Especially the location is quite good as different metro stations, supermarkets, the Apollo theater are near by. The flat was cosy, clean and well equipped and we felt very welcome to use the kitchen and the living room. Clement and Natalia also seemed interested in our stay and our well being. So we received good advices or helpful recommendations. I would definitely stay there again when I would get the possibility!

Nous avons passé deux semaines formidables chez Natalia et Clément chez qui nous nous sentions vraiment "at home". Ils sont très accueillants et sympas. Ils nous ont fait partagé avec beaucoup de plaisir et de simplicité leur appartement et leur vie à  New-York. Ce logement  est très bien situé à proximité des métro. Harlem est vraiment un quartier à decouvrir! Grâce à eux nous avons passé des vacances inoubliables et nous avons qu'une envie : y retourner!!
Ps : Natalia et Clément nous vous attendons en Guadeloupe ;-)

We found the apartment as advertised. The room was nice and clean. The only slight downside is the creaking sound the wooden floorboards make whenever someone walks in the corridor. Other than that the place is cozy and relaxed. Natalia is a wonderful host. Very friendly and always with a smile. The closest subway station is two and half block away. All in all, we really enjoyed our stay at her place and will recommend to anyone who needs a space to stay while visiting NYC.

We stayed at Clement & Natalia's house for 9 days in June. Unfortunately, they weren't there but they had organized the check-in perfectly and a friend of them let us in. 

The apartment is perfectly located, not far from the subway & it's really easy to get downtown. The neighborhood also felt really secure, even at night.

The apartment & the room we stayed in was really clean, so was the bathroom. 

We would stay there again without any hesitation!

Laurine & Korneel.
The host canceled this reservation 30 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Clément y Natalia son muy amables, su casa es limpia y organizada, esta cerca del subterraneo. Nos brindaron información sobre la ciudad y sobre sitios. Son 5 mins caminando al subterráneo y más o menos 20 mins en tren a timesquare.

Clément et Natalia forment un adorable couple, toujours à l'écoute, plein de conseils et très discrets. L'appartement est tout près de plusieurs métros. Harlem est bruyant, certes, mais aussi accueillant et très vivant. Séjour fabuleux à New York.

Hola muchas gracias, la estancia en el departamento fue muy agradable, placentera y el tiempo que estuvimos ahí nos sentimos como en casa. muy céntrico y seguro y los anfitriones excelentes personas!!!!!

I spend 1 week in this apartment and I felt like at home. Clement and Natalia have been traveling for the entire period and I was alone, the room is cozy and very quiet, although is situated in the heart of the Harlem. During summer, people are very active there and I've found a lovely and colored atmosphere typical of some African and Caribbean countries. Nearby it's easy to find tasty Dominican food  for competitive prices. Subway located at 5 min walking distance from the apartment.

The was very nice and clean. I had everything I needed. The bathroom and kitchen were small but you have everything you need and it's clean too. Natalia and clement were so friendly. If you have a problem there will be there. It really feels like a home!

Nuestra estancia en casa de Clement y Natalia fue muy agradable.
Es cierto que nos hicieron sentir como en casa. Estaban pendientes por si necesitábamos algo, nos dejaron información sobre la ciudad, teníamos espacio para nosotros en la nevera y el baño...

Very easygoing couple that went far beyond our expectations - their hospitality was great, as was their eagerness to assist and find answers to all sorts of strange questions. The flat and the room is correctly described, our main concern (close to complaint) was that Natalia and Clement has no sense for business, they charge way below market value. 

The area is really nice, a New York neighborhood. Not a New York tourist area. Lovely, when you are a tourist...

Natalia and Clement are an incredibly nice and very courteous couple. They are always there for you and do their best to make you feel really at home. This they succeed very well! Harlem is a very nice and interesting district. There is always something going on and is never boring. The space to Natalia and Clement offer is small but nice. Bathroom and kitchen are shared, the two are very welcoming and it was always very fun and interesting to talk to them. The whole apartment is very clean and tidy.
We would not hesitate to come back.

Clement y Natalia me hicieron sentir en casa: son tan cordiales y cálidos! 
He charlado mucho con ellos y son gente inteligente e interesante.
La descripción del anuncio era exacta, el dormitorio es bonito y eficiente y cabe hacer una mención especial respecto al barrio: es verdaderamente bello y seguro y su gente la más amable que encontré en todo Nueva York.
Seguramente voy a volver

Clement & Natalia fueron muy amables, cordiales y amigables durante nuestra estadía. Ellos son el tipo de personas que quieres encontrarte en el camino ya siempre te recibían con una sonrisa y estaban al pendiente de cualquier cosa que necesitáramos. La casa muy acogedora, en verdad te sientes como en casa. El barrio seguro sin importar la hora y con metro unas cuantas cuadras. Hay restaurantes,farmacias y tiendas cruzando la calle. En verdad es una ubicación envidiable. Al llegar ellos tenían todo listo; información, folletos y mapas. Sin dudarlo es una de las mejores opciones para quedarte en NY, sobre todo en Manhattan.  Seguro regresamos con ellos.

Bonjour, ce fut une excellente première expérience à New York et sur AirBnb, Clément n'était malheureusement pas la, mais Natalia à été une hôte exceptionnel, elle nous a attendu alors que nous somme arrivé tard dans la nuit, à été de bon conseil pour des endroits a visiter,  et à été très accueillante et discrète.
L'appartement est sympathique et très bien situé, proche des stations de métro, commerce, et restaurant.
Natalia est une hôte formidable, avec une grande joie de vivre.
Nous nous sommes senti comme chez nous durant ce séjour, Merci encore Natalia.
Clément et toi êtes les bienvenue en France.

Natalia was host to my girlfriend and me during our short trip to NYC. The apartment is very spacious and very well furnished so we immediately felt comfortable. We stayed in a seperate room which had a pretty soft bed and some room for storage as well as a desk. The spartment is within 5-10 min walking distance to the next subway station and a supermarket as well as several restaurants are close by. Overall it was a pleasure meeting Natalia because she made it easy to feel at home away from home :)

Natalia made us feel very welcome.  We arrived very late due to our flight being delayed and she stayed up for us and was very generous in offering me a sandwich and some tea.  On arrival she showed us where everything was and gave us our keys and clean towels.  She even left a whole shelf in the refrigerator and an empty basket in the bathroom so we had adequate space to put our stuff.  

The apartment was as described.  The bedroom was small but adequate for our stay seeing that we were out most of the time. The bed slept very well and the window offered lovely cool air.  The room has a closet and a chest of drawers so you will have some space to store your stuff and a full length mirror which was lovely.  We also appreciated having wifi available to us.

The neighborhood seemed a bit dodgy when we first got there but we had absolutely no problems.  We went out as early as 4:30 in the morning and came back home as 11:45 at night and no one bothered us at all.  We took the subway all of the time we were there and the walk to the station was only a few minutes away.  We often did short walks to 125th street which has a few stores and restaurants.

I would recommend taking the M2 on Lenox between 132nd and 133rd to the upper west side.  The drive there is really nice.  And you can get out around Columbus Circle and explore the area. So lovely...

Overall we had a lovely stay.  Natalia was so nice and welcoming.  Always with a smile on her face. Clement was away with work. but we hope to see him next time we are in New York.

Siendo esta nuestra primera vez en  airbnb, la experiencia  ha sido muy buena.
La casa, el barrio y los anfitriones  muy bien.
Una experiencia para repetir.

Clement and Natalia are both very friendly and helpful.
In total we had a very nice stay at their place.
You can't expect anything luxury, but for exploring NYC for a few days its everything you'll need.
Nice and small apartment. Only few minutes by walk to the subway. Natalia was very nice and lovely.

On n'a pas beaucoup vu Clément et Natalia car ils n'étaient pas souvent là mais ils sont très accueillants, leur appartement est bien situé et très chaleureux. Nous y retournerions avec grand plaisir !

Clement & Natalia nos acogieron de la mejor manera en su casa! 
Nos quedamos con ellos durante año nuevo por 6 noches y totalmente nos volveríamos a quedar con ellos. 
La casa es muy acogedora y la habitación es muy cómoda. Tiene un closet, un escritorio, una cajonera y la cama y el siempre bienvenido espejo. En cuanto al barrio es residencial, lo que se agradece cuando uno pasa gran parte del día en lugares turísticos, queda muy cerca de dos estaciones de metro 24hrs y es muy fácil moverse por el barrio. Tiene restaurantes muy ricos, supermercados, farmacias, lo que uno necesite!

Totalmente recomiendo a Clement & Natalia, ellos son muy cálidos y como ellos mismo lo dicen, te hacen sentir en casa fuera de casa! 

Muchas gracias por todo, hicieron nuestros últimos días de Luna de Miel, los mejores!

Esta fue nuestra primera experiencia con AirBnB y fue satisfactoria. Muchas gracias a esta bonita pareja!!


Clement y Natalia son personas cálidas, respetuosas y muy serviciales. Nos sentimos acogidos y tranquilos con ellos.

El alojamiento fue bueno, la habitación limpia y tranquila, la cama nos resultó muy cómoda y realmente logramos descansar muy bien!

El barrio es tranquilo con buena oferta de comida, Laundry y transporte.  La estación del metro esta a unas pocas cuadras.  Y estar en Harlem facilita mucho la experiencia de participar en una misa Gospel! Hay varias iglesias a muy pocas cuadras, una de las más apetecidas esta a 3 cuadras. 

El edificio tiene sus años y hay que subir 2 niveles de escalas para subir al piso 3 (lo habíamos leído en otros reviews) pero realmente nos resultó irrelevante. 

Les dejamos un plan detallado por días para conocer NewYork, Natalia lo tiene y lo mejoró con sus comentarios!  Esperamos que lo puedan compartir y que les sea de utilidad para vivir la expedición Manhatan!!

I just came back home from a week in NYC and it's really been a pleasure so Natalia and Clement have been nice and kind. I've been welcomed as a guest much than a customer, they immediatly made it sweet and easy to me to set up, without being embarassing or anything, they are just naturelly gentle. I had a real good time and I strongly recommand the place.
Natalia was extremely friendly from the moment we got there. Gave us the key and helped us fell welcomed. Clement was also very helpful. They made us feel right at home and comfortable.

Era nuestra primera vez con Airbnb y ha sido genial. Natalia y Clement son hospitalarios, muy simpáticos, y siempre dispuestos a ayudar y a resolver nuestras dudas. 
La habitación era amplia y la cama bastante cómoda, muy importante cuando estás todo el día dando vueltas por la ciudad. 
Con ellos todo son facilidades, lo cual ha hecho nuestra estancia muy agradable. :-)

Natalia and Clement are amongst the most welcoming hosts I've ever experienced – they gave us tips about current events going on in the city and were always up for some good talks! Apart from that, the apartment is very cozy, clean and we could do everything in the communal space from cooking in the kitchen to relaxing in the living room. Also, the apartment is conveniently located as there are two subway stops nearby, with a several lines heading to Downtown Manhattan, Brooklyn and The Bronx. But we also enjoyed walking through the neighborhood to explore some of the nice cafés, bars and cultural venues in Harlem. Thank you very much for having us, we're looking forward to coming back some time!

El barrio era perfecto para mi primer estadía en NYC, me sentí muy cómodo con todos los servicios que disponía y no le faltaba nada. El departamento era tal cual la descripción y fotografías. Muy acogedor, limpio y ordenado. Clement & Natalia son excelentes y de verdad que me hicieron sentir muy cómodo y a gusto. No tengo más que palabras de agradecimiento para los 2. Mejor lugar no podría haber elegido. Lo recomiendo totalmente.

I had an amazing stay with Clement and Natalia ! 
I felt at home ... The apartment is very spacious and very well furnished so I immediately felt comfortable.
They are very nice. It was a real pleasure to meet them. I had a really good time in their appartment and I appreciated that I could discuss with them about my NYC experience. We had many interests in common. 
I consider Harlem and their appartment  as home.
I love Harlem. You can walk around and discover a lof of shops, restaurants, coffees. I had a real good time and I strongly recommand the place.

It was a pleasure staying at Clement's & Natalia's home. They are both very nice and helpfull persons and made me feel home in New York. I can recommend their place to everyone! It's clean and very close to the subway station. There is pretty much everything one needs very close to the appartment: restaurants, shops, transportation etc.

Clement & Natalia were the perfect hoste! Natalia gave us some advice and help us for everything. We stay 1 week to visit NYC. The place is great and very closed from the subway, restaurants and supermarkets. The room were we slept was very quiet. It's very clean. A good place to stay in NYC!

Con mi hermana nos hospedamos en lo de Natalia y Clement, y la verdad es que nos sentimos muy cómodas. El departamento es tal cual se ve en la fotos, la habitación estuvo bien para dos personas, y la cama super cómoda.  A pocas cuadras hay subte, varias líneas, lo que hace a la zona del departamento muy accesible, con diversos negocios abiertos hasta tarde para hacerse de provisiones. En cuanto a la seguridad, estuvimos muy tranquilas, y siempre nos movimos con confianza por el barrio. 
Natalia estuvo muy atenta a nuestras necesidades y a mantener fluía la comunicción. Nos brindo siempre la mejor atención, simpatía y amabilidad. Sin dudas, recomendamos este alojamiento!
Todo muy agradable, la habitación muy acogedora y organizada. La cocina siempre limpia y con todos los implementos necesarios. Natalia una gran anfitriona, muy amable y nos ayudó mucho.

Nous avons été chaleureusement accueillis par Natalia. Quelques jours plus tard, Clement est arrivé et a également été très sympathique. L'appartement est agréable à vivre et le quartier est vivant. Notre séjour à NYC restera inoubliable !

Todo muy bien, el departamento es muy cómodo, las fotos reflejan muy bien el lugar. Esta ubicado cerca de 2 lineas de subte lo que lo hace muy cómodo. El barrio es tranquilo. Tanto Clement como Natalia contestan todas las inquietudes y están pendientes de cualquier cosa que se necesite.
Muy lindo lugar.
Un lugar acogedor, realmente como estar en casa. Departamento bien ubicado, con estaciones de metro muy cerca, supermercados y tiendas. Totalmente recomendable.
Natalia and  Clement have a beautiful place. We had a great time for a week we were there. Would book again.

name: Centrally Located Family House
summary: My place is close to Sydney CBD, Iron cove bay, Rozelle Village and  Leichhardt aquatic centre. You’ll love my place because of the ambience, the neighbourhood, and ease of access to Sydney and the beaches. the comfy beds. My place is good for 2 x couples, business travellers, and families (with kids).
description: My place is close to Sydney CBD, Iron cove bay, Rozelle Village and  Leichhardt aquatic centre. You’ll love my place because of the ambience, the neighbourhood, and ease of access to Sydney and the beaches. the comfy beds. My place is good for 2 x couples, business travellers, and families (with kids). Whole House Yes, I will be available on the phone. Lilyfield feels like a little village miles from a city with family-friendly cafes, parks, and restaurants. The famous Iron cove and the 7km bay run is 3 mins walk from the house offering water views across the inner west. A great spot to explore not only the local area but also Sydney and its surrounds Bus and light rail service can take you into Sydney within 10mins, 5 mins to Rozelle and Balmain. 20 Mins to Balmoral Beach and Eastern Suburbs by car.
neighborhood_overview: Lilyfield feels like a little village miles from a city with family-friendly cafes, parks, and restaurants. The famous Iron cove and the 7km bay run is 3 mins walk from the house offering water views across the inner west. A great spot to explore not only the local area but also Sydney and its surrounds
transit: Bus and light rail service can take you into Sydney within 10mins, 5 mins to Rozelle and Balmain. 20 Mins to Balmoral Beach and Eastern Suburbs by car.
access: Whole House
interaction: Yes, I will be available on the phone.
house_rules: - Be pleasant to the neighbors - Place out the bins on Wednesday night - No loud music

host.host_about: Orginally from London England but now residing in Sydney Australia. I have a young family which takes up most of my time but also play as much golf and football as possible!

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 65 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Artistic house in the center of BCN
summary: Hello ! We are renting Laila's Bedroom 3 in our beautiful flat (while laila is traveling !). The apartment is very central , 120 m2, with a big living room and an amazing kitchen, next to the Palau de la Musica. Looking forward to host you
space: We love our flat and contribute to his decoration and life all the time. Lots of furniture and painting have been done by one of us or one of our friends. The space is luminous, well ventilated (Important in summer !),  and impressively calm for a location in the old city centre of Barcelona! The ceiling is high giving majesty to the space. We hope you will feel at home here.
description: Hello ! We are renting Laila's Bedroom 3 in our beautiful flat (while laila is traveling !). The apartment is very central , 120 m2, with a big living room and an amazing kitchen, next to the Palau de la Musica. Looking forward to host you We love our flat and contribute to his decoration and life all the time. Lots of furniture and painting have been done by one of us or one of our friends. The space is luminous, well ventilated (Important in summer !),  and impressively calm for a location in the old city centre of Barcelona! The ceiling is high giving majesty to the space. We hope you will feel at home here. Your bedroom will become your private space, while sharing bathrooms and kitchen. We enjoy hosts and wish we can share a nice moment together. We are working most of the day but might meet you in the evening and the morning. In general the location is really nice, within the old city center, close to the touristic area but far enough to have a calm street. At 5min walking you wi
neighborhood_overview: In general the location is really nice, within the old city center, close to the touristic area but far enough to have a calm street.
transit: At 5min walking you will find plenty of fancy bars and restaurants, and some nice shops. you have also on Laetana a grocery shop open till 3am that should cover all your basic needs. Mercat Santa Caterina at 3min walking is also a nice place to make food shopping (we love people cooking at home :)) At 10min away you will be in the touristic area with tons of place to visit, museum and shops. At 20 min walking you will be either on the beach or in any place of the old city center ! The place is really nicely connected with the rest of the city using the metro (station Urquinaona, with L1 red and L3 yellow) If you wish to visit further Catalonia, The train station Arc de Triomf will bring you almost everywhere with the regional train network Rodalies ((URL HIDDEN)
access: Your bedroom will become your private space, while sharing bathrooms and kitchen.
interaction: We enjoy hosts and wish we can share a nice moment together. We are working most of the day but might meet you in the evening and the morning.
house_rules: Your welcome to join us !

host.host_about:
We are a fun team of young artist, architect and philosophe (30's) happy to share our flat when we travel around the world in search of adventure and discoveries. We are all working during the day, but when in the house, we love to share our passions with new and interesting people. (Don't worry we'll let you privacy if you wish).
Hope to meet you soon.

address.government_area: Sant Pere, Santa Caterina i la Ribera

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The house is located in the very city centre. The hosts are nice, away most of the time, and offer all the services of the house (fridge, kitchen, etc). The house is old but clean and very spacious, so our stay was very pleasant.

Colador was a very Nice Host! They Shared all of them with us, were always very friendly and gave us a lot of ideas, what er can do in Barcelona! 
The flat is in a very good Place and is Really beautiful! We Hope we'll come Again soon!
Barrio muy simpático, piso original y artístico! Fuimos muy bien recibidos por Colador... Les recommanda!
We had an amazing time with these guys! They were super friendly, helped us with everything, they are open minded and very cool! Stay with them, your will enjoy!

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour. Nos hôtes étaient des personnes très accueillantes et ils étaient toujours là pour nous donner des conseils (lieux de visites, restaurations, etc... ). Le logement était nickel, comme indiqué sur les photos et de plus, il est proche de toutes activités. L'endroit est plaisant et calme. Encore un tout grand merci !! Nous vous le conseillons très fortement et nous y retournerions très volontiers.

The kitchen and bathrooms are shared so it has a communal feel much like having (Hidden by Airbnb) - you are welcome to leave things in the fridge and cook etc. so it is a nice way to integrate and feel at home.

All the (Hidden by Airbnb) make you feel very comfortable. With plenty of great tips on the area - they are very friendly and lovely people. Don't hesitate as this is located in a great area and they give you all the independence you need to come and go as you please. 

Thanks again! :)

Colador was very welcoming and helpful! He knew great places to eat and visit during our stay.  The location was central, but it stayed relatively quiet so noise was never an issue.  All in all, we're glad we chose Colador's place!
Logement correspondant aux photos et Colador a été très accueillant et sympathique avec nous!
Super emplacement et logement tres agreable.

The location is excellent and the communication was very good. I was met with friendly and open people, the bed and shower are good and I had a nice time staying at Colador's place. This is a shared flat so it has a relaxed student-feel over it which suited me well and is great for interacting with the host.

name: Country house with pool
summary: The house is situated in the middle of Quinta Vinha Dónicas , in the parish of Rossas , 6 km from Arouca Village and is surrounded by gardens with views of the surrounding mountains. The house has access exclusive to the pool with salty water where reign sun, calm and nature.
space: The house is unique in its kind because it is located in the center of the property so it has no road noise and it has all privacy in the pool.
description: The house is situated in the middle of Quinta Vinha Dónicas , in the parish of Rossas , 6 km from Arouca Village and is surrounded by gardens with views of the surrounding mountains. The house has access exclusive to the pool with salty water where reign sun, calm and nature. The house is unique in its kind because it is located in the center of the property so it has no road noise and it has all privacy in the pool. The house has a parking space inside the property, exclusive access to the pool and gardens surrounding the house.
access: The house has a parking space inside the property, exclusive access to the pool and gardens surrounding the house.
interaction: Je suis toujours disponible pour repondre aux questions et sollicitations.

host.host_about:
sou uma pessoa sociável e que gosta de receber.
"Arouca the place to be"

reviews.comments: Sergio et sa famille ont été adorables et très disponibles pour nous. L'appartement et la piscine sont conformes aux photos. La région est magnifique ! Un vrai coup de coeur pour les hôtes et la région !! <3
Séjour très agréable, la maison est conforme au descriptif. Sergio est un hôte très agréable et disponible. Un grand merci à lui et à sa famille. Nous reviendrons sûrement

Esta estadia proporcionou-nos um fim-de-semana repleto de tranquilidade, total privacidade , longe da confusão e ruídos, num local muito calmo e agradável. Conseguimos descansar e relaxar, e agradecemos a simpatia do proprietário que sempre foi prestável em todas as informações solicitadas. Uma experiência a repetir!

Mal chegamos fomos muito bem recebidos e sentimo-nos logo à vontade. A casa é exatamente como descrito e embora sem "luxos", é perfeita para acomodar 5 adultos. Ambiente muito tranquilo e com estacionamento privado, o que é sempre bom! No verão a piscina privada será uma mais valia excelente!
super séjour! très belle maison; hôte très accueillant. à refaire !
La casa es pequeña pero muy confortable, ideal para disfrutar la piscina. Nis niños lo pasaron en grande. Tanto Sergio como su familia muy amables y pendientes de todo.  Para repetir.

Sérgio et sa famille ont été très accueillants. La maison et la piscine étaient conformes au descriptif. On a beaucoup apprécié les randonnées de la région d'Arouca et la tranquillité de l'emplacement.

Ótima experiência em Arouca. A casa fica perto da vila e tem todas as comodidades que se podem ver pelas fotos e descrição. O Sérgio e restante família fizeram de tudo para nos facilitar a estadia, dando todo o espaço para nos sentirmos à vontade e com toda a privacidade. Recomendo.

Très bon accueil et notre hôte a été présent pour chaque petit détail pratique (venir nous chercher à l'arrivée car le GPS ne trouvait pas, nous indiquer la meilleure route pour repartir...). La maison est très agréable, garantit un maximum d'intimité et est parfaitement équipée, notamment la cuisine. Super séjour, que nous recommandons chaudement.

Nous avons eu un accueil formidable de la part de Sérgio ainsi que sa famille.
La maison est très agréable, parfaitement équipée, au calme dans un joli environnement.
Après les promenades le plus est de pouvoir plonger dans la piscine parfaitement entretenue.
Cette région du Portugal est absolument à découvrir, pour la beauté de sa nature, sa gastronomie et l’hospitalité de ses habitants.
Merci Sérgio




et permet de découvrir une région magnifique.
El anfitrión nos hizo sentir bien. Barrio correcto

Nous venons de passer une semaine dans cette maison près de Arouca, les photos correspondent exactement aux lieux. La piscine est très agréable, le calme est là, le cadre magnifique... L'accueil de Sergio au top, très souriant ainsi que sa famille. Je recommande fortement cette maison :)!
lugar ideal para fugir do stress da cidade , optima piscina !!

Fomos bem recebidos e o Sérgio foi muito prestável. A casa fica bem localizada e é muito sossegada. Quem for de verão pode Ainda aproveitar a zona da piscina. Recomendamos para quem queira ir conhecer Arouca e os passadiços do Paiva.

Desde a flexibilidade de Check in ao Check out.. A recepção e a disponibilidade para responder a todas as questões o Sr. Sérgio foi fantástico. 
Deu nos toda a privacidade e ainda nos deixou prolongar mais umas horas a estadia para aproveitar o sol. A casa era fantástica,  teve o cuidado de nos ligar o aquecimento com antecedência e a limpeza da casa não tem nada a apontar. As vistas são maravilhosas e as imediações super silenciosas. De manhã só ouvimos o som da natureza com os passarinhos a chilrear! Recomendo vivamente!
Fantástica casa, local tranquilo. Ideal para Famílias.
Exatamente como anunciado. Host muito atencioso. Recomendo.
Casa muito bem equipada, em especial a cozinha.
Espaço bastante agradavel, tanto interior como exterior. Quartos confortaveis, cozinha e sala equipadas, piscina com espreguiçadeiras e mesa para refeiçoes. Hospedes muito atenciosos!
Óptimo espaço, tranquilo é exatamente igual as fotos. Hospitalidade dos proprietários foi fantástica. Espaço a voltar e a recomendar.
Boa estadia

Ambiente tranquilo, muito confortável para passeio em família e aproveitar a piscina. 
A 15/20min de carro dos passadiços do paiva. 
Cozinha muito completa, limpeza e acolhimento 5 estrelas.
Sergio was a great host and the house was amazing: 200% recommended!
Pour profiter d'un moment de calme en famille, un transat au bord de la piscine, le top!

Merci pour votre accueil par la maman et le coucou de Sergio...l'impression d'être en famille. Les enfants ont adorés la (Website hidden by Airbnb) nous aussi...les repas à l exterieur sous la tonelle...conforme à la description...Merci encore on recommande sans hésitation. ..

Wonderfull! Everything 100% fantastic!
Koen

A fantastic host. The house is great, clean and with all the necessary utensils needed. With a privileged view over the mountain range the sunrise is beautiful and quiet. Just the noise of nature. I recommend it. ;)

Recomendado! Boa localização, excelente comunicação com o anfitrião.
Bom local para relaxar.
Todo perfecto. La amabilidad de sergio y su familia te hace la estancia muy agradable.

Experiencia para repetir, en verano volveremos. Fuimos con mucha lluvia a nuestro paso por Aveiro y Oporto, una zona increíble de montaña, y por eso queremos repetir, la lluvia no nos dejo apreciar los alrededores. Familia muy atenta y respetuosa. Casa muy tranquila, no se escucha a ningun vecino cercano y vistas espectaculares.

Espaço muito acolhedor, cozinha totalmente equipada. Pessoas muito atenciosas e simpáticas.
Casa muito acolhedora.
Very good place and comfortable. This place is good for summer vacation with private swimming pool. Great place to take a dog also. Sérgio is a very nice guy and will help for anything you need.

We stayed at this property for two weeks. Sérgio is an amazing host! Fast responses to our questions before arrival and always available. The house is stunning, more beautiful than in the pictures, bright and spacious. We received a box of traditional Portuguese pastries as a welcome gift! The village is quiet, but it is also only minutes away from Arouca, a very charming town. Lots to do around the area: restaurants, trails, museums, parks. It is close to Porto and historical cities in the North and Center if Portugal. It was a perfect holiday! Thank you, Sérgio and family! We are already planning our next visit!

Accueil chaleureux dans un logement correspondant au descriptif. Linge de toilette et parures de draps fournis.
Piscine propre et opérationnelle. Un grand merci aux parents de Sergio qui ont tout fait pour que notre séjour soit
 le plus agréable possible. Un lave vaisselle serait le bienvenu

Great place, the photos don't do the views justice. 

Nice apartment to have a cosy vibe, with friendly, helpful hosts.

Um espaço muito acolhedor, limpo e organizado, com todas as comodidades. Anfitriões excepcionais, muito atenciosos, e sempre à distância de uma chamada. Um local muito tranquilo, ideal para relaxar com a família ou amigos. Vou voltar em breve!!!
Idéal pour le repos et visiter Arouca

Logement simple mais plutôt sympathique, piscine profonde et grande mais non chauffé (donc froide dans notre cas)  et possibilité de manger à l’extérieur avec une jolie vue et une petit épicerie à proximité

excellent stay at a calm place, very beautiful view and good quality of infrastructures. the area is fully closed which is a good thing if you come with your dog (like we did). very warm welcome from Sergio as well. for sure we will come back.
Optimo local para se ficar hospedado numa ida a Arouca ou a Castelo de Paiva. Sentimo nos realmente em contacto com a natureza! Excelente hospitalidade por parte do anfitrião.

O Sérgio foi um anfitrião impecável. O espaço e  espectacular, bem localizado e muito privado. O facto de permitir levar o nosso cão foi uma mais valia que muito apreciamos. Recomendo a todas as pessoas que visitem Arouca. Venham conhecer este espaço. Não se vão arrepender .

Casa muito cómoda, não foge ao que está descrito. 
Piscina muito agradável e casa muito fresca para os dias de mais calor. 
Cozinha totalmente equipada e limpa. 
Fomos muito bem recebidos. 
A cerca de 20min dos Passadiços do Paiva. 
Recomendo e espero voltar!

It is necessary to inform guests that it is not possible to drive to the house by car. And that need to climb two stairs. For us, this was not a problem, but for other people it can be very bad.
Wonderful owner and his mom. Very nice home. If you can walk the stairs, 100% recommendation. Not suitable for small children.

name: Large flat Mid-Levels with harbor/skyline views
summary: Perched in the Mid Levels, 10 minutes’ walk from Central busy city life. ~1,200 sq feet (~110 sqm) with a spacious living area, 3 brightly lit bedrooms and a balcony overlooking HK harbor and skyline. Perfect place to relax and experience city living!
space: You can use our entire apartment, including 3 large, separate bedrooms. The living room is very large (essentially two rooms) and bright with views over Hong Kong harbor and light coming from an inner courtyard. The table can sit up to 10 people and is great for dinners with family and friends.
description: Perched in the Mid Levels, 10 minutes’ walk from Central busy city life. ~1,200 sq feet (~110 sqm) with a spacious living area, 3 brightly lit bedrooms and a balcony overlooking HK harbor and skyline. Perfect place to relax and experience city living! You can use our entire apartment, including 3 large, separate bedrooms. The living room is very large (essentially two rooms) and bright with views over Hong Kong harbor and light coming from an inner courtyard. The table can sit up to 10 people and is great for dinners with family and friends. There's a shared rooftop on the last floor of the building! Just walk up to the 6th floor and take the door outside. We are always available by phone, email and Airbnb messaging - we respond quite fast. We look forward to welcoming our guests upon arrival and showing you around our place. As you settle in, we like to give you space so you feel at home! Our place is perched in the Mid Levels, a residential neighborhood of Hong Kong. The sea breeze f
neighborhood_overview: Our place is perched in the Mid Levels, a residential neighborhood of Hong Kong. The sea breeze flowing in makes summer temperatures more pleasant.
notes: Feel free to ask for tips on visiting Hong Kong if this is your first time there! We can leave city guides and maps.
transit: Getting around has never been easier! There are 2 bus stops with 6 bus lines connecting you to all of Hong Kong. Central and Admiralty are 10 minutes away. Or simply hail one of the many taxis that drive around. All facilities (supermarkets, restaurants, bakery etc) are within walking distance.
access: There's a shared rooftop on the last floor of the building! Just walk up to the 6th floor and take the door outside.
interaction: We are always available by phone, email and Airbnb messaging - we respond quite fast. We look forward to welcoming our guests upon arrival and showing you around our place. As you settle in, we like to give you space so you feel at home!
house_rules: Kids welcome! No smoking, no pets please.

host.host_about:
We're a French couple living in HK since 2013 with two kids. We love traveling across Asia to far away places, scuba diving, fine dining and getting to know new people! 

As travelers using Airbnb we loved the encounters and "home away from home" feeling. Now that we settled down as a family, we would love to provide the experience as hosts welcoming newcomers to HK.

reviews.comments: It's a very cozy and spacious place with fantastic view. My 2 kids love it very much. Nadia & Thierry had been very considerate during our stay. We would definitely come back!

What a wonderful experience. The apartment is well situated and about 5-6 min walk to convenience store, grocery store, pharmacy and coffee shop. From there, go down a flight of stairs and you have access to many nice restaurants. 

We were welcome by Nova their Ayi  (maid) (since Nadia and Thierry were on holidays) who was really nice to us and even walked me to show me where the stores and restaurants were. We couldn't have got a better reception.  Moreover we even were offered the option to have Nova come over to watch our baby if we needed so and this for a very small fee. This is also great for parents who might want a diner out. 

The place was spotless and had all we could wish for. But the most important for us and, I am sure, many other travelers is that there is a baby room with the cot, toys and the whole main room is baby proof. Wow that was amazing for us traveling with our 1 year old. 

Bedding in China and Asia can often be quite on the hard side but not in this home. The bed and pillow were real comfy actually we forgot to check the brand of the mattress and pillow to ask Nadia and Thierry since my wife's back pain disappeared during the trip. 

There were also nice touch like toot brush and bath products were provided in a small kit like in an Hotel.

There is a large balcony, very useful, especially if you smoke, since you don't have to go all the way downstairs.

Communication was very easy with Thierry and they are very responsive.
All in all we were very very please with the apartment and our host and recommend them strongly. We had bad experience in the past with airbnb but this made us feel that there are gems out there like this one.

We were welcomed by Nadia and Thierry's helper Nova who helped us carry our bags up the four flights of stairs.  After that we had a wonderful time in Nadia and Thierry's  beautifully decorated flat.  There were 4 of us and a baby and the flat is well geared towards small children.  The flat is extremely spacious with a bathroom and an ensuite - a rare find in Hong Kong.  We were made to feel very welcome and I would definitely recommend staying here.

Parfait !
l'appartement est non seulement bien situé, entre le pic et central, mais aussi très bien décoré. L'accueil a été assuré par Nova "l'helper" de Nadia et Thierry qui nous a donné tous les renseignements nécessaires, sur l'appartement et sur le quartier. De plus Nadia et Thierry répondent très vite aux moindres questions, par mail ou autre. nous avons passé 4 jours superbes à HK, pour notre première visite.
Ne cherchez pas mieux, vous perdrez votre temps...nous avons déjà conseillé cette adresse à tous nos amis et collègues vivant comme nous en Chine.

It was a very nice Flat with a marvelous view on Hong Kong. Unfortunately it was very cold and we had to heat a little bit. Everything what we needed was here, I only was surprised, that even the rings and bracelets and so on we're laying around in the bathroom. I hope, everything was on its place. 
For us it was really nice, thank you Nadia and Thierry and nova!
This is lovely spacious and clean apartment. It is extremely suitable for families with children such as ours. Lots of toys, great view over Hong Kong and well connected with transport.

Nadia & Thierry's place is awesome! It's walkable to central and soho where there are lots of dinning options. The place itself is clean and very spacious. The best thing is that Nadia and Thierry made it very easy - from enquiry to getting to the place, they are very welcoming and considerate, they are definitely great hosts and I highly recommend their place

We had a perfect stay at Nadia and Thierry's beautiful apartment. Travelling with my parents, I was looking for an alternative to an apartment and several times during our stay in the apartment, we all commented just how lucky we were to have such a fantastic temporary "home" in HK. The apartment itself is spacious (by any standards but especially in HK!) and was very comfortable for a party of five adults like ours. It was also very clean and the kitchen was well-equipped for our Christmas lunch.

Nadia and Thierry were incredibly proactive in communicating both before and during our booking to make sure we had everything we needed. They even made a special effort to make sure we had the right bedding to accomodate all of us. Nova (Nadia and Thierry's helper) was lovely and did a great job helping us check in and also staying in touch during our stay.

Overall, the apartment really made our trip and I would recommend it in a heartbeat to others, especially for those with small children as it is perfectly set up for that. Thank you for having us!

Nadia & Thierry's place is very clean, spacious and homey -- 3 of us had our own rooms plus a common space and 2 bathrooms.  The area is nice and quiet and has a bus stop nearby + the neighborhood has a lot of cute cafes and stores.  Walking is a bit of an effort due to the hills but overall really great airbnb and experience with Nadia & Thierry - highly recommend.  Their communication is great and it was easy to check in and check out!  Thank you!
Nice service, good views, clean and spacious. Couldn't be better!

The communication with Nadia & Thierry was very smooth before and during our stay. They always had promptly and helpful response. The apartment is very spacious, especially in HK standard. A little complaint is that there's no room for us to put out our clothes at all, we have to live out of a suitcase. And the 4 flight stairs is a bit challenging for us with 3 young kids, especially when we have to haul all the luggages up and down the stairs. The little private road leads close to the building is quite narrow, we got complaints from most taxi drivers about having difficulty to make a U turn back down. Overall, we had a great time staying at Nadia & Thierry's apartment.
非常感谢房东,房东非常友好,非常满意的一次旅行!

This place is incredible.  Very easy to walk to cool spots, grab groceries, and it has plenty of space for all three of us!  The view was amazing!  We ended up spending some time in the apartment it was just so nice!  

This is an amazing place, and I encourage you to compare the SIZE of any place you are going to be looking at to this one.  NO comparison.

Great location, only ten minutes walk to Soho. Spacious which is so hard to find in Hk especially in Central. Nadia and Thierry were great host and always responded to my questions right away. Kids room with 2 beds were great for my little ones. Highly recommended!
The great place to stay in Hong Kong, Nadia & Thierry are extremely hospitable hosts.

The location is great! Easy access to subway and very easy to catch a cab. Quiet and wonderful neighborhood. Just expect a bit of a climb up the hill to the apartment, a little difficult with suitcases if the taxi driver refuses to go up the hill (since it's narrow, the driver will have to back the car down the hill, thus the reluctance). The home owners are wonderful people, and their neighbor's helper Laila was also very helpful. Would highly recommend this apartment!
A great spacious flat, nice view across to Kowloon and very central location.
Bright and charming flat with Hong Kong skyline and harbor views - great experience living in Mid-Levels!
非常棒的住宿,非常感谢房东的支持和他助理的帮助.下次希望能住宿.
